/study/scriptures/dc-testament/introduct.title: Chisumo
text: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano zviunganidzwa zvezvakazarurwa zvinoyera nezvirevo zvakafemerwa zvakapihwa kuitira kumiswa nokugadziridzwa kweumambo hwaMwari pano pasi mumazuva ekupedzisira. Kunyangwe zvazvo zvikamu zvizhinji zvakanangana nenhengo dzeChechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira, mashoko, yambiro nezvikomekedzwa zviripo pakubatsira munhu wose uye zvinekukoka kuvanhu vose kwose kwose kuti vanzwe izwi raIshe Jesu Kristu, vachitaura kwavari nezveupenyu hwavo hwenguva ino nezveruponeso rwavo rwusingaperi.

Zvakazarurwa zvizhinji muchiunganidzwa ichi zvakagamuchirwa nekuburikidza naJoseph Smith, Mwana, muporofita nemutungamiriri wekutanga weChechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira. Zvimwewo zvakazounzwa kuburikidza nevamwe vevatevedzeri vake muhutungamiri (ona misoro yezvikamu 135, 136 ne138, neZvirevo zveChechi 1 ne 2).

Bhuku reDzidziso neZvibvumirano nderimwe remagwaro anoshandiswa neChechi pamwechete neBhaibheri, Bhuku raMormoni, neDombo reMutengo Mukuru. Zvisinei, Dzidziso neZvibvumirano rinokosha zvikuru nokuti harisi dudziro yegwaro rakare, asi nderenguva ino uye rakapihwa naMwari mukuburikidza nevaporofita vake vakasarudzirwa mukudzorerwazve kwebasa ravo tsvene nekumiswa kweumambo hwaMwari pasi mumazuva ano. Mune zvakazarurwa, mumwe anonzwa izwi raIshe Jesu Kristu rakapfava asi rakatsunga, richitaura patsva mumukuwo wekuzara kwenguva, uye basa ratangiswa pano iri, nderekugadzirira kuuya kwavo kwepiri, mukuzadzikisa uye zvichiwirirana nemazwi evose vaporofita matsvene kubva nyika ichatanga.

Joseph Smith, Mwana, akaberekwa musi wa23 Zvita 1805, muSharon, muRuwa rweWindsor, Vermont. Munguva yekutanga yeupenyu hwake, akatama nemhuri yake kuenda kuManchester, kumadokero kweNew York. Apo paaigara pedyo neManchester mumwaka wepfumvudza muna 1820, aine makore gumi nemana okuberekwa, akaona chiratidzwa chake chokutanga, munove maakashanyirwa naMwari Baba vekusingaperi, neMwanakomana wavo Jesu Kristu, pachezvavo. Akataurirwa muchiratidzo ichi kuti Chechi yechokwadi yaJesu Kristu yakange yakamiswa munguva yeTestamende Itsva, uye yakange yashandira kuzadzikiswa kwevhangeri, rakange risisipo pano pasi. Zvimwe zviratidzo zvinoyera zvakatevera munove ndimo maakadzidziswa nengirozi dzakawanda, zvikaratidzwa kwaari kuti Mwari vaive nebasa rinokosha rekuti iye agozoita pano pasi uye kuti nekuburikidza maari Chechi yaJesu Kristu yaizodzoserwazve pasi.

Mukufamba kwenguva, Joseph Smith akakwanisa nerubatsiro rwunoyera nekuburitsa Bhuku raMormoni. Munguva iyoyo, iye naOliver Cowdery vakagadzwa hupurisita hwaAroni naJohane Mubapatidzi muna Chivabvu 1829 (ona D&Z 13), uye mushure mezvo vakazogadzwa zvakare Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki neVaapositori vakare Petro, Jakobo naJohane (ona D&Z 27:12) Kumwe kugadzwa kwazotevera monove makiyi ehupirisita akagadzwa pavari naMosesi, Erija, Eria nevaporofita vakawanda (ona D&Z 110; 128:18, 21). Kugadzwa uku, kwatove kudzorerwa kutsvene kwemasimba dzvene raMwari kuvanhu pano pasi. Musi wa6 Kubvumbi 1830, pasi pehutungamiri hwekudenga muporofita Joseph Smith akaronga nekumisa Chechi nekudaro Chechi yechokwadi yaJesu Kristu yave kushandazve sehurongwa mukati mevanhu, riinemvumo yekudzidzisa vhangeri nekuita zvisungo zveruponeso. (Ona Dombo reMutengo Mukuru, Nhoroondo—yaJoseph Smith 1: 1–75 neD&Z 20.)

Zvakazarurwa izvi zvinoera zvakatambirwa kubva mumhinduro yemunamato, munguva dzekuda rubatsiro, uye zvakazoburitsa zvinhu zvinoitika muupenyu zvichibatanidzira vanhu chaivo. Muporofita nevamwe vake vakatsvaga hutungamiriri hunoyera uye zvakazarurwa izvi zvinotsigira kuti vakazvitambira. Mune zvakazarurwa mumwe anoona kudzoserwazve nekuvhurika kwevhangeri raJesu Kristu nekuunza muupenyu mukuwo wekuzadzikiswa kwenguva. Kufamba kuenda kumadokero kweChechi kubva kuNew York uye Pennsylvania kusvikira Ohio kuMissouri, kuIllinois nekupedzisira nekuGreat Basin yekumadokero kweAmerica uye kutambura kukuru kweVatendi mukuedza kuvaka Zioni pano pasi munguva ino zvinoratidzwa mune zvakazarurwa izvi.

Zvimwe zvezvikamu zvakatikuti zvekutanga zvinosanganisa zvinhu zviri maererano nekupindurwa nekuburitswa kweBhuku raMormoni (ona zvikamu 3, 5, 10, 17, na19). Zvimwe zvikamu zvinotevera zvinoratidza basa reMuporofita Joseph Smith mukugadzirira mukupindura kwakafemerwa kweBhaibheri munova zvizhinji zvezvikamu zvikuru zvedzidziso zvakazotambirwa (ona, semuenzaniso, zvikamu 37, 45, 73, 76, 77, 86, 91, ne132, chimwe nechimwe chine kuwirirana kwakanangana nekupindurwa kweBhaibheri).

Muzvakazarurwa, dzidziso dzevhangeri dzinoiswa pachena netsananguro dzehwaro hwezvinhu sechimiro cheMusoro wehuMwari, mavambo emunhu, mamiriro chaiwo aSatani, chinangwa cheupenyu huno, kukosha kwekuteerera, kudikanwa kwekutendeuka, mashandiro eMweya Mutsvene, zvisungo nezviitiko zvinechekuita neruponeso, magumo enyika, mamiriro achateera emunhu mushure meKumuka kuVakafa neKutongwa, kusapera kwehukama hwekuroorana, uye mamiriro emhuri okusingaperi. Saizvozvo, kubuda pachena zvishoma nezvishoma kwehurongwa hwemashandiro echimiro cheChechi zvinoratidzwa nekudaidzwa kwemaBhishopi, vaTungamiri veKutanga, Dare revaneGumi neVaviri nevaneMakumi Manomwe uye kumiswa kweZvimwe zvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri nezvikwata. Mukupedzisira, uchapupu hunopihwa pamusoro paJesu Kristu—humwari hwake, hukuru hwake, hururami hwake, rudo rwake nesimba rake rerununuro—zvinoita kuti bhuku rino rive nekukosha kukuru kumhuri yemunhu uye richiva rinokosha kudarika upfumi hwepasi rose.

Zvakazarurwa zvakatiwandeyi zvakaburitswa muZioni (Independence), Missouri, muna 1833, pasi pemusoro unoti A Book of Commandments for the Government of the Church of Christ (Bhuku reMirairo yeHurumende yeChechi yaKristu). Maererano nechinyorwa ichi, vakuru veChechi vakapa uchapupu hwavo pamwechete kuti Ishe vakange vavapupurira mumwoyo yavo kuti zvakazarurwa izvi zvaive zvechokwadi. Apo Ishe vaienderera mberi nekutaura nevashandi vavo, chinyorwa chakakura chakazoburitswa mumakore maviri akatevera muKirtland, Ohio, chiine musoro unoti Doctrine and Covenants of the Church of Jesus Christ of the Latter Day Saints (Dzidziso neZvibvumirano zveChechi yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira). Kuchinyorwa ichi muna 1835, uchapupu hwakanyorwa hweVaapositori vaneGumi neVaviri hwakabatanidzwa sezvinotevera:
Uchapupu hwevapupuri kuBhuku reMirairo yaIshe, mirairo inove Ivo yavakapa kuChechi Yavo mukuburikidza naJoseph Smith, Mwana, uyo akadomwa nezwi reChechi kuchinangwa ichi:

Isu, naizvozvo, tinonzwa kuda kupa uchapupu kune nyika yose yevanhu, kune chisikwa chose chiri pauso hwenyika, kuti Ishe vapa umboo kumwoyo yedu mukuburikidza neMweya Mutsvene wakanga uri matiri kuti mirairo iyi yakapihwa nekufemerwa kwaMwari, uye zvinobatsira vanhu vose uye zvirokwazvo ndezvechokwadi.

Tinopa uchapupu kunyika yose, Ishe vari mubatsiri wedu uye kuburikidza nenyasha dzaMwari Baba, neMwanakomana Wavo, Jesu Kristu, kuti tinobvumidzwa kuwana mukana uyu wekupa uchapupu kunyika yose zvinove zvinotipa rufaro rwakanyanyisisa, tichinamata Ishe nguva dzose kuti vana vevanhu vanga batsirikane nazvo.
Mazita evaneGumi neVaviri:
Thomas B. Marsh
David W. Patten
Brigham Young
Heber C. Kimball
Orson Hyde
Wm. E. McLellin
Parley P. Pratt
Luke S. Johnson
William Smith
Orson Pratt
John F. Boynton
Lyman E. Johnson
Mukuburitswa kwakatevedzana kweDzidziso neZvibvumirano, zvakazarurwa zvakazowedzerwa kana zvimwe zvezvinyorwa zvakazowedzerwa sekutambirwa nekugamuchirwa nemagungano kana misangano yeChechi.

Kutanga nerakaburitswa muna 1835, zviteedzwa zvinomwe zvedzidziso yaMwari zvakazosanganiswa zvakare; izvi zvakatumidzwa kunzi Lectures on Faith (Zvidzidzo zveRutendo). Izvi zvakange zvagadzirirwa kushandiswa muChikoro cheVaporofita muKirtland, Ohio, kubva 1834 kusvikira 1835. Kunyangwe zvazvo zvichibatsira mukudzidzisa nekuraira, zvidzidzo izvi zvakasiiwa kubva muDzidziso neZvibvumirano kubvira mune rakaburitswa muna 1921 nekuti akange asina kupihwa kana nekuburitswa sezvakazarurwa kuSangano rose.

Zviri pachena kuti zvimwe zvikanganiso zvakaramba zvichingodzokererwa mune zvakaburitswa kare muChirungu, kunyanya muzvikamu zvenhoroondo yemisoro yezvikamu. Zvakadaro, chinyorwa chino chinegadziridzo yemusi nemazita enzvimbo uyezve nezvimwe zvigadziridzo zvidiki zvainge zvichikodzera. Shanduro idzi dzakaitwa kuti dziunze zvinyorwa izvi mukuwirirana nemagwaro enhoroondo. Zvimwe zvimiro zvinokosha zvechinyorwa ichi chitsva zvinosanganisira kunhadziridzwa kwerubatsiro rwemagwaro, misoro yezvikamu, zvidimbu zvechitaurwa, zvose izvi zvinove zvakagadzirirwa kubatsira vaverengi kuti vanzwisise uye kuti vafare mushoko raIshe sekupihwa kwaro muDzidziso neZvibvumirano.

Zvisumo zvezvikamu zveDzidziso neZvibvumirano zvine kuwirana neHistory of the Church (Nhoroondo yeChechi). History of the Church mabhuku anokwana kuita manomwe ezviitiko zvenhoroondo zveChechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi vaMazuva eKupedzisira kubva 1820 kusvikira 1848. Nokuti mabhuku aya haana kududzirwa uye anowanikwa chete mururimi rweChirungu, mavambo eHistory of the Church muzvisumo zvezvikamu zvechinyorwa chino cheDzidziso neZvibvumirano chinokunongedzera kumabhuku enhoroondo yeSangano ari mururimi rweChirungu.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 1
chapter_summary: 1–7, Izwi rekuyambira riri kuvanhu vose; 8–16, Kurasika pachitendero nehuipi kunotungamira Kuuya Kwechipiri; 17–23, Joseph Smith anodaidzwa kuti adzorere panyika chokwadi uye nemasimba aIshe; 24–33, Bhuku raMormoni rinounzwa, uye Chechi yechokwadi inomiswa; 34–36, Runyararo rwuchabviswa panyika; 37–39, Nzverai mirairo iyi.

verses.text: Teererai imi vanhu vechechi yangu, inotaura izwi reuyo agere kumusoro, uye ane maziso ari pamunhu wose; hongu, zviro kwazvo ndinoti: Teererai imi vanhu munobva kure; uye nemi muri pamusoro pezvitsuwa zvegungwa, teererai pamwechete.
Nokuti zviro kwazvo izwi raIshe riri kuvanhu vose, uye hakuna anopunyuka; uye hakuna ziso richatadza kuona, kana nzeve ichatadza kunzwa, kana mwoyo uchatadza kupindwa.
Uye vapanduki vachabaiwa nokusuwa kukuru; nokuti kuipa kwavo kuchataurwa pamusoro pedzimba, uye zviito zvavo zvemuruvande zvichaiswa pachena.
Uye izwi rekuyambira richave kuvanhu vose, nemiromo yevadzidzi vangu, avo vandakasarudza mumazuva ano ekupedzisira.
Uye vachaenda mberi uye hapana achavarambidza, nokuti ini Ishe ndakavaraira.
Tarisai, iyi imvumo yangu, uye nemvumo yevaranda vangu, nechisumo changu kubhuku remirairo yangu, yandakavapa kuti vaishambadze kwamuri, vagari vepanyika.
Nokudaro ityai uye mubvunde, imi vanhu, nokuti ini Ishe zvandataura mavari zvichazadzikiswa.
Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti avo vachaenda mberi, vakatakura mazwi aya kuvagari vepasi, kwavari simba rinopihwa rekusunga kwose panyika nekudenga, uye avo vasingatende nevapanduki;
Hongu, zvirokwazvo, kuvasunga kuitira zuva iro hasha dzaMwari dzichadirwa pamusoro pevakaipa zvisina mupimo—
Pazuva iro Ishe ravachauya kuzopa mubairo kumunhu wose maererano nebasa rake, nemwero kumunhu wose maererano nekuyera nekwaanenge ayera nako kune mumwe wake.
Nokudaro izwi raIshe riri nekumigumo yenyika, kuti vose avo vanoda kunzwa, vanzwe:
Gadzirirai imi, gadzirirai imi icho chichauya, nokuti Ishe vave pedyo;
Uye hasha dzaIshe dzatungidzwa, nemunondo wavo wasukwa mudenga, uye uchawira pavagari vepasi.

Uye ruoko rwaIshe rwucharatidzwa; uye zuva richauya iro rekuti avo vasingade kunzwa izwi raIshe, kana izwi revaranda vavo, kana vasingateerere mashoko evaporofita nevaapositori, vachabviswa kubva mukati mevanhu;
Nokuti varasika kubva muzvisungo zvangu, uye vatyora chibvumirano changu chisingaperi;

Havatsvake Ishe kuti vamise kururama kwavo, asi wose munhu anofamba munzira dzake pachake, uye achitevera mufananidzo wamwari wake pachake, uyo ane chimiro chakafanana nezvemunyika, uye hunhu hwacho huri hwechivezwa, icho chinochembera uye chofira muBabironi, kunyangwe Babironi huru, iyo ichapunzika.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe, ndichiziva njodzi ichauya pavagari vepasi ndakadaidza muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uye ndikataura naye ndiri kudenga, uye ndikamupa mirairo;
Uye ndikapawo mirairo kune vamwe, kuti vashambadze zvinhu izvi kunyika; uye zvose izvi kuti zvizadzikiswe, izvo zvakanyorwa nemaporofita—
Zvisinasimba zvemunyika zvichauya zvigotyora vemasimba uye nevakasimba, kuti munhu asaraye mumwe wake, kana kuvimba neruoko rwenyama—
Asi kuti wose munhu ataure muzita raMwari Ishe, kunyangwe iye Muponesi wenyika;
Kutiwo rutendo rwuwande panyika;
Kuti chibvumirano changu chisingaperi chimiswe;
Kuti kuzara kwevhangeri rangu kushambadzwe nevasinasimba nevanhuwo zvavo, kusvika kumagumo enyika, nepamberi pemadzimambo nevatongi.
Tarisai, ndini Mwari uye ndazvitaura; mirairo iyi ndeyangu, uye yakapihwa kuvaranda vangu mukushaya simba kwavo, mutsika yerurimi rwavo, kuti vasvike mukunzwisisa.
Uye kuti kana vakakanganisa zviitwe kuti zvizivikanwe.
Kuti kana sokutsvaga kwavanoita ungwaru vachadzidziswa;
Uye kuti kana sokutadza kwavanoita vanorangwa, kuti vatendeuke;
Kuti kana vakange vakazvininipisa vachaitwa kuti vasimbe, uye vagoropafadzwa kubva kumusoro, uye vagogashira ruzivo nguva nenguva.

Uye mushure mekugashira zvinyorwa zvemaNifai, hongu, kunyangwe muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, ave anokwanisa kuwana simba rekududzira kuburikidza nenyasha dzaMwari, nesimba raMwari, Bhuku raMormoni.

Uyewo neavo vakapihwa mirairo iyi vagove vanowana simba rekuwaridza hwaro hwechechi ino, uye nekuriburitsa kubva mukusaziikanwa uye nemurima, iro chete chechi rechokwadi uye rinorarama pamusoro pepasi rose, randinoti ini Ishe, rinondifadza zvikuru, ndichitaura kuchechi pamwechete kwete kune mumwe nemumwe—
Nokuti ini Ishe handigone kutarisa chitadzo ndigombochibvumira kana nepadukuduku zvapo;
Zvisinei, uyo anotendeuka uye oita mirairo yaIshe acharegererwa;
Uye uyo asingatendeuke, kwaari kuchabviswa kunyangwe chiedza chaakagashira; nokuti Mweya wangu hauzogara uchinetsana nemunhu, vanodaro Ishe veHondo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, vagari vepasi: Ini Ishe ndinoda kuita kuti zvinhu izvi zvizikanwe kune venyama vose;

Nokuti handina tsvete kuvanhu, uye ndinoda kuti vose vanhu vazive kuti zuva riri kukurumidza kuuya; nguva haisati yasvika, asi iri pedyo, apo runyararo rwuchabviswa panyika, uye dhiabhorosi achave nesimba munzvimbo yake.
Uye naiyewo Ishe vachave nesimba kuvatendi vavo, uye vachatonga vari pakati pavo, uye vachauya pasi vari mukutonga muEdomi, kana kuti nyika.
Nzverai mirairo iyi nokuti ndeye chokwadi uye yakatendeka, uye huporofita nezvivimbiso zviri mairi, zvose zvichazadzikiswa.

Zvandataura ini Ishe, ndataura, uye handitsvage chikonzero; uye kana dai zvazvo denga nenyika zvichipfuura, izwi rangu haripfuuri, asi zvose zvichazadzikiswa, kunyangwe nezwi rangu ini kana nezwi ravaranda vangu, zvakangofanana.
Nokuti tarisai, uye onai, Ishe ndiMwari, uye neMweya unopupura, uye uchapupu ndehwe chokwadi, uye chokwadi chinogara nariini nariini. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/2.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 2
chapter_summary: 1, Erija acharatidza hupirisita; 2–3, Zvivimbiso zvamadzibaba zvinodyarwa mumwoyo yevana.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndicharatidza kwamuri Hupirisita, neruoko rwaErija, muporofita, kusati kwauya zuva guru rinotyisa raIshe.
Uye achadyara mumwoyo yevana zvivimbiso zvakaitwa kumadzibaba, uye mwoyo yevana ichatendeukira kumadzibaba avo.
Dai zvisina kudaro, pasi rose raizove rinotsakatika zvachose pakuuya kwavo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/3.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 3
chapter_summary: 1–4, Nzira yaIshe yokusingaperi inogara yakadaro; 5–15, Joseph Smith anofanira kutendeuka kana kuti acharasikirwa nechipo chekududzira; 16–20, Bhuku raMormoni rinouya kuzoponesa mbeu yaRihai.

verses.text: Mabasa uye nehurongwa uye nezvinangwa zvaMwari hazvikwanisike kukanganiswa, kana kuti zvive zvinhu pasina.

Nokuti Mwari havafambe munzira dzakakombama, zve havatendeukire kurudyi kana kuruboshwe, zve havabve mune icho chavakataura, nokudaro nzira dzavo dzakatwasanuka, uye nenziro yavo inogara yakadaro nekusingaperi.
Yeukai, yeukai kuti harisi basa raMwari rinokanganiswa, asi basa revanhu;

Nokuti kana dai zvazvo munhu akave nezvakazarurwa zvakawanda aine simba rekuita mabasa mazhinji anoshamisa, kana ari anozvikudza nesimba rake, uye achishora kuraira kwaMwari, uye achitevera zvaanoda nezvido zvenyama, akafanira kupunzika uye nokuwana kutsividza kwaMwari anoenzanisa paari.
Tarisai, wakachengeteswa zvinhu izvi, asi mirairo yako yakanga yakaoma zvakadii; uye rangarira zvakare zvivimbiso zvakaitwa kwauri, kana ukasazvityora.
Uye tarisai, kuti kangani kawakatyora mirairo nemitemo ya Mwari, ukafamba uri mukufurirwa nevanhu.
Nokuti, tarisai, hauna kufanira kunge wakatya munhu kupfuura Mwari. Kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vanotora kuraira kwaMwari sekusina maturo, uye nokushora mazwi avo—
Asika ungadai wakave wakavimbika; vangadai vakatambanudza ruoko rwavo vakakutsigira mukudzivirira yose miseve inemoto yemuvengi; vangadai vakave vainewe panguva yega yega yedambudziko.
Tarisai ndiwe Joseph, uye wakasarudzwa kuita basa raIshe, asi pamusana pekutadza, kana ukasangwarira uchapunzika.
Asi rangarira, Mwari vazere nenyasha; nokudaro, tendeuka pane icho chawaita chisingapindirane nemurairo wandakakupa, nokuti iwe uchiri wakasarudzwa, uye iwe urikudaidzwa zvakare kubasa;
Kunze kwekunge waita izvi, ucharaswa uye wove sevamwewo vanhu, uye usisina kana chipo.
Uye pawakapa icho chawakanga wapihwa naMwari kuona nesimba rekududzira, wakapa icho chinoyera mumaoko emunhu akaipa,
Uyo akaita kuraira kwaMwari sekusina maturo, uye akatyora zvivimbiso zvinoyeresesa izvo zvakaitwa pamberi paMwari, uye akavimba nekuziva kwake uye akazvitutumadza neungwaru hwake pachake.
Uye ichi ndicho chikonzero chaita kuti urasikirwe nemukana wako kwechinguvana—
Nokuti iwe wakabvumira kuraira kwemutungamiri wako kuti kutsokodzerwe kubvira pakutanga.
Zvisinei, basa rangu richafambira mberi, nokuti kana sekuuya kwakaita ruzivo rweMuponesi munyika, kuburikidza neuchapupu hwevaJuda, kunyangwe naizvozvo ruzivo rweMuponesi rwuchauya kuvanhu vangu—
Uye nekumaNifai, nekumaJakobho, uye nemaJosefa, uye nemaZoramu, kuburikidza neuchapupu hwemadzibaba avo—

Uye uchapupu uhwu huchauya muruzivo rwemaRamani, uye nemaRemueri, uye nemaIshumaeri, avo vakadzikira murutendo pamusana pezvitadzo zvemadzibaba avo, avo Ishe akabvumira kuti vaparadze hama dzavo maNifai, pamusana pekutadza kwavo uye nohuipi hwavo.
Uye nechikonzero ichochi mahwendefa aya akachengetedzwa, ayo anezvinyorwa izvi—Kuti zvivimbiso zvaIshe zvigozadzikiswa, izvo zvaakaita kuvanhu vake;

Uye kuti maRamani vauye kuruzivo rwemadzibaba avo, uye kuti vazive zvivimbiso zvaIshe, uye kuti vatende muvhangeri nokuvimba nezviito zvakanaka zvaJesu Kristu, uye nokubwinya kuburikidza nerutendo muzita rake, uye kuti kuburikidza nekutendeuka kwavo, vangaponeswe. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 4
chapter_summary: 1–4, Kusatya pakushanda kunoponesa vashumiri vaIshe; 5–6, Kuita kwehumwari kunoita kuti vakodzere hushumiri; 7, Zvinhu zvaMwari zvinofanira kutsvagwa.

verses.text: Zvino tarisai, basa rinoshamisa rave kuda kuuya pakati pevana vevanhu.
Naizvozvo, imi munopinda mubasa raMwari, onai kuti mamushandira nemwoyo yenyu yose, nokugwinya, nepfungwa, uye nesimba, kuti mumire musina mhaka pamberi paMwari pazuva rokupedzisira.
Naizvozvo, kana muine chido chekushandira Mwari, munodaidzwa kubasa;
Nokuti tarisai munda wachena wave kuda kukohwewa uye onai; uyo anoisa jeko rake nokugwinya, iyeyo anochengetedza zvekuti asafe, asi anounza ruponeso kumweya wake;
Uye rutendo, tariro, rudo rwakadzama nerudo, neziso rakatarisana bedzi kukubwinya kwaMwari, kunomuita kuti akwanise basa.
Rangarira rutendo, tsika, ruzivo, kuzvidzora, mwoyo murefu, tsitsi kunevamwe, umwari, rudo rwakadzama, kuzvirereka, kushingaira.
Kumbira, uye uchagashira; gogodza, uye richazarurirwa kwauri. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/5.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 5
chapter_summary: 1–10, Chizvarwa chino chichagashira izwi raIshe kuburikidza naJoseph Smith; 11–18, Vapupuri vatatu vachapupura nezveBhuku raMormoni; 19–20, Izwi raIshe richasimbiswa semunguva dzakapfuura; 21–35, Martin Harris angangotendeuka uye akave mumwe wevapupuri.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, kuti sezvo muranda wangu Martin Harris ada uchapupu kubva muruoko rwangu, kuti iwe, muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, unemahwendefa ayo awakapupura nezvawo uye ukapupura kuti wakazvitambira kwandiri;

Uye zvino tarisai, izvi ndizvo zvauchataura kwaari—iyeyo akataura kwauri, akati kwauri: Ini Ishe, ndini Mwari, uye ndakapa kwauri zvinhu izvi muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uye ndikakuraira kuti wakafanira kumira semupupuriri wezvinhu izvi;
Uye ndikakuita kuti upinde muchibvumirano neni, kuti usazviratidze kunze kweavo vanhu vandakakuraira; uye hauna simba pamusoro pazvo kunze kwekunge ndaripa kwauri.

Uye unechipo chekududzira mahwendefa; uye ichi ndicho chipo chekutanga chandakaisa pauri; uye ndakakuraira kuti hakuna chimwezve chipo chaungagambire dakara basa rangu razadzikiswa muzvinhu izvi; nokuti handizokupa chimwe chipo kudakara zvapera.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, dambudziko richauya kuvagari vepasi kana vasingateerere kumazwi angu;
Nokuti mushure mezvizvi uchagadzwa uye woenda uye ugopa mazwi angu kuvana vevanhu.
Tarisai, kana vakasatenda mazwi angu, havangatende iwe, muranda wangu Joseph, kunyange dai zvichikwanisika kuti uvaratidze zvose zvinhu izvi zvandaisa kwauri.
Chizvarwa chevasingatende ichi uye chakaoma mutsipa—hasha dzangu dzabatidzwa kwavari.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, ndachengetedza zvinhu izvo zvandakaisa mumaoko ako, muranda wangu Joseph, nechinangwa cheungwaru mandiri, uye zvichaziviswa zvizvarwa zvichauya;
Asi chizvarwa chino chichawana izwi rangu kuburikidza newe;
Uye pamusoro peuchapupu hwako, uchapupu hwevaranda vangu vatatu, avo vandichadaidza ndigogadza, kwavari ndicharatidza zvinhu izvi, uye vachaenda nemazwi angu anopihwa kuburikidza newe.
Hongu, vachaziva zvechokwadi kuti zvinhu izvi ndezvechokwadi, nokuti kubva kudenga, ndichazvitaura kwavari.
Ndichavapa simba kuti vagone kuona nokutarisa zvinhu izvi sezvazviri;

Uye hakuna mumwezve wandichapa simba iri, kuti vatambire uchapupu humwechetehwo pakati pechizvarwa chino, mukutanga kuno nokusimuka uye nokuuya kwechechi yangu kubva murenje rakajeka semwedzi—uye nekunaka sezuva, uye nokutyisa semauto anemireza.
Uye uchapupu hwevapupuri vatatu ndinohutumira nezwi rangu.
Uye tarisai, aninani zvake anotenda mumazwi angu, ivavo ndivo vandichashanyira nokuratidza Mweya wangu; uye vachazvarwa neni, kunyangwe nemvura uye neMweya—
Uye iwe wakafanira kumbomira kwechinguvana, nokuti hausati wagadzwa—
Uye uchapupu hwavo huchaendawo mukutongwa kwechizvarwa chino kana vakaomesa mwoyo yavo kwavari;

Nokuti shamhu inoparadza ichaenda pakati pevagari vepasi, uye icharamba ichidirwa nguva nenguva, kana vakasatendeuka, kudakara nyika isisina chinhu, uye vagari vacho vapedzwa uye vaparadzwa zvachose nekupenya kwekuuya kwangu.
Tarisai, ndinokutaurira zvinhu izvi, kunyangwe sekutaurira kwandakaitawo vanhu nezvekuparadzwa kweJerusarema; uye izwi rangu richasimbiswa panguva iyoyi sekusimbiswa kwarakamboita kare.
Uye zvino ndinokuraira, muranda wangu Joseph, kuti utendeuke uye ufambe wakatwasanuka pamberi pangu, uye nokusatevedza kunyengetedzwa nevanhu zvakare;
Uye nokuti ushinge mukuchengetedza mirairo iyo yandakakuraira iwe; uye kana ukaita izvi, tarisai ndinokupa iwe upenyu hwokusingaperi, kunyangwe kana ukaurawa.
Iyezvino, zvakare, ndinotaura kwauri, muranda wangu Joseph, maererano nemurume arikuda uchapupu—

Tarisai, ndinoti kwaari, anozvikudza uye asingazvininipise zvakakwana pamberi pangu; asi kana akakotama pamberi pangu, uye akazvininipisa mumunamato wakasimba nerutendo, muchokwadi chemwoyo wake, ndipo pandichamubvumira kuona zvinhu zvaanoda kuona.

Uye zvino achazoti kuvanhu vechizvarwa chino: Tarisai ndakaona zvinhu izvo zvakaratidzwa naIshe kuna Joseph Smith, Mwana, uye ndinoziva zvechokwadi kuti ndezvechokwadi, nokuti ndakazviona, nokuti zvakaratidzwa kwandiri nesimba raMwari uye kwete remunhu.

Uye ini Ishe ndamuraira iye, muranda wangu Martin Harris, kuti asataurezve zvimwe kwavari maererano nezvinhu izvi, kunze kwekuti ati: Ndakazviona, zvakaratidzwa kwandiri nesimba raMwari; aya ndiwo mazwi aachataura.
Asi akaramba izvi anenge atyora chibvumirano icho chaakabvumirana neni kare, uye tarisai, atotongwa.

Uye zvino, kunze kwekunge azvininipisa uye nokubvuma kwandiri zvinhu zvaakaita zvakaipa, uye agobvumirana neni kuti achachengetedza mirairo yangu, uye nokuve nerutendo mandiri, tarisai, ndinoti kwaari, haazomboona zvinhu zvakadaro, nokuti handimupe mukana wekuona zvinhu zvandataura nezvazvo.
Uye kana izvi zviri izvo, ndinokuraira iwe, muranda wangu Joseph, kuti uchati kwaari, kuti haachaita zvimwe, kana kundinetsa zvakare maererano nenyaya iyi.
Kana izvi zviri izvo, tarisai, ndinoti kwauri Joseph, kana wadudzira mamwe mapeji mashoma, uchambomira kwechinguva, kunyangwe kudakara ndakutaurira zvakare; ipapo wozotanga kududzira zvakare.
Uye kunze kwekunge waita izvi, tarisai, hauchazove nechipo zvakare, uye ndichatora zvinhu zvandaisa mauri.

Uye zvino pamusana pekuti ndiri kufanoona kuhwandirwa kuti uparadzwe, hongu, ndiri kufanoona kuti kana muranda wangu Martin Harris akasazvininipisa uye agogashira uchapupu kubva muruoko rwangu, kuti achawira mukutadza;
Uye kune vazhinji vakahwandira kukuparadza kubva pameso penyika; uye nechikonzero ichi, kuti mazuva ako apamhidzirwe, ndakakupa mirairo iyi.
Hongu, nechikonzero ichi ndataura kuti: Mira, uye umire wakadaro dakara ndakuraira, uye ndichakupa zvinoita kuti ukwanise kupedza chinhu icho chandakakuraira.
Uye kana wakatendeka mukuchengeta mirairo yangu, uchasimudzirwa pazuva rekupedzisira. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/6.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 6
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vashandi mumunda waIshe vanowana ruponeso; 7–13, Hakuna chipo chikuru kupfuura chipo cheruponeso; 14–27, Uchapupu hwechokwadi hunounzwa nesimba reMweya; 28–37, Tarisai kuna Kristu, uye muite zvakanaka nguva dzose.

verses.text: Basa guru uye rinoshamisa rave kuda kuuya kuvana vevanhu.

Tarisai, ndini Mwari; teererai kushoko rangu, iro rinokurumidza uye rakasimba, rinopinza kupfuura munondo unocheka nekwose, mukupatsanura nepakati zvose nhengo nemwongo; naizvozvo teererai kumashoko angu.

Tarisai, munda wachena wamirira kukohwewa; naizvozvo, uyo anoda kukohwa, ngaaise jeko rake nesimba rake, uye akohwe zuva richiripo, kuti agochengetera mweya wake ruponeso rwusingaperi muumambo hwaMwari.
Hongu, ani zvake achaisa jeko rake uye agokohwa, iyeyo akadaidzwa naMwari.
Nokudaro, kana mukakumbira kwandiri muchagashira; kana mukagogodza richazarurirwa kwamuri.
Zvino, sekukumbira kwawakaita, tarisai ndinoti kwauri, chengeta mirairo yangu, uye utsvake kuunza nokumisa chinangwa cheZioni;
Musatsvake upfumi, asi ungwaru, uye tarisai, zvakavanzika zvaMwari zvichapetenurirwa kwauri; uye ndipo pauchaitwa mupfumi. Tarisai, uyo aneupenyu hwokusingaperi akapfuma.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kunyangwe sezvaunoshuvira kwandiri zvichave saizvozvo kwauri; uye kana unechishuvo, uchave nzira yekuita zvakanaka zvakawanda muchizvarwa chino.
Usataure chimwe chinhu kunze kwekutendeuka kuchizvarwa chino; chengeta mirairo yangu, uye uyamure kuunza basa rangu, maererano nemirairo yangu, uye iwe ucharopofadzwa.
Tarisai unechipo, uye wakakomborerwa iwe pamusana pechipo chako. Yeuka kuti chinoyera uye chinobva kumusoro—

Uye kana ukabvunza, uchaziva zvakavanzika izvo zvikuru zvinoshamisa; nokudaro iwe uchashandisa chipo chako, kuti ugowana zvakavandika, kuti ugounza zvakawanda kuruzivo rwechokwadi, hongu, uvapwise pamusoro pekukanganisa kwetsika dzavo.
Usaite kuti chipo chako chizivikanwe nani kunze kweavo vechitendero chako. Usatambe nezvinhu zvinoyera.

Kana iwe ukaita zvakanaka, hongu, uye ukaramba uri murutendo kusvika kumagumo, uchaponeswa muumambo hwaMwari, chinove ndicho chipo chikuru-kuru kupfuura zvose zvipo zvaMwari; nokuti hakuna chipo chikuru kupfuura chipo cheruponeso.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, wakaropafadzwa iwe pamusana pezvawakaita; nokuti wabvunza kwandiri, uye tarisai, panguva dzose dzawaibvunza wakagashira kurairwa neMweya wangu. Dai zvakanga zvisina kudaro, ungadai usina kuuya kunzvimbo yauri panguva ino.
Tarisai, iwe unoziva kuti wakabvunza kwandiri uye ini ndikajekesa pfungwa dzako; uye zvino ndiri kukutaurira zvinhu izvi kuti uzive kuti wakajekeswa neMweya wechokwadi;
Hongu, ndinokuudza iwe, kuti ugoziva kuti hakuna mumwezve kunze kwaMwari uyo anoziva pfungwa dzako uye nezvinangwa zvemwoyo wako.
Ndinokutaurira zvinhu izvi seuchapupu kwauri—kuti mashoko kana basa iro rawanga uchinyora nderechokwadi.
Naizvozvo shingaira; mira nemuranda wangu Joseph, norutendo, mukuomerwa kupi zvako kwaangave ari pamusana peshoko iri.
Mutsiure mukukanganisa kwake, uye newewo ugashire kutsiurwa naye. Iva nemwoyo murefu, uzive zvauri, zvidzore, uve nomwoyo murefu, rutendo, tariro uye norudo rwakadzama.

Tarisai, ndiwe Oliver, uye ndataura kwauri pamusana pezvauri kuda; nokudaro chengetedza mazwi aya mumwoyo mako. Iva unotendeka nokushingirira mukuchengeta mirairo yaMwari, uye ini ndichakukomberedza mumaoko erudo rwangu.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari. Ndini mumwecheteyo akauya kune vangu, uye vekwangu vakasandigamuchira. Ndini chiedza chinopenya murima, uye rima harichinzwisise.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana uchida humwe uchapupu, isa pfungwa yako kuusiku hwawakachema kwandiri mumwoyo mako, kuti ugoziva chokwadi chezvinhu izvi.
Handina here kutaura runyararo kupfungwa dzako maererano nezvenyaya iyi? Ungawane uchapupu hwakakura sei kupfuura hunobva kuna Mwari?
Uye zvino, tarisai, wagashira uchapupu; nokuti kana ndakutaurira zvinhu zvisina munhu anozviziva, hauna kugashira uchapupu here?
Uye tarisai, ndinopa kwauri chipo, kana uchichida kwandiri, chekududzira, kunyangwe semuranda wangu Joseph.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kuti kune zvinyorwa zvine zvizhinji zvevhangeri rangu, izvo zvichakavanzwa kuburitswa pamusana pehuipi hwevanhu;

Uye zvino ndinokuraira, kuti kana uine zvido zvakanaka—chido chekuzvirongedzera upfumi hwedenga—saka uchayamura mukuunza kuchiedza, nechipo chako, izvo zvidimu zvemagwaro matsvene angu zvakavigwa pamusana pehuipi.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinopa kwauri nekumuranda wangu Joseph, makiyi echipo ichi, chichaunza muchiedza vhangeri rino; uye mumuromo yavaviri kana vatatu vapupuri, shoko rimwe nerimwe richamiswa.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kana vakaramba mazwi angu, nechidimu chino chevhangeri rangu nehushumiri, wakaropafadzwa iwe, hakuna chimwe chavangaite kwauri chinopfuura chavangaite kwandiri.
Uye kana vakaita kwauri kunyangwe sezvavakaita kwandiri, wakaropafadzwa iwe, nokuti uchagara neni mukubwinya.
Asi kana vakasaramba mazwi angu ayo achamiswa neuchapupu huchapihwa, vakaropafadzwa, uye ndipo pauchawana rufaro mumuchero wekushanda kwako.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, sekutaura kwandakaita kuvadzidzi vangu, pane vaviri kana vatatu vaungana pamwe chete muzita rangu, uye sekubata chinhu chimwe chete, tarisai, ndinenge ndiripo pakati pavo—kunyangwe izvozvi ndiripakati penyu.
Musatye kuita zvakanaka, vanakomana vangu, nokuti pane chose chamunodyara, icho ndicho chamuchakohwawo; naizvozvo, kana mukadyara kunaka, muchakohwawo chakanaka semubairo wenyu.
Nokudaro, musatye, imi vegungano diki; itai zvakanaka: regai nyika negehena zvikukutsiranei, nokuti kana makavakira padombo rangu, hazvikukwanisei.
Tarisai, handikutongei, endai nenzira dzenyu uye musatadzezve; itai muchiziva zvamuri basa randakakurairai.
Tarisai kwandiri mupfungwa yose; musakahadzike, musatye.
Tarisai maronda akabaiwa parutivi rwangu, uye nemavanga ezvipikiri ari mumaoko netsoka dzangu; ivai nerutendo, chengetai mirairo yangu, uye muchagara nhaka yeumambo hwekudenga. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/7.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 7
chapter_summary: 1–3, Johane Mudikani achararama kudakara Ishe vauya; 4–8, Petro, Jakobo naJohane vakabata kiyi dzevhangeri.

verses.text: Uye Ishe vakati kwandiri: Johane, mudiwa wangu, chii chaunoda? Nokuti ukakumbira chaunoda, uchapihwa.
Uye ndakati kwavari: Ishe, ndipei simba rekukunda rufu, kuti ndirarame uye kuti ndigounza mweya kwamuri.
Uye Ishe vakati kwandiri: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, nokuti unechido ichi, uchagara kudakara ndauya mukubwinya kwangu, uye uchiporofita pamberi pemarudzi, madzinza, ndimi, nevanhu.

Uye nechikonzero ichi Ishe vakati kuna Petro: Kana ndikaita kuti agare kusvika ndauya, zvinorevei kwauri? Nokuti akakumbira kwandiri kuti aunze mweya kwandiri, asi iwe unoda kuti uuye nokukurumidza kwandiri muumambo hwangu.
Ndinoti kwauri, Petro, ichi chido chakanaka, asi mudiwa wangu ada kuti aite zvakawanda, kana kuti basa guru kupfuura, raakamboita kare, mukati mevanhu.
Hongu, atora basa guru kupfuura repakutanga; nokudaro ndichamuita semoto unerimi uye sengirozi inoshumira; achashumira avo vachave vagari venhaka yeruponeso panyika.
Uye ndichaita kuti umushumirire uye nemunin’ina wako Jakobo; uye kwamuri imi vatatu ndichapa simba iri nemakiyi ehushumiri uhwu kudakara ndauya.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, mose muchawana maererano nezvamunoda, nokuti mose munofara mune icho chamunoda.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/8.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 8
chapter_summary: 1–5, Zvakazarurwa zvinouya nesimba reMweya Mutsvene; 6–12, Ruzivo rwezvakavanzika zvaMwari uye nesimba rekududzira zvinyorwa zvepasichigare rwunouya nerutendo.

verses.text: Oliver Cowdery, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, nechokwadi, sekurarama kunoita Ishe, avo vanove ndivo Mwari wako uye neMununuri wako, kunyangwe chokwadi uchagashira ruzivo rwezvinhu zvose zvazvo zvaungade kana ukakumbira murutendo, nemwoyo unovimbika, uchitenda kuti uchatambira ruzivo maererano nekunyorwa kwezvinyorwa zvekare, izvo zvepasi chigare, zvine zvidimu izvo zvemagwaro matsvene angu zvakataurwa nekuiswa pachena neMweya wangu.
Hongu, tarisai ndichakuudza mupfungwa dzako nemumwoyo mako, neMweya Mutsvene, uyu uchauya pauri uye uyu uchagara mumwoyo mako.
Zvino tarisai, uyu ndiwo mweya wezvakazarurwa; tarisai, uyu ndiwo mweya uyo wakaita kuti Mosesi aunze vana vaIsraeri mukupfuura nemuGungwa Dzvuku pavhu rakaoma.
Nokudaro ichi ndicho chipo chako; chishandise, uye wakaropafadzwa iwe, nokuti zvichakubvisa mumaoko evavengi vako, nokuti, dai zvakanga zvisiri izvo, vaikuponda uye nokuunza mweya wako mukuparadzwa.
Rangarira mazwi aya, uye chengeta mirairo yangu. Rangarira, ichi ndicho chipo chako.
Zvino ichi hachizicho chipo chako chete; nokuti unechimwe chipo, icho chiri chipo chaAroni; tarisai, chakuudza zvinhu zvizhinji;
Tarisai, hakuna rimwe simba, kunze kwesimba raMwari, iro rinogona kuita kuti chipo ichi chaAroni chive newe.
Nokudaro, usakahadzike, nokuti chipo chaMwari; uye uchachibata mumaoko ako, uye ugoita mabasa anoshamisa; uye hakuna simba richagona kuchitora kubva mumaoko ako, nokuti ibasa raMwari.
Uye nokudaro, chose zvacho chauchandikumbira kuti ndikutaurire netsika iyoyo, ichocho ndichachipa kwauri, uye uchave neruzivo maererano nacho.
Rangarira kuti pasina rutendo hakuna chaungaite; nokudaro kumbira murutendo. Usatambe nezvinhu izvi; Usakumbire icho chisingafanirwe.

Kumbira kuti uzive zvakavanzika zvaMwari, uye ududzire uye ugogashira ruzivo kubva kuzvinyorwa zvose izvo zvepasichigare izvo zvakange zvakavigwa, izvo zvinoyera; uye maererano nerutendo rwako zvichaitwa kwauri.
Tarisai, ndini ndazvitaura; uye ndini iye mumwecheteyo akataura kwauri kubvira pakutanga. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/9.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 9
chapter_summary: 1–6, Zvimwe zvinyorwa zvekare zvichazodudzirwa; 7–14, Bhuku raMormoni rinodudzirwa nokudzidza uye nokusimbiswa nemweya.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri mwanakomana wangu, nepamusana pekuti hauna kududzira maererano neizvo zvawaida kwandiri, uye ukatanga zvakare kunyorera muranda wangu, Joseph Smith, Mwana, kunyangwe zvakadaro ndinoti dai waramba uchienderera mberi kudakara mapedza zvinyorwa izvi, izvo zvandakaisa mumaoko ake.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndine zvimwe zvinyorwa, izvo zvandichakupa simba kuti uyamure mukududzira.
Ita mwoyo murefu, mwanakomana wangu, nokuti ungwaru mandiri, uye hazvikodzere kuti ududzire panguva ino.
Tarisai, basa rawakadaidzirwa kuita kunyorera muranda wangu Joseph.
Uye tarisai, pamusana pekuti hauna kuramba uchienderera mberi, sekutanga kwawangawaita, pawakatanga kududzira, zvaita kuti nditore kodzero iyi kubva kwauri.
Usanyunyute, mwanakomana wangu, nokuti ungwaru mandiri kuti ndaita izvi kwauri netsika iyi.
Tarisai, hauna kunzwisisa; wakafunga kuti ndichangokupa kwauri, iwe usina kumboita imwe pfungwa kunze kweyekundikumbira.
Asi tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, zvidzidze mupfungwa dzako; zvino wondibvunza kuti zvakanaka here, kana zvakanaka, ndichakonzera chipfuva chako kuti chipise, naizvozvo uchanzwa kuti zvakanaka.

Asi kana zvisina kunaka hauzove nokunzwa zvakadaro, asi uchave nepfungwa yakagomara ichakuita kuti ukanganwe chinhu ichocho chakaipa; naizvozvo, haukwanise kunyora icho chinoyera kunze kwekunge watochipihwa kubva kwandiri.
Zvino, dai wakanga uchiziva izvi ungadai wakadudzira; zvisinei, hazvichakodzera kuti ududzire zvino.
Tarisai, zvakanga zvakafanira pawakatanga, asi wakatya, uye nguva yacho yapfuura, uye hazvichakodzera zvino;
Nokuti, hauone here kuti ndakapa kumuranda wangu Joseph simba rakakwana, mukugadzirwa kwazvakaitwa? Uye hapana mumwe wenyu wandatonga.
Ita chinhu ichi chandakuraira, uye uchabudirira. Iva wakatendeka, uye usakundwe nekuyedzwa.
Mira wakasimba mubasa iro randakakudaidzira, uye hakuna kavhudzi kemumusoro mako kacharasika, uye iwe uchasimudzirwa pazuva rekupedzisira. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/10.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 10
chapter_summary: 1–26, Satani anomutsiridza vanhu vakaipa kuti varwise basa raIshe; 27–33, Anotsvaka kuparadza mweya yevanhu; 34–52, Vhangeri rakafanira kuenda kumaRamani uye nekumarudzi ose kuburikidza neBhuku raMormoni; 53–63, Ishe vachamisa Chechi yavo nevhangeri ravo mukati mevanhu, 64–70, Vachaunganidza vanotendeuka muChechi yavo uye vachaponesa vanoteerera.

verses.text: Zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, pamusana pekuti wakapa zvinyorwa izvo zvawakanga wapirwa simba rekududzira uchiyamurwa neUrimi neTumimi, mumaoko emunhu akaipa, wazvirasa.
Uye warasikirwawo nechipo chako nguva imwecheteyo, uye pfungwa yako yakadzima.
Zvisinei, chadzorerwa kwauri zvakare; naizvozvo chiona kuti wavimbika uye uenderere mberi kudakara wasvika pakupedzisa zvakasara zvebasa rekududzira semavambiro awakangewaita.
Usamhanye zvakapfurikidza kana kushanda kupfuura zvaune simba nazvo nenzira yawakapihwa yekukuita kuti ugone kududzira; asi shingaira kusvika kumagumo.
Namata nguva dzose, kuti ubude uri mukundi; hongu, kuti ukurire Satani, uye kuti upunyuke mumaoko avaranda vaSatani avo vanosumudzira basa rake.
Tarisai, vakatsvaka kukuparadza; hongu, kunyangwe murume wawakanga wavimba naye akatsvaka kukuparadza.
Uye nechikonzero ichi ndakamuti munhu akaipa, nokuti akatsvaka kutora zvinhu izvo zvakaiswa mumaoko ako; uye akatsvakawo kuparadza chipo chako.
Uye pamusana pekuti wakaisa zvinyorwa mumaoko ake, tarisai, vanhu vakaipa vazvitora kubva kwauri.
Naizvozvo, wakaisa, hongu, icho chinoera, muhuipi.
Uye tarisai, Satani azviisa mumwoyo yavo kuti vashandure mazwi awakaita kuti anyorwe, kana kuti awakadudzira, ayo akabva mumaoko ako.
Uye tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, nepamusana pekuti vashandura mazwi, ave kutaura zvakasiyana neizvo zvawakadudzira uye ukaita kuti zvinyorwe;
Uye netsika iyi, dhiabhorosi atsvaka kuita chirongwa chemano, kuti aparadze basa iri;
Nokuti azviisa mumwoyo mavo kuti vaite izvi, kuti nokunyepa vangati vakubata nemazwi ayo awakanyepera kududzira.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, handizobvumira kuti Satani akwanise kuita zano rake rakaipa muchinhu ichi.
Nokuti tarisai, akachiisa mumwoyo yavo kuti vakuite kuti uyedze Ishe Mwari vako, mukukumbira kuti uzozvidudzira zvakare.
Uye zvino tarisai, vanoti uye vachifunga mumwoyo yavo—Tichaona kanaMwari vakamupa simba rekududzira; kana zviriizvo, vachamupawo simba zvakare;
Uye kana Mwari vakamupa simba zvakare, kana kuti vakadudzira zvakare, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, kana vakaburitsa mazwi mamwechetewo, tarisai, tine mamwechetewo atiinawo, uye takashandura;
Naizvozvo haazowirirana, uye tinobva tati anyepa mumazwi ake, uye nokutiwo haana chipo, uye nokutiwo haana simba;
Naizvozvo tinobva tamuparadza, uye nebasa racho; uye tichaita izvi kuti tirege kuzonyara pakupedzisira, uye kuti tigowana kurumbidzwa nenyika.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, Satani akabata mwoyo yavo zvikuru; anovamutsiridza mukuipa kwekurwisana neicho chakanaka;
Uye mwoyo yavo yakaora, uye izere nohuipi uye nokunyangadza; uye vanoda rima, pane chiedza, nokuti zviito zvavo zvakaipa, naizvozvo havandikumbire.
Satani anovamutsiridza, kuti agotungamirira mweya yavo kunoparadzwa.
Uye saka aita zano remano, achifunga kuparadza basa raMwari; asi izvi ndichazvida kubva mumaoko avo, uye zvichavapindukira mukunyara kwavo nekuwanikwa vaine mhoswa muzuva rekutongwa.
Hongu, anomutsa mwoyo yavo mukushatirwa mukurwisa basa iri.

Hongu, anoti kwavari: Nyengedzai uye muhwandire kuti mubate, kuti mugoparadza; tarisai, izvi hazvikuvadze. Uye nokudaro anovanyengedza, uye achivaudza kuti hachisi chitadzo kunyepa kuti mubate munhu mumanyepo, kuti mugovaparadza.
Uye nokudaro anovanyengedza, uye ovatungamira achienda kudakara azvuvira mweya yavo pasi mugehena; uye nokudaro anoita kuti vazvibate muriva ravo.
Uye nokudaro anokwira achidzika, achienda achidzoka munyika, achitsvaka kuparadza mweya yavanhu.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, nhamo kune uyo anonyepa kuti anyengedze nokuti anenge achifunga kuti mumwe ari kunyepa kuti anyengere, nokuti ivo vakadai havazoregererwa mukutonga kunoenzanisa kwaMwari.
Zvino tarisai; vashandura mazwi aya, nokuti Satani anoti kwavari: Akakunyengedzai—uye nokudaro anovanyengedza kuti vaite zvakaipa, kuita kuti iwe uyedze Ishe Mwari vako.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, kuti hauchadudzira zvakare mazwi ayo akaenda achibva mumaoko ako;

Nokuti tarisai, havazokwanisa kuita zvirongwa zvavo zvakaipa mukunyepa vachirwisana nemazwi aya. Nokuti tarisai, kana ukaunza mazwi mamwechetewo vachati wanyepa uye voti wange uchinyepera kududzira, asi kuti wazvipikisa iwe pachako.
Uye tarisai, vachashambadza izvi, uye Satani achaomesa mwoyo yevanhu kuvamutsiridza kuti vakushatirirwe, zvekuti havazotenda mazwi angu.
Nokudaro Satani anofunga kukurira uchapupu hwako muchizvarwa chino, kuti basa ritadze kuuya muchizvarwa chino.
Asi tarisai, houno ungwaru, uye pamusana pekuti ndinokuratidza ungwaru, uye nokukupa mirairo maererano nezvinhu izvi, zvauchaita, usazviratidze kunyika kudakara wapedza basa rekududzira.
Usashamiswe kuti ndati kwauri: Houno ungwaru, usazviratidze kunyika—nokuti ndati usazviratidze kunyika, kuti uchengetedzwe.
Tarisai, handisi kuti hauchazozviratidza kunevakarurama;

Asi sezvo usingazive vakarurama nguva dzose, kana kuti sezvo usingagone nguva dzose kupatsanura vakaipa kubva kune vakarurama, naizvozvo ndinoti kwauri, chimbonyarara kudakara ndaona zvakafanira kuti ndiite kuti zvinhu zvose zvizikanwe kunyika maererano nenyaya iyi.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, kuti rondedzero yezvinhu izvo zvawakanyora, izvo zvakabva mumaoko ako, yakanyorwa pamahwendefa aNifai;
Hongu, uye rangarira kuti zvakanzi muzvinyorwa izvozvo rondedzero izere yakapihwa yezvinhu izvi pamahwendefa aNifai.
Uye zvino, nokuti rondedzero yakanyorwa pamahwendefa aNifai yakanyatsokwana maererano nezvinhu izvo muungwaru hwangu, zvandinofanira kuunza kuruzivo rwevanhu vari murondedzero ino—
Nokudaro uchadudzira zvinyorwa zviri pamahwendefa aNifai, wodzika kunyangwe kudakara wasvika mukutonga kwamambo Benjamini, kana kudakara wasvika pane izvo zvawakadudzira, zvawakachengetedza;
Uye tarisai, uchazvishambadza sezvinyorwa zvaNifai, uye naizvozvo ndichanyadzisa avo vakashandura mazwi angu.
Handizovabvumira kuti vaparadze basa rangu; hongu, ndichavaratidza kuti ungwaru hwangu hukuru panemano adhiabhorosi.
Tarisai, vane chidimu chete, kana kuti mudimbudzirwa werondedzero yaNifai.

Tarisai, kune zvinhu zvizhinji zvakanyorwa pamahwendefa aNifai izvo zvinopa rujeko rwakawedzerwa pavhangeri rangu; naizvozvo, ungwaru kwandiri kuti iwe ududzire chikamu chino chekutanga chezvinyorwa zvaNifai, uye wozvitumira mubasa rino.
Uye tarisai, zvose zvasara zvebasa rino zvine zvose zvidimbu zvevhangeri rangu izvo vaporofita vangu matsvene, hongu, uye nevadzidzi vanguwo, vaida muminamato yavo kuti zviuye kuvanhu vano.
Uye ndakati kwavari, vachazvipihwa maererano nerutendo rwavo muminamato yavo.

Hongu, uye urwu ndirwo rwange rwuri rutendo rwavo kuti vhangeri rangu, iro randakavapa kuti vaparidze mumazuva avo, rwungauye kuhama dzavo maRamani uyewo nekune avo vose vakanga vave maRamani pamusana pekusabvumirana kwavo.
Zvino, izvi hazvisi zvose—rutendo rwavo muminamato yavo rwaive rwekuti vhangeri rino riitwe kuti rizivikanwewo, kana zvichibvira kuti mamwe marudzi atore nyika ino;
Uye saka vakasiya maropafadzo panyika ino muminamato yavo, kuti ani zvake achatenda muvhangeri rino munyika ino awane upenyu hwokusingaperi;
Hongu, kuti rive rakasununguka kune vose verudzi rwupi zvarwo, madzinza, ndimi, chero vanhu vapi zvavo vavangave vari.

Uye zvino, tarisai, maererano nerutendo rwavo muminamato yavo, ndichaunza chidimu chino chevhangheri rangu kuruzivo rwevanhu vangu. Tarisai, handiriunze kuti riparadze icho chavakatambira, asi kuchivaka.
Uye nechikonzero ichi ndakati: Kana chizvarwa chino chikasaomesa mwoyo yacho, ndichamisa chechi yangu pakati pavo.
Zvino handitaure izvi kuti ndiparadze chechi yangu, asi ndinotaura izvi kuti ndivake chechi yangu.
Naizvozvo, ani zvake wemuchechi yangu, haafanire kutya nokuti ivavo vachagara nhaka yeumambo hwekudenga.

Asi ndeavo vasinganditye, kana kuchengeta mirairo yangu, vanozvivakira machechi kuti vawane pundutso, hongu, uye neavo vose vanoita zvakaipa uye vachivaka umambo hwadhiabhorosi—hongu, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, ndivo ivavo vandichakanganisa, uye ndigoita kuti vadedere, uye nokubvunda kusvika mukati.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari. Ndakauya kune vangu, uye vangu vakasanditambira.
Ndini chiedza chinopenya murima, uye rima harichinzwisise.
Ndini iye akati—Ndine dzimwe hwai dzisiri dzedanga rino—kuvadzidzi vangu, uye kune vazhinji vasina kundinzwisisa.
Uye ndicharatidza kuvanhu ava kuti ndaive nedzimwe hwai, uye nokuti dzaive bazi remba yaJakobo;
Uye ndichaburitsa pachena mabasa avo anoshamisa, ayo avakaita muzita rangu;

Hongu, uye ndichaunzawo pachena vhangeri rangu iro rakashumirwa kwavari, uye tarisai, havazoramba icho chawakatambira, asi vachachivaka, uye vachaunza pachena zvinhu zvechokwadi mudzidziso yangu, hongu, uye iri iyo yega dzidziso iri mandiri.

Uye, izvi ndiri kuzviita kuti ndimise vhangeri rangu, kuti parege kuve negakava rakanyanya; hongu, Satani anomutsiridza mwoyo yevanhu mukukakavadzana maererano nezvinhu zvedzidziso yangu; uye muzvinhu izvi vanokanganisa, uye vanoshandurudza magwaro matsvene uye havaanzwisise.
Nokudaro ndichavapetenurira chishamiso chikuru ichi;
Nokuti tarisai, ndichakuvhumbamirai sekuvhumbamira kunoita huku nhiyo dzayo pasi pemapapiro ayo, kana vasina kuomesa mwoyo yavo;
Hongu, kana vachiuya, vangangouya, vagomwa mvura dzeupenyu vakasununguka.
Tarisai, iyi ndiyo dzidziso yangu—ani zvake anotendeuka uye akauya kwandiri, mumwecheteyo ndiye wechechi yangu.
Ani zvake anowedzera kana kubvisa kune izvi, iyeyo haazi wangu, asi anorwisana neni; nokudaro haasi wechechi yangu.
Uye zvino tarisai, ani zvake wechechi yangu, uye achishingirira muchechi yangu kusvika kumagumo, iyeyo ndichamumisa padombo rangu, uye misuwo yegehena haingamukurire.
Uye zvino, rangarira mazwi ake uyo anova ndiye upenyu nechiedza chenyika, Mununuri wako, Ishe vako naMwari vako. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 11
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vashandi vemumunda wemizambiringa vachawana ruponeso; 7–14, Tsvagai huzivi, daidzirai kutendeuka, vimbai muMweya; 15–22, Chengetai mirairo, uye mudzidze shoko raIshe; 23–27, Musarambe mweya wezvakazarurwa newehuporofita; 28–30, Avo vanotambira Kristu vanove vanakomana vaMwari.

verses.text: Basa guru uye rinoshamisa rave kuda kuuya pakati pevana vevanhu.

Tarisai, ndini Mwari; teererai kushoko rangu, iro rinokurumidza uye rakasimba, rinopinza kupfuura munondo unocheka nekwose, mukupatsanura nepakati zvose nhengo nemwongo; naizvozvo teererai kumashoko angu.

Tarisai, munda wachena wamirira kukohwewa; naizvozvo uyo anoda kukohwa, ngaaise jeko rake nesimba rake, uye akohwe zuva richiripo, kuti agochengetera mweya wake ruponeso rwusingaperi muumambo hwaMwari.
Hongu, ani zvake achaisa jeko rake uye agokohwa, iyeyo akadaidzwa naMwari.
Nokudaro, kana mukakumbira kwandiri muchagashira; kana mukagogodza richazarurirwa kwamuri.
Zvino sezvo wakumbira, tarisai, ndinoti kwauri; chengeta mirairo yangu, uye mutsvake kuunza nokumisa chinangwa cheZioni.
Usatsvake upfumi asi ungwaru; uye tarisai, zvakavandika zvaMwari zvichapetenurirwa kwamuri, uye ipapo ndipo pamuchaitwa vapfumi. Tarisai uyo ane upenyu hwokusingaperi akapfuma.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, chero zvaunoda kwandiri izvozvo zvichave saizvozvo kwauri; uye, kana uchida, uchave nzira yekuita zvakanaka zvakawanda muchizvarwa chino.
Usataure chimwe chinhu kunze kwekutendeuka kuchizvarwa chino. Chengeta mirairo yangu, uye uyamure kuunza basa rangu, maererano nemirairo yangu, uye iwe ucharopafadzwa.
Tarisai, une chipo, kana kuti uchawana chipo kana ukave unochida kwandiri murutendo, nemwoyo wakatendeka, uchidaira musimba raJesu Kristu, kana musimba rangu iro rinotaura kwauri;
Nokuti, tarisai, ndini ndirikutaura; tarisai, ndini chiedza chinopenya murima, uye nesimba rangu ndinopa mazwi aya kwauri.

Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, isa ruvimbo rwako muMweya uyo unotungamirira mukuita zvakanaka—hongu, kuita zvakarurama, kufamba wakazvininipisa, kutonga zvakarurama; uye uyu ndiwo Mweya wangu.
Zvirokwazvo, Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, ndichapa kwauri Mweya wangu, uyo uchajekesa pfungwa dzako, izvo zvichazadza mweya wako mufaro:
Uye ndipo pauchaziva, kana kuti nezvizvi uchaziva, zvose zvinhu zvipi zvazvo zvaunoda nezvangu, zviri maererano nezvinhu zvekururama, murutendo uchidaira mandiri kuti uchagashira.
Tarisai, ndinokuraira kuti haufanire kufungidzira kuti wakadaidzwa kuti uparidze kudakara wadaidzwa.
Mira kwenguva yakareba zvishoma, kudakara wawana izwi rangu, dombo rangu, chechi yangu, nevhangeri rangu, kuti uzive zvechokwadi dzidziso yangu.
Uye zvino tarisai, maererano nezvaunoda, hongu, kunyangwe maererano nerutendo rwako zvichaitwa kwauri.
Chengeta mirairo yangu; nyarara; kumbira kuMweya wangu;
Hongu, namatira pandiri nemwoyo wako wose, kuti uyamure mukuunza kuchiedza zvinhu izvo zvakataurwa nezvazvo—hongu, kududzirwa kwebasa rangu; iva nemwoyo murefu kudakara wazvipedza.
Tarisai, iri ndiro basa rako, kuchengeta mirairo yangu, hongu, nekugwinya kwako kwose, nepfungwa nesimba.

Usatsvake kuparidza izwi rangu, asi chekutanga tsvaka kuwana izwi rangu, uye zvino rurimi rwako rwuchasunungurwa; zvino, kana uchida, uchave neMweya wangu nezwi rangu, hongu, simba raMwari mukupwisa vanhu.

Asi iye zvino nyarara; dzidza izwi rangu iro raenda mukati mevana vevanhu, uye zvakare dzidza izwi rangu iro richauya mukati mevana vevanhu, kana iro ririkududzirwa iye zvino, hongu, kudakara wawana zvose zvandichapa kuvana vevanhu muchizvarwa chino, uye ndipo pachapamhidzirwa zvinhu zvose.
Tarisai, ndiwe Hyrum, mwanakomana wangu; tsvaka umambo hwaMwari, uye zvose zvinhu zvichapamhidzirwa maererano nechecho chakanaka.
Vaka pamusoro pedombo rangu, rinove ndiro vhangeri rangu;
Usarambe mweya wezvakazarurwa, kana mweya wehuporofita, nokuti nhamo kwaari uyo anoramba zvinhu izvi;
Nokudaro, rongedzera mumwoyo mako kudakara nguva iri muungwaru hwangu yekuti uzoenda.
Tarisai, ndinotaura kune vose vanoda zvakanaka, uye avo vakaisa majeko avo kuti vakohwe.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakonama waMwari. Ndini upenyu nechiedza chenyika.
Ndini mumwecheteyo akauya kune vekwangu uye vekwangu vakasanditambira;
Asi zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, vazhinji vachanditambira, kwavari ndichavapa simba kuti vave vanakomana vaMwari, kunyangwe kune avo vanotenda muzita rangu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/12.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 12
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vashandi vari mumunda wemizambiringa vachawana ruponeso; 7–9, Vose avo vanoda uye vari vakakodzera vangayamure mubasa raIshe.

verses.text: Basa guru uye rinoshamisa rave kuda kuuya pakati pevana vevanhu.
Tarisai, ndini Mwari; teerera kuzwi rangu, iro benyu uye rine simba, rinopinza kupfuura munondo unocheka nekwose, nokupatsanura nepakati zvose nhengo nemwongo; nokudaro, teerera kuzwi rangu.

Tarisai munda wachena wamirira kukohwewa; nokudaro, ani zvake anoda kukohwa regai apinze jeko rake nesimba rake, uye akohwe zuva richiripo, kuti agochengetera mweya wake ruponeso rwusingaperi muumambo hwa Mwari.
Hongu, ani zvake achapinza jeko rake uye agokohwa, iyeyo akadaidzwa naMwari.
Nokudaro, kana ukakumbira uchagashira; kana ukagogodza richazarurirwa iwe.
Zvino, sekukumbira kwawaita, tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, chengeta mirairo yangu, uye utsvake kuunza uye nokumisa chinangwa cheZioni.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, uye nekune vosewo avo vane zvido zvekuunza uye nokumisa basa iri;

Uye hakuna mumwe angabatsire mubasa iri kunze kwekunge akazvininipisa uye azere nerudo, aine rutendo, tariro nerudo rwakadzama, uye ari anozvidzora muzvinhu zvose, zvipi nezvipi zvazvo zvichaiswa mumaoko ake.
Tarisai, ndini chiedza neupenyu hwenyika, ndiri kutaura mazwi aya, nokudaro teerera nesimba rako, uye ipapo wadaidzwa. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/13.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 13
chapter_summary: Kiyi nemasimba eHupirisita hwaAroni anopihwa.

verses.text: Panemi vamwe vangu varanda, muzita raMesiya ndinogadza Hupirisita hwaAroni, uhwo hunobata kiyi dzekushumira kwengirozi, uye nedzevhangeri rekutendeuka, uye nedzekubhabhatidzwa uchinyikwa kubvisa zvitadzo; uye izvi hazvizotorwa zvakare kubva panyika, kudakara vanakomana vaRevi vapira zvakare mupiro kuna Ishe mukururama.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/14.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 14
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vashandi mumunda wemizambiringa vachawana ruponeso; 7–8, Upenyu hwokusingaperi ndichochipo chikuru-kuru chaMwari; 9–11, Kristu akasika matenga nenyika.

verses.text: Basa guru uye rinoshamisa ravakuda kuuya kuvana vevanhu.

Tarisai, ndini Mwari; teererai kushoko rangu, iro rinokurumidza uye rakasimba, rinopinza kupfuura munondo unocheka nekwose, mukupatsanura nepakati zvose nhengo nemwongo; naizvozvo teererai kumashoko angu.

Tarisai, munda wachena wamirira kukohwewa; naizvozvo uyo anoda kukohwa, ngaaise jeko rake nesimba rake, uye akohwe zuva richiripo, kuti agochengetera mweya wake ruponeso rwusingaperi muumambo hwaMwari.
Hongu, ani zvake achaisa jeko rake uye achikohwa, iyeyo akadaidzwa naMwari.
Nokudaro, kana ukandikumbira uchagashira; kana ukagogodza richazarurirwa kwauri.
Tsvaka kuunza uye nokumisa Zioni yangu. Chengeta mirairo yangu muzvinhu zvose.
Uye, kana ukachengeta mirairo yangu uye nekushingirira kusvika kumagumo uchawana upenyu hwokusingaperi, chiri icho chipo chikuru kupfuura zvose zvipo zvaMwari.

Uye zvichaitika kuti kana ukakumbira Baba muzita rangu, murutendo uchitenda uchagashira Mweya Mutsvene, uyo unopa kuti utaure, kuti ugomira semupupuri wezvinhu zvauchaona zvose nekunzwa, uye nokutiwo ungataure kutendeuka kuchizvarwa chino.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu, akasika matenga nenyika, chiedza chisingavanzike murima;
Nokudaro, ndinofanira kuunza kuzara kwevhangeri rangu kubva kumaJentairi kuenda kuimba yaIsraeri.
Uye tarisai, ndiwe David, uye unodaidzwa kuti uzoyamura; chinhu chekuti ukachiita, uye uine rutendo, ucharopafadzwa zvose mumweya nemunyama, uye nemubairo wako uchave mukuru. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 15
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ruoko rwaIshe rwuri pamusoro penyika yose; 3–6, Kuparidza vhangeri nekuponesa mweya ndichochinhu chakanyanya kukosha.

verses.text: Teerera, muranda wangu John, uye uteerere kumazwi aJesu Kristu, Ishe vako neMununuri wako.
Nokuti tarisai, ndinotaura kwauri nehukari uye nesimba, nokuti ruoko rwangu rwuri pamusoro penyika yose.
Uye ndichakutaurira icho chisina mumwe munhu anoziva kunze kwangu newe wega—
Nekuti kwenguva zhinji wakada kuziva kwandiri icho chingazove chakakoshesesa kwauri.
Tarisai, wakaropafadzwa iwe pamusoro pechinhu ichi, uye nokutaura mazwi angu ayo andakupa maererano nemirairo yangu.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, chinhu chichazove chakakoshesesa kwauri chichave kutaura kutendeuka kuvanhu ava, kuti ugounza mweya kwandiri, kuti ugozozorora navo muumambo hwaBaba vangu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/16.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 16
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ruoko rwaIshe rwuri pamusoro penyika yose; 3–6, Kuparidza vhangeri nekuponesa mweya ndichochinhu chakanyanya kukosha.

verses.text: Teerera, muranda wangu Peter, uye uteerere kumazwi aJesu Kristu, Ishe vako neMununuri wako.
Nokuti tarisai, ndinotaura kwauri zvakajeka uye nesimba, nokuti ruoko rwangu rwuri pamusoro penyika yose.
Uye ndichakutaurira icho chisina mumwe munhu anoziva kunze kwangu newe wega—
Nekuti kwenguva zhinji wakada kuziva kwandiri icho chingazove chakakoshesesa kwauri.
Tarisai, wakaropafadzwa iwe pamusoro pechinhu ichi, uye nokutaura mazwi angu ayo andakupa maererano nemirairo yangu.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, chinhu chichave chakakoshesesa kwauri kutaura kutendeuka kuvanhu ava, kuti ugounza mweya kwandiri, kuti ugozozorora navo muumambo hwaBaba vangu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/17.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 17
chapter_summary: 1–4, Nerutendo Vapupuri Vatatu vachaona mahwendefa nezvimwe zvinhu zvinoyera; 5–9, Kristu anopa uchapupu hwehutsvene hweBhuku raMormoni.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, munofanira kuvimba nezwi rangu, izvo zvekuti mukazviita nechido chizere chemwoyo, mucharatidzwa mahwendefa, uye chidzitiro chepachipfuva, munondo waRabhani, Urimi neTumimi, izvo zvakapihwa kumukoma waJaredhi pagomo, apo paakataura naIshe vakatarisana, uye nezvinongedzero zvaishamisa zvakapihwa kuna Rihai ari murenje, pamiganhu yeGungwa Dzvuku.
Uye kuburikidza nerutendo rwenyu muchakwanisa kuzviona, kunyangwe nerutendo irworwo rwaive nevaporofita vekare.
Uye mushure mekunge mawana rutendo, uye maaona nemaziso enyu, muchapupura pamusoro pawo, nesimba raMwari;
Uye izvi muchazviita kuti muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, asaparadzwe, kuti ini ndigounza zvinangwa zvangu zvakarurama kuvana vevanhu mubasa rino.
Uye imi muchapupura kuti makaaona, semaonerwo aakaitwa nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, nokuti isimba rangu rakaita kuti aaone, uye pamusana pekuti aive nerutendo.
Uye akadudzira bhuku, kunyangwe icho chidimu chandakamuraira, uye saIshe venyu uye naMwari venyu ari mupenyu, ichocho ichokwadi.
Nokudaro, makagashira simba rimwechetero, uye nerutendo rwumwecheterwo, uye nechipo chimwechetecho sechake.
Uye kana mukaita iyi mirairo yekupedzisira yangu, iyo yandakakupai, masuwo egehena haazove nesimba pamuri; nokuti nyasha dzangu dzakakwana kwamuri, uye imi muchasimudzwa muzuva rekupedzisira.
Uye ini Jesu Kristu, Ishe venyu naMwari venyu, ndazvitaura kwamuri, kuti ndingounza zvinangwa zvangu zvakarurama kuvana vevanhu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 18
chapter_summary: 1–5, Magwaro matsvene anoratidza kuti chechi inovakwa sei; 6–8, Nyika irikuibva muhuipi; 9–16, Kukosha kwemweya kukuru; 17–25, Kuwana ruponeso, vanhu vanofanira kuzvitorera pachavo zita raKristu; 26–36, Kudaidzwa uye nebasa revaneGumi neVaviri kunoratidzwa; 37–39, Oliver Cowdery naDavid Whitmer vanofanira kutsvaka vaneGumi neVaviri; 40–47, Kuti vawane ruponeso, vanhu vakafanira kutendeuka, vobhabhatidzwa uye vochengeta mirairo.

verses.text: Zvino tarisai, pamusana pechinhu icho iwe muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery, chawakada kuziva kwandiri, ndinokupa mazwi aya:
Tarisai, ndakaratidza kwauri, neMweya wangu nguva dzakawanda, kuti zvinhu zvawakanyora ndezvechokwadi; nokudaro iwe unoziva kuti ndezvechokwadi.
Uye kana uchiziva kuti ndezvechokwadi, tarisai, ndinopa kwauri murairo, kuti uvimbe nezvinhu zvakanyorwa;
Nokuti mazviri ndimomakanyorwa zvose zvinhu maererano nekutanga kwechechi yangu, vhangeri rangu, uye nedombo rangu.
Nokudaro kana mukavaka chechi yangu, pahwaro hwevhangeri rangu nedombo rangu; masuwo egehena haangakukundei.
Tarisai, nyika yave kuibva muhuipi; uye zvinofanira kuti vana vevanhu vamutswe kuti vatendeuke, vose maJentairi uye neimbawo yaIsraeri.
Nokudaro, sezvo makabhabhatidzwa nemaoko emuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, maererano naichocho chandakamuraira, azadzikisa chinhu chandakamuraira.

Uye zvino, musashamiswe kuti ndamudaidza kuchinangwa changu, icho chinozivikanwa neni; nokudaro kana akashingaira mukuchengeta mirairo yangu acharopafadzwa kuve neupenyu hwokusingaperi; uye zita rake ndiJoseph.

Uye zvino, Oliver Cowdery, ndinotura kwauri, uyewo nekuna David Whitmer, nenzira yemurairo; nokuti, tarisai, ndinoraira vose vanhu kwose kwose kuti vatendeuke, uye ndinotaura kwamuri, kunyangwe sekuna Pauro muapositori wangu, nokuti makadaidzwa kunyangwe naiko kudaidzwa kumwecheteko kwaakadaidzwa nako.
Rangarirai kuti kukosha kwemweya kukuru mumaziso aMwari.
Nokuti tarisai, Ishe Mununuri venyu vakatambudzika murufu rwenyama; nokudaro vakatambudzika nokurwadzirwa vanhu vose kuti vanhu vose vatendeuke uye vagouya kwavari.
Uye vakamuka zvakare kubva kuvakafa, kuti vagoudza vanhu vose kwavari, kana vachinge vatendeuka.
Uye rufaro rwavo rukuru zvikuru nemweya uyo unotendeuka!
Nokudaro, munodaidzwa kuti mudaidzire kutendeuka kuvanhu ava.

Uye kana zvichiita kuti munofanira kushanda mazuva enyu ose mukudaidzira kutendeuka kuvanhu ava uye mukaunza, kana mweya mumwechete kwandiri, kufara kwako kuchave kukuru sei naiye muumambo hwaBaba vangu!
Uye zvino, kana kufara kwenyu kukave kukuru nemweya mumwechete uyo wawaunza kwandiri muumambo hwaBaba vangu, kufara kwenyu kungave kukuru zvakadii kana mukaunza mweya yakawanda kwandiri!
Tarisai, mune vhangeri rangu pamberi penyu, uye nedombo rangu, neruponeso rwangu.
Kumbirai Baba muzita rangu, murutendo muchitenda kuti muchagashira, uye uchave neMweya Mutsvene, uyo unoratidza zvose zvinhu zvakafanira kuvana vevanhu.
Uye kana musina rutendo, tariro nerudo rwakadzama, hapana chaungaite.
Usakakavadzane nechechi ipi zvayo, kunze kwekunge iri chechi yadhiabhorosi.
Torai pamuri zita raKristu, uye mutaure chokwadi muine mutsigo.
Uye vakawanda sei vanotendeuka uye vachibhabhatidzwa muzita rangu, iro rinova Jesu Kristu, uye vagoshingirira kusvika kumagumo, ivavo vachaponeswa.
Tarisai, Jesu Kristu ndiro zita rakapihwa naBaba, uye hakuna rimwezve zita rakapihwa iro ringaponese munhu;
Nokudaro, vose vanhu vanofanira kutora zita rakapihwa naBaba, nokuti muzita iroro vachadaidzwa pazuva rekupedzisira;
Nokudaro, kana vasingazive zita ravanodaidzwa naro, havangawane nzvimbo muumambo hwaBaba vangu.
Uye zvino tarisai, kune vamwe vakadaidzwa kuti vataure vhangeri rangu, kwose kumaJentairi nekumaJuda;
Hongu, kunyangwe, gumi nevaviri; uye vaneGumi neVaviri vachave vadzidzi vangu, uye vachatora pavari zita rangu; uye vaneGumi neVaviri ndivo vachada kutora pavari zita rangu nechido nemwoyo wose.
Uye kana vachida kutora pavari zita rangu nechido chemwoyo wose, vanodaidzwa kuti vaende pasi rose kunoparidza vhangeri rangu kune chisikwa chose.
Uye ndivo ivavo vakagadzwa neni kuti vabhabhatidze muzita rangu, maererano neizvo zvakanyorwa;
Uye munacho icho chinyorwa pamberi penyu, nokudaro makafanira kuzviita maererano nemazwi akanyorwa.
Uye zvino ndinotaura kwamuri, imi vaneGumi neVaviri—Tarisai, nyasha dzangu dzakawanda kwamuri; makafanira kufamba makatwasanuka pamberi pangu uye musatadze.

Uye tarisai, ndimi avo vakagadzwa neni kuti mugadze vapirisita nevadzidzisi; kuti mutaure vhangeri rangu, maererano nesimba reMweya Mutsvene iro riri mamuri, uye maererano nekudaidzwa nezvipo zvaMwari kuvanhu;
Uye ini Jesu Kristu, Ishe venyu naMwari venyu, ndini ndazvitaura.
Mazwi aya haasi evanhu kana emunhu, asi ndeangu; nokudaro, muchapupura kuti ndeangu kwete emunhu;
Nokuti izwi rangu ririkuataura kwamuri; nokuti ari kupihwa neMweya wangu kwamuri, uye nesimba rangu munogona kuaverengerana; uye dai pasina simba rangu hamaiawana;
Nokudaro, munogona kupupura kuti manzwa izwi rangu, uye munoziva mazwi angu.
Uye zvino, tarisai, ndinopa kwauri, iwe Oliver Cowdery, nekuna David Whitmer zvakare, kuti muchatsvaga vaneGumi neVaviri, avo vachave nezvido sezvandataura;
Pamusoro pezvido zvavo nemabasa avo muchavaziva.
Uye kana mavawana mucharatidza zvinhu izvi kwavari.
Muchawira pasi uye monamata Baba muzita rangu.
Uye makafanira kuparidzira nyika, muchiti: Makafanira kutendeuka uye mobhabhatidzwa, muzita raJesu Kristu;
Nokuti vose vanhu vanofanira kutendeuka vobhabhatidzwa, kwete varume chete, asi vakadzi nevana avo vasvika pazera rekuzvidavirira.
Zvino, mushure mekunge matambira izvi, munofanira kuchengeta mirairo yangu muzvinhu zvose;
Nemaoko enyu ndichashanda basa rinoshamisa mukati mevana vevanhu, mukupwisa vazhinji nezvezvitadzo zvavo zvakawanda, kuti vangangouya mukutendeuka, uye nokuti vangangouya muumambo hwaBaba vangu.
Nokudaro, maropafadzo andinopa kwamuri ari pamusoro pezvinhu zvose.
Uye mushure mekunge magashira izvi, kana mukasachengeta mirairo yangu hamungaponeswe muumambo hwaBaba vangu.
Tarisai, ini Jesu Kristu, Ishe venyu naMwari venyu, neMununuri wenyu, nesimba reMweya wangu, ndazvitaura. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, Kristu ane simba rose; 4–5, Vose vanhu vanofanira kutendeuka kana kutambudzika; 6–12, Kurangwa kwokusingaperi kuranga kwaMwari; 13–20, Kristu akatambudzikira vose, kuti vasazotambudzika kana vari vatendeuka; 21–28, Paridzai vhangeri rekutendeuka; 29–41, Taurai nhau dzinofadza.

verses.text: Ndini Arfa naOmega, Kristu Ishe; hongu, kunyangwe ini ndini iye, wekutanga nowekupedzisira, Mununuri wenyika.
Ini ndaita uye ndapedza kuda kweuyo wandiri wake, kunyangwe Baba, maererano neni—ndazviita izvi kuti ndiise pasi pangu zvinhu zvose—

Kuti ndive nesimba rose, kunyange mukuparadzwa kwaSatani nemabasa ake pakuguma kwenyika, uye nezuva guru rekupedzisira rekutongwa, kwandichaita kuvagari vemo, ndichatonga wose munhu maererano nemabasa ake nezviito zvaakaita.
Chokwadi munhu wose anofanira kutendeuka kana kuti achatambudzika, nokuti ini Mwari, handina magumo.
Nokudaro, handizobvisa kutonga kwandinenge ndaita, asi matambudziko achapararira mberi, kuchema, kuwungudza nekugeda-geda kwemeno, hongu, kune avo vanowanikwa vari kuruoko rwangu rweruboshwe.
Zvisinei, hazvina kunyorwa kuti kutambudzika uku hakuzopera asi zvakanyorwa kuti, kutambudzika kusingaperi.

Zvakare, zvakanyorwa kuti kuraswa kwokusingaperi; nokudaro zvakanyatsojeka kupfuura mamwe magwaro matsvene, kuti zvingangoshanda mumwoyo yevana vevanhu, zvose pamwechete kuitira kurumbidzwa kwezita rangu.
Nokudaro, ndichatsanangura kwauri chakavandika ichi, nokuti zvakafanira kwauri kuti uzive kunyangwe sevaapositori vangu.
Ndinotaura kwamuri makasarudzwa muchinhu ichi, kunyangwe sevamwechete, kuti mugopinda muzororo rangu.
Nokuti tarisai, kuvandika kwehumwari, kukuru sei! Nokuti, tarisa, handina magumo, uye kuranga kunopihwa kubva muruoko rwangu kuranga kusina magumo, nokuti Chisina magumo ndiro zita rangu. Nokudaro—
Kuranga kwokusingaperi kuranga kwaMwari.
Kuranga kusinamagumo kuranga kwaMwari.
Nokudaro, ndinokuraira kuti utendeuke, uye uchengete mirairo iyo yawakagashidzwa neruoko rwemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, muzita rangu.
Uye kuburikidza nesimba rangu guru kuti iwe wazvigashira;

Nokudaro ndinokuraira kuti utendeuke—tendeuka, nokuti ndingakurove netsvimbo yemuromo wangu, uye nehasha dzangu, uye nokushatirwa kwangu, uye kutambudzika kwako kugorwadza—kuti zvinenge zvichirwadza sei hauzive, kuti zvakakura sei hauzive, hongu, kuti zvakaoma sei kuzvitakura hauzive.
Nokuti tarisai, Ini Mwari, ndakatambudzikira vose zvinhu izvi, kuti vasatambudzike kana vakatendeuka;
Asi kana vakasatendeuka vakafanira kutambudzika kunyangwe sezvandakaita ini;

Kuri kutambudzika kwakandikonzera ini, kana Mwari, mukuru kune vose, kuti ndidedere pamusana pekurwadziwa, uye nokubuda ropa muburi rose remuviri uye nokutambudzika mumuviri nemumweya—uye ndikanzwa kuti dai zvaiita kuti ndisanwe mukombe unovava, uye ndidududze—
Zvisinei, kubwinya ngakuve kuna Baba, uye ndakanwa ndikapedzisa kugadzirira kwangu kuvana vevanhu.

Nokudaro ndinokuraira zvakare kuti utendeuke, potse ndingangokuninipisa nesimba rangu guru, uye kuti ureurure zvitadzo zvako, potse uchatambura nekurangwa uku kwandakataura, iko kudikidiki chaizvo, hongu, kunyangwe muchidumbu chidiki wakachiraira mukachidimbu makachiraira panguva yandakabvisa Mweya wangu.
Uye ndinokuraira kuti hauna chaunoparidza kunze kwekutendeuka, uye usaratidze zvinhu izvi kunyika kudakara ndazvibvumira.
Nokuti havangakwanise nyama iyezvino, asi mukaka vanofanira kugashira; nokudaro, havafanire kuziva zvinhu izvi, nokuti vangafe.
Dzidza kubva kwandiri, uye woteerera kumazwi angu; famba uri muhunyoro hweMweya wangu, uye uchawana runyararo mandiri.
Ndini Jesu Kristu; ndakauya nekuda kwaBaba, uye ndinoita kuda kwavo.
Uye zvakare, ndinokuraira kuti usachive mukadzi wemuvakidzani wako; kana kutsvaga upenyu hwemuvakidzani wako.
Zvakare, ndinokuraira kuti usachive zvinhu zvako, asi zvipe wakasununguka kunodhindisa Bhuku raMormoni, iro rine chokwadi nezwi raMwari.
Riri iro izwi rangu kumuJentairi, kuti nechinguvana richaenda kumuJuda, maRamani vari vevamwe vavo vakasara, kuti vagotenda vhangeri uye vagorega kutsvaka Mesia achauya iye akatouya kare.
Zvakare ndinokuraira kuti uchanamata uchidaidzira uye nokunamatawo nechemumwoyo mako, hongu, pamberi penyika, uye nemuruvande; paruzhinji uye nepako wega.
Uye uchataura nhau dzinofadza, hongu, uchizvishambadza uri mumakomo, uye nepanzvimbo yose yakakwirira, uye nemuvanhu vose vauchabvumirwa kuona.
Uye izvi uchazviita nekuzvityora kose, uchivimba neni, usingatuke vatuki.
Pamusoro pemitemo hapana chaunotaura, asi uchataura kutendeuka uye nerutendo muna Muponesi, uye nokuregererwa kwezvitadzo nokubhabhatidzwa, uye nemoto, hongu, kunyangwe Mweya Mutsvene.
Tarisai, uyu ndiwo murairo mukuru uye wekupedzisira uyo wandichakupa maererano nenyaya iyi; nokuti izvi zvichakwanirana nekufamba kwako kwemazuva ose, kunyangwe kusvika mukuguma kweupenyu hwako.
Uye kusuwa ndiko kwauchagashira kana mukashora mirairo iyi, hongu, kunyangwe kuparadzwa kwako pachako nekwezvinhu zvako.
Gova chikamu chezvinhu zvako, hongu, kunyangwe chidimbu cheminda yako, uye zvose kunze kwezvekuriritira mhuri yako.
Ripa chikwereti chauinacho kumudhindi. Zvisunungure kubva pahusungwa.
Siya imba yako nemusha, kunze kwekunge wavekuda kunoona mhuri yako;
Uye taura wakasununguka kune vose; hongu, paridza, nyengetedza, taura chokwadi, kunyangwe nezwi guru uye neruzha rwekufara, uchishevedzera—Hosana, hosana, ngariropafadzwe zita raIshe Mwari!
Namata nguva dzose, uye ini ndichadira Mweya wangu pauri, uye maropafadzo ako achave makuru—hongu, kunyangwe kupfuura zvekunge wawana upfumi hwepasi pano uye nokuora kwahwo.
Tarisai ungaverenge izvi here usingafare uye nokusimudza mwoyo wako nokufara?
Kana kuti uchagona kuramba uchimhanya here semutungamiri asingaone?
Kana kuti ungave wakazvininipisa here urimunyoro, uye nokuzvibata zvakachenjera pamberi pangu? Hongu, uya kwandiri ini Muponesi wako. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 20
chapter_summary: 1–16, Bhuku raMormoni rinoratidza hutsvene hwebasa remazuva ekupedzisira; 17–28, Dzidziso dzekusikwa, kupunzika, rudzikinuro, nerubhabhatidzo zvinotsinhirwa; 29–37, Mitemo inotonga kutendeuka, kunatsiridza, kutsvenesa, nerubhabhatidzo inomiswa; 38–67, Mabasa emagosa, vapirisita, vadzidzisi, nemadhikoni anotsanangurwa muchidimbu; 68–74, Mabasa enhengo, kuropafadzwa kwevana, netsika yerubhabhatidzo zvinoratidzwa; 75–84, Minamato yeSakaramende nemitemo inotonga nhengo dzeChechi inopihwa.

verses.text: Kusimuka kweChechi yaKristu mumazuva ano ekupedzisira, pave nechiuru chimwechete nemazana masere nemakumi matatu emakore kubvira kuuya kwakaita Ishe vedu neMuponesi Jesu Kristu panyama, riri rakarongwa nemazvo uye nokumiswa muchibvumirano chemitemo yenyika yedu, nokuda uye nemirairo yaMwari, mumwedzi wechina uye muzuva rechitanhatu remwedzi unonzi Kubvumbi—
Iri mirairo yakapiwa kuna Joseph Smith, Mwana, uyo akadaidzwa naMwari, uye akagadzwa muapositori waJesu Kristu, kuti ave gosa rekutanga chechi ino;
Uye kuna Oliver Cowdery, uyo akadaidzwawo naMwari, muapositori waJesu Kristu, kuti ave gosa wechipiri wechechi ino, uye akagadzwa pasi peruoko rwavo;
Uye izvi zviri maererano nenyasha dzaIshe neMuponesi vedu Jesu Kristu, kubwinya kwose kuve kwaari, iye zvino nariini, Ameni.
Mushure mekunge zvaratidzwa zvechokwadi kune gosa rekutanga iri kuti rakanga ragashira kuregererwa kwezvitadzo zvaro, rakapinda zvakare mukuzvida kwenyika;

Asi mushure mekutendeuka, uye nokuzvininipisa, nemwoyo wake wose, kuburikidza nerutendo, Mwari vakamushumira nengirozi tsvene, iyo chiso chayo chaiita semheni, uye nhumbi dzayo dzakange dzakachena dziri chena kupfuura kumwe kwose kuchena;
Uye ikamupa mirairo yakamufemera;
Uye ikamupa simba kubva kumusoro, nenzira yakanga yakagadzirwa kare, kuti adudzire Bhuku raMormoni;
Iro rine zvinyorwa zvevanhu vakapunzika, nevhangeri rizere raJesu Kristu kumaJentairi uye nekuvaJudawo.
Iro rakapihwa nekufemerwa, uye richitsigirwa kune vamwe kuburikidza nokushumira kwengirozi, uye richiparidzirwa kunyika naivo—
Kuratidza kunyika kuti magwaro matsvene ndeechokwadi, nokuti Mwari vanofemera vanhu uye nokuvadaidza kubasa ravo dzvene munguva nechizvarwa chino, uye nekuzvizvarwa zvekare;
Zvichiratidza kuti ndivo Mwari vamwechetevo vaiveko nezuro, nhasi, nariini. Ameni.
Nokudaro, kuve nevapupuri vakuru vakadai, naivava nyika ichatongwa, kunyangwe nevakawanda vachauya mushure meizvi mukuzoziva zvebasa rino.
Uye avo vanorigashira nerutendo, uye vakashanda mukururama, vachagashira korona yeupenyu hwokusingaperi;
Asi avo vanoomesa mwoyo yavo nokusatenda, uye vachiriramba, richavapindukira mukutongwa kwavo—
Nokuti Ishe Mwari vazvitaura; uye isu magosa echechi, takazvinzwa uye tinopupura kumazwi aMambo vanobwinya vekumusoro, kwavari ngakuve nekurumbidzwa nariini nariini. Ameni.

Pamusoro pezvinhu izvi tinoziva kuti kuna Mwari kudenga, avo vasinamagumo uye vokusingaperi, kubva kusingaperi kusvika kusingaperi vamwechetevo Mwari vasingashanduke, muumbi wedenga nenyika, nezvinhu zvose zviri mazviri;
Uye vakasika munhu, murume nemukadzi, nemufananidzo wavo uye nokumufananidza navo, ndivo vakavasika;
Uye ndokuvapa mirairo yokuti vakafanira kumuda nokumushandira, ivavo chete vapenyu Mwari vechokwadi, uye nokuti ivo chete ndivo munhu wavanofanira kunamata.
Asi pamusana pekutyora mitemo iyi mitsvene munhu akave wenyama newehudhiabhorosi, uye akave munhu akapunzika.
Nokudaro, Mwari Samasimba vakapa Mwanakomana wavo Mumwechete Akaberekwa, sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa mumagwaro matsvene ayo akapihwa pamusoro pake.
Akatambudzika nokuyedzwa asi haana kuita hanya nazvo.
Akarovererwa, akafa, uye akamuka zvakare muzuva rechitatu;
Uye akakwira kudenga, kwaagere kurudyi rwaBaba, kuti atonge namasimba makuru maererano nokuda kwaBaba;
Kuti vakawanda sei vaizotenda uye vagobhabhatidzwa muzita rake dzvene, uye vagoshingirira murutendo kusvika kumagumo, vanofanira kuponeswa;

Kwete avo chete vakatenda mushure mekuuya kwake pakati penguva ari munyama, asi avo vose kubvira pakutanga, kunyangwe vakawanda sei vakanga variko asati auya, vakatenda kumazwi evaporofita matsvene, vaitaura sekufemerwa kwavaiitwa nechipo cheMweya Mutsvene, vaipupura nechokwadi pamusoro pake muzvinhu zvose, vanofanirwa kuve neupenyu hwokusingaperi,
Naivowo vachauya shure, vachatenda muzvipo nekudaidza kwaMwari kuburikidza neMweya Mutsvene, uyo unopupura nezvaBaba nezveMwanakomana;
Ivo Baba, Mwanakomana, neMweya Mutsvene vari Mwari mumwechete, vasinamagumo vokusingaperi, vasingagume. Ameni.

Uye tinoziva kuti vose vanhu vanofarira kutendeuka uye nokutenda muzita raJesu Kristu, uye nokunamata Baba muzita rake, uye nokushingirira mukutenda muzita rake kusvika kumagumo, kana kuti havangaponeswe muumambo hwaMwari.
Uye tinoziva kuti kunatswa kuburikidza nenyasha dzaIshe vedu neMuponesi vedu Jesu Kristu kwakarurama uye ndekwechokwadi.

Uye tinozivawo kuti, kutsveneswa kuburikidza nenyasha dzaIshe Muponesi vedu Jesu Kristu kwakarurama uye ndekwechokwadi, kune avo vose vanoda nokushandira Mwari nekugwinya kwavo kwose, nepfungwa, uye nesimba.
Asi zvinogonakuitika kuti munhu anopunzika kubva panyasha uye obva abva pana Mwari mupenyu;
Naizvozvo regai chechi iteerere uye nokunamata nguva dzose, potse vangapinde mukuyedzwa;
Hongu, uye regai kunyangwe avo vakatsveneswa vateerere naivowo.

Uye tinoziva kuti zvinhu izvi ndezvechokwadi uye zviri maererano nezvakazarurwa zvaJohane, pasina kupamhidzira kana kushora chiporofita chebhuku rake, magwaro matsvene, kana zvakazarurwa zvaMwari zvichauya mushure nechipo nesimba reMweya Mutsvene, izwi raMwari, kana kushumira kwengirozi.
Uye Ishe Mwari vazvitaura, uye rukudzo, simba nekubwinya ngazvipihwe kuzita ravo dzvene, iye zvino narinhi. Ameni.

Uye zvakare nenzira yekuraira kuchechi maererano netsika yerubhabhatidzo—Avo vose vanozvininipisa pamberi paMwari, uye vachida kubhabhatidzwa, uye vachiuya vaine mwoyo yakatyoka nemweya yakapfava, uye vagopupura pamberi pechechi kuti chokwadi vatendeuka kuzvitadzo zvavo zvose, uye vave kuda kutora pavari zita raJesu Kristu, vaine hushingi hwekumushandira kusvika kumagumo, uye vagoratidza nemabasa avo kuti zvechokwadi vakagashira Mweya waKristu mukuregererwa kwezvitadzo zvavo, vachagashirwa nerubhabhatidzo muchechi yake.
Basa remagosa, vapirisita, vadzidzisi, madhikoni, uye nenhengo dzechechi yaKristu—muapositori igosa, uye ibasa rake kuti abhabhatidze;
Uye nekugadza mamwe magosa, vapirisita, vadzidzisi, nemadhikoni;
Uye nekupa chingwa newaini—mifananidzo yenyama neropa raKristu—
Uye nokusimbisa avo vanobhabhatidzwa muchechi, nekuvaisa maoko pamusoro rwuri rubhabhatidzo rwemoto neMweya Mutsvene, maererano nemagwaro matsvene.
Uye nokudzidzisa, kutsanangura, kukurudzira, kubhabhatidza, uye nokutarisa chechi.
Uye nekusimbisa chechi nekuisa maoko pamusoro, uye nekupa Mweya Mutsvene;
Uye nokutungamira yose misangano.
Magosa ndivo vanotungamira misangano sekutungamirwa kwavanenge vachiitwa neMweya Mutsvene, maererano nemirairo nezvakazarurwa zvaMwari.
Basa remupirisita kuparidza, kudzidzisa, kutsanangura, kukurudzira, uye nokubhabhatidza, uye nokupa sakaramende,
Uye nokushanyira imba yenhengo yega-yega, uye nokuvakuridzira kuti vanamate zvinonzwika uye nemuruvande uye nokuona mabasa ose emhuri.
Uye anogonawo kugadza vamwe vapirisita, vadzidzisi, nemadhikoni.
Uye akafanira kutungamira misangano kana pasina gosa riripo;
Asi kana paine gosa riripo, chake kuparidza chete, nokudzidzisa, nokutsanangura, nokukuridzira, uye nokubhabhatidza;
Uye nokushanyira imba yenhengo yega-yega, nokuvakurudzira kuti vanamate zvinonzwika nemuruvande uye nokuita ose mabasa emhuri.
Mumabasa ose aya mupirisita anofanira kuyamura gosa kana mukana uchitendera.
Basa remudzidzisi kutarisa chechi nguva dzose, uye nokuvanavo nokuvasimbisa;
Uye nokuona kuti hamuna zvitema muchechi, kana kusaitirana zvakanaka, kana kunyepa, kurevana, kana kutaura zvakaipa;
Uye nokuona kuti chechi inosangana pamwechete nguva dzose, uye nokuonawo kuti nhengo dzose dziri kuita basa radzo.
Uye anotora hutungamiri hwemisangano kana pasina gosa kana mupirisita.
Uye anofanira kugara achiyamurwa nguva dzose, mumabasa ake ose muchechi, nemadhikoni, kana zvichifanira.
