Asi vadzidzisi kana madhikoni havana mvumo yekubhabhatidza, kunamatira sakaramende, kana kuisa maoko pamusoro;
Asika, vanofanira kuyambira, nokutsanangura, kukuridzira, nokudzidzisa, uye nokukoka vose kuti vauye kuna Kristu.
Rose gosa, mupirisita, mudzidzisi kana mudhikoni anofanira kugadzwa maererano nezvipo nekudaidza kwaMwari, uye anofanira kugadzwa nesimba reMweya Mutsvene, uri mune uyo anomugadza.
Magosa akati kuti anoumba chechi ino yaKristu anofanira kusangana mugungano kamwechete pamwedzi mitatu, kana kuti nguva nenguva, sezvicharongwa kana kusarudza kuchaita makungano arehwa.
Uye makungano arehwa ndeekuita chero basa rechechi rakafanira kuve rinoitwa panguva iyoyo.
Magosa anofanira kuwana magwaro avo kubva kune mamwe magosa, vachitsigirwa nechechi yavanenge vari, kana kubva kumisangano.

Mupirisita ega-ega, mudzidzisi, kana mudhikoni, akagadzwa nemupirisita, anokwanisa kutora rugwaro kwaari panguva iyoyo, rugwaro urwu, kana rwukaratidzwa kugosa, rwunomuita kuti awane rugwaro urwo rwuchamupa mvumo kuti aite mabasa ekudaidzwa kwake, kana kuti angarwutambire kubva kumusangano.
Hapana munhu achagadzwa muchinzvimbo chipi zvacho muchechi ino, panebazi rakafanana rechechi iripo yakarongwa, pasina rutsigiro rwechechi iyoyo;
Asi magosa anotungamira, mabhishopi anofamba, makurukota epamusoro, vapirisita vepamusoro, nemagosa, vanogona kuve nerombo rekugadza, panenge pasina bazi rechechi rekudaidzirwa kutsigira.
Wose mukuru wehupirisita hwepamusoro (kana gosa riri kutungamira), bhishopi, gurukota repamusoro, nemupirisita wepamusoro, anogadzwa zvichitungamirwa nedare repamusoro kana gungano revose.

Basa renhengo mushure mekunge vagashirwa nerubhabhatidzo.—Magosa kana mapirisita vanofanira kuve nenguva yakakwana yekutsanangura zvose zvinhu zviri maererano nechechi yaKristu kuti vazvinzwisise, vasati vatora sakaramende uye nokuzosimbiswa nokuiswa maoko pamusoro nemagosa, kuti zvinhu zvose zvigoitwa nenzira kwayo.

Uye nhengo dzicharatidza pachena pamberi pechechi, nepamberi pemagosa, nekufamba nekutaura kwehumwari, kuti vakakodzera, kuti kuve nemabasa nerutendo rwunobvumirana nemagwaro matsvene—vachifamba muhutsvene pamberi paIshe.
Yose nhengo yechechi yaKristu ine vana inofanira kuvaunza kumagosa pamberi pechechi, avo vanofanira kuvaisa maoko pamusoro muzita raJesu Kristu, nokuvaropafadza muzita rake.
Hakuna angatambirwe muchechi yaKristu kunze kwekunge asvika pazera rekuzvidavirira pamberi paMwari, uye ari anokwanisa kutendeuka.
Rubhabhatidzo rwunoitwa netsika inotevera kune vose avo vanotendeuka—

Munhu akadaidzwa naMwari uye aine mvumo kubva kuna Jesu Kristu kuti abhabhatidze, achapinda mumvura nemunhu auya kuzobhabhatidzwa, uye oti achimudaidza nezita: Nemvumo yandakapihwa naJesu Kristu, ndinokubhabhatidza muzita raBaba, nereMwanakomana, nereMweya Mutsvene. Ameni.
Zvino omunyika mumvura, uye omuburitsa zvakare mumvura.
Zvakakodzera kuti chechi isangane nguva dzose kuti vatore chingwa newaini mukurangarira Ishe Jesu;
Uye gosa kana mupirisita ndiye acharopafadza basa racho; uye anoropafadza netsika inotevera iyi—achapfugama pamwechete nechechi uye odaidza Baba mumunamato wakadzama achiti:

Mwari Baba Vokusingaperi, tinokukumbirai muzita reMwanakomana wenyu, Jesu Kristu, kuti muropafadze nekutsvenesa chingwa ichi kumweya yeavo vose vanochidya, kuti vagochidya mukurangarira muviri weMwanakomana wenyu, uye vapupure kwamuri, Mwari Baba Vokusingaperi, kuti vanoda kutora pavari zita reMwanakomana wenyu, nokumurangarira nguva dzose nokuchengeta mirairo yake iyo yaakavapa; kuti vave neMweya wake nguva dzose. Ameni.
Mutowo wekuropafadza waini—achatora komichi, otaura achiti:

Mwari Baba Vokusingaperi, tinokukumbirai muzita reMwanakomana wenyu, Jesu Kristu, kuti muropafadze nekutsvenesa waini iyi kumweya yeavo vose vanoinwa, kuti vave vanozviita mukurangarira ropa reMwanakomana wenyu, iro ravakadeurirwa; kuti vagopupura kwamuri, Mwari Baba Vokusingaperi, kuti vagomurangarira nguva dzose, kuti vave neMweya wake. Ameni.
Chero zvake nhengo yechechi yaKristu anotadza, kana anowanikwa aine chaanokanganisa, achaitwa sezvinotaurwa nemagwaro matsvene.
Richave basa rechechi dzose, dzinoumba chechi yaKristu kuti vatumire mumwechete kana vakawanda vevadzidzisi vavo kuti vanopinda mumakungano akawanda anoitwa nemagosa echechi.

Vaine mazita enhengo dzose dzakazvibatanidza nechechi kubvira pagungano rekupedzisira; kana kutumira neruoko rwemumwe muhupirisita, kuitira kuti zvinyorwa zvemazita ose echechi yose zvichengetwe mubhuku nerimwe remagosa, ripi zvaro rinenge rasarudzwa nemamwe magosa nguva-nenguva;
Uyewo, kana paine vakatandaniswa muchechi, kuti mazita avo agodzimwa muzvinyorwa zvevanhu vose vechechi.

Dzose nhengo dzinotama muchechi yadzakanga dzichigara, kana dziri dzakakodzera kuchechi yadzisingazivikanwe, dzingatore tsamba inotsigira kuti inhengo chaidzo uye vamire zvakanaka, iyoyo tsamba inogona kusainwa neripi zvaro gosa kana mupirisita ndokunge nhengo iri kutambira tsamba ichizivikanwa negosa kana mupirisita, kana kuti ingasainwe nevadzidzisi kana madhikoni echechi.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/21.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 21
chapter_summary: 1–3, Joseph Smith anodaidzwa kuva muoni, mududziri, muporofita, muapositori, negosa; 4–8, Izwi rake richatungamira chinangwa cheZioni; 9–12, Vatendi vachatenda mazwi ake paanotaura kuburikidza neMunyaradzi.

verses.text: Tarisai, pachave nezvinyorwa zvinochengetwa pakati penyu; uye mazviri uchanzi muoni, mududziri, muporofita, muapositori waJesu Kristu, gosa rechechi kuburikidza nekuda kwaMwari Baba, uye nenyasha dzaIshe vako Jesu Kristu,
Uchifemerwa neMweya Mutsvene kuti uhwarika hwaro hwayo, uye nokuivaka kurutendo rwutsvene tsvene.
Riri chechi rakarongwa uye rakamiswa mugore raIshe wenyu 1830, mumwedzi wechina, uye muzuva rechitanhatu remwedzi unonzi Kubvumbi.
Nokudaro, zvakanangana nechechi, muchateerera kumazwi ake ose nemirairo yaachapa kwamuri sekugashira kwaanenge achiita, achifamba muhutsvene hwose pamberi pangu;
Nokuti shoko rake mucharigashira, sekunge ririkubva mumuromo mangu, mumwoyo murefu wose nerutendo.

Nokuti mukuita zvinhu izvi masuwo egehena haazokukundai; hongu, uye Ishe Mwari anoparadza masimba erima kubva kwamuri, uye nokuita kuti matenga azunguzike zvinonakira imi, uye nezvekurumbidzwa kwezita rake.
Nokuti ndiko kutaura kwaIshe Mwari; Iyeyo ndiye wandakafemera kufambisa chinangwa cheZioni musimba guru munezvakanaka, nekushingaira kwake ndinokuziva, uye minamato yake ndakainzwa.
Hongu, kuchemera kwake Zioni ndakakuona, uye ndichaita kuti asazoichemera zvakare; nokuti mazuva ake ekufara auya mukuregererwa kwezvitadzo zvake, uye nokuonekwa kwemaropafadzo angu pamabasa ake.

Nokuti tarisai, ndicharopafadza vose avo vanoshanda mumunda wangu wemizambiringa nemaropafadzo makuru, uye ivo vachatenda nemazwi ake, anopihwa kwaari kuburikidza nekwandiri naMweya Munyaradzi, ayo anoratidza kuti Jesu akaroverwa nevanhu vane zvitadzo pamusoro pezvitadzo zvenyika, hongu, kuitira kuregererwa kwezvitadzo kune mwoyo wakapfava.
Nokudaro zvinondifadza kuti anofanira kugadzwa newe Oliver Cowdery, muapositori wangu;
Ichi chiri chisungo kwauri, kuti uri gosa pasi peruoko rwake, iye ari wekutanga kwauri, kuti uve gosa kuchechi ino yaKristu, ine zita rangu.
Uye muparidzi wekutanga kuchechi ino, uye pamberi penyika, hongu, pamberi pamaJentairi; hongu ndiko kutaura kunoita Ishe Mwari, tarisa, tarisa nekumaJudawo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/22.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 22
chapter_summary: 1, Rubhabhatidzo chibvumirano chitsva uye chisingaperi; 2–4, Rubhabhatidzo rwune mvumo ndirwo rwunodikanwa.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri zvose zvibvumirano zvakare ndaita kuti zvibviswe kuburikidza nechinhu ichi; uye ichi chibvumirano chitsva chisingaperi, icho chakabvira pakutanga.
Nokudaro, kana dai munhu akabhabhatidzwa kazana hapana chazvinomuyamura, nokuti haungapinde nepakamusuwo kakamanikana nemutemo waMosesi, kana nemabasa ako akafa.
Nokuti pamusoro pemabasa enyu akafa ndaita kuti ndiite chibvumirano ichi chekupedzisira nechechi ino kuti zvivakirwe ini, kana semazuva akare.
Nokudaro, pindai nepamusuwo, sekuraira kwandaita, uye musatsvake kuraira Mwari venyu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/23.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 23
chapter_summary: 1–7, Vadzidzi vekutanga ava vonodaidzwa kuti vaparidze, nokukurudzira, nokusimbisa Chechi.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinotaura kwauri Oliver, mazwi mashomanani. Tarisa, iwe wakaropafadzwa, uye hausi pasi pekutongwa. Asi chenjera kuzvikudza, potse ungapinde mukuyedzwa.
Ita kuti kudaidzwa kwako kuzivikanwe kuchechi, uye nepamberiwo penyika, uye mwoyo wako uchazarurirwa kuparidza chokwadi kubvira zvino kusvikira nariini. Ameni.

Tarisai, ndinotaura kwauri Hyrum, mazwi mashomanani; nokuti newewo hausi pasi pekutongwa, uye mwoyo wako wazarurwa, nerurimi rwako rwasunungurwa; uye kudaidzwa kwako ndekwekukurudzira, nokusimbisa chechi nguva dzose. Nokudaro basa rako riri muchechi nariini, uye izvi zvakadaro nekuda kwemhuri yako. Ameni.

Tarisai, ndinotaura mazwi mashomanani kwauri, Samuel; nokuti newewo hausi pasi pekutongwa, kudaidzwa kwako ndekwekukurudzira, nokusimbisa chechi; uye hausati wadaidzwa kuti uparidze pamberi penyika. Ameni.

Tarisai, ndinotaura mazwi mashomanani kwauri Joseph; nokuti newewo hausi pasi pekutongwa, kudaidzwa kwakowo ndekwekukurudzira, nokusimbisa chechi; iri ndiro basa rako kubvira zvino kusvika nariini. Ameni.

Tarisai, ndinozviratidza kwauri, Joseph Knight, nemazwi aya, kuti wakafanira kutora muchinjikwa wako, mukudaro wakafanira kunamata uchidaidzira pamberi penyika nemuruvandewo, mumhuri yako nemushamwari dzako, nemunzvimbo dzose.
Uye tarisai, ibasa rako kubatana nechechi yechokwadi, uye mutauro wako kukurudzira nguva dzose, kuti ugogashira mubairo wemushandi. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/24.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 24
chapter_summary: 1–9, Joseph Smith anodaidzwa kuti adudzire, aparidze, nokutsanangura magwaro matsvene; 10–12, Oliver Cowdery anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri; 13–19, Mutemo unoratidzwa pamusoro pekushanda nesimba raMwari, kutukwa, kuguma guruva retsoka, nokuenda usina chikwama kana mbuva.

verses.text: Tarisai, wakadaidzwa ukasarudzwa kuti unyore Bhuku raMormoni, uye nokuhushumiri hwangu; ndakakusimudza kubva mumatambudziko ako uye ndikakuraira, zvekuti wakabviswa kune vose vavengi vako, uye ukabviswa mumasimba aSatani uye nemurima;
Zvisinei, haugone kuregerwa mukutadza kwako; zvisinei, enda zvako uye usazotadza zvakare.

Kudza basa rako; uye mushure mekunge wadyara minda yako uye waivakirira, enda nokukurumidza kuchechi iri muColesville, Fayette, neManchester, uye vachakutsigira; uye ini ndichavaropafadza zvose mumweya nemunyama;
Asi vakasakutambira, ndinozotumira kwavari kutukwa kunze kwemaropafadzo.
Uye iwe ucharamba uchienderera mberi mukudaidzira kuna Mwari muzita rangu, uye nokunyora zvinhu zvamuchapihwa naMunyaradzi, uye nokutsanangura magwaro matsvene ose kuchechi.
Uye zvichapihwa kwauri munguva iyoyo zvauchataura, nekunyora, uye vachazvinzwa, kana kuti ndinotumira kwavari kutukwa kunze kwemaropafadzo.
Nokuti uchaisa rose basa rako muZioni; uye mukudaro uchaita simba.
Iva nemwoyo murefu, mumatambudziko, nokuti uchava neakawanda; asi ushingirire, nokuti tarisa, ndinewe, kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo emazuva ako.

Uye mumabasa emunyika hauzove nesimba, nokuti iri harisi basa rako. Ita zvebasa rako uye uchazove nezvekukudzisa basa rako, uye nokutsanangura ose magwaro matsvene, ramba uchigadza maoko nokusimbisa machechi.
Mumwe wako Oliver acharamba ari mukutakura zita rangu pamberi penyika, uye nechechiwo. Uye haafanirwe kuzombofunga kuti angataure zvakakwana mubasa rangu; uye tarisa, ndinaye kusvika kumagumo.
Mandiri achawana kubwinya, kwete kwake iye, chero mukusasimba kana mukusimba, chero mukusungwa kana murusununguko;
Uye panguva dzose nemunzvimbo dzose achavhura muromo wake achitaura vhangeri rangu nezwi rinenge rehwamanda, zvose masikati neusiku. Ndichamupa simba iro risingazikanwe pakati pevanhu.
Usatsvage zvishamiso, kunze kwekunge ndakurairai, kunze kwekubvisa mweya yakaipa, kurapa vanorwara, nokurwisana nenyoka dzine muchetura, nemuchetura inouraya.
Uye zvinhu izvi hauzozviita kunze kwekunge zvichidiwa kwauri neavo vanozvida, kuti magwaro matsvene azadzikiswe; nokuti uchaita maererano neizvo zvakanyorwa.

Nemunzvimbo ipi zvayo yauchapinda, uye vasingakutambire muzita rangu, uchasiya kutukwa kunze kwemaropafadzo, kuburikidza nekugumira guruva retsoka dzako kwavari seuchapupu, nokugeza tsoka dzako parutivi rwenzira.
Uye zvichaitika kuti ani zvake achaisa maoko ake pauri kukurwisa, ucharaira kuti arohwe muzita rangu; tarisai; ndichavarova maererano nemazwi ako, mukukwana kwenguva yangu.
Uye ani zvake achaenda kumutemo newe achatukwa nemutemo.
Uye hautakure chikwama kana nhava, kana mudonzvo, kana mabhatyi maviri, nokuti chechi ichakupa panguva yose icho chaunoda chekudya uye nechekupfeka, neshangu nezvemari, nenhava.

Nokuti wakadaidzwa kuzochekerera munda wangu wemizambiringa nokuchekerera kukuru, hongu, kunyangwe kwenguva yekupedzisira; hongu uye neavowo vose vawakagadza, uye vachaita kunyangwe nemaererano nenzira iyoyi. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/25.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 25
chapter_summary: 1–6, Emma Smith, mudzimai akasarudzwa, anodaidzwa kuti ayamure nekunyaradza murume wake; 7–11, Anodaidzwawo kuti anyore, nekutsanangura magwaro matsvene nokusarudza nziyo; 12–14, Rwiyo rwevakarurama munamato kuna Ishe, 15–16, Misimboti yekuteerera mune chakazarurwa chino inoshanda kune vose.

verses.text: Teerera kuzwi raIshe Mwari vako, ndichitaura kwauri, Emma Smith, mwanasikana wangu; nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, avo vose vanogashira vhangeri rangu vanakomana nevanasikana muumambo hwangu.
Chakazarurwa ndinochipa kwauri pamusoro pechido changu; kana wakatendeka uchifamba munzira dzakanaka pamberi pangu, ndichachengetedza upenyu hwako, uye uchagashira nhaka muZioni.
Tarisai, zvitadzo zvako wazviregererwa, uye uri mudzimai akasarudzwa uyo wandakadaidza.
Usanyunyute nechikonzero chezvinhu zvausati waona, nokuti hazvina kupihwa kwauri uye nekunyika, hunova ungwaru mandiri munguva iri kuuya.
Uye basa rawakadaidzirwa richave rekunyaradza muranda wangu, Joseph Smith Mwana, murume wako, mumatambudziko ake, nemazwi anonyaradza, mumweya wekupfava.
Uye uchaenda naye panguva yekuenda kwake, uye ugove kwaari semunyori, papanenge pasina angave munyori kwaari, kuti nditumire muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery, kwose zvako kwandinoda.
Uye iwe uchagadzwa pasi peruoko rwake kuti utsanangure magwaro matsvene, uye nokukurudzira chechi maererano nokupihwa kwazvichaitwa kwauri neMweya wangu.
Nokuti achaisa maoko ake pauri, uye iwe uchagashira Mweya Mutsvene, uye nguva yako ichapirwa mukunyora, nokudzidza zvakawanda.
Uye haufanire kutya, nokuti murume wako achakutsigira muchechi; nokuti kwavari ndiko kune kudaidzwa kwake, kuti zvose zvinhu zvingazarurwe kwavari, zvose zvandingade, maererano nerutendo rwavo.
Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri uchaisa parutivi zvinhu zvenyika ino, uye wotsvaga zvinhu zvakanaka.
Uye zvichapihwa kwauri, uyewo, zvokusarudza nziyo dzinoyera, sokuzvipihwa kwauchaitwa, zviri zvinofadza kwandiri, kuti dzive muchechi yangu.
Nokuti mweya wangu unofara murwiyo rwunobva pamwoyo; hongu, rwiyo rwevakarurama munamato kwandiri, uye rwuchapindurwa nemaropafadzo pamisoro yavo.
Nokudaro, simudza mwoyo wako ufare, uye unamatire kuzvibvumirano izvo zvawaita.
Ramba uri mumweya wekupfava, uye uchenjerere kuzvikudza. Rega mweya wako ufarire murume wako, nokubwinya kuchauya paari.
Chengeta mirairo yangu nguva dzose, uye korona yekururama uchaigashira. Uye kunze kwekunge waita izvi, pandinenge ndiri haungapauye.
Uye zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, iri ndiro izwi rangu kune vose. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/26.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 26
chapter_summary: 1, Vanorairwa kuti vadzidze magwaro matsvene nekuparidza; 2, Mutemo wekubvumirana unogashirwa.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri mucharegera nguva yenyu ichiiswa mukudzidza magwaro matsvene, nomukuparidza, nokusimbisa chechi kuColesville, uye nomukuita basa renyu munyika sezvinodiwa kudakara maenda kumavirira kunoita muchechi mukuru unotevera; ipapo zvichazoziviswa zvamuchaita.
Uye zvose zvinhu zvichaitwa nokubvumirana kwevose muchechi, neminamato yakawanda nerutendo, nokuti zvose zvinhu muchazvigashira nerutendo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/27.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 27
chapter_summary: 1–4, Micherechedzo ichashandiswa pakutora sakaramende inomiswa; 5–14, Kristu nevaranda vake kubva kumikuwo yose vanofanirwa kutora sakaramende; 15–18, Pfekai gandautare rose raMwari.

verses.text: Teererai kuizwi raJesu Kristu, Ishe venyu, Mwari venyu, neMununuri wenyu, uyo aneshoko benyu uye rine simba.

Nokuti tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, hazvinei kuti muchadyei kana kuti muchanwei kana muchitora sakaramende, kana zviri zvekuti muri kuzviita neziso rakatarisa bedzi kubwinya kwangu—muchirangarira kuna Baba muviri wangu uyo wakaradzikwa pasi pamusana penyu, uye neropa rangu rakadeurirwa kuregerera zvitadzo zvenyu.
Nokudaro, murairo ndinoupa kwamuri, kuti hamutenge waini kana zvinwiwa zvinodhaka kubva kuvavengi venyu;
Nokudaro, hamuinwe kunze kwekunge yagadzirwa iri itsva pakati penyu; hongu, muno muumambo hwaBaba vangu uhwo huchavakwa pano pasi.

Tarisai, uhwu ungwaru mandiri; nokudaro, musashamiswe, nokuti nguva iri kusvika iyo yandichanwa nemi zvinobva mumuchero wemudzambiringa panyika, uye naMoronai, uyo wandakatumira kwamuri kuti aratidze Bhuku raMormoni, rine kuzara kwevhangeri rangu risingaperi, uyo wandakapa makiyi ezvinyorwa zverukuni rwaEfraimi;
Uye naEria, uyo wandakapa makiyi anounza kuitika kwekudzorerwa kwezvinhu zvose pakare zvakataurwa nemuromo wevaporofita vatsvene vose kubvira mukutanga kwenyika, maererano nemazuva ekuguma;
Uyewo naJohane mwanakomana waZakaria, uyo Zakaria iye (Eria) waakashanyira uye akamupa ruvimbiso kuti achaita mwanakomana, zita rake richave Johane, uye achave akazadzwa nemweya waEria;
Uyo Johane wandatumira kwamuri, varanda vangu, Joseph Smith Mwana, naOliver Cowdery, kuti ndikugadzei hupirisita hwekutanga uhwo hwamatambira, kuti mugodaidzwa nokugadzwa kunyangwe saAroni;
Uye nekuna Erija, uyo wandakapa makiyi esimba rekutendeudzira mwoyo yemadzibaba kuvana, nemwoyo yevana kumadzibaba, kuti pasi pose pasarohwe nekutukwa;
Uye naJosefa naJakobo, naIsaka, naAbrahama, madzibaba enyu, avo vane zvivimbiso zviripo;
Uye naMikaeri, kana Adama, baba wevose, jinda revose, Mukweguru wamaZuva;

Uye naPetro, naJakobo, naJohane, avo vandatumira kwamuri, vandakugadzai navo nokukusimbisai kuti muve vaapositori, navapupuri vanokosha vezita rangu, nokutakura makiyi ehushumiri hwenyu nezvinhu zvimwechetezvo zvandakazarura kwavari;

Avo vandakapa makiyi eumambo hwangu, uye nemukuwo wevhangeri munguva dzekupedzisira; uye nemukuzara kwenguva, umu mandichaunganidza pamwechete muchinhu chimwechete zvose zvinhu, zvose zviri mudenga, neizvo zviri panyika;
Uyewo neavo vose vandapihwa naBaba vangu kubva munyika.
Nokudaro, simudzai mwoyo yenyu uye mufare, uye sungira nguwo dzako muchiuno, uye mutore pamuri gandautare rangu rose, kuti mugozokwanisa kukurira zuva rakaipa, moita zvose kuti mugozokwanisa kumira.

Mirai naizvozvo, makasunga zviuno zvenyu nechokwadi, makapfeka chipfeko chepa chipfuva chekururama, uye tsoka dzenyu dzakashongedzwa nekugadzirira kwevhangeri rerunyararo, urwo rwandatumira ngirozi dzangu kuti dziise kwamuri;
Muchitora nhowo yerutendo iyo ichaita kuti mugone kudzimura yose miseve yemoto yewakaipa.

Uye motora heremende yeruponeso, uye nemunondo weMweya wangu, uyo wandichadururira pamuri, uye nezwi rangu iro randichaburitsa kwamuri, uye mubvumirane pamusoro pezvose zvinhu zviri zvipi zvazvo zvamunondikumbira, uye muve makatendeka kudakara ndadzoka, uye muchatorwa, kuti pandiri nemiwo muchavepo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/28.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 28
chapter_summary: 1–7, Joseph Smith ane kiyi dzezvakavanzika, uye iye chete ndiye anogashira zvakazarurwa zveChechi; 8–10, Oliver Cowdery achaparidzira kumaRamani; 11–16, Satani akanyengedza Hiram Page uye akamupa zvakazarurwa zvemanyepo.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri Oliver, kuti iwe uchanzwikwa nechechi muzvinhu zvose zvipi zvazvo zvauchavadzidzisa neMunyaradzi, maererano nezvakazarurwa uye nemirairo iyo yandapa.

Asi tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, hakuna munhu achaiswa kuti agashire mirairo nezvakazarurwa muchechi ino kunze kwemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, nokuti anozvigashira kunyangwe saMosesi.
Uye uchateerera kuzvinhu zvose zvandichapa kwaari kana saAroni, kuti ataure akatendeka mirau nezvakazarurwa, nesimba nemvumo kuchechi.
Uye kana ukatungamirwa panguva ipi zvayo naMunyaradzi kuti utaure kana kudzidzisa, kana panguva dzose nenzira yemurau kuchechi, ungangozviita.
Asi usazonyora nenzira yemurairo, asi neungwaru;
Uye usazomutuma uyo ari pamusoro pako uye neari pamusoro pechechi;
Nokuti ndakamupa makii ezvakavandika, nezvakazaruwa izvo zvakazarirwa, kudakara ndavamisira mumwe munzvimbo make.

Uye zvino, tarisai ndinoti kwauri uchaenda kumaRamani uye wonoparidza vhangeri rangu kwavari, uye sokugashira kwavanenge vachiita kudzidzisa kwako uchaita kuti chechi yangu imiswe pakati pavo uye uchawana zvakazarurwa, asi usazvinyore zviri semurairo.

Uye zvino, tarisai, ndinoti kwauri kuti hazvina kuiswa pachena, uye hakuna munhu anoziva kuti guta Zioni richavakwa kupi, asi zvichapihwa pano pashure. Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri richave nekumiganhu yemaRamani.
Hauchazobva panzvimbo ino kudakara mushure megungano; muranda wangu Joseph achanzi atungamire muchechi mukuru nezwi rawo, zvaanotaura kwauri izvozvo ndizvo zvauchataura.
Zvakare uchatora hama yako, Hiram Page, pakati penyu muri mega, womutaurira kuti zvinhu izvo zvaakanyora kubva padombo riya, hazvisi zvangu nokuti Satani akamunyengedza;
Nokuti tarisai, izvi zvinhu hazvina kupiwa kwaari zvakare hakuna chichazopihwa kuna ani zvake wechechi ino icho chinopesana nezvibvumirano zvechechi.
Nokuti zvinhu zvose zvinofanira kuitwa nehurongwa, nokubvumirana mukati mechechi, nomunamato werutendo.
Uye uchayamura mukuenzanisa zvinhu zvose izvi, maererano nezvibvumirano zvechechi, usati watora rwendo rwako pakati pemaRamani.
Uye zvichapihwa kwauri kubvira panguva yauchaenda, kusvika panguva yauchadzoka, kuti uchaitei.
Uye iwe unofanira kuzarura muromo wako panguva dzose, uchitaura vhangeri rangu nekufara. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/29.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 29
chapter_summary: 1–8, Kristu anounganidza vakasarudzwa vake, 9–11, Kuuya kwake kunounza Mereniamu; 12–13, VaneGumi neVaviri vachatonga Israeri yose; 14–21, Zviratidzo, zvirwere, nokuparadza kuchatungamira Kuuya kweChipiri; 22–28, Kumuka kuvakafa kwekupedzisira nokutongwa kwekupedzisira mushure meMereniamu; 29–35, Zvose zvinhu ndezvemweya kuna Ishe; 36–39, Dhiabhorosi nehondo yake vakatandaniswa kudenga kuti vagoyedza munhu; 40–45, Kupunzika neRudzikinuro zvinounza ruponeso; 46–50, Vana vadiki vanoponeswa kuburikidza nerudzikinuro.

verses.text: Teerera kuizwi raJesu Kristu, Mununuri wako, Mukuru Ndini, uyo ane ruoko rwetsitsi urwo rwakaripira zvitadzo zvenyu;
Uyo uchaunganidza vanhu vake sehuku inounganidza nhiyo dzayo pasi pamapapiro ayo, ndokunge vazhinji vachiteerera kuzwi rangu uye vagozvininipisa pamberi pangu, uye nokundidaidza mumunamato wakasimba.

Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kuti panguva ino zvitema zvako wazviregererwa, naizvozvo uchigashira zvinhu izvi; asi yeuka kuti usazotadza zvakare, kuti matambudziko asazouya pauri.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti wakasarudzwa kubva munyika kuti utaure vhangeri rangu nezwi rakafara, nezwi rinenge hwamanda.
Simudzai mwoyo yenyu mufare, nokuti ndiri pakati penyu uye ndini mureveri wenyu kuna baba; uye kuda kwavo kwakanaka kuti vakupei umambo.
Uye, sekunyorwa kwazvakaita—Chose zvacho chamuchakumbira murutendo, makabatana mumunamato maererano nemurairo wangu, muchachigashira.
Uye makadaidzwa kuti muunze kuunganidzwa kwevangu vakasarudzwa; nokuti vangu vakasarudzwa vanonzwa izwi rangu uye havaomese mwoyo yavo;

Nokudaro chirevo chakaenda kubva kuna Baba kuti vachaunganidzwa panzvimbo imwechete pamusoro penyika ino, kugadzira mwoyo yavo uye nokuve vakagadzirira muzvinhu zvose kuitira zuva iro matambudziko uye nokuparadzwa, achatumirwa kune vakaipa.

Nokuti nguva yacho yave pedyo, uye nezuva rave pedyo apo nyika ichave yaibva; uye vose avo vanodada uye neavo vanoita zvakaipa vachaita sezvitsitsi; uye ini ndichavapisa, vanodaro Ishe veHondo, kuti kuipa kusavepo pano pasi;
Nokuti nguva yave pedyo, uye icho chakataurwa nevaapositori vangu chinofanira kuzadzikiswa; nokuti sokutaura kwavakaita naizvozvo zvinofanira kuitika.
Nokuti ndichazviratidza ndiri kudenga nesimba uye nokubwinya kukuru, nemhomho yose iriko, togara mukururama nevanhu pano panyika, kwechiuru chemakore, uye avo vakaipa havazomira.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, uye zvakaenda nemuchirevo chakasimba, nekuda kwaBaba, kuti vaapositori vangu paJerusarema, vachamira kurudyi rwangu muzuva iro randichauya ndiri murimi remoto, ndakapfeka nguwo dzekururama, nengundu pamusoro pavo, mukubwinya kana sezvandiri, kana kuzotonga imba yose yaIsraeri, nevazhinji vakandida nokuchengeta mirau yangu, pasina vamwezve.

Nokuti hwamanda icharira kwenguva refu uye zvine ruzha, kana sepaGomo Sinai, uye yose nyika ichandengendeka, uye ivo vachauya—hongu, kana avo vakafa vari mandiri, kuti vagashire ngundu yekururama, uye kuti vapfekedzwe, kunyange sezvandakaita, kuti vave neni, kutitive vamwechete.

Asi tarisai, ndinoti kwauri zuva guru iri risati rauya zuva richasvibiswa, uye mwedzi uchapindurwa ukave ropa, uye nyenyedzi dzichakoromoka kubva kudenga, uye kuchave nezviratidzo zvikuru kudenga kumusoro uye nepanyika pasi;
Uye kuchave nekuchema nekuwuwura pakati pemhomho yevanhu;
Uye kuchave nechimvuramabwe chikuru chinotumirwa kuzoparadza mbeu dzepasi.

Uye zvichaitika kuti, nepamusana pekuipa kwenyika ndichadzorera vakaipa, nokuti havadi kutendeuka; nokuti mukombe wekushatirwa kwangu wazara; nokuti tarisai, ropa rangu harizovachenesa kana vasingandinzwe.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe Mwari ndichatumira nhunzi pamusoro penyika, dzichabata vagari vemunyika, uye dzigodya nyama yavo, uye dzigokonzera kuti honye dziuye pavari;
Uye ndimi dzavo dzichabatwa kuti vasataure chimwe chinhu chekundishora; uye nyama yavo ichabva pamapfupa avo, uye maziso avo achabva mumaburi awo;
Uye zvichaitika kuti zvikara zvesango uye neshiri dzemumhepo dzichavadya.

Uye zichechi huru inonyangadza inova nzenza yepasi pose, ichakandwa pasi nemoto unodya, maererano sekutaurwa kwazvinoitwa nemuromo wa Ezekieri muporofita, uyo akataura nezve zvinhu izvi, izvo zvisati zvaitika asi chokwadi zvinotofanirwa, sezvandiri mupenyu, nokuti zvakaipisisa hazvizotonga.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri kana chiuru chemakore chapera, uye vanhu vakatanga zvakare kuramba Mwari vavo, zvino ndicharegera nyika kwemwaka mudiki;
Uye magumo achauya, denga nenyika zvichapera zvobva zvapfuura, uye kuchave nedenga idzva nenyika itsva.
Nokuti zvose zvinhu zvakare zvichapfuura, uye zvose zvinhu zvichave zvitsva, kunyangwe denga nenyika, uye nezvizazikiswa zvose zvirimo, vanhu nemhuka, shiri dzedenga, uye nehove dzegungwa;
Uye hakuna vhudzi rimwe, kana sanga, icharasika, nokuti humhizha hwerwuoko rwangu.

Asi tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, nyika isati yapfuura, Mikaeri, ngirozi yangu huru, acharidza hwamanda yake, uye ipapo vose vakafa vachamuka, nokuti makuva avo achavhurwa uye vachauya—hongu, kunyangwe vose.
Uye vatsvene vachaungana kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi kuupenyu hwokusingaperi; uye vakaipa vari kuruoko rwangu rwekuruboshwe ndichanyara kuvaita vangu pamberi paBaba;
Nokudaro ndinoti, kwavari—Ibvai pandiri, imi makatukwa, muende kumoto usingaperi, wakagadzirirwa dhiabhorosi nengirozi dzake.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, hapana kana nguva ipi zvayo pandakataura nemuromo wangu kuti vachazodzoka, nokuti pandinenge ndiri ivo havangagone kupauya, nokuti havana simba.

Asi rangarira kuti kutonga kwangu kwose hakupihwe kuvanhu; uye sezvo mazwi abva mumuromo mangu kunyangwe saizvozvo achazadzikiswa, kuti wekutanga achava wekupedzisira, uye kuti wekupedzisira achave wekutanga muzvinhu zvose zvazvo zvandakasika nezwi resimba rangu rinova iro simba reMweya wangu.
Nokuti nesimba reMweya wangu ndakavasika, hongu, zvose zvinhu mumweya nemunyama.
Chekutanga zvemweya, chepiri zvenyama, kuri iko kutanga kwebasa rangu; uye zvakare, chekutanga zvenyama, chepiri zvemweya, zviri izvo zvekupedzisira mubasa rangu—
Kutaura kwamuri kuti munzwisise sezvamuri, asi kwandiri ini mabasa angu haana magumo, kana paakatangira; asi zvinopihwa kwamuri kuti munzwisise, nokuti makazvikumbira kwandiri uye makabvumirana.

Nokudaro, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri zvose zvinhu kwandiri ndezvemweya, handina kana imwe nguva yandakambokupai mutemo wakange uri wenyama; kana munhu zvake, kana vana vevanhu, kana Adama, baba venyu, uyo wandakasika.

Tarisai, ndakapa kwaari kuti azvifungire pachake; uye ndakamupa murairo, asi hapana murairo wenyama wandakamupa, nokuti mirairo yangu ndeye mweya; haizi yepazvinhu zvepanyama kana kuti yenyama, kana kuti yezvenyama kana zvinonzwikwa.

Uye zvakaitika kuti Adama, ayedzwa nadhiabhorosi—nokuti, tarisai, dhiabhorosi aivepo Adama asati avepo, nokuti akandipandukira, achiti ndipei kukudzwa kwenyu, iro riri simba rangu; uye nechidimbu chimwechete pazvitatu zvemhomho yekudenga akazvitendeudza kubva kwandiri pamusana pekugona kuzvifungira kwavo;
Uye vakakandwa pasi, uye ndiko kuuya kwakaita dhiabhorosi nengirozi dzake;
Uye tarisai, pane nzvimbo yavakagadzirirwa kubva pakutanga, nzvimbo iyoyo iri gehena.
Uye zvinofanirwa kuti dhiabhorosi ayedze vana vevanhu, kana kuti havaizove vanozvifungira pachavo; dai vasina kumbowana zvinovava havaigona kuziva zvinotapira—
Nokudaro, zvakaitika kuti dhiabhorosi akaedza Adama, uye akadya muchero wakarambidzwa uye akatyora murairo, mukudaro akave pasi pezvido zvadhiabhorosi, nokuti akakundwa nemuedzo.

Nokudaro, ini Ishe Mwari ndakaita kuti atandirwe kunze kwebindu reEdeni, kuti abve pamberi pangu, pamusana pekutadza kwake, uko kwakaita kuti afe mumweya, iko kuri kufa kwekutanga, kunyangwe kuri kumwechete kunove kufa kwekupedzisira, kuri kwemweya, uko kuchataurwa pane vakaipa apo pandichati; ibvai imi makatukwa.

Asi tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri ini Ishe Mwari, ndakapa kuna Adama nekumbeu yake, kuti vasafe sekufa kwenyama, kudakara ini Ishe Mwari, ndatumira ngirozi kunotaura kwavari rutendeuko uye nerudzikinuro kuburikidza nerutendo muzita rewangu Mwanakomana Mumwechete Akaberekwa.
Uye, ndizvo zvandakaita ini Ishe Mwari, ndakatarira munhu mazuva ekuyedzwa kwake—kuti nokufa kwake, agogona kuzomutswa mukusafa kuupenyu hwokusingaperi, kunyangwe avo vose vanodaira;
Uye avo vasingatende mukuraswa kwokusingaperi; nokuti havagone kudzikinurwa mukupunzika kwavo mumweya nokuti havatendeuke;
Nokuti vanoda rima pane chiedza, uye zviito zvavo zvakaipa, uye vanotambira mibairo yavo kune uyo wavanosarudza kuteerera.
Asi tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, vana vadiki vakadzikinurwa kubva pahwaro hwenyika kuburikidza newangu Mumwechete Akaberekwa;
Nokudaro, havakwanise kutadza, nokuti simba harina kupihwa kuna Satani rekuti ayedze vana vadiki, kudakara vave kukwanisa kuzvidavirira pamberi pangu;
Nokuti zvakapihwa kwavari kunyangwe sekuda kwangu, maererano nemafadziro azvinondiita, kuti zvinhu zvikuru zvingangodiwa kubva muruoko rwemadzibaba avo.
Uye, zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, nani zvake ane ruzivo, handina here kumuraira kuti atendeuke?
Uye asina nzwisiso, zvichasarira mandiri kuita maererano sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa. Uye zvino handichataura zvimwe kwamuri panguva ino. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/30.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 30
chapter_summary: 1–4, David Whitmer anotsiurwa pamusana pekutadza kushanda zvine simba; 5–8, Peter Whitmer, Mwana, achaperekedza Oliver Cowdery nebasa kumaRamani; 9–11, John Whitmer anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri David, kuti wakatya munhu uye hauna kuvimba neni pasimba sezvaunofanirwa.

Asi pfungwa yako yanga iri muzvinhu zvenyika kupfuura muzvinhu zvangu, ini Musiki vako, nehushumiri uhwo hwawakadaidzirwa; uye hauna kuteerera kuMweya wangu, uye nekune avo vakaiswa pamusoro pako, asi wakanyengerwa neavo vandisina kuraira.
Nokudaro unosiiwa kuti uzvitsvakire wega kubva muruoko rwangu, uye ugofungisisa pamusoro pezvinhu zvawatambira.
Uye musha wako uchave kumba kwababa vako, kudakara ndakupa mimwe mirairo. Uye uchabatsira muhushumiri muchechi, uye nepamberi penyika, uye nemumatunhu akatenderedza. Ameni.

Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, Peter, uchatora rwendo rwako nehama yako Oliver; nokuti nguva yasvika zvekuti zvinofanira kwandiri kuti uchashama muromo wako kuparidza vhangeri rangu; naizvozvo usatye, asi teerera kumazwi nekuraira kwehama yako, uko kwaachakupa.

Uye utambudzike mukutambudzika kwake kwose, uchigara uchisimudzira mwoyo wako kwandiri nemunamato nemurutendo, kuitira kununurwa kwake nekwako, nokuti ndamupa simba rekuti avake chechi yangu pakati pemaRamani;
Uye hakuna wandakamisa kuve murairi wake ari pamusoro pake muchechi, maererano nenyaya dzemuchechi, kunze kwekunge ari hama yake, Joseph Smith, Mwana.
Nokudaro, teerera kuzvinhu izvi uye ushingaire mukuchengeta mirairo yangu, uye ucharopafadzwa kuupenyu hwokusingaperi. Ameni.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, iwe muranda wangu John, kuti uchatanga kubvira zvino kuparidza vhangeri rangu, nezwi rinenge hwamanda.
Uye basa rako richave kwehama yako Philip Burroughs, uye nemudunhu iroro, hongu, pose paunganzwikwe, dakara ndakuraira kuti ubvepo.
Uye kushanda kwako kose kuchave muZioni, nemweya wako wose, kubvira zvino, hongu, uchagara uchishama muromo wako muchinangwa changu, usingatye zvinoitwa nemunhu nokuti ini ndinewe. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/31.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 31
chapter_summary: 1–6, Thomas B. Marsh anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri anovimbiswa pamusoro pekuchengeteka kwemhuri yake; 7–13, Anorairwa kuti avenomwoyo murefu, anamate nguva dzose, uye atevere Mweya Munyaradzi.

verses.text: Thomas, mwanakomana wangu, iwe wakaropafadzwa pamusana perutendo rwako mubasa rangu.

Tarisai, wakawana matambudziko mazhinji pamusana pemhuri yako; zvisinei, ndichakuropafadza iwe nemhuri yako, hongu, vadiki vako; uye zuva ririkuuya iro kuti vachatenda nokuziva chokwadi nekuve pamwechete newe muchechi yangu.
Simudza mwoyo wako ufare, nokuti nguva yebasa rako yasvika; nerurimi rwako rwuchasunungurwa, ugoparidza mashoko erufaro rukuru kuchizvarwa chino.
Uchataura zvinhu zvakaratidzwa kumuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana. Uchatanga kuparidza kubvira pane ino nguva zvichienda mberi, hongu, kukohwa mumunda wachena kare wave kuda kupiswa.
Nokudaro, isa jeko rako nemwoyo wako wose, uye zvitadzo zvako wazviregererwa, uye uchatakudzwa masvinga kumusana kwako, nokuti mushandi akakodzera mubairo wake. Naizvozvo mhuri yako ichararama.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, ibva kwavari kwenguva diki, utaure izwi rangu, ndichavagadzirira nzvimbo yavo.
Hongu, ndichazarura mwoyo yevanhu, naivo vachakutambira. Ndichamisa chechi neruoko rwako;
Uchavasimbisa uye ugovagadzirira kuitira nguva yavachaunganidzwa.
Ita mwoyo murefu mumatambudziko ako, usazvidze avo vanozvidza. Tonga imba yako muhunyoro, uye urambe wakasimba.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri uchave chiremba kuchechi, asi kwete kunyika, nokuti havakutambire.
Enda nzira yako ipi zvayo yandinenge ndada, uye zvichapihwa kwauri neMweya Munyaradzi zvauchafanira kuita nekwauchaenda.
Namata nguva dzose, potse ungangopinda mukuyedzwa uye ugozorasikirwa nemubairo wako.
Iva wakatendeka kusvika kumagumo, uye tarisa, ini ndinewe. Aya haasi mazwi emunhu kana evanhu, asi ndeangu, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu, Mununuri wako, nekuda kwaBaba. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/32.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 32
chapter_summary: 1–3, Parley P. Pratt naZiba Peterson vanodaidzwa kuti vaparidze kumaRamani uye nokuperekedza Oliver Cowdery naPeter Whitmer, Mwana; 4–5, Vanofanira kunamatira nzwisiso yemagwaro matsvene.

verses.text: Uye zvino pamusoro pemuranda wangu Parley P. Pratt, tarisai, ndinoti kwaari sezvo ndiri mupenyu ndinoda kuti azoparidza vhangeri rangu uye nokudzidza nezvangu, uye ave wakazvirereka, uye ainemwoyo munyoro.
Uye icho chandakapa kwaari ndechekuti achaenda nevaranda vangu, Oliver Cowdery naPeter Whitmer, Mwana, murenje mukati memaRamani.
Uyewo Ziba Peterson achaenda navo; uye ini pachangu ndichaenda navo ndigove pakati pavo; uye ndini murevereri wavo kuna Baba, hakuna chichazovakunda.
Vachateerera kune icho chakanyorwa, vasingazoteedza zvimwe zvakazarurwa; uye vachanamata nguva dzose kuti ndigovazarurira zvimwechetezvo kuti vazvinzwisise.
Vachateerera kumazwi aya uye vasingaite zvekutamba neni, uye neni ndichavaropafadza. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/33.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 33
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vashandi vanodaidzwa kuti vaparidze vhangeri munguva yekupedzisira; 5–6, Chechi rinomiswa, uye avo vakasarudzwa vachaunganidzwa; 7–10, Tendeukai, nokuti umambo hwekudenga hwave pedyo; 11–15, Chechi rinovakwa padombo revhangeri; 16–18, Gadzirirai kuuya kweChikomba.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, varanda vangu Ezra naNorthrop, vhurai nzeve dzenyu uye muteerere kuizwi raIshe Mwari venyu, uyo aneshoko benyu rizere nesimba, rinopinza kupfuura munondo unocheka nekwose, nekupatsanura nhengo nemwongo, munhu nemweya; uye muoni wepfungwa nezvinangwa zvemwoyo.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri makadaidzwa kuti musimudzire mazwi enyu seruzha rwehwamanda, kuti mutaure vhangeri rangu kuchizvarwa chakakombama uye chakatsauka.
Nokuti tarisai, munda wachena wave kuda kukohwewa; uye yave nguva yekupedzisira, uye ndiyo nguva yandichadaidza vashandi kekupedzisira, mumunda wemizambiringa yangu.

Uye munda wemizambiringa raoreswa rose zvaro; uye hapana kana mumwechete ari kuita zvakanaka kunze kwevashoma-shoma; uye vanokanganisa nguva zhinji pamusana pehupirisita hwenhema, vose vaine pfungwa dzakaora.
Uye zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri kuti chechi ino ndakarimisa uye ndikaridaidza kubva murenje.
Uye kunyangwe saizvozvo ndichaunganidza vakasarudzwa vangu kubva kumativi mana enyika, kunyangwe vose vazhinji vanotenda mandiri, uye vachiteerera kuizwi rangu.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, munda wachena wave kuda kukohwewa; nokudaro pinzai majeko enyu, uye mukohwe nekugwinya kwenyu kwose, nepfungwa, uye nesimba.
Vhurai miromo yenyu uye ichazadzwa, uye muchave kunyangwe saNifai wakare, uyo akafamba kubva Jerusarema murenje.
Hongu, vhurai miromo yenyu, uye musazorega, muchatakudzwa masvinga pamisana yenyu, nokuti tarisai, ini ndinemi.
Hongu, vhurai miromo yenyu uye ichazadzwa, muchiti; Tendeukai, tendeukai, uye mugadzirire imi nzira yaIshe, uye mutwasanudze nzira dzavo; nokuti umambo hwekudenga hwave pedyo;
Hongu, tendeukai uye mugobhabhatidzwa, mumwe nemumwe wenyu, kuti muregererwe zvitadzo zvenyu; hongu, bhabhatidzwai kunyangwe nemvura, uye kozouya rubhabhatidzo rwemoto nerweMweya Mutsvene.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, iri ivhangeri rangu; uye rangarirai kuti vachave nerutendo mandiri kana kuti havazokwanisa zvachose kuponeswa;
Uye padombo iri ndichavaka chechi yangu; hongu, padombo iri makavakwa, uye mukaramba makadaro, masuwo egehena haangakukundei.
Uye mucharangarira misimboti yechechi nezvibvumirano kuti muzvichengete.
Ani zvake ane rutendo muchamusimbisa muchechi yangu, nekumugadza maoko, uye ndichaisa chipo cheMweya Mutsvene paari.
Uye Bhuku raMormoni uye nemagwaro matsvene anopihwa neni kuti murairwe; nesimba reMweya wangu rinotunha zvinhu zvose.
Nokudaro, ivai makatendeka, muchinamata nguva dzose, muine mwenje yenyu izere uye ichibvira, uye muine mafuta kuti muve makagadzirira pakuuya kweChikomba.
Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ndinouya nokukurumidza. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/34.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 34
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vanotendeuka vanove vanakomana vaMwari kuburikidza neRudzikiniro; 5–9, Kuparidzwa kwevhangeri kunofanogadzira nzira yeKuuya kweChipiri; 10–12, Kuporofita kunouya nesimba reMweya Mutsvene.

verses.text: Mwanakomana wangu Orson, teerera uye unzwe uye uone izvo ini Ishe Mwari zvandichataura kwauri, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu Mununuri wako;
Chiedza neupenyu hwenyika, chiedza chinopenya murima uye rima harichinzwisise;
Uyo akada nyika zvekuti akapira upenyu hwake, kuti vazhinji vachatenda vangazove vanakomana vaMwari. Nokudaro iwe uri mwanakomana wangu;
Uye iwe wakaropafadzwa pamusana pekuti wakadaira;
Uye iwe wakaropafadzwa zvakare nokuti wakadaidzwa neni kuti uparidze vhangeri rangu—

Kuti usimudze izwi rako neruzha serwe hwamanda, zvose kwenguva refu uye nokudaidzira, uye ugodaidzira kutendeuka kuchizvarwa chakakombama chakarasika, mukugadzirira nzira yaIshe yekuuya kwavo kwechipiri.
Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, nguva zvino yavepedyo yekuti ndichiuya ndiri mugore nesimba nokubwinya kukuru.
Uye richave zuva guru panguva yekuuya kwangu nokuti marudzi ose achadedera.
Asi risati rauya zuva guru iroro, zuva richadzimwa, uye mwedzi wosandurwa kuve ropa; nenyenyedzi dzicharamba kupenya kwadzo, nedzimwe dzichadonha, nekuparadzwa kukuru kwakamirira vakaipa.
Nokudaro, simudza izwi rako uye usanyarare, nokuti Ishe Mwari vataura; naizvozvo porofita, uye zvichapihwa nesimba reMweya Mutsvene.
Uye kana wakatendeka, tarisai, ndinewe kudakara ndauya—
Uye zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, ndinouya nokukurumidza. Ndini Ishe vako neMununuri wako. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/35.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 35
chapter_summary: 1–2, Vanhu vangavesei vana vaMwari; 3–7, Sidney Rigdon anodaidzwa kuti abhabhatidze uye nekupa Mweya Mutsvene; 8–12, Zviratidzo nezvishamiso zvinounzwa nerutendo; 13–16, Varanda vaIshe vachapura marudzi nesimba reMweya; 17–19, Joseph Smith ane makiyi ezvakavanzika, 20–21, Vakasarudzwa vachamirira zuva rekuuya kwaIshe; 22–27, Israeri ichaponeswa.

verses.text: Teererai kuizwi raIshe Mwari venyu, kana Arfa naOmega, kutanga nekupedzisira, uyo ane nzira yake yokusingaperi inogara yakadaro, mumwechete nhasi sazuro, uye nokusingaperi.

Ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, akarovererwa pamusana pezvitadzo zvenyika kunyangwe avo vose vachatenda muzita rangu, kuti vave vanakomana vaMwari, kunyangwe mumwechete ari mandiri sezvo ini ndiri mumwechete munaBaba, sezvo Baba vari mumwechete mandiri, kuti tive vamwechete.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kumuranda wangu Sidney, ndakutarisa uye nebasa rako. Ndanzwa minamato yako, uye ndikakugadzirira basa rakakurisisa.
Wakaropafadzwa, nokuti uchaita zvinhu zvikuru. Tarisai iwe wakatumirwa, kunyangwe saJohane, kugadzira nzira mberi kwangu, uye nemberi kwaErija uyo anofanira kuuya, uye iwe wanga usingazvizive.
Wakabhabhatidza nemvura mukutendeuka, asi havana kugashira Mweya Mutsvene;
Asi zvino ndinopa kwauri murairo, kuti uchabhabhatidza nemvura, uye vachagashira Mweya Mutsvene nekuiswa maoko, kunyangwe sevaapositori vekare.
Uye zvichaitika kuti kuchave nebasa guru munyika, kunyangwe pakati pemaJentairi, nokuti hurema hwavo nekunyangadza kwavo kuchaiswa pachena mumaziso avanhu vose.
Nokuti ndiri Mwari, uye ruoko rwangu haruna kupfupiswa; uye ndicharatidza zvishamiso, zviratidzo nezvishamiso kune vose avo vanotenda muzita rangu.

Uye ani zvake achakumbira muzita rangu murutendo, vachabvisa dhiabhorosi; vacharapa vanorwara; vachaita kuti mapofu atambire kuona kwawo, uye matsi kuti dzinzwe, uye mbeveve kuti dzitaure, vakaremara kuti vafambe.
Uye nguva iri kusvika nokukurumidza yekuti zvinhu zvikuru zviratidzwe kuvana vevanhu;
Asi pasina rutendo hapana chinoratidzwa kunze kwekuparadzwa pamusoro peBabironi, imwecheteyo iyo yakaita kuti ose marudzi anwe waini yehasha dzeupombwe hwayo.
Uye hakuna mumwechete ari kuita zvakanaka kunze kweavo vagadzirira kutambira kuzara kwevhangeri rangu, iro randakatumira kuchizvarwa chino.
Nokudaro, ndinodaidza vasina kusimba venyika, avo vasina kudzidza uye vanoshorwa, kuti vapure marudzi nesimba reMweya wangu.

Uye ruoko rwavo rwuchave ruoko rwangu, uye ndichave nhowo yavo nechikopereso chavo; uye ndichasunga zviuno zvavo, uye vacharwa pachirume kuitira ini, uye vavengi vavo vachave pasi petsoka dzavo; uye ndicharegerera munondo kuitira ivo nemoto wehasha dzangu ndichavadzivirira.
Uye varombo nevakazvirereka vachave nevhangeri richiparidzirwa kwavari, uye vachange vachitarisira kunguva yekuuya kwangu, nokuti yave pedyo—
Uye vachadzidza rungano rwemufananidzo wemuti wemukuyu, nokuti kunyangwe iye zvino zhizha rave pedyo.
Uye ndatumira kuzara kwevhangeri rangu neruoko rwemuranda wangu Joseph; uye mukusasimba ndakamuropafadza iye;

Uye ndapa kwaari makiyi ezvakavandika zvezvinhu izvo zvakazarirwa, kunyangwe zvinhu zvakanga zviripo kubvira pahwaro hwenyika, nezvinhu zvichauya kubvira panguva ino kusvika panguva yekuuya kwangu, kana akararama mandiri, uye kana zvisina kudaro, ndichadyara mumwe panzvimbo yake.
Nokudaro, mutarise kuti kutenda kwake kusakundikane, uye zvichapihwa neMunyaradzi, Mweya Mutsvene, uyo unoziva zvose zvinhu.
Uye murairo ndinopa kwauri—kuti iwe uchamunyorera; uye magwaro matsvene achapihwa, kunyangwe sezvaakaita muchipfuva changu, kuitira kuponeswa kwevakasarudzwa vangu.
Nokuti vachanzwa izwi rangu, uye vagondiona, uye havazokotsira, uye vachamirira zuva rekuuya kwangu, nokuti vachacheneswa, kunyangwe sekuchena kwandakaita ini.
Uye zvino ndinoti kwauri, gara naye, uye achafamba newe; usamusiye kwete, uye chokwadi zvinhu izvi zvichazadzikiswa.

Uye sezvo usingazonyora, tarisai, zvichapihwa kwaari kuti aporofite; uye iwe uchaparidza vhangeri rangu uye uchadaidzira kuvaporofita matsvene vakare kuti vatsigire mazwi ake, semapirwo zvichange zvachiitwa kwaari.
Chengeta yose mirairo nezvibvumirano zvamakasungwa nazvo; uye ndichaita kuti matenga azunguzikire iwe mukukunakirai, uye, Satani achadedera uye Zioni ichafara pamusoro pezvikomo uye nokubudirira;
Uye Israeri achaponeswa munguva yangu ini; uye nemakiyi ayo andapa vachatungamirwa, uye vasingazokundwa.
Simudzai mwoyo yenyu uye mufare, kununurwa kwenyu kwave kusvika pedyo.
Musatye, imi kadanga kemakwai, umambo ndehwenyu kudakara ndauya. Tarisai, ndinouya nekukurumidza. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/36.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 36
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ishe vanoisa ruoko rwavo pamusoro paEdward Partridge neruoko rwaSidney Rigdon; 4–8, wose munhu anotambira vhangeri uye nehupirisita anodaidzwa kuti aende kunoparidza.

verses.text: Vanodaro Ishe Mwari, Samasimba weIsraeri: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri, muranda wangu Edward, kuti wakaropafadzwa uye zvitadzo zvako vazviregererwa uye wadaidzwa kuti uparidze vhangeri rangu nezwi serehwamanda:
Uye ndichaisa ruoko rwangu pauri neruoko rwemuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon, uye uchagashira Mweya wangu, Mweya Mutsvene, kunyangwe Munyaradzi, uyo achakudzidzisa zvinhu zverunyararo zveumambo;
Uye uchazvitaura nezwi guru, uchiti: Hosana ngariropafadzwe zita raMwari wekumusoro-soro.
Uye zvino kudaidzwa uku nemurairo uyu ndinopa kwauri maererano nevanhu vose—

Kuti avo vose vachauya pamberi pevaranda vangu Sidney Rigdon naJoseph Smith, Mwana, vachimbundira kudaidzwa uku nemurairo, uyu vachagadzwa uye vagotumirwa kunoparidza vhangeri risingaperi mukati memarudzi—
Daidzirai rutendeuko, muchiti: Zviponesei imi pachenyu kubva kuchizvarwa chino chisina chinangwa, muuye mubude mumoto, muchivenga kunyangwe nenguwo yakasvibiswa nenyama.
Uye murairo uyu uchapihwa kumagosa echechi, kuti wose munhu uyo achambundira ichi nemwoyo mumwechete anogona kugadzwa achitumwa, kunyangwe sezvandataura.
Ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari; nokudaro, sungira nguwo dzako muchiuno uye ndichangoyerekana ndauya kutemberi yangu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/37.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 37
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vatendi vanodaidzwa kuti vaungane paOhio.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri kuti hazvina kunaka kwandiri kuti murambe muchidudzira kudakara maenda kuOhio, uye izvi zvichikonzerwa nemuvengi uye pamusana penyu.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, hamufanirwe kuenda kudakara maparidza vhangeri rangu munzvimbo idzo, uye masimbisa chechi uko kwose kwarinowanikwa, uye kunyanya muColesville; nokuti, tarisai, vanonamata kwandiri murutendo rwukuru.
Uye zvakare, murairo wandinopa kuchechi, kuti zvakanaka kwandiri kuti vanofanira kuungana pamwechete paOhio, kuitira nguva muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery achadzoka kwavari.
Tarisai, heuno ungwaru, uye regai wose munhu azvisarudzire kusvika pandinouya. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/38.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 38
chapter_summary: 1–6, Kristu akasika zvose zvinhu; 7–8, Ari pakati peVatendi vake, avo vachamuona zvinozvino; 9–12, Yose nyama yakaora pamberi pake; 13–22, Akachengeta nyika yechipikirwa kuitira Vatendi vake munguva ino nokusingaperi; 23–27, Vatendi vanorairwa kuti vave vamwe uye varemekedzane sehama; 28–29, Hondo dzichauya dzinofanotaurwa; 30–33, Vatendi vachapihwa simba kubva kumusoro uye nokuti vaende pakati pemarudzi ose; 34–42, Chechi rinorairwa kuti richengete varombo nevanoshaya uye nokutsvaka upfumi hwokusingaperi.

verses.text: Uku ndiko kutaura kunoita Ishe Mwari vako, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu, Mukuru Ndini Arfa naOmega, kutanga nekupedzisira, mumwecheteyo akatarisa hupamhi hwekusingaperi nehondo yose yeserafimu dzekudenga, nyika isati yaitwa;
Mumwecheteyo anoziva zvinhu zvose, nokuti zvose zvinhu zviri pamberi pemaziso angu;
Ndini mumwechete akataura, uye nyika; ikabva yaitwa, uye zvose zvinhu zvakauya kuburikidza neni.

Ndini mumwecheteyo akatora Zioni yaEnoki muchipfuva changu; uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti; kunyangwe avo vose vakatenda, muzita rangu nokuti ndini Kristu uye pamusana peropa, randakadeura, ndakavakumbirira kuna Baba.
Asi tarisai, vakasarira vevakaipa ndakavachengeta mumangetani erima kudakara kutongwa kwezuva guru, uko kuchauya mukuguma kwenyika.
Uye naizvozvo ndichaita kuti vakaipa vachengetwe mumangetani erima, avo vasingade kunzwa izwi rangu asi vanoomesa mwoyo yavo uye nhamo, nhamo, nhamo, ndiko kuparadzwa kwavo.
Asi tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri maziso angu ari pamuri. Ndiri pakati penyu uye imi hamukwanise kundiona;
Asi zuva ririkusvika zvino rekuti muzondiona, uye mugoziva kuti Ndini; nokuti chidzitiro cherima iye zvino chave kuzotsemurwa, uye uyo asina kucheneswa haangararame zuva iro.
Nokudaro, sungirai nguwo dzenyu muchiuno uye mugadzirire. Tarisai, umambo ndehwenyu, uye muvengi haazokunda.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, makachena, asi kwete mose; uye hakuna mumwezve uyo anondifadza chaizvo;
Nokuti yose nyama yakaora pamberi pangu; uye masimba erima anotonga nyika, pakati pevana vevanhu pamberi pemhondo yose yedenga—
Izvo zvinokonzera kuti kunyarara kutonge, uye kusingaperi kose kunorwadziwa uye ngirozi dzakamirira murairo mukuru wekukohwa pano pasi kuunganidza sawi kuti ripiswe; uye tarisai, muvengi abatana,
Uye iyezvino ndinoratidza kwamuri zvakavanzika, chinhu chiri munzvimbo dzakavanzika, kuunza kunyangwe kuparadzwa kwenyu nekufamba kwenguva, uye makanga musingazvizive;

Asi zvino ndinozvitaura kwamuri, uye imi makaropafadzwa, kwete pamusana pekuipa kwenyu, kana kusatenda kwemwoyo yenyu; nokuti zvirokwazvo vamwe venyu vane mhosva pamberi pangu, asi ndichaitira tsitsi kusasimba kwenyu.
Naizvozvo, ivai makasimba kubvira zvino; musatye, nokuti umambo ndehwenyu.

Uye kuruponeso rwenyu ndinopa kwamuri murairo, nokuti ndakanzwa minamato yenyu, uye varombo vakanyunyuta pamberi pangu uye vapfumi ndakavasika, uye yose nyama ndeyangu, uye ini handina munhu wandinokudza.
Uye ndakaita kuti nyika ipfume, uye tarisai chituru chetsoka dzangu, nokudaro, zvakare ndichamira pamusoro payo.
Uye ndinotambanudza maoko angu nokuzvideredza kuti ndikupei upfumi hukuru, kunyangwe nenyika yechipikirwa, nyika iri kuyerera nemukaka nehuchi, pamusoro payo pasingazove nokutukwa apo Ishe pavanouya;
Uye ndichaipa kwamuri senyika yenhaka yenyu, kana mukaitsvaka nemwoyo wenyu wose.
Uye ichi ndicho chichave chibvumirano changu nemi muchaiwana senyika yenhaka yenyu, uye nenhaka yevana venyu nariini, apo nyika ichakamira, uye muchaiwana zvakare mukusingaperi, isingazopfuura.
Asi, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri nenguva muchashaya mambo kana mutongi, nokuti ndichave mambo wenyu uye ndichikutarisai.

Nokudaro, inzwai izwi rangu munditevere, uye munozove vanhu vakasununguka, uye muchange musina mimwe mitemo asi mitemo yangu pandinouya, nokuti ndini mupi wemutemo wenyu, uye chii chingatadzise ruoko rwangu?
Asi, zvirokwavo ndinoti kwamuri, dzidzisanai maererano nechinzvimbo chandakakupai;
Uye regai wose munhu akudze hama yake sezvaanozviita iye pachake, uye ateedze hunhu nehutsvene pamberi pangu.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri regai wose munhu akudze hama yake sezvaanozviita uye pachake.

Nokuti ndiani munhu pakati penyu aine vanakomana gumi nevaviri, asina tsvete pakati pavo, uye vachimushandira nokuteerera, uye oti kune mumwe wavo: Iva unoshonga nguwo uye ugare pano; uye oti kune mumwe: Pfeka mamvemwe uye ugare uko—uye otarisa vanakomana vake ozviti ndinoenzanisa?
Tarisai, izvi ndazvipa kwamuri semufananidzo, uye zvakaita kunyangwe sezvandiri. Ndinoti kwamuri ivai vamwechete; uye kana musiri vamwechete hamusi vangu.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri muvengi ari munzvimbo dzakavandika ari kutsvaka upenyu hwenyu.
Munonzwa nezvehondo munyika dziri kure, uye imi moti kuchave nehondo huru kunyika dziri kure, asi hamuzive mwoyo yevanhu vari munyika menyu.

Ndinokutaurirai zvinhu izvi pamusana peminamato yenyu; nokudaro pfimbikai ungwaru muzvipfuva zvenyu, kuitira kuti huipi hwevanhu hukazoburitsa zvinhu izvi kwamuri kuburikidza nehuipi hwavo nenzira ichataura munzeve dzenyu nezwi guru kupfuura iro richazunguza nyika; asi kana makagadzirira hamuzotya.
Uye kuti mupunyuke musimba remuvengi, uye mugounganidzwa kwandiri muri vanhu vakarurama, musina kavara uye musina mhosva—
Nokudaro, nechikonzero ichi ndakakupai murairo kuti muende kuOhio; uye ikoko ndichakupai mutemo wangu; uye ikoko muchapihwa masimba anobva kumusoro;

Uye kubvira ipapo, ani zvake wandinoda kuti aende pakati pemarudzi ose, uye zvichataurwa kwavari zvavakafanira kuita; nokuti ndine basa guru rakamirira, nokuti Israeri ichaponeswa, uye ndichavatungamirira kwose kwandinenge ndichida, uye hakuna simba richatadzisa ruoko rwangu.
Uye zvino, ndinopa kuchechi munzvimbo dzino murairo kuti vamwe vanhu mukati mavo vachasarudzwa, uye vachasarudzwa nezwi rechechi;
Uye vachatarisa kune varombo nevanoshaya, uye vovaropafadza nerubatsiro kuti vasazotambudzika; uye vachivatumira kunzvimbo yandakavaraira;
Uye iri ndiro richave basa ravo, kutonga nyaya dzemidziyo yechechi.
Uye avo vane mapurazi asingagone kutengeswa, regai asare kana kuisa vanhu vanoterera maererano nezvavanoona zvakanaka.
Onai kuti zvose zvinhu zvakachengetedzwa; uye kana vanhu vapihwa masimba kubva kumusoro uye vatumwa, zvose zvinhu izvi zvichaunganidzwa kuchipfuva chechechi.

Uye kana mukatsvaka upfumi uhwo huri kuda kwaBaba kuti vakupei, muchave vapfumi kupfuura vanhu vose, nokuti muchawana upfumi hwokusingaperi; uye zvinofanira kuti upfumi hwenyika ndehwangu kuti ndipe; asi chenjererai kuzvikudza, potse mungave semaNifai akare.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, ndinopa kwamuri murairo, kuti wose munhu, wose gosa, mupirisita, mudzidzisi, uyewo nenhengo, aende nesimba rake, nekushanda nemaoko ake, kugadzirira nokuita zvinhu zvandaraira.
Uye regai kuparidza kwenyu kuve izwi rekuyambira, wose munhu kumuvakidzani wake, uye mukupfava nemuhunyoro.
Uye endai kubva mukati mevakaipa. Zviponesei pachenyu imi. Ivai makachena imi makatakura midziyo yaIshe. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/39.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 39
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vatendi vanesimba rekuve vanakomana vaMwari; 5–6, Kugashira vhangeri ndiko kugashira Kristu; 7–14, James Covill anorairwa kuti abhabhatidzwe uye kuti ashande mumunda wemizambiringa waIshe; 15–21, Varanda vaIshe vanoparidza vhangeri Kuuya Kwechipiri kusati kwasvika; 22–24, Avo vanogashira vhangeri vachaunganidzwa munguva uye nekusingaperi.

verses.text: Teererai uye munzwe kuizwi reuyo anobva kwokusingaperi kwose kusvika kwokusingaperi kwose, Mukuru Ndini, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu—
Chiedza neupenyu hwenyika; chiedza chinopenya murima uye rima harichinzwisise;
Mumwecheteyo akauya pakati penguva kune vekwangu, asi vekwangu havana kundigashira.
Asi kuna vazhinji vakandigashira ndakavapa simba kuti vave vanakomana vangu; uye kunyangwe zvakadaro ndichapa kuvazhinji avo vachandigashira, simba rekuti vave vanakomana vangu.
Uye zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uyo anogashira vhangeri rangu anogashira ini; uye asingagashire vhangeri rangu haandigashire.

Uye iri ndiro vhangeri rangu—kutendeuka nerubhabhatidzo nemvura, uye kwozouya zvino rubhabhatidzo rwemoto neMweya Mutsvene, kunyangwe Munyaradzi, anoratidza zvinhu zvose nokudzidzisa zvinhu zverunyararo zveumambo.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwauri iwe, muranda wangu James, ndatarisa mabasa ako uye ndinokuziva.
Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri mwoyo wako iye zvino watove pamberi pangu panguva ino; uye tarisai ndaisa maropafadzo makuru pamusoro pako;
Zvisinei iwe waona kusuwa kukuru, nokuti wandiramba nguva zhinji pamusana pekuzvida nepamusana pezvinetswa zvenyika.

Asi, tarisai, mazuva ekupona kwako asvika kana ukateerera kuizwi rangu, iro rinoti kwauri; Simuka ubhabhatidzwe, uye ugeze zvitadzo zvako uchidaidzira zita rangu, uye uchagashira Mweya wangu, neropafadzo guru rausati wamboziva.

Uye ukaita izvi, ndakugadzirira iwe basa guru. Uchaparidza vhangeri rangu rizere, iro randatumira mumazuva ano ekupedzisira, chibvumirano chandakatumira kuti ndidzore vanhu vangu, avo vari vemba yaIsraeri.
Uye zvichaitika kuti iroro simba richagara pauri; uchave nerutendo rwukuru, uye ini ndichave newe uye ndichaenda pamberi pechiso chako.
Wakadaidzirwa kushanda mumunda wangu wemizambiringa, nekuvaka chechi yangu, nekuunza Zioni; kuti ifare pamusoro pezvikomo uye ibudirire.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, hauna kudaidzirwa kuti uende kunyika yekumabvazuva, asi wakadaidzirwa kuti uende kuOhio.

Uye kana vanhu vangu vakazviunganidza pachezvavo paOhio, ndavachengetera maropafadzo ayo asingazivikanwe mukati mevana vevanhu, uye achadururirwa pamisoro yavo. Uye kubvira ipapo vanhu vachaenda kumarudzi ose.

Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, kuti vanhu vari kuOhio vanodaidza kwandiri nerutendo rukuru, vachifunga kuti ndingadzore ruoko rwangu mukutongwa kwemarudzi, asi handingarambe izwi rangu.
Nokudaro shanda nesimba rako uye wodaidza vashandi vanovimbika kumunda wangu wemizambiringa, kuti richekererwe kekupedzisira.
Uye kana vachitendeuka uye vachigashira kuzara kwevhangeri rangu, uye vachitsveneswa, ndichadzora ruoko rwangu mukutonga.
Nokudaro, enda, uchideedzera nezwi rapamusoro, uchiti: Umambo hwekudenga hwave pedyo; uchideedzera: Hosana! Ngariropafadzwe zita raMwari wePamusoro-soro.
Enda uchibhabhatidza nemvura, uchigadzira nzira pamberi pechiso changu kuitira nguva yandinouya.
Nokuti nguva yasvika; zuva kana nguva hapana munhu anoziva; asi chokwadi richauya.
Uye uyo anotambira zvinhu izvi, iye anotambira ini; uye vachaunganidzwa kwandiri munguva nekusingaperi.
Uye zvakare, zvichaitika kuti vazhinji vamuchabhabhatidza nemvura, muchavagadza maoko enyu, uye vachagashira chipo cheMweya Mutsvene, uye vachitarisira zviratidzo zvekuuya kwangu, uye vachazondiziva.
Tarisai ndinouya nokukurumidza: Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/40.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 40
chapter_summary: 1–3, Kutya kutambudzwa nezvinhu zvenyika zvinokonzera kurambwa kwevhangeri.

verses.text: Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti mwoyo wemuranda wangu James Covill wakanga wakanaka pamberi pangu, nokuti akabvumirana neni kuti anozoteerera izwi rangu.
Uye akagashira izwi nokufara asi pakarepo Satani akamuedza; uye kutya kutambudzwa nezvinhu zvenyika zvakaita kuti arambe izwi.
Nokudaro akatyora chibvumirano changu, uye zvasarira kwandiri kuita kwaari zvandinoona zvakanaka. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/41.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 41
chapter_summary: 1–3, Magosa achatonga Chechi nemweya wezvakazarurwa; 4–6, Vadzidzi vechokwadi vachagashira nokuchengeta mutemo waIshe; 7–12, Edward Partridge anodaidzwa sabhishopi muChechi.

verses.text: Teererai, uye munzwe, imi vanhu vangu, vanodaro Ishe naMwari wenyu, imi vandinofarira kuropafadza nemaropafadzo makuru kupfuura ose, imi munondinzwa; uye imi musingandinzwe ndichakutukai imi makakambira zita rangu, nekutuka kunokunda kwose kutuka.
Teererai, imi magosa echechi avo vangu vandakadaidza, tarisai ndinokupai murairo, kuti muchaungana pamwechete kuti mubvumirane pamusoro peshoko rangu;
Nemunamato werutendo rwenyu muchagashira mutemo wangu, kuti mugoziva kutonga chechi yangu nokuve nezvinhu zvose zvakarurama pamberi pangu.
Uye ndichave mutongi wenyu pandinouya; uye tarisai, ndinouya nokukurumidza, uye imi muchaona kuti mutemo wangu wachengetwa.
Uyo anogashira mutemo wangu uye akauita, mumwecheteyo mudzidzi wangu; uye uyo anoti agashira akasauita mumwecheteyo haasi mudzidzi wangu, uye achabviswa pakati penyu;
Nokuti hazvina kufanira kuti zvinhu zvevana veumambo zvipihwe kune avo vasina kukodzera, kana kumbwa, kana zvinokosha zvikandwe pamberi penguruve.
Uye zvakare, zvakafanira kuti muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, ave nemba inovakwa yokugara uye nokududzira.
Uye zvakare, zvakafanira kuti muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon anofanira kugara sezvaanoona zvakamunakira, kana achichengeta mirairo yangu—

Uye zvakare, ndadaidza muranda wangu Edward Partridge; uye ndinopa murairo, kuti anofanira kudomwa nezwi rechechi, uye ogadzwa sabhishopi wechechi, kuti asiye zvaanotengesa kuti ashandise nguva yake yose mumabasa echechi;
Kuona kuzvinhu zvose sekudomwa kwazvichaitwa kwaari mumitemo yangu muzuva iro randichayipa.
Izvi nechikonzero chekuti mwoyo wake wakachena pamberi pangu, nokuti akaita saNatanaeri wekare, uyo asina hunyengedzi maari.
Aya mazwi anopihwa kwamuri, uye akachena pamberi pangu; nokudaro, chenjerai kuti munoabata sei, nokuti achapindurirwa pamweya yenyu nemusi wekutongwa. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 42
chapter_summary: 1–10, Magosa anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri, vabhabhatidze vatendeuki, uye nokuvaka Chechi; 11–12, Vanofanira kudaidzwa uye vogadzwa uye vari vanofanira kudzidzisa mitemo yevhangeri iyo inowanikwa mumagwaro matsvene; 13–17, Vanofanira kudzidzisa nokuporofita nesimba reMweya; 18–29, Vatendi vanorairwa kuti vasauraye, kuba, kunyepa, kuita ruchiva, kuita upombwe, kana kutaura zvakaipa pamusoro pevamwe; 30–39, Mitemo inotonga kutsaurwa kwemidziyo inomiswa; 40–42, Kuzvikudza nenungo hazvidiwe; 43–52, Vanorwara vacharapwa kuburikidza nokuropafadzwa; uye nerutendo; 53–60, Magwaro matsvene anotonga Chechi uye anofanira kutaurwa kunyika; 61–69, Nzvimbo yeJerusarema Idzva nezvakavandika zveumambo zvichaiswa pachena; 70–73, Midziyo yakatsaurwa inofanira kushandiswa kuriritira vashandi veChechi; 74–93, Mitemo inotonga kuzivana kusina kururama, hupombwe, kuuraya, kuba, uye nokureurura zvitadzo inotsanangurwa.

verses.text: Teererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, imi maungana pachenyu muzita rangu, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu, Muponesi wenyika; sezvo muri munotenda muzita rangu uye nokuchengeta mirairo yangu.
Zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, teererai nekunzwa nekutevedza mutemo uyo wandichapa kwamuri.

Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti, sezvo maungana pamwechete pachenyu maererano nemurairo wandakakurairai, uye makabvumirana muchinhu chimwechete chino, uye mukakumbira kuna Baba muzita rangu, kunyangwe saizvozvo muchagashira.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinopa kwamuri uyu murairo wekutanga, kuti muchaenda muzita rangu, mumwe nemumwe wenyu, kunze kwevaranda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon.
Uye ndinopa kwavari murairo kuti ivo vachaenda kwemwaka mudiki, uye zvichapihwa nesimba reMweya kuti vachadzoka rinhi.
Uye imi muchaenda musimba reMweya wangu, muchiparidza vhangeri rangu, vaviri vaviri, muzita rangu, muchisimudza mazwi enyu sekurira kwehwamanda, muchitaura izwi rangu sengirozi dzaMwari.
Uye muchaenda muchibhabhatidza nemvura, muchiti: Tendeukai imi, tendeukai imi nokuti umambo hwekudenga hwave pedyo.
Uye muchibva panzvimbo ino muchaenda kumatunhu ekumadokero; uyezve nokuwana kwamuchaita avo vachakutambirai muchavaka chechi yangu mudunhu rega-rega—
Kudakara nguva yangu yauya iyo pazvicharatidzwa kwamuri kubva kumusoro, apo guta reJerusarema Idzva richagadzirwa, kuti muunganidzwe muri pamwechete, kuti muve vanhu vangu uye ndichave Mwari venyu.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, muranda wangu Edward Partridge achamira munzvimbo iyo yandakamupa. Uye zvichaitika, kuti kana akatadza mumwe anoiswa munzvimbo yake. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, hazvipihwe kumunhu wose zvake kuti ayende anoparidza izwi rangu, kana kuvaka chechi yangu, kunze kwekunge akagadzwa nemumwe ane mvumo, uye zvichizivikanwa kuchechi kuti ane mvumo uye akagadzwa nenzira kwayo nemisoro yechechi.
Uye zvakare, magosa, vapirisita nevadzidzisi vechechi ino vachadzidzisa misimboti yevhangeri rangu, iyo iri muBhaibheri uye neBhuku raMormoni, umo mune kuzara kwevhangeri,
Uye vachacherechedza zvibvumirano nemisimboti yechechi kuti vaiite, uye izvi ndizvo zvichave zvidzidziso zvavo, sekutungamirirwa kwavachange vachiitwa neMweya.
Uye Mweya uchapihwa kwamuri nemunamato werutendo; uye kana musina kugashira Mweya hamudzidzise.
Uye zvose izvi muchacherechedza kuzviita sekuraira kwandakaita pamusoro pekudzidzisa kwenyu, kudakara kuzara kwemagwaro angu matsvene kwapihwa.
Uye sezvo muchazosimudza mazwi enyu kuburikidza naMweya Munyaradzi, muchataura nokuporofita sekuda kwangu;
Nokuti tarisai, Mweya Munyaradzi anoziva zvinhu zvose, uye anopupura pamusoro pezvaBaba nezveMwanakomana.
Uye zvino tarisai, ndinotaura kuchechi. Musauraye; uye uyo anouraya haazowane ruregerero pasi pano, kana munyika ichauya.
Uye zvakare ndinoti, musauraye; asi uyo anouraya achafa.
Musabe; uye uyo anoba uye agorega kutendeuka acharaswa kunze.
Musareve nhema; uyo anonyepa akasatendeuka anoraswa kunze.
Ida mukadzi wako nemwoyo wako wose, uye uchanamatira kwaari uye pasina mumwe.
Uye uyo anotarisa mukadzi nokumuchiva acharamba chitendero, haazove neMweya; uye kana akasatendeuka acharaswa kunze.
Musaite upombwe; uye uyo anoita upombwe, uye akasatendeuke, acharaswa kunze.
Asi uyo aita upombwe uye akatendeuka nemwoyo wake wose, uye akabva azvisiya, uye akasazviita zvakare, iyeyo muchamuregerera;
Asi akazviita zvakare, iyeyo haachazoregererwa, asi acharaswa kunze.
Musataure zvakaipa pamusoro pemuvakidzani wenyu, kana kumuitira chinhu chinomukuvadza.
Munoziva mitemo yangu maererano nezvinhu izvi zvinopihwa mumagwaro matsvene angu; uyo anotadza uye akasatendeuka acharaswa kunze.
Kana uchindida uchandishandira uye nokuchengetedza mirairo yangu.
Uye tarisai, mucharangarira varombo, uye mugopira midziyo yenyu kuvariritira, iyo yamungakwanise kuvapa, nechibvumirano nechisungo chisingatyoreke.

Uye sekupa kwamunenge muchiita zvinhu zvenyu kuvarombo, munenge muchizviita kwandiri; uye zvichaiswa pamberi pabhishopi wechechi yangu nevabatsiri vake, vaviri vemagosa, kana vapirisita vepamusoro, vaachasarudza kana vaakasarudza kare uye akavatsaurira basa iroro.

Uye zvichaitika, kuti mushure mekunge zvaiswa pamberi pabhishopi wechechi yangu, uye mushure mekunge agashira uchapupu uhu maererano nekupirwa kwemidziyo yechechi rangu, kuti hazvizokwanisika kutorwa kubva muchechi, zvichipindirana nemirairo yangu, munhu wose achaitwa kuti azvidavirire kwandiri, hutariri hwemidziyo yake, kana izvo zvaakatambira kuburikidza nekutsaurwa, izvo zvinokwanirana naye nemhuri yake.

Uye zvakare, kana pachizoita mimwe midziyo iri mumaoko echechi, kana emumwe munhu ari mariri zvakawanda kupfuura zvakafanira kuti vararame mushure mekupirwa kwekutanga uku, zviri zvasara zvinopirwa kuna bhishopi, zvichachengetwa kuti zvigoropafadza avo vasina, nguva nenguva, kuti wose munhu anoshaya apihwe zvinomukwanira uye kuti agotambira maererano nezvaanoda.
Nokudaro, zvinosaririra zvichachengeterwa mumba yangu yekuchengetera, kuti zvigopihwa kuvarombo nevanoshaya, sezvinenge zvadomwa nedare repamusoro rechechi, nabhishopi nedare rake;
Uye nechinangwa chekutenga nzvimbo dzinoyamura chechi, uye nokuvaka dzimba dzekunamatira, uye nekuvaka Jerusarema Idzva iro richaratidzwa mushure—
Kuti vanhu vechibvumirano vagoungana pamwechete muzuva iro randichauya kutemberi yangu. Uye izvi ndinozviitira ruponeso rwevanhu vangu.

Uye zvichaitika kuti, uyo anotadza uye akasatendeuka, achakandwa kunze kwechechi, uye haazogashira zvakare icho chaakanga apira kuvarombo nekune vanoshaya vechechi yangu, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, kwandiri—
Sekuita kwamunenge muchizviitira wekupedzisira weava, munenge muchizviitira ini.

Nokuti zvichaitika kuti, izvo zvandakataura nemiromo yemaporofita vangu zvichazadzikiswa; nokuti ndichatsaura upfumi hweavo vanogumbatira vhangeri rangu pakati peJentairi, kuvarombo vevanhu vangu avo vari vemba yaIsraeri,
Uye zvakare, musazvikudze mumwoyo menyu; itai kuti nhumbi dzenyu dzose dzive dzisingashamisire, uye kunaka kwadzo kuve kunaka kwebasa remaoko enyu;
Itai kuti zvinhu zvose zviitwe mukutsvinda pamberi pangu.
Musaite nungo; nokuti uyo ane nungo haazodya chingwa kana kupfeka nhumbi dzemushandi.

Uye ani zvake pakati penyu anorwara, asina rutendo rwekuti arapwe, asi achitenda, achachengetwa achibatwa nokuzvakanaka chose, nemishonga uye nekudya kwakapfava, uye kuti zvisingaitwe neruoko rwemuvengi.
Uye magosa echechi, vaviri kana kupfuura, vachadaidzwa, uye vachanamatira nekuvagadza maoko pamusoro pavo muzita rangu; uye kana vakafa vachafira kwandiri, uye vakapona vachaponera kwandiri.
Muchagara pamwechete murudo, zvekuti muchachema nokurasikirwa neavo vanenge vafa, uye kunyanya avo vasingatarisirwe kuve nekumuka kuvakafa kune kubwinya.
Uye zvichaitika kuti avo vachafa vari mandiri havazoraira rufu, nokuti rwuchange rwuchitapira kwavari;
Uye vanofa vasiri mandiri, nhamo kwavari, nokuti rufu rwavo rwunovava.
Uye zvakare, zvichaitika kuti uyo ane rutendo mandiri rwekupona, uye asina kudomerwa kufa achapona.
Uyo ane rutendo rwekuona, achaona.
Uyo ane rutendo rwekunzwa, achanzwa.
Anokaminha ane rutendo rwekusvetuka achasvetuka.
Uye avo vasina rutendo rwekuita zvinhu izvi, asi vachitenda mandiri, vane simba rekuve vanakomana vangu; uye kana vasiri kutyora mitemo yangu, muchatakura utera hwavo.
Muchamira munzvimbo yeutariri hwenyu.
Musazotora nhumbi yehama yenyu; muchatenga icho chamunotambira kubva kuhama yenyu.
Uye mukawana zvakawanda kupfuura zvamunoda mukuzviriritira kwenyu, makafanira kuzvipa kuimba yangu yekuchengetera, kuti zvose zvinhu zvigoitwa mayererano neizvo zvandataura.
Muchakumbira, uye magwaro matsvene angu achapihwa sezvandadoma, uye agochengetedzwa zvakanaka;
Uye zvakafanira kuti munyarare pamusoro pawo, uye musavadzidzise dakara mavagashira zvizere.
Uye ndinokupai murairo kuti muchaidzidzisa kuvanhu vose; nokuti ichadzidziswa kumarudzi ose, vehukama, vendimi, nevanhu.
Muchatora zvinhu zvamakatambira, izvo zvakapihwa kwamuri mumagwaro matsvene angu semutemo, kuti uve mutemo wangu unotonga chechi yangu;
Uye uyo anoita maererano nezvinhu izvi achaponeswa, uyo asingazviite achatongwa kana akaramba akadaro.

Kana mukakumbira, muchagashira zvakazarurwa pamusoro pezvakazarurwa, ruzivo pamusoro peruzivo, kuti mugoziva zvakavandika nezvinhu zverunyararo—izvo zvinounza rufaro, izvo zvinounza upenyu hwokusingaperi.
Muchakumbira, uye zvobva zvaratidzwa kwamuri munguva yangu painenge yasvika apo Jerusarema Idzva richavakwa.
Uye tarisai, zvichaitika kuti varanda vangu vachatumirwa kumabvazuva nekumadokero, kuchamhembe nekumaodzanyemba.

Uye kunyangwe iye zvino, regai uyo anoenda kumabvazuva avadzidzise avo vachatendeudzwa kuti vatizire kumadokero, uye izvi zviri zvinokonzerwa nechichauya panyika, uye zvisungo zvemibatanidzwa yemuchivande.
Tarisai, muchacherechedza zvinhu zvose izvi, uye mubairo wenyu uchave mukuru; nokuti kwamuri kwakapihwa kuti muzive zvakavanzika zvemuumambo, asi kunyika hazvina kupihwa kuti vazvizive.
Muchacherechedza mitemo yamakatambira uye move makatendeseka.
Uye muchagashira pashure zvibvumirano zvechechi, izvo zvichave zvakakwana kukumisai, zvose pano nemuJerusarema Idzva.
Nokudaro, uyo asina ungwaru, ngaandikumbire, ndichamupa zvakakwana uye ndisingamukonorere.
Simudzai mwoyo yenyu, uye mufare, nokuti kwamuri umambo, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, makiyi echechi apihwa. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.
Vapirisita nevadzidzisi vachawana hutariri hwavo, kunyangwe senhengo

Uye magosa kana vapirisita vepamusoro avo vanosarudzwa kuti vayamure bhishopi semachinda muzvinhu zvose, mhuri dzavo dzinoriritirwa kubva mumidziyo yakapirwa kuna bhishopi, kuti zviyamure varombo, uye nezvimwe zvinangwa, sezvataurwa kare;
Kana kuti vanotambira mubairo wakaenzanirana nekushanda kwavo, kana hutariri kana rimwewo basa, zvinenge zvafungwa kuti zvakafanira kana zvaitwa nevabatsiri nabhishopi.
Uye naiyewo bhishopi, achatambira zvekuti azviriritire kana mubairo wekushanda kwake kwose muchechi.

Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti vanaani zvavo vari pakati penyu, vachinge varamba vamwe vavo nekuda kwehupombwe, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, kana vakazopupura pamberi penyu mumwoyo wose wazvininipisa zvikuru kuti ndizvo zviripo, musazovabvisa pakati penyu;
Asi mukaona kuti pane vanhu vakasiya vamwe vavo pamusana pehupombwe, asi vari ivo vakatadza, uye vamwe vavo vachiri vapenyu, vachabviswa pakati penyu.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, murinde makachenjerera, muchibvunzurudza zvose, kuti musagashire vakadaro pakati penyu kana vari vakaroorana;
Uye kana vasina kuroorana, vanofanira kutendeuka kuzvitadzo zvavo zvose kana kuti imi hamuzovagashira.
Uye zvakare, wose munhu wechechi yino yaKristu, achacherechedza nokuchengeta yose mirairo nezvibvumirano zvechechi.

Uye zvichaitika, kuti kana paina ani zvake pakati penyu achauraya vachatorwa vonoiswa kwavanoitwa zviri maererano nemitemo yenyika; nokuti yeukai kuti haana ruregerero; uye zvinozoratidzwa maererano nemitemo yenyika.

Uye kana ani zvake murume kana mukadzi akaita hupombwe, iyeyo, murume kana mukadzi, achatongwa pamberi pemagosa maviri echechi, kana vano pfuura, uye rose shoko richamiswa mukumutonga nevapupuri vaviri vechechi, uye kwete vemuvengi; asi kana vakave vapupuri vanopfuura vaviri ndizvo zvirinani.

Asi iye murume kana mukadzi achatongwa nemiromo yevapupuri vaviri; uye magosa achaisa nyaya yacho pamberi pechechi, uye chechi ichasimudza maoko mukusavatsigira, kuti vagoitwa zviri maererano nemutemo waMwari.
Uye kana zvichibvira, zvinofanirwa kuti bhishopi avepowo.
Uye ndiko kuita kwamuchaita munyaya dzose dzichauya pamberi penyu.
Uye kana murume kana mukadzi akaita hukororo, iyeyo anoiswa kumutemo wenyika.
Uye kana murume kana mukadzi akaba, iyeyo murume kana mukadzi anoiswa kumutemo wenyika.
Uye murume kana mukadzi akareva nhema, iyeyo mukadzi kana murume achaiswa kumurau wenyika.
Uye murume kana mukadzi akaita chitadzo chipi zvacho, iyeyo murume kana mukadzi achaiswa kumutemo, kunyange uyo waMwari.
Uye kana mukoma wako kana hanzvadzi akakutadzira, unomutora pakati penyu mega, mukoma iyeyo kana hanzvadzi, muri mega; uye kana mukoma kana hanzvadzi akareurura, muchasunungurana.
Uye kana mukoma kana hanzvadzi akasareurura uchamuendesa iye mukoma kana hanzvadzi kuchechi, kwete kunhengo, asi kumagosa. Uye izvi zvichaitirwa mumuchechi, uye kwete pamberi penyika.
Uye kana mukoma kana hanzvazi yako ikatadzira ruzhinji, iyeyo mukoma kana hanzvadzi, acharangwa pamberi peruzhinji.
Uye kana paine atadza pachena, achatsiurwa pachena kuti iye, murume kana mukadzi anyare. Uye kana iyeyo murume kana mukadzi akasareurura, iyeyo murume kana mukadzi anoendeswa kumutemo waMwari.

Kana paine atadza muruvande, iyeyo murume kana mukadzi achatsiurwa muruvande, kuti iyeyo murume kana mukadzi awane mukana wekureurura muruvande kune uyo murume kana mukadzi waatadzira, uye nekuna Mwari, kuti chechi irege kutaura zvekumutsiura iyeyo murume kana mukadzi.
Uye ndiko kuita kwamuchaita muzvinhu zvose.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 43
chapter_summary: 1–7, Zvakazarurwa nemirairo zvinouya chete kuburikidza neuyo akadomwa; 8–14, Vatendi vanotsveneswa kuburikidza nokufamba muutsvene hwose pamberi paIshe; 15–22, Magosa anotumwa kuti anodaidzira kutendeuka uye nokugadzirisa vanhu kuzuva guru raIshe; 23–28, Ishe vanodaidza vanhu nezwi ravo uye nokuburikidza nemasimba enyika; 29–35, Mereniamu nekusungwa kwaSatani zvichauya.

verses.text: Tererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, uye mupe nzeve kumazwi andichataura kwamuri.

Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kuti magashira murairo uchave mutemo muchechi yangu, kuburikidza naiye uyo wandakakudomerai kuti agashire mirairo nezvakazarurwa kubva muruoko rwangu.
Uye izvi muchazviziva zvechokwadi—kuti hakuna mumwezve wamakadomerwa kuti agashire mirairo nezvakazarurwa kudakara atorwa, kana ari anogara mandiri.

Asi zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, hakuna mumwezve achadomwa kuchipo ichi kunze kwekunge zvaitwa kuburikidza naiye; nokuti kana chikabviswa kwaari haazowana simba kunze kwekutodoma mumwe panzvimbo yake.
Uye izvi zvichave mutemo kwamuri, kuti hamuzogashira dzidziso yaani zvake achauya pamberi penyu sezvakazarurwa kana semurairo;
Uye izvi ndinokupai kuti musazonyengedzwa, kuti mugoziva kuti havasi vekwangu.

Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti uyo akagadzwa neni achapinda nepasuwo uye ozogadzwa sekukutaurirai kwandaita kare, kuzodzidzisa izvo zvakazarurwa zvamakagashira uye zvamuchagashira kuburikidza naiye wandakadoma.

Uye zvino tarisai, ndinokupai murairo, kuti kana maungana pamwechete muchadzidzisana nekusimudzirana, kuti mugoziva zvekuita nekutungamira chechi yangu, zvekuita pamusoro pemitemo nemirairo yangu, iyo yandakapa.
Uye muchave makadzidziswa mumutemo wechechi yangu, uye mugocheneswa neicho chamagashira, uye muchazvisunga mega kuti mushande neutsvene hwose pamberi pangu—
Kuti kana muri munoita izvi, kubwinya kuchapamhidzirwa paumambo hwamakagashira. Kana musiri kuzviita, zvichabviswa, kunyangwe neichocho chamakagashira.
Bvisai kutadza kuri mukati menyu; zvichenesei pamberi pangu;
Uye kana muchida kubwinya kweumambo, domai muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uye momutsigira pamberi pangu nemunamato werutendo.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, kana muchida zvakavanzika zveumambo, mupei zvekudya nezvipfeko, kana nechose zvacho chaanoda kuti aite basa randakamuraira;
Uye mukasazviita acharamba ari kune avo vakamugashira, kuti ini ndizvichengetere vanhu vakachena pamberi pangu.
Zvakare ndinoti, teererai imi magosa echechi yangu, imi vandakasarudza: Hamuna kutumirwa kuti muzodzidziswa, asi kuti mudzidzise vana vevanhu zvinhu zvandakaisa mumaoko enyu nesimba reMweya wangu;
Uye muchadzidziswa kubva kumusoro. Zvichenesei, uye muchava munopihwa simba, kuti mugopa kunyangwe sekutaura kwandakaita.
Teerai imi, nokuti tarisai, zuva guru raIshe rave pedyo.

Nokuti zuva riri kuuya rekuti Ishe vachataura izwi ravo richibva kudenga; matenga achazunguzika uye nyika ichadedera, uye hwamanda yaMwari icharira kwenguva refu neruzha, uye vachati kumarudzi akarara: Imi vatsvene mukai murarame; imi vatadzi garayi uye murare kudakara ndadzoka zvakare.
Nokudaro sungira nguwo dzako muchiuno potse mungawanikwe muri mukati mavakaipa.
Simudzai mazwi enyu musanyarare. Daidzirai kumarudzi kuti atendeuke, vose vakuru nevadiki, vose vakasungwa nevakasununguka, muchiti: Zvigadzirirei kuitira zuva guru raIshe;
