Nokuti kana ini, anove munhu, ndichisimudza izwi uye ndichikudaidzai kuti mutendeuke, uye imi mondivenga, muchazoti chii kana zuva rauya apo mabhanan’ana achataura mazwi aya kubva kumagumo enyika, achitaura kunzeve dzeavo vose vapenyu, achiti—Tendeukai, uye mugadzirire zuva guru raIshe?

Hongu, uye zvakare, kana mheni dzopenya kubva kumabvazuva dzichienda kumadokero, uye dzichitaura mazwi adzo kune vose vapenyu, uye dzichiita kuti dzose nzeve dzisekenyedzeke dzeavo vari kunzwa, dzichitaura mazwi aya—Tendeukai imi, nokuti zuva guru raIshe rauya?
Uye zvakare, Ishe vachataura izwi ravo richibva kudenga, achiti, Teererai imi marudzi enyika, uye munzwe mashoko eavo Mwari vakakusikai.
Imi marudzi enyika, kangani kandingadai ndakakuunganidzai pamwechete sehuku inounganidza hukwana dzayo pasi pemapiro ayo, asi imi mairamba!

Kangani ndichikudaidzai nemiromo yevaranda vangu, uye nokushumira kwengirozi, uye nezwi rangu pachangu, uye nezwi remabhanan’ana, uye nezwi remheni, uye nezwi remadutu, uye nezwi rekundengendeka kwenyika, uye nemvura huru ine zvimvuramabwe, uye nezwi renzara uye nezvirwere zvemarudzi ose, uye nekuridzwa kukuru kwehwamanda, uye nezwi rekutonga, uye nezwi retsitsi muswere wose wezuva, uye nezwi rekubwinya nerukudzo uye neupfumi hweupenyu hwokusingaperi, uye ndingadai ndakakuponesai neruponeso rwusingaperi, asi hamuna kuda!
Tarisai, zuva rauya, apo mukombe wehasha dzangu nekushatirwa kwangu wazara.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti aya mazwi aIshe Mwari venyu.
Nokudaro, shandai imi, shandai imi mumunda wangu wemuzambiringa kwenguva yekupedzisira—kwenguva yekupedzisira daidzirai vagari vepasi.
Nokuti mukusvika kwenguva yangu ndichauya pasi munyika mukutonga, uye vanhu vangu vachadzikinurwa uye vagotonga neni panyika.
Nokuti Mereniamu huru iyo yataurwa nemiromo yevaranda vangu, ichauya.
Nokuti Satani achasungwa, uye paachazosunungurwa zvakare achazotonga kwemwaka mudiki, uye kobva kwauya kuguma kwenyika.
Uye uyo anogara mukururama achashandurwa mukubwaira kweziso, uye nyika ichapfuura sekupiswa nemoto.
Uye vakaipa vachaenda mumoto usingadzimike, uye magumo avo hapana munhu anoziva munyika, kana achazoziva nariini, kudakara vauya kwandiri mukutongwa.
Teererai imi kumazwi aya. Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Muponesi wenyika. Koshesai zvinhu izvi mumwoyo yenyu, uye morega kuera kwekusingaperi kugare mupfungwa dzenyu.
Ivai makadzikama. Chengetai mirairo yangu yose. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/44.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 44
chapter_summary: 1–3, Magosa anofanira kuungana mumusangano mukuru; 4–6, Vanofanira kuronga maererano nemitemo yenyika uye nokuchengeta varombo.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndikokutaura kwaIshe kwamuri varanda vangu, zvakakodzera kwandiri kuti magosa echechi yangu anofanira kudaidzwa pamwechete, kubva kumabvazuva nekubva kumadokero, nekubva kuchamhembe, nekubva kumaodzanyemba, netsamba kana neimwe nzira.
Uye zvichaitika, kuti sekutendeka kwavachange vakaita, uye vachishandisa rutendo mandiri, ndichadurura Mweya wangu pavari muzuva iro ravachaungana pamwechete.
Uye zvichaitika kuti vachaenda kumatunhu mamwe akatenderedza, uye vachiparidza kutendeuka kuvanhu.
Uye vazhinji vachatendeutswa, zvekuti muchawana simba rekuzvirongera maererano nemitemo yevanhu;

Kuti vavengi venyu varege kuva nesimba pamusoro penyu; kuti muve munochengetedzwa muzvinhu zvose; kuti mugoneswe kuchengeta mitemo yangu; kuti zvose zvinosunga zvidamburwe izvo muvengi anotsvakisa kuparadza vanhu vangu.

Tarisai ndinoti kwamuri, munofanira kuti mushanyire varombo nevanoshaya uye nokushandira kuvasunungura, kuti vachengetwe kudakara zvinhu zvose zvaitwa maererano nemutemo wangu uyo wamakatambira. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/45.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 45
chapter_summary: 1–5, Kristu ndiye mureveri wedu kuna Baba; 6–10, Vhangeri mutumwa wekugadzira nzira pamberi paIshe; 11–15, Enoki nehama dzake vakagashirwa naIshe kwavari; 16–23, Kristu akaratidza zviratidzo zvekuuya kwake sekupihwa kwazvakaitwa paGomo reMiorivhi; 24–38, Vhangeri richadzorerwa pakare, nguva dzeMaJentairi dzichazadzikiswa, uye chirwere chinoparadza chichazara panyika; 39–47, Zviratidzo, zvishamiso, uye nekumuka kuvakafa zvichavepo paKuuya Kwechipiri; 48–53, Kristu achamira paGomo reMiorivhi, uye maJuda achaona maronda ake ari mumaoko ake nekutsoka; 54–59, Ishe vachatonga munguva yeMereniamu; 60–62, Muporofita anoudzwa kuti atange kududzira Testamente Itsva, kuburikidza nayo zvimwe zvinokosha zvichaziviswa; 63–75, Vatendi vanoudzwa kuti vaungane uye kuti vavake Jerusarema Idzva, uko kuchaenda vanhu vemarudzi ose.

verses.text: Teererai, imi vanhu vechechi yangu, iyo yakapihwa umambo; teererai imi uye mupe nzeve kuna iye akaisa hwaro hwenyika, uyo akaita matenga uye nemhomo dzirimo, uye zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa naiye zvipenyu zvinofamba, uye zvine chimiro.
Uye zvakare ndinoti, teererai kuzwi rangu, kuti musawanikidzwe nerufu; munguva yamusingafungire, zhizha rinenge rapfuura, uye kukohwa kwapera, uye mweya yenyu isina kuponeswa.
Teererai kwaari anove ndiye murevereri kuna Baba, ari kukukumbirirai pamberi pavo—
Achiti: Baba, tarisai kutambudzika nerufu rwake kweuyo asina kuita chitadzo, wamakafara kwazvo naye; tarisai ropa reMwanakomana wenyu iro rakadeurwa, ropa reuyo wamakapa kuti imi mugorumbidzwa;
Nokudaro, Baba, regererai idzi hama dzangu idzo dzinotenda muzita rangu, kuti dzigouya kwandiri uye dziwane upenyu hwusingaperi.
Teererai, imi vanhu vechechi yangu, uye nemi magosa teererai pamwechete, uye munzwe izwi rangu achirikunzi nhasi, uye musaomese mwoyo yenyu;
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri ndini Arfa naOmega, mavambo namagumo, chiedza neupenyu hwenyika—chiedza chinopenya murima uye rima racho harichinzwisise.

Ndakauya kune vekwangu, uye vekwangu havana kundigashira; asi kune vakawanda vakandigashira ndakavapa simba rekuti vaite zvishamiso zvizhinji, uye nekuti vave vanakomana vaMwari; uye kunyangwe kune avo vakatenda kuzita rangu ndakavapa simba rekuti vawane upenyu hwokusingaperi.

Uye kunyangwe naizvozvo ndakatumira chibvumirano changu chisingaperi munyika, kuti chive chiedza kunyika, uye kuti chive rupawo rwevanhu vangu, uye kuti maJentairi vachitsvake kwachiri, uye nokuve mutumwa pamberi pechiso changu kugadzirira nzira pamberi pangu.
Nokudaro, uyai imi kwachiri, uye kune uyo achauya ndichataura naye sezvaiitwa nevanhu mumazuva akare, uye ndinokuratidzai kusimba kwekufunga kwangu.
Nokudaro, teererai imi pamwechete uye murege ndikuratidzei kunyangwe huchenjeri hwangu—huchenjeri hweuyo wamunoti ndiMwari vaEnoki, uye nehama dzake,

Avo vakapatsanurwa kubva munyika, uye vakagashirwa kwandiri—guta rakachengetedzwa kudakara zuva rekururama rauya—zuva raitsvagwa nevose varume vatsvene, uye havana kuriwana pamusana pehuipi nezvinyangadzo;
Uye vakareurura kuti vatorwa nevanamati pano panyika;
Asi vakawana chivimbiso chekuti vachariona uye vagoriwana munyama yavo.
Nokudaro, teererai ndigotaurirana nemi, uye ndigotaura kwamuri uye nokuporofita, sezvaiitwa nevanhu vekare.

Uye ndichazviratidza pachena sekuratidza kwandakariita kuvadzidzi vangu zvandakange ndimire pamberi pavo munyama, uye ndichitaura kwavari, ndichiti: Sezvo mandikumbira pamusana pezviratidzo zvekuuya kwangu, muzuva iro randichauya mukubwinya kwangu mumakore edenga, kuzadzikisa zvivimbiso zvandakaita kumadzibaba enyu,
Sezvo makatarisa kushaikwa kwemweya yenyu kwenguva refu isiri mumuviri yenyu, sehusungwa, ndichakuratidzai kuti richauya sei zuva rerununuro, uyewo nekudzorerwa pakare kweIsraeri yakapararira.
Uye zvino imi munoona temberi iyi iri muJerusarema, iyo yamunodaidza kuti imba yaMwari, uye vavengi venyu vanoti izvo imba iyi haife yakapunzika.
Asi, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuparadzwa kuchauya pachizvarwa chino sembavha husiku, uye vanhu ava vachaparadzwa uye vagopararira mumarudzi ose.
Uye iyi temberi yamuri kuona zvino ichapunzirwa pasi zvekuti hapana dombo richasara riri pamusoro perimwe.
Uye zvichaitika, kuti chizvarwa chino chemaJuda hachizopfuura kudakara kuparadzwa kwose kwandakutaurirai maererano navo kwapfuura.
Munoti munoziva kuti kuguma kwenyika kuri kuuya; munotiwo zvakare imi munoziva kuti matenga nenyika zvichapfuura;
Uye muneizvi munotaura chokwadi, nokuti ndizvo zvazviri; asi zvinhu zvandakutaurirai hazvizopfuura kudakara zvose zvazadzikiswa.
Uye izvi ndakutaurirai maererano neJerusarema; uye apo pachauya iroro zuva, chidimu chakasara chichaparadzirwa mukati memarudzi;
Asi vachaunganidzwa zvakare; asi vachagara vakadaro kudakara nguva yemaJentairi yazadzikiswa.

Uye muzuva iroro muchanzwikwa zvehondo uye nerunyerekupe rwehondo, uye pasi rose richave nyonga-nyonga, uye mwoyo yevanhu ichavakurira, uye vachati Kristu ari kunonoka kuuya kwake kudakara kuguma kwenyika.
Uye rudo rwevanhu rwuchagwamba kutonhora, uye huipi huchawanda.
Uye kana nguva yemaJentairi yapinda chiedza chichaita pakati pavo avo vagere murima, uye chichave kuzara kwevhangeri rangu;
Asi havarigashire; nokuti havaone chiedza, uye vanobvisa mwoyo yavo kwandiri pamusana pemirairo yevanhu.
Uye muchizvarwa ichocho nguva yemaJentairi ichazadzikiswa.
Uye kuchave kuine varume vakamira muchizvarwa ichocho, vasisazopfuure kudakara vaona shamhu huruhuru; nokuti chirwere chinoparadza chichafukidza nyika.
Asi vadzidzi vangu vachamira munzvimbo tsvene, uye vasingazobva; asi pakati pevakaipa, vanhu vachasimudza mazwi avo uye votuka Mwari vobva vafa.

Uye kuchave nekundengendeka kwenyika zvakare munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana, uye nokuparadzwa kwakawanda; zvakadaro vanhu vachaomesa mwoyo yavo kwandiri, uye vachatora munondo, vachirwisana, uye vachaurayana.
Uye zvino, apo ini Ishe ndakange ndabva kutaura mazwi aya kuvadzidzi vangu, vakanetsekana.
Uye ndakati kwavari: Musanetseke, nokuti, pachaitika zvose zvinhu izvi, muchazoziva kuti zvivimbiso zvakaitwa kwamuri zvichazadzikiswa.
Uye chiedza pachichatanga kuuya, zvichaita kwavari serungano rwemufananidzo uyu wandichakuratidzai—
Munotarisa mugoona miti yemikuyu, uye munoiona nemaziso enyu, uye munoti kana yave kutanga kupfumvura, uye mashizha ayo achiri matete, munoti zvino zhizha rave pedyo;
Kunyangwe saizvozvo ndizvo zvazvichange zvakaita muzuva iro ravachaona zvinhu zvose izvi, ndipo pavachaziva kuti nguva yave pedyo.
Uye zvichaitika kuti uyo anonditya achatarisira kuti zuva guru raIshe riuye, kunyangwe zviratidzo zvekuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu.
Uye vachaona zviratidzo nezvishamiso, nokuti zvicharatidzwa kumatenga kumusoro, uye nemunyika pasi.
Uye vachaona ropa, nemoto, uye nemhute yehutsi.
Uye zuva raIshe risati rauya, zuva richasvibiswa, uye mwedzi uchapindurwa kuita ropa, uye nyenyedzi dzichadonha kubva kudenga.
Uye vakasara vachaunganidzwa panzvimbo ino;
Uye ipapo vachanditsvaka, tarisai, ndichauya; uye vachandiona ndiri mumakore edenga, ndakashongedzwa simba uye nokubwinya kukuru; nengirozi dzose tsvene; uye asingazonditarisiri achadimburwa.
Asi ruoko rwaIshe rwusati rwawa, ngirozi icharidza hwamanda yayo, uye vatsvene vange vakarara vachauya kuzosangana neni mumakore.

Nokudaro, kana mange makarara murunyararo makaropafadzwa imi; nokuti sekundiona kwamuri kuita iye zvino uye nokuziva kuti ndini, kunyangwe saizvozvo muchauya kwandiri uye mweya yenyu ichararama, uye kununurwa kwenyu kuchakwaniswa; uye vatsvene vachauya kubva kumativi mana epasi.
Ipapo ruoko rwaIshe rwuchawira pamusoro pemarudzi.
Uye zvino Ishe vachaisa tsoka yavo pagomo rino, uye richatsemuka nepakati, uye nyika ichadedera, uye igovheya, uye kana matenga achazunguzukawo.
Uye Ishe vachataura izwi ravo, uye kumiganhu kwose kwenyika richanzwika; uye marudzi epasi achachema, uye avo vaiseka vachaona kukanganisa kwavo.
Uye nhamo ichaputira nyakushora, uye mutuki achaparadzwa; uye vakagarira kuipa vachatemwa vachikandwa mumoto.
Uye ipapo maJuda vachatarisa pandiri uye voti: Ko maronda aya ari mumaoko uye nemutsoka dzako ndeei?

Ipapo ndipo pavachaziva kuti ndini Ishe; nokuti ndichati kwavari: Maronda aya ndiwo maronda andakakuvadzwa nawo ndiri mumba meshamwari dzangu. Ndini iye akasimudzwa. Ndini Jesu akarovererwa. Ndini Mwanakomana waMwari.
Uye ipapo ndipo pavachachema nokuda kwekuipa kwavo; zvino ndipo pavachakungura nokuti vakatambudza mambo wavo.
Uye ndopachanunurwa marudzi evahedheni, uye avo vakanga vasingazive mutemo vachawana mukana mukumuka kuvakafa kwekutanga; uye zvichave zvirinani kwavari.
Uye Satani achasungwa, zvekuti haazowane nzvimbo mumwoyo yevana vevanhu.
Uye muzuva iroro randichauya ndiri mukubwinya kwangu, ndimo muchazadzikiswa rungano rwemufananidzo urwo rwandakataura pamusoro pemhandara dzine gumi.

Nokuti avo vakangwara uye vakagashira chokwadi, uye vakatora Mweya Mutsvene kuti uvatungamire, uye vasati vanyengedzwa—zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, havazotemwa uye vachikandwa mumoto, asi kuti vachagara muzuva iroro.
Uye nyika ichapihwa kwavari senhaka; uye vachapamhidzirwa uye vagowanda zvikuru, uye vana vachakura vasina chitadzo kuruponeso.
Nokuti Ishe vachave pakati pavo, uye kubwinya kwavo kuchave pavari, uye anenge ari mambo wavo uye nemupi wemutemo wavo.

Uye zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, hazvichapihwa kwamuri kuti muzive zvinopfuura izvi pamusoro pechitsauko chino, kudakara Testamente Itsva yadudzirwa, uye mairi zvose zvinhu izvi zvichaitwa kuti zvizivikanwe;
Nokudaro ndinopa kwamuri kuti zvino muchiidudzira, kuti mugadzirire zvinhu zvichauya.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvinhu zvikuru zvakakumirirai;
Munonzwa nezvehondo munyika dzevatorwa; asi tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, dziri pedyo, kunyangwe pamisiwo yenyu, uye kusina makore mazhinji kubvira zvino muchanzwa nezvehondo munyika menyu.

Nokudaro ini Ishe, ndakataura kuti unganai muchibva kunyika dziri kumabvazuva, unganidzanai imi pamwechete imi magosa echechi yangu; endai kunyika dzekumadokero, daidzirai kuvagari vemo kuti vatendeuke, maererano nokutendeuka kwavanenge vaita vakai machechi kwandiri.
Uye nemwoyo mumwechete nepfungwa imwechete, unganidzai upfumi hwenyu kuti mugotenga nhaka iyo yamuchapihwa pashure.
Uye ichazodaidzwa kunzi Jerusarema Idzva, nyika yerunyararo, guta rekupotera, nzvimbo isina chekutya yevatsvene vaMwari wePamusoro-soro;
Uye kubwinya kwaIshe kuchavepo, uye nokutyisa kwaIshe naikowo kuchavepo, zvekuti vakaipa havazouya kwairi, uye ichadaidzwa kunzi Zioni.
Uye zvichaitika pakati pevakaipa, kuti wose munhu asingazotora munondo wake kurwisa muvakidzani wake anotofanira kutizira kuZioni kuti apone.
Uye kuchaungana mairi vanobva kurudzi rwose rwose rwuri pasi pedenga; uye vachave vanhu chete vanenge vasina hondo pakati pavo.
Uye zvichanzi pakati pevakaipa: Ngatiregei kunorwa neZioni, nokuti vagari veMuZioni vanotyisa; nokudaro hatingamire.
Uye zvichaitika kuti vakarurama vachaunganidzwa vachibva mukati memarudzi ose, uye vachiuya kuZioni, vachiimba nziyo dzerufaro kusingaperi.

Uye zvino ndinoti kwamuri, chengetai zvinhu izvi kuti zvisapararire munyika kudakara zvafanira kwandiri, kuti mugoita basa iri pamberi pevanhu, uye nemumaziso evavengi venyu, kuti varege kuziva mabasa enyu kudakara maita icho chinhu chandakakurairai;
Kuti pavachazozviziva, kuti vagozvifunga zvinhu izvi.
Nokuti apo Ishe pavachaonekwa vachatyisa kwavari, zvekuti kutya kuchavabata, uye vachamirira kure uye vachibvunda.
Uye ose marudzi achatya nokuda kwekutyisa kwaIshe, uye nesimba ravo guru. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/46.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 46
chapter_summary: 1–2, Magosa vanofanira kutungamira michechi sekutungamirwa kwavanoitwa neMweya Mutsvene; 3–6, Vatsvagi vechokwadi havafanire kubviswa mumichechi yesakaramende; 7–12, Kumbirai kuna Mwari uye mutsvage zvipo zveMweya; 13–26, Kuverengwa kwezvimwe zvezvipo izvi kunopihwa; 27–33, Vatungamiri veChechi vanopihwa simba rekuona zvipo zveMweya.

verses.text: Teererai, imi vanhu vechechi yangu; nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri zvinhu izvi zvakataurwa kwamuri kuti zvikupundutsei nekukudzidzisai.

Asi kana dai zvazvo paine izvo zvinhu zvakanyorwa, zvagara zviri zvakapihwa kumagosa echechi yangu kubvira pakutanga, uye zvichagara zvakadaro, kutungamira michechi sekutungamirwa nokuratidzwa kwavanoitwa neMweya Mutsvene.
Zvisinei munorairwa kuti musazodzinga ani zvake panze pemichechi yenyu yeruzhinji, iyo inoitwa pamberi penyika.
Munorairwawo kuti musaburitse ani zvake wechechi mumisangano yenyu yesakaramende; zvakadaro, kana paine akanganisa, muitei kuti asadye sakaramende asati ayananiswa.
Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, hamuzobvisa ani zvake mumichechi yenyu yesakaramende anenge achitsvaga nemwoyo wake wose umambo—ndiri kutaura izvi maererano neavo vanenge vasiri vechechi.
Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, maererano nemichechi yenyu yekusimbisa, kuti paine mumwe asiri wechechi, ari kutsvaga nemwoyo wose umambo, musazovaburitse kunze.

Asi munorairwa muzvinhu zvose kuti, mukumbire kuna Mwari, vanopa vakasununguka; uye neicho chinhu chinopupurwa neMweya kwamuri kunyangwe saizvozvo ndinoti zviitei muhutsvene hwose hwemwoyo, muchifamba makatwasanuka pamberi pangu, muchifunga chinangwa cheruponeso rwenyu, muchiita zvose zvinhu nemunamato uye nekutenda, kuti musafurirwe nemweya yakaipa, kana dzidziso yaana dhiabhorosi, kana mirairo yevanhu; nokuti mimwe ndeye vanhu, uye mimwe ndeyaana dhiabhorosi.
Nokudaro, chenjerai potse munganyengedzwe; uye kuti musanyengedzwe tsvagai nemwoyo wose zvipo zvakanaka, nguva dzose muchirangarira kuti zvinopirwei;

Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvinopihwa kuti zvipundutse avo vanondida uye vanochengeta yose mirairo yangu, uye neuyo anotsvaga kuita saizvozvo; kuti vose vapundutswe vanonotsvaga kana vanobvunza kwandiri, avo vanobvunza kwandiri asi vasingakumbire chiratidzo chekuti vagodya muruchiva rwavo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, munofanira kurangarira nguva dzose, uye nguva dzose muzvichengete mupfungwa dzenyu kuti, zvipo izvo ndezvei, izvo zvinopihwa kuchechi.
Nokuti vose havazi kupihwa chose chipo; nokuti kune zvipo zvakawanda, uye kumunhu wose kunopihwa chipo neMweya waMwari.
Kune vamwe kunopihwa ichi, kune vamwe kunopihwa chimwe kuti vose vagopundutswa nokudaro.
Kune vamwe chinopihwa neMweya Mutsvene kuziva kuti Jesu Kristu ndiye Mwanakomana waMwari, uye nekuti akaroverwa zvitadzo zvenyika.
Kune vamwe kunopihwa kutenda kumazwi avo, kuti naivowo vagowana upenyu hwokusingaperi kana vakaramba vakatendeka.

Uye zvakare, kune vamwe chinopihwa neMweya Mutsvene kuziva kusiyana kwekutonga, sekufadza kwazvinoita Ishe vamwecheteyo, maererano nekuda kwaIshe zvichienderana netsitsi dzavo maererano nemamiriro evana vevanhu.
Uye zvakare, zvinopihwa kune vamwe neMweya Mutsvene kuziva kusiyana kwemashandiro kuti ndezvaMwari, kuti zviratidzo zveMweya zvive zvinopihwa kumunhu wose kuti apundutswe nazvo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kune vamwe kunopihwa neMweya waMwari, izwi reungwaru.
Kune mumwe kunopihwa izwi reruzivo, kuti vose vagodzidziswa kuti vangware nekuve neruzivo.
Uye zvakare, kune vamwe zvinopihwa kuti vave nerutendo rwekuti varapwe;
Uye kune vamwe vanopihwa kuti vave nerutendo rwekurapa.
Uye zvakare, kune vamwe kunopihwa kusevenza zvishamiso nesimba raMwari;
Uye kune vamwe kunopihwa kuporofita;
Uye kune vamwe kuziva nekupatsanurwa mweya.
Uye zvakare, zvinopihwa kune vamwe kutaura nendimi;
Uye kune vamwe kunopihwa kududzira ndimi.
Uye zvose zvipo izvi zvinobva kunaMwari, kuti zvipundutse vana vaMwari.

Uye nekuna bhishopi wechechi, uye nekune avo vachadomwa nekugadzwa naMwari kuti vatarise chechi uye nekuve magosa kuchechi, zvinopihwa kwavari kuziva nekupatsanura zvose zvipo izvozvo potse pangangove nevamwe pakati penyu vanonyepera, uye ivo vasiri vaMwari.
Uye zvichaitika kuti uyo anokumbira muMweya achagashira muMweya;
Kuti kune vamwe zvingangopihwa kuti vawane zvipo zvose izvo, kuti kuve nemutungamiri, kuitira kuti yose nhengo ipundutswe nazvo.
Uyo unokumbira muMweya anokumbira maererano nekuda kwaMwari; nokudaro zvinoitwa kana sekukumbira kwake.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, zvinhu zvose zvinofanira kuitwa muzita raKristu, chose icho chamunoita muMweya;
Uye munofanira kutenda kuna Mwari muMweya maropafadzo ose zvawo amunoropafadzwa nawo.
Uye munofanira kuteedza hunhu uye nehutsvene pamberi pangu nguva dzose. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/47.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 47
chapter_summary: 1–4, John Whitmer anosarudzwa kuti achengete nhoroondo dzeChechi uye nekunyorera Muporofita.

verses.text: Tarisai, zvakafanira kwandiri kuti muranda wangu John anofanira kunyora uye nekuchengeta nhoroondo nguva dzose, uye nokukuyamura iwe, muranda wangu Joseph, nekunyora zvose zvinhu zvauchapihwa, kudakara adaidzwa kune mamwe mabasa.
Zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, anogona kusimudzawo izwi rake mumichechi, pose pazvinenge zvakakodzera.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwauri zvichapihwa kwaari kuti achengete zvinyorwa zvechechi nenhoroondo nguva dzose; nokuti Oliver Cowdery ndamudomesa kune chimwe chinzvimbo.
Nokudaro, zvichapihwa kwaari, kana ari akatendeka, neMweya Munyaradzi, kuti anyore zvinhu izvi. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/48.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 48
chapter_summary: 1–3, Vatendi vari muOhio vanofanira kugarisana munzvimbo dzavo nehama dzavo; 4–6, Vatendi vanofanira kutenga nzvimbo, vovaka guta, uye votevedza kuraira kwevatungamiri vavo.

verses.text: Zvinofanira kuti murambe mugare kwenguva ino munzvimbo dzenyu dzamugere, sezvo zviri zvinoenderana nezvamuri.
Uye muine nzvimbo, muchadzipa kuhama dzekumabvazuva;
Uye kana musina nzvimbo, regai vatenge kwenguva ino mumatunhu ayo akatenderedza, sezvinovanakira, nokuti zvakafanira kuti vave nenzvimbo dzekugara iye zvino.
Zvinodiwa kuti zvive zvakafanira kuti muchengete mari yamunokwanisa, nekuti muwane zvose zvamunogona mukururama, kuitira kuti nenguva muchaitwa kuti mukwanise kutenga nzvimbo yenhaka, kunyangwe guta.

Nzvimbo haisati yave kutaurwa; asi mushure mekunge hama dzenyu dzabva kumabvazuva kuchave nevamwe varume vachadomwa, kwavari ivavo kuchapihwa kuti vazive nzvimbo yacho, kana kuti kwavari icharatidzwa.

Uye vachadomwa kuti vatenge nzvimbo, uye nekuti vatange kuisa hwaro hweguta; uye ipapo ndipo pamuchatanga kuunganidzwa nemhuri dzenyu, wose munhu maererano nemhuri yake, maererano nezvaari, uye sezvaanenge apihwa nevatungamiri uye nabhishopi wechechi, maererano nemitemo nerairo yamagashira, uye neyamuchatambira mushure mazvino. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 49
chapter_summary: 1–7, Zuva nenguva yekuuya kwaKristu zvichagara zvisina anoziva kudakara auya; 8–14, Vanhu vakafanira kutendeuka, vatende vhangeri, uye vagoteerera zvisungo kuti vawane ruponeso; 15–16, Roorano yakagadzwa naMwari; 17–21, Kudya nyama kwakabvumirwa; 22–28, Zioni ichabudirira uye maRamani agotumbuka seruva Kuuya Kwechipiri kusati kwaitika.

verses.text: Teererai kuzwi rangu, varanda vangu Sidney, naParley, naLeman; nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai murairo wekuti muchaenda munoparidza vhangeri rangu iro ramakagashira imi, kunyangwe sekutambira kwamakariita, kumaShakers.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, vanoda kuziva chokwadi muchidimbu, kwete chose, nokuti havana kunaka pamberi pangu uye vanofanira kuti vatendeuke.
Nokudaro, ndinokutumai, imi varanda vangu Sidney naParley, kuti muparidze vhangeri kwavari.

Uye muranda wangu Leman achagadzwa kuita basa iri, kuti agotaura navo, kwete maererano nezvaakagashira kwavari, asi maererano neicho chaachadzidziswa nemi varanda vangu; uye mukudaro ndichamuropafadza, kunze kwezvo haangazobudirira.

Ndiko kutaura kwaIshe; nokuti ndiri Mwari, uye ndatumira wangu Mumwechete Mwanakomana Akaberekwa munyika kurudzikinuro rwenyika, uye ndikataura kuti uyo achamugashira achaponeswa, uye asingamugashire acharaswa—

Uye vakaita kuMwanakomana weMunhu kunyangwe sezvakanyorwa; uye akatora simba rake kurudyi rwekubwinya kwake, uye zvino ari kutonga ari kumatenga, uye achatonga dakara adzika panyika kuzoisa vose vavengi pasi petsoka dzake, iri nguva yave pedyo—
Ini Ishe Mwari, ndazvitaura; asi nguva nezuva hakuna munhu anoziva, kana ngirozi dziri kudenga, hadzizoziva dakara auya.
Nokudaro, ndinoda kuti vose vanhu vatendeuke, nokuti vose vari pasi pechitadzo, kunze kweavo vandakazvichengetera ini, varume vatsvene vamusingazive.
Nokudaro, ndinoti kwamuri ndatumira kwamuri chibvumirano changu chisingaperi, kunyangwe icho chaivepo kubvira pakutanga.

Uye icho chandakavimbisa ndakachizadzikisa, uye marudzi enyika vachachikotamira; uye, kana vasingazviite pachavo, vachadzika pasi, nokuti icho chakazvikwiridzira pachezvacho iye zvino chichaiswa pasi nesimba.
Nokudaro, ndinokupai murairo kuti muyende mukati mevanhu ava, uye muti kwavari, semupostora wangu wekare, zita rake ainzi Petro:
Tendai kuzita raIshe Jesu, akange ari munyika, uye achauya, wekutanga nokupedzisira;
Tendeukai uye mubhabhatidzwe muzita raJesu Kristu, maererano nemurairo mutsvene, kuti muregererwe zvitadzo;
Uye uyo ani zvake achaita izvi achagashira chipo cheMweya Mutsvene, nokugadzwa maoko nemagosa echechi.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uyo ani zvake anorambidza kuroorana haasi waMwari; nokuti kuroorana kwakamiswa naMwari kumunhu.
Nokudaro, zviri mumutemo kuti murume anofanira kuve nemukadzi mumwechete, uye ivo vaviri vachave nyama imwechete, uye izvi kuitira kuti nyika izadzikise mhedziso yekusikwa kwayo;
Uye nokuti izadzwe nehuwandu hwevanhu, maererano nekusika kwake nyika isati yaitwa.
Uye ani zvake anorambidza kusadya nyama, munhu iyeyo haafanire naiye kuidya, haasi waMwari;
Nokuti tarisai, mhuka dzesango neshiri dzedenga, uye zvinouya nenyika, zvakaitirwa kushandiswa nemunhu sekudya uye nezvipfeko, uye nekuti azviwane zvakawanda.
Asi hazvina kupihwa kuti munhu mumwechete ave nezvakapfuura zvemumwe, nokudaro nyika irere muchitadzo.
Uye nhamo kune uyo munhu anodeura ropa kana anoparadza nyama zvisina kufanira.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti Mwanakomana weMunhu haauye nechimiro chemunhukadzi, kana chemurume ari kufamba panyika.

Nokudaro, musanyengedzwe, asi rambai makashinga, muchitarisira kuzunzwa kwematenga, uye nenyika kuti idedere uye nokuvheya semunhu akadhakwa, uye nhika dzichikwidziridzwa, uye makomo achidzikiswa, uye nzvimbo dzine man’a dzichiitwa sedzakakwenenzverwa—uye zvose izvi zvichaitika apo ngirozi icharidza hwamanda yayo.
Asi zuva guru raIshe risati rauya, Jakobo achabudirira murenje, uye maRamani achatumbuka seruva.
Zioni ichabudirira pazvikomo uye nokufara pamakomo, uye ichaunganidzwa pamwechete panzvimbo yandakadoma.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, endai sekukurairai kwandakuitai; tendeukai kuzvitadzo zvenyu zvose; kumbirai uye muchagashira; gogodzai uye richazarurwa kwamuri.
Tarisai, ndichaenda pamberi penyu uye ndigokudzivirai mushure; uye ndichave pakati penyu, uye imi hamuzokoneswa.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, uye ndinouya nokukurumidza. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 50
chapter_summary: 1–5, Mweya mizhinji yenhema iriko kunze uko munyika; 6–9, Nhamo kuvanyengedzi uye nekune avo vakabviswa muChechi; 10–14, Magosa vanofanira kuparidza vhangeri neMweya; 15–22, Vose, vaparidzi nevanonzwa vanofanira kujekeserwa neMweya; 23–25, Icho chisingajekese hachisi chaMwari; 26–28, Vakatendeka ndivo varidzi vezvinhu zvose; 29–36, Minamato yevakacheneswa inopindurwa; 37–46, Kristu ndiye Mufudzi Akanaka uye Dombo reIsraeri.

verses.text: Teererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, uye mupe nzeve kuizwi raMwari mupenyu; uye muteerere kumazwi eungwaru ayo achapihwa kwamuri, maererano nokukumbira kwamaita uye muchitenderana muzvinhu zvechechi, uye nemweya yakapararira munyika.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kune mweya mizhinji iyo iri mweya yenhema, iyo yaenda mberi munyika, ichinyengedza nyika.
Uyewo kana Satani atsvagawo kukunyengedzai, kuti agokurasai.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndakatarisa pamuri, uye ndikaona zvinyangadzo muchechi iyo rinokambira zita rangu.
Asi vakaropafadzwa avo vakatendeka uye vachishingirira, muupenyu kana murufu, nokuti vachagara nhaka yeupenyu hwokusingaperi.
Asi nhamo kwavari avo vanyengedzi nevanonyepera, nokuti, ndikokutaura kwaIshe, ndichavaunza mukutongwa.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, mune vanyengedzi mukati menyu, avo vakatonyengedza vamwe, izvo zvakapa muvengi simba; asi tarisai vakadaro vachadzorwa;
Asi vanyengedzi vachaonekwa uye vagobviswa, kana muupenyu kana murufu, kunyangwe sekuda kwangu; uye nhamo kwavari avo vakabviswa muchechi yangu, nokuti vamwechetevo ndivo vakakundwa nenyika.
Nokudaro, wose munhu ngaachenjerere potse icho chisiri muchokwadi uye nomukururama pamberi pangu.
Uye zvino chiuyai, vanodaro Ishe, neMweya, kumagosa echechi yavo, uye regai titaurirane tiri pamwechete, kuti mugonzwisisa;
Ngatitauriranei kunyangwe semurume ari kutaurirana nemumwe vakatarisana zviso.
Zvino, kana munhu akataura anonzwikwa nemunhu, nokuti anokurukura semunhu; kunyangwe neni ndozvandichaita ini Ishe, kukurukura nemi kuti munzwisise.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe ndinokubvunzai mubvunzo uyu—makagadzwa kuti mudii?
Kuti muparidze vhangeri rangu neMweya, kunyangwe Mweya Munyaradzi uyo wakatumirwa kuzoparidza chokwadi.
Uye ndokubva magashira mweya yamusina kunzwisisa, uye mukaigashirwa seyaMwari; uye mune izvi makanatsa here?
Tarisai muchapindura mubvunzo uyu imi pachenyu; zvakadaro, ndichakunzwirai tsitsi; uyo asina kusimba pakati penyu mushure achaitwa kuti asimbe.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uyo akagadzwa neni uye akatumirwa kuti aparidze shoko rechokwadi naMunyaradzi, muMweya wechokwadi, haanoparidza here neMweya wechokwadi kana neimwe nzira?
Uye kana zviri neimwe nzira hazvisi zvaMwari.
Uye zvakare, uyo anogashira shoko rechokwadi, haanorigashira neMweya wechokwadi here kana neimwe nzira?
Kana zviri zveimwe nzira hazvisi zvaMwari.
Nokudaro, sei musingagone kunzwisisa uye nokuziva, kuti uyo anogashira shoko neMweya wechokwadi anorigashira sekuparidzwa kwarinoitwa neMweya wechokwadi?
Nokudaro, uyo anoparidza uye neuyo anogashira, vanonzwisisana, uye vose vanosimudzirwa uye vachifara pamwechete.
Uye icho chisingasimudzire hachisi chaMwari, uye irima.
Icho chinenge chiri chaMwari chiedza; uye uyo anogashira chiedza, uye achiramba ari munaMwari, anogashira chiedza chakawedzerwa; uye chiedza ichocho chinokura mukuchena kudakara zuva rakwana.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinozvitaura kuti mungazive chokwadi, kuti mungadzinge rima kuti ribve pakati penyu;
Uyo akagadzwa naMwari uye akatumwa, iyeyo akadomwa kuti ave mukuru pane vose, zvisinei iye ndiye wekupedzisira uye ari muranda wevose.
Nokudaro, ndiye ane zvinhu zvose, nokuti zvose zvinhu zvinotongwa naye, kwose kudenga nepasi, upenyu nechiedza, Mweya nesimba, zvakatumwa nekuda kwaBaba kuburikidza naJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana wavo.
Asi hakuna munhu ane zvinhu zvose kunze kwekunge acheneswa uye asukwa kubva muzvitadzo zvose.
Uye kana muri macheneswa uye masukwa kubva kuzvitadzo zvose, muchakumbira chose chamunoda muzita raJesu uye chigoitwa.
Asi zivai izvi, zvichapihwa kwamuri zvamuchakumbira; uye zvamakadomerwa kuhutungamiri, mweya ichave pasi penyu.

Nokudaro, zvichaitika, kuti kana mukaona mweya waratidzwa wamusingagone kunzwisisa, uye morega kuugashira mweya iwoyo, muchakumbira kuna Baba muzita raJesu; uye kana vakasakupai mweya iwoyo, ndipo munobva maziva kuti hausi waMwari.
Uye zvichapihwa kwamuri, simba pamusoro pemweya iwowo; uye muchataura muchirwisa mweya iwoyo nezwi guru kuti hauzi waMwari—
Kwete kutuka nekutsvagira mhosva, kuti musakurirwe, kana nekuzvikudza kana nemafaro, potse mungabatwe nazvo.
Uyo anogashira kuna Mwari, regai azive kuti ndezva Mwari; uye regai afare kuti anoonekwa naMwari akakodzera kugashira.
Uye nokuzvitevedzera nekuzviita zvinhu izvi zvamakagashira, uye nezvamuchagashira pashure—uye neumambo hunopihwa kwamuri naBaba, nesimba rekukunda zvose zvinhu zvisina kugadzwa navo—
Uye tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, makaropafadzwa imi muri kunzwa zvino mazwi angu aya, achibva mumuromo wemuranda wangu, nokuti zvitadzo zvenyu mazviregererwa.
Regai muranda wangu Joseph Wakefield, uyo anondifadza zvikuru, uye nemuranda wangu Parley P. Pratt vaende mukati memachechi uye vachivasimbisa neshoko rekurudziro;

Uye nemuranda wanguwo John Corrill, kana sekuwanda kwakaita varanda vangu vakagadzwa mubasa rino, uye regai vashande mumunda wemizambiringa; uye pasave nemumhu anovarambidza kuita izvozvo zvandakadoma kwavari—
Nokudaro, muchinhu ichi muranda wangu Edward Partridge haarevererwe; zvisinei regai atendeuke uye acharegererwa.
Tarisai, muri vana vadiki uye hamungakwanise kutakura zvose zvinhu zvino; makafanira kukura munyasha uye nemuruzivo rwechokwadi.
Musatye, vana vadiki, nokuti muri vangu, uye ini ndakunda nyika, uye muri vamwe veavo vandakapihwa naBaba vangu;
Uye hakuna mumwe wevandakapihwa naBaba vangu acharasika.
Uye Baba neni tiri vamwechete. Ndiri munaBaba uye Baba vari mandiri; sekundigashira kwamakaita, imi muri mandiri uye ini ndiri mamuri.
Nokudaro, ndiri pakati penyu, uye ndini mufudzi akanaka, uye nedombo raIsraeri. Uyo anovaka padombo iri haafe akapunzika.
Uye zuva riri kuuya rekuti muchanzwa izwi rangu uye mondiona, uye moziva kuti ndini.
Garirai, naizvozvo kuti muve makagadzirira. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/51.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 51
chapter_summary: 1–8, Edward Partridge akadomwa kuti atonge hutariri nemidziyo; 9–12, Vatendi vanofanira kuuita zvakavimbika uye vachitambira zvimwechetezvo; 13–15, Vanofanira kuve nemba yekuchengetera yabhishopi nekuronga midziyo maererano nemutemo waIshe; 16–20, Ohio ichave nzvimbo yekumbofanoungana.

verses.text: Teererai kwandiri, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, uye ndichataura kumuranda wangu Edward Partridge, ndigomupa zvekutevedza; nokuti zvakafanira kuti agashire zvekutevedza mukuronga vanhu ava.
Nokuti zvakafanira kuti varongwe maererano nemitemo yangu; kana zvikasadaro, vanodimburwa.

Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Edward Partridge, neavo vaakasarudza, avo vanondifadza zvikuru, vadome kuvanhu ava nzvimbo dzavo, wose munhu zvakaenzana, maererano nemhuri yake, maererano nezvaari nezvaanoda nezvaanoshaya.

Uye regai muranda wangu Edward Partridge, paadoma kumunhu nzvimbo yake, amupe gwaro rinosunga nzvimbo iyoyo seyake, kuti achaibata, kunyange kodzero iyi nenhaka iyi muchechi, kudakara atadza uye asisaverengwe seakakodzera nezwi rechechi, maererano nemitemo nezvibvumirano zvechechi, kuti ave wechechi.

Kana akatadza nekusaverengwa seakakodzera kuti ave muchechi, haazove nesimba rekutora nzvimbo iya yaakatsaurira kunabhishopi kuitira varombo nevanoshaya vechechi vangu; naizvozvo haazoramba aine chipo ichocho, asi achasara nenzvimbo iyo chete yaaine gwaro nayo.
Uye naizvozvo zvose zvinhu zvichaitwa muchokwadi, maererano nemitemo yenyika.
Uye regai izvo zviri zvevanhu ava zvidomerwe kuvanhu ivava.
Uye mari inenge yasara kuvanhu ava—ngakuve nemumiririri anodomwa kuvanhu ava, kuti atore mari yacho kuti avape kudya nezvipfeko, maererano nezvinodiwa nevanhu ava.
Uye munhu newose ashande zvakavimbika, uye ave akafanana nevanhu ava, uye agashire zvakafanana kuti muve vamwe, kunyangwe sekukurairai kwandaita.
Uye itai kuti icho chevanhu vano chisatorwe chichinopihwa kuvanhu vekune imwe chechi.
Nokudaro, kana imwe chechi ikatambira mari yechechi ino, regai vaibhadhare kuchechi ino zvakare maererano nezvichabvumiranwa;
Uye izvi zvichaitwa kuburikidza nabhishopi kana akaitwa mumiririri, uyo achadomwa nezwi rechechi.
Uye zvakare, regai bhishopi adome imba yekuchengetera yechechi iyi; regai zvinhu zvose mumari kana munyama, zvakawanda kupfuura zvinodiwa nevanhu ava, zvichengetwe zviri mumaoko abhishopi.
Uye regaiwo azvichengetere zvaanoda iye pachake, uye nezvinodiwa nemhuri yake, sezvo achange akapinzwa basa kuti aite basa iri.
Saizvozvo ndinopa kuvanhu ava mukana wekuzvirongera pachavo maererano nemitemo yangu.
Uye ndinovapira nyika ino kwemwaka mupfupi, kudakara ini Ishe, ndazovapa nepamwe, nekuraira kuti, vaende ikoko;
Uye nguva nezuva hazvina kupihwa kwavari, nokudaro regai vashande pane ino nzvimbo sevaripo kwemakore, zvichatendeuka kwavari kuvanakira.
Tarisai, uyu uchave mufananidzo kumuranda wangu Edward Partridge, mune dzimwe nzvimbo, mumachechi ose.
Uye ani zvake anowanikwa akatendeka, akarurama, ari mutariri akangwara achapinda mukufara kwaIshe vake, uye achawana nhaka yeupenyu hwokusingaperi.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, ndini Jesu Kristu, uyu anouya nokukurumidza, munguva yamusingafungire. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/52.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 52
chapter_summary: 1–2, Muchechi unotevera zvakamiswa kuti uitirwe kuMissouri; 3–8, Kudomwa kwemamwe magosa kuti vafambe pamwechete kwakaitwa; 9–11, Magosa anofanira kudzidzisa izvo zvakanyorwa navaapositori nevaporofita; 12–21, Avo vakajekeserwa neMweya vanounza michero yekurumbidza neungwaru; 22–44, Magosa akasiyana-siyana anodomwa kuti aende achiparidza vhangeri vachifamba kuenda kuMissouri kumuchechi.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndizvo zvinotaura Ishe kumagosa ayo avadaidza uye vakasarudza mumazuva ano ekupedzisira, nezwi reMweya wavo—

Uchiti: Ini Ishe ndichaita kuti muzvizive zvandinoda kuti muite kubvira panguva ino kusvika pamuchechi unotevera, uyo uchaitirwa muMissouri, panyika iyo yandapira kuvanhu vangu, avo vakasara vaJakobo, neavo vagari venhaka maererano nechibvumirano.

Nokudaro, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai varanda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon vatore rwendo rwavo panokwanisika kugadzirirwa zvinhu zvekuti vasiye dzimba dzavo, vaende kunyika yeMissouri.
Uye sekutendeka kwavo kwandiri, zvichaitwa kuti zvizivikanwe kwavari kuti vachaitei;
Zvichaitawo, sekutendeka, kuti zvizivikanwe kwavari nyika yenhaka yenyu.
Uye kana vakasava vakatendeka, vachabviswa, kunyangwe sekuda kwandinoita, sezvakandinakira.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Lyman Wight nemuranda wangu John Corrill vaende rwendo rwavo nokukurumidza;
Uye nemuranda wanguwo John Murdock, nemuranda wangu Hyrum Smith, vatore rwendo rwavo vaende kunzvimbo imwecheteyo nenzira yekuDetroit.

Uye regai vafambe kubvira ikoko vachiparidza izwi munzira, vasina chimwe chavanotaura kunze kweizvo zvakanyorwa nevaporofita nevaapositori, nezvavakadzidziswa neMweya Munyaradzi kuburikidza nemunamato werutendo.
Regai vaende vari vaviri vaviri, uye zvakadaro regai vaparidze munzira kumakungano ose, vachibhabhatidza nemvura, nekugadza maoko vari murutivi memvura.
Nokuti vanodaro Ishe, ndichadimburira basa rangu mukururama, nokuti mazuva ari kuuya ayo ndichatumira kutonga muhukundi.
Uye regai muranda wangu Lyman Wight achenjere, nokuti Satani ari kuda kumusefa sehundi.
Uye tarisai, uyo anotendeka achaitwa mutongi wezvinhu zvakawanda.
Uye zvakare, ndichakupai zvekutevedza muzvinhu zvose, kuti musazonyengedzwa; nokuti Satani ari kwose munyika, uye anoenda achinyengedza marudzi—
Nokudaro uyo anonamata, uyo ane mweya wakazvirereka, mumwecheteyo anotambirwa neni kana akateerera zvisungo zvangu.
Uyo anotaura, ane mweya wokuzvirereka, ane mutauro wakanyorova uye unosimudzira, mumwecheteyo ndewaMwari kana akateerera zvisungo zvangu.
Uye zvakare, uyo anobvunda pasi pesimba rangu achasimbiswa, uye achaunza michero yekurumbidza neungwaru, maererano nezvakazarurwa nechokwadi chandakakupai.
Uye zvakare, uyo anokurirwa uye otadza kuunza michero, kunyange maererano nechiratidzo ichi, haasi wangu.
Nokudaro, netsika iyi muchaziva yose mweya muzvinhu zvose pasi pematenga ose.
Uye mazuva anouya; maererano nerutendo rwevanhu zvichaitwa kwavari.
Tarisai, murairo uyu unopihwa kumagosa ose andasarudza.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Thomas B. Marsh nemuranda wangu Ezra Thayre vaende rwendo rwavowo, vachiparidza shoko munzira kuenda kunyika imwecheteyo.
Uye zvakare, regai muranda wangu Isaac Morley nemuranda wangu Ezra Booth vatore rwendo rwavo, naivowo vachiparidza izwi munzira kuenda kunyika imwecheteyo.
Uye zvakare, regai varanda vangu Edward Partridge naMartin Harris vaende rwendo rwavo nevaranda vangu Sidney Rigdon naJoseph Smith, Mwana.
Regai varanda vangu David Whitmer naHarvey Whitlock vatorewo rwendo rwavo, uye vaparidze munzira vachienda kunzvimbo imwecheteyo.
Uye regai varanda vangu Parley P. Pratt naOrson Pratt vaende rwendo rwavo, uye vaparidze munzira, kuenda kune nyika imwecheteyo.
Uye regai varanda vangu Solomon Hancock naSimeon Carter naivowo vaende rwendo rwavo kunyika imwechete iyoyi, uye vaparidze vari munzira.
Regai varanda vangu Edson Fuller naJacob Scott naivowo vaende rwendo rwavo.
Regai varanda vangu Levi W. Hancock naZebedee Coltrin naivowo vaende rwendo rwavo.
Regai varanda vangu Reynolds Cahoon na Samuel H. Smith naivowo vaende rwendo rwavo.
Regai varanda vangu Wheeler Baldwin naWilliam Carter naivowo vaende rwendo rwavo.
Uye murege varanda vangu Newel Knight naSelah J. Griffin vose vagadzwe uye, naivowo vatore rwendo rwavo.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo ndinoti, regai vose ava vaende nzendo dzavo kunzvimbo imwechete, munzira dzavo dzakawanda, uye hakuna munhu mumwechete achavakira pahwaro hwemumwe, kana kufamba gwara remumwe.
Uyo akatendeka, mumwecheteyo achachengetwa uye nokuropafadzwa nemichero yakawanda.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, regai varanda vangu Joseph Wakefield naSolomon Humphrey vaende rwendo rwavo kunyika dziri kumabvazuva;
Regai vashande nemhuri dzavo, pasina chimwe chavanotaura kunze kweizvo zvevaporofita nevaapositori, izvo zvavakaona nezvavakanzwa neizvo zvavanotenda mazviri zvizere, kuti huporofita huzadzikiswe.
Pamusana pekutadza, regai izvo zvakaiswa pana Heman Basset azvitorerwe kubva kwaari, uye zviiswe pamusoro paSimonds Ryder.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai Jared Carter agadzwe semupirisita uye naGeorge James zvakare agadzwe semupirisita.
Regai vasara vemagosa vachengete chechi, uye vataure shoko kumatunhu akavatenderedza; uye murege vashande nemaoko avo kuti parege kuva nekunamatwa kwezvifananidzo kana kuitwa kwezvakaipa.
Uye murangarire muzvinhu zvose varombo nevanoshaya, varwere nevanonetsekana, nokuti uyo asingaite zvinhu izvi, haazi mudzidzi wangu.
Uye zvakare, regai varanda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon naEdward Partridge vatore gwaro rekuvasuma kubva kuchechi. Uye regai pave nerimwe rinotorerwawo muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery.
Uye zvakadaro, kunyangwe sezvandakataura, kana muri makatendeka muchaungana pamwechete kuti mufare pamusoro penyika yeMissouri iyo iri nyika yenhaka yenyu, iri parizvino nyika yevavengi venyu.
Asi tarisai, ini Ishe, ndichakurumidzisa kuvakwa kweguta munguva yaro, uye ndigopfekedza korona kune vane rutendo nerufaro uye nokupemberera.
Tarisai, ndini Jesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari, uye ndichavasimudza muzuva rekupedzisira. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/53.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 53
chapter_summary: 1–3, Sidney Gilbert, kudaidzwa nekudomwa kwake muChechi kuti agadzwe segosa; 4–7, Achavewo achashanda semumiriri wabhishopi.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwauri muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert, kuti ndanzwa minamato yako; uye wakandikumbira kuti zviitwe kuti zvizivikanwe kwauri, naIshe Mwari vako, maererano nekudaidzwa nekudomwa muchechi, iro ini Ishe, ndasimudza mumazuva ano ekupedzisira.
Tarisai ini Ishe, uyo akaroverwa zvitadzo zvenyu zvenyika, ndinokupa murairo wekuti usiye zvenyika.
Tora pauri kugadza kwangu, kunyangwe uko kwegosa, kuparidza rutendo nekutendeuka nekuregererwa kwezvitadzo, maererano neshoko rangu, uye nokugashirwa kweMweya Mutsvene nekugadzwa maoko;
Uye zvakare kuve mumiriri wechechi munzvimbo ichadomwa nabhishopi, maererano nemirairo ichapiwa mushure.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, uchaenda rwendo rwako nevaranda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon.
Tarisai, izvi ndizvo zvisungo zvekutanga zvauchagashira; uye zvasara zvichaziviswa munguva ichauya, maererano nekushanda kwako mumunda wangu wemizambiringa.
Uye zvakare, ndingade kuti udzidze kuti iyeyo chete ndiye achaponeswa, anoshingirira kusvika kumagumo. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/54.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 54
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vatendi vanofanira kuchengeta chibvumirano chevhangeri kuti vawane tsitsi; 7–10, Vanofanira kuve nemwoyo murefu mumatambudziko.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe, kunyangwe Arfa naOmega, kutanga nokuguma, kunyangwe ivo vakaroverwa pamusana pezvivi zvenyika—
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, muranda wangu Newel Knight, uchamira wakasimba muchinzvimbo icho chandakakudomera.
Uye kana hama dzako dzichida kupunyuka kuvavengi vadzo, regai vatendeuke kuzvitadzo zvose zvavo, uye vave vakazvininipisa zvechokwadi pamberi pangu uye vakazvirereka kwazvo.
Uye sezvo chibvumirano chavakaita kwandiri chakatyorwa, kunyangwe saizvozvo chave chakapfudzwa chisisina simba.
Uye nhamo kwaari uyo anounza mhosva iyi, nokuti zvaitove nani kwaari dai akanga anyura muhudzame hwegungwa.
Asi vakaropafadzwa avo vakachengeta chibvumirano uye vakateerera murairo, nokuti vachawana tsitsi.
Nokudaro, endai zvino mutize nyika, potse vavengi venyu vangauye pamuri; uye endai rwendo rwenyu, mudome uyo wamunoda kuti ave mutungamiri wenyu, uye anokukubvisirai mari dzenyu.
Uye zvakadaro, muchatora rwendo rwenyu muchienda kumatunhu ekumadokero, kusvika kunyika yeMissouri, kumiganhu yemaRamani.
Uye mushure mekunge mapedza rwendo, tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, tsvagaiwo zvekurarama nazvo sevarume, kudakara ndakugadzirirai nzvimbo.

Uye zvakare, ivai nemwoyo murefu mumatambudziko kudakara ndauya; uye, tarisai, ndinouya nokukurumidza, uye mubairo wangu uneni, uye avo vakakasika kunditsvaga vachawana zororo kumweya yavo. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/55.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 55
chapter_summary: 1–3, W. W. Phelps anodaidzwa nekusarudzwa kuti abhabhatidzwe, kuti agadzwe hugosa, uye kuti aparidze vhangeri; 4, Anofanira kunyora mabhuku evana vari kuzvikoro zveChechi; 5–6, Anofanira kufamba kuenda kuMissouri, iro richave dunhu rebasa rake.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe kwauri, iwe muranda wangu William, hongu, kunyangwe Ishe vepasi rose, iwe wadaidzwa uye ukasarudzwa; mushure mekunge wabhabhatidzwa nemvura, izvo kana ukazviita neziso rakanangana chete nekubwinya kwangu, uchawana kuregererwa kwezvitadzo zvako uye nokugashira Mweya Mutsvene nekugadzwa maoko;

Uye ipapo uchagadzwa neruoko rwemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, kuti uve gosa muchechi ino, kuti uparidze kutendeuka nekuregererwa kwezvitadzo nenzira yekubhabhatidzwa muzita raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana waMwari vapenyu.
Uye panaani zvake wauchaisa maoko, kana vakazvirereka pamberi pangu, uchave nesimba rekupa Mweya Mutsvene.

Uye zvakare, uchagadzwa kuti ugoyamura muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery kuita basa rekudhinda, uye nokusarudza nokunyora mabhuku ezvikoro zviri muchechi ino, kuti vana vadiki naivowo vagashire rairo pamberi pangu sezvinondifadza ini.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, pamusana pechikonzero ichi uchatora rwendo rwako nevaranda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon, kuti mudyarwe munyika yenhaka kuti muite basa iri.
Uye zvakare, regai muranda wangu Joseph Coe naiyewo aende rwendo rwake navo. Zvasara zvichaitwa kuti zviziviswe pashure, kunyangwe sekuda kwangu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/56.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 56
chapter_summary: 1–2, Vatendi vanofanira kutora muchinjikwa wavo uye vatevere Ishe kuti vawane ruponeso; 3–13, Ishe vanoraira uye vachidzora, uye vasingateerere vanoraswa; 14–17, Nhamo kune vapfumi vasingade kuyamura varombo, uye nhamo kune varombo vane mwoyo isina kutyoka; 18–20, Vakaropafadzwa varombo vakachena mumwoyo, nokuti vachawana nhaka yenyika.

verses.text: Teererai, imi vanhu munotaura zita rangu, vanodaro Mwari venyu; nokuti tarisai, hasha dzangu dzatungidzwa pamusoro pevapanduki, uye vachaziva ruoko rwangu uye nekugumbuka kwangu, muzuva rekushanyirwa nerehasha kumarudzi.
Uye uyo asingazotora muchinjikwa wake, nekunditevera uye nekuchengeta mirairo yangu, iyeyo haazoponeswa.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndinoraira; uye uyo asingazoteerera, achazodimburwa achibviswa kana nguva yangu ini, yakakwana, mushure mekunge ndaraira uye murairo watyorwa.
Nokudaro ini Ishe, ndinoraira nekudzora, zvinenge zvichiratidzika kwandiri kuti zvakanaka; uye zvose izvi zvichapindurirwa pamisoro yevapanduki, vanodaro Ishe.

Nokudaro, ndinodzora murairo wakapihwa kuvaranda vangu Thomas B. Marsh naEzra Thayre, uye ndopa murairo mutsva kumuranda wangu Thomas, kuti achaenda rwendo rwake nokukurumidza kuenda kunyika ye Missouri, uye nemuranda wangu Selah J. Griffin naiyewo achaenda naye.
Nokuti tarisai, ndinodzora murairo wakanga wapihwa kuvaranda vangu Selah J. Griffin uye naNewel Knight, pamusana pekuomesa mutsipa kwevanhu vangu vari muThompson, uye nokupanduka kwavo.
Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Newel Knight arambe ainavo; uye vose vanoda kuenda ngavaende, avo vakazvirereka pamberi pangu, uye vatungamirwe naye kunyika yandakadoma.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti muranda wangu Ezra Thayre anofanira kutendeuka pakuzvikudza kwake, uye nohundingoveni hwake uye ateerere kumurairo wekare uyo wandakamupa maererano nenzvimbo yaanogara.
Uye kana akaita izvi, sezvo pasina kupatsanurwa kuchaitwa munyika umu, achadomwa zvakare kuti aende kunyika yeMissouri;
Kana kuti angangozogashidzwa mari yaakabhadhara, uye onzi asiye nzvimbo, uye odimburwa kubva muchechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe Mwari vehondo;
Uye kana dai denga nenyika zvikapfuura, mazwi aya haazopfuura, asi achazadzikiswa.

Uye kana muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, achifanira kubhadhara mari iyoyo, tarisai, ini Ishe, ndinozoibhadhara kwaari zvakare munyika yeMissouri, kuti avo vaachagashira kwavari vagopihwa mubairo zvakare maererano neicho chavanoita;
Nokuti maerererano neicho chavanoita vachagashira, kunyangwe nenyika senhaka yavo.

Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe, kuvanhu vangu—mune zvinhu zvizhinji zvekuita uye nezvekutendeuka kubva kwazviri; nokuti tarisai, zvitadzo zvenyu zvakwira kwandiri, uye hazvina kuregererwa, nokuti munotsvaka kurairwa nenzira dzenyu mega.
Uye mwoyo yenyu haigutswe. Uye hamuteerere kuchokwadi, asi munofara mukusarurama.

Nhamo kwamuri imi vanhu makapfuma, imi musingade kupa zvamuinazvo kuvarombo, nokuti upfumi hwenyu huchave zvipfukuto zvemweya yenyu; uye uku ndikokuchave kuchema kwenyu muzuva rekurangwa kwenyu, nekutongwa, uye nerekugumbuka: Kukohwa kwapfuura, zhizha rapera, uye mweya wangu hauna kuponeswa!

Nhamo kwamuri imi vanhu varombo, mune mwoyo isina kutyoka, uye mune mweya isina kupfava, uye mune matumbu asingagute, uye mune maoko asingadzorwe pakutora zvinhu zvevamwe, vane maziso azere makaro, uye musingagone kuzvishandira nemaoko enyu pachenyu!

Asi vakaropafadzwa varombo avo vakachena mumwoyo, avo vane mwoyo yakaninipa, uye vane mweya yakapfava, nokuti vachaona umambo hwaMwari huchiuya musimba uye nokubwinya kukuru mukuponeswa kwavo; nokuti mafuta enyika achave avo.
Nokuti tarisai, Ishe vachauya, uye mibairo yavo vachange vainayo, uye vachapa mubairo wose munhu, uye varombo vachava nokufara;
Uye zvizvarwa zvavo zvichagara nhaka yenyika kubva kuchizvarwa kuenda kune chimwe chizvarwa, nariini nariini. Uye zvino ndavekumira kutaura kwamuri. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/57.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 57
chapter_summary: 1–3, Guta rinonzi Independence, Missouri ndiyo nzvimbo yeguta reZioni netemberi; 4–7, Vatendi vanofanira kutenga nzvimbo kuti vagashire nhaka mudunhu iroro; 8–16, Sidney Gilbert anofanira kumisa chitoro, W. W. Phelps ndiye achave mudhindi, uye Oliver Cowdery ndiye achapesva nhau kuti dzishambadzwe.

verses.text: Teererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, imi makazviunganidza pamwechete, maererano nemirairo yangu, munyika muno, iri iyo nyika yeMissouri, inove ndiyo nyika yandadoma uye ndikaipira kuungana kwevatendi.
Nokudaro, ino ndiyo nyika yechivimbiso, uye nzvimbo yeguta reZioni.

Uye vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, kana muri munogashira ungwaru heuno ungwaru. Tarisai, nzvimbo iri kudaidzwa zvino kuti Independence ndiyo nzvimbo iri pakati; uye nzvimbo yetemberi iri nechekumadokero, pahoko isiri kure nemba inotongerwa mhosva.
Nokudaro, ungwaru kuti nzvimbo yacho itengwe nevatendi; uyezve nekose kanzvimbo kari kumadokero, kunyangwe kusvika kumutsetse unomhanya pakati pemuJuda nemuJentairi;
Uye zvakare nenzvimbo ipi zvayo yakaganurana nemapani, sekubvumirwa kunoitwa vadzidzi vangu kutenga nzvimbo. Tarisai, uhwu ungwaru, kuti vaitore senhaka isingaperi.

Uye regai muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert amire mubasa randakamudomesa, kuti atambire mari, kuti ave mumiririri wechechi, kuti kutengwe nzvimbo mumatunhu ose akatenderedza, uye chero zvichiitwa zvinoitwa mukururama, uye sekutungamirwa kuchaitwa neungwaru.
Uye regai muranda wangu Edward Partridge amire mubasa randakamudomera, uye agovere vatendi nhaka yavo, kunyangwe sezvandakaraira; uye naizvowo avo vaakadoma kuti vamuyamure.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert azvidyare munzvimbo iyi, uye amise chitoro, uye kuti agotengesa zvinhu asingabire, kuti agowana mari yekutengesa nzvimbo dzakanakira vatendi, uye nekuti agone kuwana zvose zvazvo zvinhu zvingadiwe nevadzidzi kuti vazvidyare munhaka yavo.

Uyewo regai muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert awane rezinesi—tarisai heuno ungwaru, uye uyo ani zvake anorwuverenga ngaanzwisise—kuti anogona kutumirawo zvinhu kuvanhu, kunyangwe neavo vaachapinza basa sevanyori vanoshanda mukumubatsira;
Uye saka ndinopa vatendi vangu, vhangeri rangu kuti riparidzwe kune avo vagere murima uye mudunhu nemumumvuri werufu.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu William W. Phelps adyarwe munzvimbo ino, uye agomiswa semudhindi wechechi.
Uye onai, kana nyika ikagashira zvinyorwa zvake—tarisai heuno ungwaru—regai awane chiri chose zvacho chaanokwanisa kuwana mukururama, kuitira kupunduka kwevatendi.

Uye regai muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery amuyamure, kunyangwe sekuraira kwandakaita, munzvimbo ipi zvayo yandichamudomera, kuti anyore, nokugadziridza, nokusarudza, kuti zvose zvinhu zvive zvakanaka pamberi pangu, sezvazvicharatidzwa neMweya kuburikidza naye.
Uye saka regai avo vandataura vadyarwe munyika yeZioni, nokukurumidza kwose kunokwanisika, nemhuri dzavo kuti vaite zvinhu izvozvo kunyangwe sekutaura kwandaita.
Uye zvino maererano negungano—Regai bhishopi nemumiririri wake vagadzirire mhuri idzodzo dzakarairwa kuti dziuye kunyika ino, nokukurumidza, uye nokuvadzika munhaka yavo.
Uye kune vakasara vose, magosa nenhengo, mimwe mirairo ichapihwa pashure. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/58.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 58
chapter_summary: 1–5, Avo vanotsungirira mudambudziko vachashongedzwa nekubwinya; 6–12, Vatendi vanofanira kugadzirira tsvitsa yeGwayana uye nokudya kwemanheru kwaIshe; 13–18, Mabhishopi ndivo vatongi vemuIsraeri; 19–23, Vatendi vanofanira kuteerera mitemo yenyika; 24–29, Vanhu vanofanira kushandisa kusununguka kwavo kuita zvakanaka; 30–33, Ishe vanotaura uye vanodzora; 34–43, Kutendeuka, vanhu vanofanira kureurura nekusiya zvitadzo zvavo; 44–58, Vatendi vanofanira kutenga nhaka yavo uye voungana muMissouri; 59–65, Vhangeri rinofanira kuparidzwa kuchisikwa chose.

verses.text: Teererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, uye mupe nzeve kushoko rangu, uye mudzidze nezvangu kuti chii chandinoda pamusoro penyu, uyewo nepamusoro penyika ino kwandakutumirai.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, akaropafadzwa uyo anochengeta mirairo yangu, muupenyu kana murufu; uye neuyo akatendeka mukutambudzika, mubairo waiyeyo mukuru chaizvo muumambo hwekudenga.
Hamukwanise kuona nemaziso enyu enyama, kwenguva ino, kuronga kwaMwari venyu pamusoro pezvinhu izvo zvichauya mushure, uye nokubwinya kuchatevera mushure mekutambudzika kukuru.
Nokuti mushure mekutambudzika kukuru kunouya maropafadzo. Nokudaro zuva riri kuuya iro ramuchagadzwa nekubwinya kukuru; nguva yacho haisati yasvika, asi yave pedyo.
Rangarirai izvi, zvandinombokutaurirai, kuti muzviise mumwoyo, uye mogashira izvo zvichatevera.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, nechikonzero ichi ndakutumirai—kuti muve munoteerera, uye nokuti mwoyo yenyu igadzirire kupa uchapupu hwezvinhu zvichauya;
Uye nekutiwo mukudzwe mukuhwarika hwaro, uye nemukutakura zvinyorwa zvenyika iyo ichamiswa Zioni yaMwari.
Uyewo kuti mabiko ezvinhu zvemafuta agadzirirwe varombo; hongu, mabiko ezvinhu zvamafuta newaini yakanyatsogadzana, kuti pasi pagoziva kuti miromo yevaporofita haiwire pasi;
Hongu, kudya kwemanheru kwemba yaIshe, kwakagadzirwa zvakanaka, uko kuchakokerwa marudzi ose.
Kutanga, vapfumi nevakadzidza, vazivi nevano remekedzwa;

Uye mushure mezvo kunouya zuva resimba rangu; zvino pachati varombo, vakaremara, nemapofu, nematsi, vopinda kutsvitsa yeGwayana, uye kunodya kudya kwemanheru kwaIshe, kwakagadzirirwa zuva guru richauya.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndazvitaura.
Uye kuti uchapupu huende huchibva kuZioni, hongu, kubva mumuromo weguta renhaka yaMwari—
Hongu, nechikonzero ichi ndakutumirai ikoko, uye ndasarudza muranda wangu Edward Partridge, uye ndikadoma basa rake munyika ino.
Asi kana asina kutendeuka kubva muzvitadzo zvake, izvo zviri kusatenda uye nehupofu hwemwoyo, regai azvichenjerere potse angapunzike.
Tarisai hushumiri hwake hwakapiwa kwaari, hauzopihwa zvakare.
Uye ani zvake achamira muhushumiri uhwu anodomwa kuti ave mutongi muIsraeri, sezvakange zvakaita mumazuva akare, kugovanisa nyika dzenhaka yaMwari kuvana vavo;
Uye nokutonga vanhu vavo neuchapupu hwekuenzanisa, uye neruyamuro rwevabatsiri vavo, maererano nemitemo yeumambo iyo inopihwa nevaporofita vaMwari.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, mutemo wangu uchachengetwa munyika ino.

Ngakurege kuve nemunhu anofunga kuti mutongi, asi regai Mwari vamutonge ivavo vanotonga, maererano nekuraira kwavanoda ivo pachavo, kana nemamwe mazwi, ivo vanoraira kana vanogara pachigaro chekutonga.
Hapana munhu anofanira kutyora mitemo yenyika, nokuti uyo anochengeta mitemo yaMwari haana chaanotyorera mitemo yenyika.
Nokudaro, ivai pasi pemasimba aripo, kudakara vatonga avo vane mvumo yekutonga, uye vagokurira dzose mhandu dziri pasi petsoka dzavo.
Tarisai, mitemo yamakatambira kubva mumaoko angu mitemo yechechi, uye muchiyedza ichi. Tarisai, houno ungwaru.

Uye zvino, sezvo ndichitaura pamusoro pemuranda wangu Edward Partridge, nyika ino inyika yake yokugara, uye neavo vaakadoma sevabatsiri vake; uye ndiyowo nyika yekugara yeuyo wandakadoma kuti achengete imba yangu yekuchengetera;
Nokudaro, regai vaunze mhuri dzavo kunyika ino, sekurangana kwavachaita pakati pavo neni.
Nokuti tarisai, hazvina kunaka kuti ndiraire muzvinhu zvose; nokuti uyo anomanikidzwa muzvinhu zvose, iyeyo ane nungo haazi muranda akachenjera; nokudaro haagashire mubairo.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti, vanhu vakafanira kubata nechido mabasa akanaka, uye vaite zvinhu zvakawanda nekuda kwavo ivo vakasununguka, uye vagounza kururama kwakanyanya;
Nokuti simba riri mavari, naizvozvo vanozvimiririra pachavo. Uye kana vanhu varikuita zvakanaka hakuna chingaite kuti varasikirwe nemubairo wavo.
Asi uyo asina chaanoita kudakara arairwa, uye ogashira murairo nemwoyo unokahadzika, uye achiuchengeta nenungo, iyeyo anotongwa.
Ko ini ndiri ani ndakasika munhu, vanodaro Ishe, anoti haana mhosva uyo asinga teerere mirairo yangu?
Ko ini ndiri ani, vanodaro Ishe, ndakavimbisa asi ndorega kuzadzikisa?
Ndinoraira uye vanhu havateerere; ndinopfudza uye havazogashira maropafadzo.
Zvino vanoti mumwoyo mavo: Iri harisi basa raIshe, nokuti zvivimbiso zvavo hazvina kuzadzikiswa. Asi nhamo kune vakadaro, nokuti mubairo wavo wakahwandira pasi, uye kwete kumusoro.
Uye zvino ndinokupai mimwe mirairo pamusoro penyika ino.
Ungwaru mandiri kuti muranda wangu Martin Harris anofanira kuve mufananidzo kuchechi, mukuisa mari yake pamberi pabhishopi wechechi.
Uye zvakare, uyu mutemo kumunhu wose anouya munyika muno kuzogashira nhaka; uye achiita nemari yake maererano nezvinotaura mutemo.
Uye ungwaruwo zvakare kuti kuve nenzvimbo dzinotengwa muIndependence, kuitira nzvimbo yeimba yekuchengetera, uyewo nemba yekudhindira.
Uye nemimwe mirairo pamusoro pemuranda wangu Martin Harris ichapihwa kwaari neMweya, kuti agogashira nhaka yake sezvaanoda iye;
Uye regai atendeuke kuzvitadzo zvake, nokuti ari kutsvaka kurumbidzwa nenyika.
Uyewo regai muranda wangu William W. Phelps amire mubasa randamudomera, uye agotambira nhaka yake munyika;
Uye naiyewo anofanira kutendeuka, nokuti ini Ishe, handizi kunyatsofadzwa naye, nokuti anotsvaka kubudirira, uye haana kunyatsonyorova pamberi pangu.
Tarisai, uyo akatendeuka pazvitadzo zvake, iyeyo anoregererwa, uye ini Ishe, handizozviyeuka nariini.
Nezvizvi muchaziva kana munhu atendeuka kuzvitadzo zvake—tarisai, anozvireurura uye ozvisiya.

Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti maererano nevakasara vemagosa echechi yangu, nguva haisati yasvika, kwemakore mazhinji, yekuti vagashire nhaka yavo munyika ino, kunze kwekunge vazvida kuburikidza nemunamato werutendo, sekudomwa chete kwazvichaitwa kwavari naIshe.
Nokuti tarisai, vachasaidzira vanhu pamwechete kubva kumiganhu yenyika.
Nokudaro, unganai pamwechete; uye vasina kudomwa kuti vagare munyika muno, regai vaparidze vhangeri mumaruwa akatenderedza; uye mushure mezvo regai vadzokere kumisha yavo.
Regai vaparidze nemunzira, uye vape uchapupu hwezvechokwadi munzvimbo dzose, uye vadaidzire kuvapfumi, vari pamusoro nevaripasi, uye nevarombo kuti vatendeuke.
Uye regai vavake machechi, maererano nekutendeuka kuchaita vagari vepasi.
Uye regai pave nemumiririri anodomwa nezwi rechechi, kuchechi yekuOhio, kuti agotambira mari yekutengesa nzvimbo muZioni.
Uye ndinopa kumuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon murairo, kuti anyore tsananguro yenyika yeZioni, uye nemazwi echido chaMwari, sekuziviswa kwaachaitwa neMweya;

Uye tsamba nechiziviso, zvinoiswa kumachechi ose kuti awane mari, inofanira kuiswa mumaoko abhishopi, iye kana mumiririri, sekuona kwaanenge achiita kana sezvaanenge ataura, kutenga nzvimbo yenhaka yevana vaMwari.

Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, Ishe vanoda kuti vadzidzi nevana vevanhu vavhure mwoyo yavo, kunyangwe kutenga dunhu rose rino renyika, nokukurumidza zviri maererano nezvinotenderwa nenguva.
Tarisai, houno ungwaru. Regai vaite izvi potse vangazotadza kugashira nhaka, kunze kwekunge kwatodeurwa ropa.
Uye zvakare, sezvo nzvimbo ichinge yawanikwa, regai kugove nevashandi vechirume vakasiyana-siyana vanotumirwa kunyika ino, kuzoshandira vatendi vaMwari.
Regai zvinhu zvose izvi zviitwe netsika kwayo; uye itai kuti kodzero dzenzvimbo dzizivikanwe nguva nenguva, nabhishopi kana mumiririri wechechi.
Uye regai basa rekuungana risaitwe nekukurumbidza, kana nekumhanyidzana; asi regai riitwe sekurairwa kwazvinenge zvaitwa nemagosa echechi mumisangano, maererano neruzivo rwavanowana nguva nenguva.
Uye regai muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon apire nokukumikidza nyika ino, uye nepanzvimbo yetemberi, kuna Ishe.

Uye regai kudaidzwe muchechi; uye mushure mezvo regai varanda vangu Sidney Rigdon naJoseph Smith, Mwana, vadzokere, uyewo naOliver Cowdery navo, kunopedzisa basa rakasara iro randakavadomera munyika mavo, uye nezvakasara sekutonga kuchaitwa nemisangano.
Uye ngakurege kuva nemunhu anodzokera achibva munyika ino kunze kwekunge achipupura munzira, neizvo zvaanoziva uye zvaanotenda zvechokwadi.

Regai izvo zvakapihwa kuna Ziba Peterson zvitorwe kubva kwaari; uye regai amire senhengo muchechi, uye ashande nemaoko ake, nehama, kudakara arangwa zvakakwana maererano nezvitadzo zvake zvose; nokuti haazvireurure, uye anofunga kuzvivanza.
Regai vakasara vemagosa echechi ino, avo varikuuya munyika muno, vamwe vacho vakaropafadzwa zvikuru kunyangwe zvinotopfuura mwero, vaitewo musangano munyika muno.
Uye regai muranda wangu Edward Partridge atungamire musangano wavachaita.
Uye regai naivowo vadzokere, vachiparidza munzira, vachipa uchapupu hwezvinhu zvinoratidzwa kwavari.

Nokuti, zvirokwazvo, ruzha rwakafanira kubva panzvimbo ino rwuchienda pasi pose, uye nekumativi ose enyika—vhangeri rinofanira kuparidzwa kuchisikwa chose, uye nezviratidzo zvichitevera avo vanotenda.
Uye tarisai Mwanakomana weMunhu anouya. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/59.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 59
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vakatendeka Vatendi vemuZioni vacharopafadzwa; 5–8, Vanofanira kuda uye nokushandira Ishe uye nokuchengeta mirairo yavo; 9–19, Nokuchengeta zuva raIshe riri dzvene, Vatendi vanoropafadzwa munyama nemumweya; 20–24, Vakarurama vanovimbiswa runyararo munyika ino uye neupenyu hwokusingaperi munyika ichauya.

verses.text: Tarisai, vakaropafadzwa, vanodaro Ishe, avo vanouya kunyika ino uye vaine chinangwa chakanangana chete nekubwinya kwangu, maererano nemirairo yangu.

Nokuti avo vapenyu vachawana nhaka yepasi, uye avo vakafa vachazorora kubva mukushanda kwavo kwose, uye mabasa avo achavatevera; uye vachagashira korona mudzimba dzababa vangu, idzo dzandakavagadzirira.
Hongu, vakaropafadzwa avo vane tsoka dzimire pamusoro penyika yeZioni, avo vakateerera vhangeri rangu; nokuti vachagashira semubairo wavo zvinhu zvakanaka zvepasi, uye richabereka nesimba raro.
Uye vachapfekedzwa korona yemaropafadzo anobva kumusoro, hongu, uye nemirairo isiri mishoma, uye nezvakazarurwa munguva yavo—avo vakatendeka uye vanoshingaira pamberi pangu.
Nokudaro, ndinopa kwavari murairo, ndichiti: Idai Ishe Mwari venyu nemwoyo yenyu yose, neshungu dzenyu, nepfungwa, nesimba; uye nemuzita raJesu Kristu muchavashandira.
Mude muvakidzani wenyu sekuzvida kwamunozviita. Musabe; kana kuita upombwe, kana kuuraya, kana kuita chimwe chinhu chakadaro.
Mutende Ishe Mwari venyu mune zvinhu zvose.
Mupe mupiro kuna Ishe Mwari venyu mukururama, kunyangwe uyo wemwoyo wakatyoka uye nemweya wakapfava.
Uye kuti mukwanise kuzvichengeta zvakakwana musina kavara kubva munyika, muchaenda kumba yemunamato monopa sakaramende yenyu muzuva dzvene rangu;
Nokuti zvirokwazvo iri ndiro zuva ramakadomerwa kuti muzorore kubva mukushanda kwenyu, uye nokuisa minamato kuna Ivavo Vepamusoro-soro;
Zvakadaro zvitsidzo zvenyu zvichapirwa mukururama uye mumazuva ose uye nenguva dzose;
Asi rangarirai kuti pane irori, zuva raIshe, muchapira mipiro yenyu nesakaramende yenyu kuna Ivo Vepamusoro-soro, muchireurura zvivi zvenyu kuhama dzenyu, uye nepamberi paIshe.
Uye muzuva irori hapana chimwe chamuchaita, itai chete kuti kudya kwenyu kugadzirwe nemwoyo mumwechete kuti kutsanya kwenyu kuve kwakakwana, kana, nemamwe mazwi, kuti kufara kwenyu kuve kuzere.
Zvirokwazvo, uku ndikokutsanya nemunamato, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, kufara nekunamata.
Uye kana muri munoita zvinhu izvi nokutenda, nemwoyo nehuso hwakafaranuka, uye pasina kuseka kwakanyanya, nokuti izvozvo chitadzo, asi nemwoyo unofara uye nechiso chakafaranuka—
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti, kana muri munoita izvi, zvose zvepasi ndezvenyu, mhuka dzesango neshiri dzedenga, neicho chinokwira mumiti nechinofamba pasi;

Hongu, uye negwenzi, uye nezvinhu zvakanaka zvinobva muvhu, kana dai zviri zvekudya kana zvekuitisa zvipfeko, kana zvedzimba, kana zvematura, kana zveminda yemichero, kana zvemapindu, kana zveminda yemizambiringa;
Hongu, zvose zvinhu zvinobva nemuvhu, mumwaka wazvo, zvinoitirwa kupundutsa nokushandiswa nemunhu, zvose kufadza ziso uye nokufadza mwoyo;
Hongu, zvekudya nezvezvipfeko, kuraira kana kunhuwidza, kusimbisa muviri uye nokumutsa mweya.
Uye zvinofadza Mwari kuti vakapa zvose zvinhu izvi kumunhu; nokuti nechikonzero ichocho ndozvazvakaitirwa kuti zvishandiswe, neungwaru, kwete kupfuuridza, kana nekupamba.
Uye hapana chimwe chinoita kuti munhu agumbure Mwari, kana kuti hakuna uyo wavakashatirirwa, kunze kweavo vasingatende ruoko rwavo muzvinhu zvose, uye vasingateerere mirairo yavo.
Tarisai, izvi zviri maererano nemutemo uye nevaporofita; nokudaro, chiregai kuramba muchindinetsa pamusoro penyaya iyi.
Asi dzidzai kuti uyo anoita mabasa ekururama achagashira mubairo wavo, kunyangwe runyararo pasi pano uye neupenyu hwokusingaperi munyika ichauya.
Ini, Ishe, ndazvitaura, uye Mweya unopa uchapupu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/60.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 60
chapter_summary: 1–9, Magosa vanofanira kuparidza vhangeri mumagungano evakaipa; 10–14, Havana kufanira kurasa nguva yavo, kana kufusira zvipo zvavo; 15–17, Vanogona kushamba tsoka dzavo seuchapupu pamusoro peavo vanoramba vhangeri.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe kumagosa echechi yavo, avo vakafanira kudzokera nokukurumidza kunyika kwavakabva: Tarisai, zvinondifadza ini, kuti mauya kuno;
Asi nevamwe handinyatsofara, nokuti havadi kuzurura miromo yavo, asi vanoviga chipo chandakapa kwavari, pamusana pekutya munhu. Nhamo kune vakadaro, nokuti hasha dzangu dzinobatidzwa kwavari.
Uye zvichaitika kuti, kana vasiri vakatendeka zvikuru kwandiri, chichatorwa, kunyangwe neicho chavainacho.

Nokuti ini Ishe, ndinotonga mumatenga kumusoro, uye nepakati pemawuto epasi; uye muzuva iro randichaunganidza zvishongo zvinokosha zvangu, vose vanhu vachaziva kuti chii icho chinotaura simba raMwari.

Asi zvirokwazvo, ndichataura kwamuri pamusoro perwendo rwenyu kunyika uko kwamakabva. Ngakugadzirwe chikepe, kana kuti chitengwe, sezvamunoona zvakakunakirai, hazvina mhosva kwandiri, uye mutore rwendo rwenyu nokukurumidza kuenda kunzvimbo inonzi St Louis.
Uye kubva ikoko regai varanda vangu, Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith, Mwana, naOliver Cowdery, vatore rwendo rwavo kuenda kuCincinnati;

Uye munzvimbo iyoyi regai vasimudze mazwi avo uye vataure shoko rangu nezwi guru, pasina hasha kana kukahadzika, vachisimudzira maoko matsvene pavari. Nokuti ndinokwanisa kukuitai vatsvene, uye zvitadzo zvenyu mazviregererwa.
Uye regai vakasara vatore rwendo rwavo kubva kuSt. Louis, vari vaviri-vaviri, uye vachiparidza shoko, kwete mukukurumidza, pakati chechi dzevakaipa, kudakara vadzokera chechi dzavakabva.
Uye zvose izvi zvichaitirwa kunakira machechi; nechinangwa ichi ndavatumira.
Uye regai muranda wangu Edward Partridge agove mari yandamupa, imwe kumagosa angu arairwa kuti adzokere;
Uye uyo anokwanisa, regai aidzore nekumumiririri; uyo asingakwanise, kwaari haidiwe.
Uye zvino ndavekutaura nevakasara vanofanira kuuya munyika muno.

Tarisai, vakatumirwa kuzoparidza vhangeri rangu pakati pemachechi evakaipa; nokudaro ndinovapa murairo, saizvozvi: Musazoparadza nguva yenyu, kana kuti mugofusira chipo chenyu kuti chirege kuzivikanwa.
Uye mushure mekunge mauya kunyika yeZioni, uye maparidza shoko rangu mukurumidze kudzoka muchishambadza izwi rangu pakati pemagungano evakaipa, kwete mukukurumidza, kana mukushatirwa kana mukupokana.
Uye mugumhe guruva retsoka dzenyu pamusoro peavo vasingakugashirei, kwete vachiona, potse mungazovadenha, asi muruvande; uye mugeze tsoka dzenyu, seuchapupu hunovarwisa muzuva rekutongwa.
Tarisai, izvi zvakakwana kwamuri, uye nechido cheivo vakakutumai.
Uye nemuromo wemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, zvichaitwa kuti zvizivikanwe zviri maererano naSidney Rigdon naOliver Cowdery. Zvasara zvichazouya mushure. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 61
chapter_summary: 1–12, Ishe vakadzika kuparadzwa kwakawanda pamvura; 13–22, Mvura dzakatukwa naJohane, uye muparadzi anofamba pameso padzo; 23–29, Vamwe vanesimba rekuraira mvura; 30–35, Magosa anofanira kufamba ari vaviri vaviri uye vachiparidza vhangeri; 36–39, Vanofanira kugadzirira kuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu.

verses.text: Tarisai, uye muteerere kuizwi reuyo ane simba rose, anobva kusingaperi kusvika kusingaperi, kunyangwe Arfa naOmega, kutanga nekuguma.

Tarisai, zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwamuri, imi magosa echechi yangu, maungana pane ino nzvimbo, imi mune zvitadzo zvamaregererwa zvino, nokuti ini Ishe, ndinoregerera zvitadzo, uye ndinonzwira tsitsi avo vanoreurura zvitadzo zvavo nemwoyo yakapfava;
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, hazvifanirwe kuti mhomho yose ino yemagosa angu vave vachifamba nekukurumidza pamusoro pemvura, ivo vagari vari kumhiri nekumhiri varikufa vari mukusatenda.
Zvisinei, ndazvibvumira kuti mugozopupura; tarisai, mune njodzi dzakawanda mumvura, kunyanya mushure mazvino;
Nokuti ini Ishe, ndaita chisungo mukushatirwa kwangu kuchave nekuparadzwa kwakawanda pamusoro pemvura; hongu, uye kunyanya pamusoro pemvura idzodzi.
Zvisinei, yose nyama iri mumaoko angu, uye uyo anotendeka pakati penyu haazofa nemvura.
Nokudaro, zvakafanira kuti muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert uye nemuranda wangu William W. Phelps vave vanokurumidza munezvavatumwa nehushumiri hwavo.
Zvisinei, handaibvumira kuti muparadzane kudakara marangwa pamusoro pezvitadzo zvenyu zvose, kuti muve vamwechete, kuti musapararire mukuipa;

Asi zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti, ndinoona zvakafanira kuti muchibva. Nokudaro regai varanda vangu Sidney Gilbert naWilliam W. Phelps vatore vakanga vachivaperekedza, uye vatore rwendo rwavo nokukurumidza kuti vazadzise hushumiri hwavo, uye kuburikidza nerutendo vachakurira;
Uye kana vari vakatendeka vachachengetedzwa, uye ini Ishe, ndinenge ndiinavo.
Uye regai vanosara vatore izvo zvavanoda zvezvipfeko.
Regai muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert atore icho chaasingade, sekubvumirana kwamuchaita naye.
Uye zvino tarisai, kuitira kupunduka kwenyu imi ndakakupai murairo pamusoro pezvinhu izvi; uye ini Ishe, ndichataurirana nemi sevanhu vemazuva ekare.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, pakutanga ndakaropafadza mvura; asi mumazuva ekupedzisira, nemuromo wemuranda wangu Johane, ndakatuka mvura.
Nokudaro, mazuva achauya ekuti hakuna nyama inenge isiri munjodzi pamusoro pemvura.
Uye zvichanzi mumazuva achauya hakuna anogona kuenda kunyika yeZioni nepamusoro pemvura, asi uyo akatwasuka mumwoyo.
Uye, sezvo ini Ishe, pakutanga ndakatuka nyika, kunyangwe saizvozvo mumazuva ekupedzisira ndakairopafadza, munguva yayo, kuti ishandiswe nevatendi vangu, kuti vagodya upfumi hurimo.

Uye zvino ndinokupai murairo kuti chandinotaura kune mumwechete ndinotaura kune vose, kuti muchafanoyambira hama dzenyu pamusoro pemvura idzi, kuti vasauye vachifamba madziri, potse rutendo rwavo rwungakundwe uye ivo vakabatwa mumiteyo;
Ini Ishe, ndakaita chisungo, uye muparadzi anotasva pamusoro pechiso chadzo, uye ini handibvise chisungo ichi.
Ini Ishe, ndakanga ndakakushatirirwai nezuro, asi nhasi kushatirwa kwangu kwabviswa.
Nokudaro, regai avo vandataura nezvavo, avo vanofanira kutora rwendo rwavo nokukurumidza—zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, regai vaende nzendo dzavo mukukurumidza.

Uye hazvinei kwandiri, kana nepashoma, kana vari vanozadzisa hushumiri hwavo, kuti vanoenda nemvura here kana nepasi; regai izvi zviitwe sekuziviswa kwazvinoitwa kwavari maererano nemaonero avo mushure mazvino.

Uye zvino, pamusoro pevaranda vangu, Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith, Mwana, naOliver Cowdery, ngavarege kuuya zvakare nepamusoro pemvura, kunze kwekunge itori nzira yemvura, varimurwendo kuenda kumisha yavo; kana nemamwe mazwi havauye nepamusoro pemvura murwendo, kunze kwemigero yemvura yekufamba nayo.

Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndadoma nzira yenzendo dzevatendi vangu; uye tarisai, iyi ndiyo nzira yacho kuti pavanosiya nzira yemvura, vachafamba nepasi, sekurairwa kwavanenge vakaitwa kuti vafambe uye kuti vakwire kuenda kunyika yeZioni;
Uye vachaita sevana vaIsraeri, vachidzika tende dzavo munzira.
Uye tarisai, uyu murairo muchaupa kuhama dzenyu dzose.
Zvisinei, kune uyo akapihwa simba rekutonga mvura, kuna iyeyo zvakapihwa kuburikidza neMweya kuti azive nzira dzake dzose;
Nokudaro, ngaaite sekurairwa kwaanenge achiitwa neMweya waMwari mupenyu, pangave pasi kana pamusoro pemvura, sezvo zvichasarira kwandiri kuzviita mushure mezvino.
Uye kwauri kwakapihwa gwara revatendi, kana nzira yekuti vatendi vemuchikwata chaIshe, vafambe nayo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, varanda vangu Sidney Rigdon, Joseph Smith Mwana, naOliver Cowdery, havazoshama miromo yavo mumagungano evakaipa kudakara vasvika kuCincinnati;
Uye munzvimbo iyoyo vachasimudza mazwi avo kuna Mwari pamusoro pevanhu ivavo, hongu, kuna ivo vanehasha dzakatungidzwa pamusana pekuipa kwavo, vanhu vave pedyo nekuibvira kuparadzwa.
Uye kubva ikoko ngavafambire magungano ehama dzavo, nokuti kushanda kwavo kunyangwe iyezvino kuri kudiwa zvakanyanya mukati mavo pane kumagungano evakaipa.
Uye zvino, nezvevasara, regai vafambe uye vanotaura izwi mukati memagungano evakaipa, sekupihwa kwarakaitwa.
Uye sekuita kwavanoita izvi vachachenesa nhumbi dzavo, uye vachave vasina kana kavara pamberi pangu.

Uye ngavafambe vari pamwechete, kana vaviri vaviri, sezvavanoona zvakavanakira, chete regai muranda wangu Reynolds Cahoon, uye nemuranda wangu Samuel H. Smith, uyo anondifadza zvikuru, vasapatsanutswe kudakara vadzokera kumisha yavo, uye izvi zviri zvine chinangwa chakangwara mandiri.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvandinotaura kune mumwechete ndinozvitaura kune vose, farai, vana vadiki; nokuti ndiri pakati penyu, uye handina kukusiyai.
Uye sezvo muchizvininipisa pamberi pangu, maropafadzo eumambo ndeenyu.
Sungirai nguwo dzenyu muchiuno uye muve makangwarira uye muve makatsiga, muchitarisira kuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu, nokuti anouya munguva yamusingafungire.
Namatai nguva dzose kuti musapinde mukuyedzwa, kuti mugone kurarama zuva rekuuya kwake, muupenyu kana murufu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 62
chapter_summary: 1–3, Uchapupu hunonyorwa kudenga; 4–9, Magosa achafamba uye achiparidza maererano nemaonere avanenge vaita nekutungamirwa kwavanenge vaitwa neMweya.

verses.text: Tarisai uye teererai, imi magosa echechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu kunyangwe Jesu Kristu murevereri wenyu, uyo anoziva kusasimba kwevanhu uye nekuti vanoyamurwa sei avo vanoyedzwa.
Uye zvirokwazvo maziso angu ari pane avo vasati vakwira nazvino kunyika yeZioni; nokudaro basa renyu harisati rakwana;
Zvisinei, makaropafadzwa, nokuti uchapupu hwamapa hwanyorwa kudenga kuti ngirozi dzigohutarisa; uye dzinofara pamusoro penyu, uye zvitadzo zvenyu mazviregererwa.
Uye zvino endererai mberi nerwendo rwenyu. Unganayi panyika yeZioni; uye mopinda chechi uye mofara pamwechete, uye mopa sakaramende kuna Ivo Vepamusoro-soro.

Uye munogona kudzoka kuzopa uchapupu, hongu, kunyangwe muri pamwechete kana vaviri vaviri sezvamunoona zvakanaka, hazvina mhosva kwandiri; chete ivai makatendeka. Uye mutaure mazwi akanaka kuvagari vemunyika, uye kana mumagungano evakaipa.

Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndakuunzai pamwechete kuti chivimbiso chizadzikiswe, kuti avo vakatendeka pakati penyu vanofanira kuchengetedzwa uye vagozofara pamwechete munyika yeMissouri. Ini Ishe, ndinovimbisa vakatendeka uye handikwanise kunyepa.

Ini Ishe, ndinoda kana mumwe pakati penyu achida kutasva pamusoro pemabhiza, kana pamusoro pemanyurusi, kana mungorovhani, achagashira maropafadzo aya, kana akazvigashira kubva muruoko rwaIshe, nemwoyo wekutenda muzvinhu zvose.
Izvi zvinhu zviri kwamuri kuzviita maererano nekutonga uye nekutungamira kweMweya.
Tarisai, umambo ndehwenyu. Uye tarisai, uye muone, ndine vakatendeka nguva dzose. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 63
chapter_summary: 1–6, Zuva rehasha richauya pane vakaipa; 7–12, Zviratidzo zvinouya nerutendo; 13–19, Mhombwe mumwoyo dzicharamba chitendero uye dzigokandwa munyanza yemoto; 20, Vakatendeka vachagashira nhaka panyika yashandurwa; 21, Nhoroondo izere yezvakaitika paGomo Rekushandurwa haisati yaburitswa pachena; 22–23, Vanoteerera vanogashira zvakavanzika zveumambo; 24–31, Nhaka muZioni dzinofanirwa kutengwa; 32–35, Ishe vanodaidzira hondo, uye vakaipa vanouraya vakaipa; 36–48, Vatendi vanofanira kuungana kuZioni uye vagopa mari yekuivaka; 49–54, Maropafadzo anovimbiswa vakatendeka paKuuya kweChipiri, muKumuka Kuvakafa, uye nemunguva yeMereniamu; 55–58, Iri izuva rekuyambirwa; 59–66, Zita raIshe rinoitwa risina maturo neavo vanorishandisa vasina mvumo.

verses.text: Teererai, imi vanhu, uye muzarure mwoyo yenyu uye mupe nzeve dzenyu imi muri kure, uye muteerere, imi munozvidaidza kuti vanhu vaIshe, uye munzwe izwi raIshe uye nechido chavo pamusoro penyu.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti, inzwai shoko reavo vane kushatirwa kwakatungidzirwa vakaipa nevane hupanduki;
Avo vanoda kutora kunyangwe ivo avo vavanoda kutora, uye nokuchengetedza muupenyu avo vavanoda kuchengetedza;
