Avo vanovaka nekudakwavo nekufadzwa kwavo; uye vachiparadza kana voda, uye vanogona kukanda mweya pasi mugehena.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndinotaura nezwi rangu uye richateererwa.

Nokudaro, zvirokwazvo ndinoti, regai vakaipa vachenjere, uye regai vane hupanduki vatye pamwe nokudedera; uye regai avo vasingatende vabate miromo yavo, nokuti zuva rehasha richauya pavari sechamupupuri, uye yose nyama ichaziva kuti ndini Mwari.
Uye uyo anotsvaka zviratidzo achaona zviratidzo, asi kwete mukuponeswa.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kune avo pakati penyu vanotsvaka zviratidzo, uye vakagara varipo vakadaro kunyangwe kubvira pakutanga.
Asi tarisai, rutendo harwuuye nezviratidzo, asi zviratidzo zvinotevera avo vanotenda.
Hongu, zviratidzo zvinouya nerutendo, kwete nekuda kwevanhu, kana sezvavanoda ivo, asi nekuda kwaMwari.

Hongu, zviratidzo zvinouya nerutendo, kuunza mabasa makuru, nokuti kana pasina rutendo hapana munhu anofadza Mwari; uye kune uyo akashatirirwa naMwari havanyatsofara naye; nokudaro kune vakadaro havaratidze zviratidzo, kunze chete kwehasha dzinovasvitsa mukutongwa kwavo.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe, handifadzwe neavo vari pakati penyu vanotsvaka zviratidzo uye nezvishamiso kuti vave nerutendo, kwete kuitira kubatsira vanhu zvichiunza kubwinya kwangu.
Zvisinei, ndinopa mirairo, uye vazhinji vakafukatira mirairo yangu uye havana kuichengeta.
Paive nemhombwe dzechirume nedzechikadzi pakati penyu; vamwe vacho vakazotendeuka kubva pamuri, vamwe vakasara nemi avo vacharatidzwa pashure.
Regai ivavo vachenjere uye vatendeuke nokukurumidza potse kutongwa kungauye pavari semuteyo, uye hupenzi hwavo huchaitwa kuti huzivikanwe, uye mabasa avo achavatevera mumaziso evanhu.

Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, sekutaura kwandakamboita, uyo anotarisa mukadzi achiva neruchiva kwaari, kana vanaani zvavo vakaita upombwe mumwoyo mavo, havazove neMweya, uye vacharamba chitendero uye vachatya.

Nokudaro, ini Ishe, ndakati avo vazere nekutya, uye vasingatende uye nevanonyepa vose, uye ani zvake anoda nhema nekureva nhema, uye nemhombwe, uye nemuroyi, vachave nenzvimbo yavo mudziva riye rinobvira nemoto nesuriferi, uye kuri iko kufa kwechipiri.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti, ivavo havazova mukumuka kuvakafa kwekutanga.
Uye zvino tarisai, ini Ishe, ndinoti kwamuri imi hamusi muchokwadi, nokuti zvinhu izvi zviri mukati menyu.
Zvisinei uyo anoshingirira murutendo uye achiita kuda kwangu iyeyo achakurira, uye achagashira nhaka panyika kana zuva rekushandurwa rauya;
Kana nyika yashandurwa, kunyangwe maererano netsika iyo yakaratidzwa kuvaapositori vangu pamusoro pegomo; iri nyaya huzere hwayo hamusati mahugashira.

Uye, zvino zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, sezvandakataura, kuti ndichaita kuti muzive kuda kwangu kwamuri, tarisai ndichaita kuti kuzivikanwe kwamuri, kwete semurairo, nokuti kune vazhinji vasingacherechedze kuchengeta mirairo yangu.
Asi kune uyo anochengetedza mirairo yangu ndichamupa zvakavanzika zveumambo hwangu, uye muna iyeyo muchave netsime remvura ine upenyu, inoenda kuupenyu hwusingaperi.
Uye zvino, tarisai, ichi ndichochido chaIshe Mwari venyu pamusoro pevatendi vake kuti vaungane pamwechete munyika yeZioni, kwete nokukurumidza, potse kungazove nekudzengaira, zviri zvinounza urwere.
Tarisai, nyika yeZioni—ini Ishe, ndakaibata mumaoko angu;
Zvisinei, ini Ishe ndinopa kuna Kesari zvinhu zvaKesari.
Naizvozvo, ini Ishe, ndinoda kuti imi mutenge nzvimbo kuti mugova munechinhano pamusoro penyika kuti mugove nekodzero yechamuinacho panyika kuti vasazokonzerwa kuita hasha.
Nokuti Satani anozviisa mumwoyo mavo kuti vakushatirirwei, uye zvigosvika mukudeurwa kweropa.
Nokudaro, nyika yeZioni haizi inozowanikwa neimwe nzira asi kunze kwekutengwa kana neropa, tadzezvo hakuna nhaka yenyu.
Uye kana iri yekutengwa, tarisai makaropafadzwa.
Kana zviri zveropa, sezvo muchirambidzwa kudeura ropa, tarisai, vavengi venyu vakuvingai, uye mucharohwa guta neguta, uye nesinagogo nesinagogo, uye vashoma vachasvika pakugashira nhaka.
Ini Ishe, ndakashatirirwa vakaipa; handisikupa Mweya wangu kuvagari vepasi.
Ndapika muhasha dzangu, ndikasheedzera hondo pamusoro penyika, uye vakaipa vachauraya vakaipa, uye kutya kuchave pamunhu wose;
Nevatendiwo vangatotadza kupunyuka; zvisinei, ini Ishe, ndinavo, uye ndichaburuka mudenga pamberi paBaba vangu uye ndigopedza vakaipa nemoto usingadzimike.
Uye tarisai, izvi hazvisati zvasvika, asi gare gare.
Nokudaro sezvo ini, Ishe ndasheedzera zvose zvinhu izvi pamusoro penyika, ndinoda kuti vatendi vangu vave vanoungana panyika yeZioni;

Uye kuti wose munhu atore kururama mumaoko ake uye ave nokutendeka pachiuno chake, uyewo agosimudza izwi rekuyambira kuvagari vepasi; uye agotaura zvose izwi pamwechete nekutiza kuti kuparadzwa kuchauya kune vakaipa.
Nokudaro, regai vadzidzi vangu vari paKirtland varonge zvinovanetsa mukugara kwavo, avo vagere mupurazi rino.

Regai muranda wangu Titus Billings, uyo ane basa rekuichengeta, ape nyika, kuti agove akagadzirira munguva yepfumvudza inouya kutora rwendo rwake kuti akwidze kunyika yeZioni, neavo vagere pamusoro payo, kunze kweavo vandichazvichengetera, kuti havazoenda kusvikira ndavaraira.
Uye regai mari dzose dzinogona kuchengetwa, hazvina mhosva kwandiri kuti ishoma kana kuti yakawanda, itumirwe kunyika yeZioni, kune avo vandakadoma kuti vaigashire.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndichapa kumuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, simba rekuti achagona kuona neMweya avo vachakwidza kunyika yeZioni, uye neavo vevadzidzi vangu vachasara.
Regai muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney arambe aine chitoro chake, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, chitoro, kwemwaka mupfupi.
Zvisinei regai ape yose mari yaangakwanise kupa, kuti itumirwe kunyika yeZioni.
Tarisai, zvinhu izvi zviri mumaoko ake, regai aite maererano neungwaru.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti, regai agadzwe semumiririri wevadzidzi avo vachasara, uye regai agadzwe kusimba iri;
Uye zvino chikurumidzai kushanyira machechi, muchitsanangura zvinhu izvi kwavari nemuranda wangu Oliver Cowdery. Tarisai, ichi ndichochido changu, kuwana mari kunyangwe sekuraira kwandakaita.
Uyo akatendeka uye achishingirira achakunda nyika.
Uyo anotumira upfumi kunyika yeZioni achagashira nhaka munyika ino, uye mabasa ake achamutevera, uyewo nemubairo munyika ichauya.

Hongu, vakaropafadzwa vakafa avo vanofa vari muna Ishe, kubvira zvino, apo pachauya Ishe, zvinhu zvakare zvichapfura, uye zvinhu zvose zvichive zvitsva, vachamuka kubva kuvakafa havazofa zvakare, uye vachagashira nhaka pamberi paIshe, muguta dzvene.
Uye uyo anenge ari mupenyu panouya Ishe, uye ari akachengeta rutendo, akaropafadzwa iyeyo, zvisinei, zvakadomwa kwaari kuti afe nezera remunhu rakafanira.
Nokudaro, vana vachakura kudakara vakwegura; vanhu vakwegura vachafa; asi havazorara muguruva, asi vachashandurwa mukubwaira kweziso.
Nokudaro, nechikonzero ichi vakaparidza vaapositori kunyika nezvekumuka kwevakafa.
Zvinhu izvi ndizvo zvinhu zvamunofanira kutsvaga; uye mukutaura netsika yaIshe, iye zvino zvave pedyo, uye nemunguva inotevera, kunyangwe nemuzuva rekuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu.

Uye kudakara nguva iyoyo kuchave nemhandara dzakazungaira mukati medzakachenjera; uye panguva iyoyo panouya kupatsanurwa zvachose kwevakarurama nevakaipa; uye muzuva iroro ndichatumira ngirozi dzangu dzichabvisa vakaipa uye dzovakanda mumoto usingadzimike.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ini Ishe, handifadzwe nemuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon; akazvikudza mumwoyo make, uye akasagashira kurairwa, asi akasuwisa Mweya;
Nokudaro zvaakanyora hazvina kubvumwa naIshe, uye achaita zvakare; uye kana Ishe vakasazvigashira, tarisai haachazove anomira muchinzvimbo chandakamudomera.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, avo vanoda mumwoyo yavo, nokunyorova, kuyambira vatadzi kuti vatendeuke, ngavagadzwe musimba iri.
Nokuti rino izuva rekuyambira, uye kwete zuva remazwi akawanda. Nokuti ini Ishe, handizi wekusekwa mumazuva ekupedzisira.

Tarisai, ndiri wekumusoro, uye simba rangu riri pasi. Ndiri pamusoro pezvose, uye nemuzvinhu zvose, uye kuburikidza nemune zvose, uye ndinoongorora zvose zvinhu, uye zuva riri kuuya, iro zvinhu zvose zvichave pasi pangu.
Tarisai, ndini Arfa naOmega, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu.
Nokudaro, regai vose vanhu vachenjere kutora kwavanoita zita rangu mumiromo yavo—
Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti, vazhinji variko vari pasi pekutongwa uku, vanoshandisa zita raIshe, vachirishandisa pasina, vasina mvumo.
Nokudaro, regai chechi ngaitendeuke muzvitadzo zvayo, uye ini Ishe, ndichavaita vangu, nokuti pasina izvozvo vanodimburwa vachibviswa.

Rangarirai kuti icho chinobva kumusoro chinoyera, uye chinofanira kutaurwa nehuchenjeri, uye nokutunhwa neMweya, uye mune izvi hamuna kutongwa, uye munogashira Mweya kuburikidza nomunamato; nokudaro, pasina izvi panoramba paine kutongwa.
Regai varanda vangu, Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon, vazvitsvagire musha, sezvavanodzidziswa kuburikidza nekunamata neMweya.
Zvinhu izvi zvinogarira kukundwa kuburikidza nemwoyo murefu, kuti ivavo vave vanogashira huremu hwakawedzerwa, uye hwokusingaperi hwekubwinya, tadzezvo vogashira kutongwa kukuru. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/64.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 64
chapter_summary: 1–11, Vatendi vanorairwa kuti varegererane, potse mungangogara mavari chitadzo chikuru; 12–22, Avo vasingatendeuke vanounzwa pamberi peChechi; 23–25, Uyo anopa chegumi haazopiswa pakuuya kwaIshe; 26–32, Vatendi vanoyambirwa pamusoro pechikwereti; 33–36, Vapanduki vanodimurwa kubva muZioni; 37–40, Chechi ichatonga marudzi; 41–43, Zioni ichabudirira.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, imi magosa echechi yangu, teererai imi munzwe, uye mugashire chido changu pamusoro penyu.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinoda kuti mukurire nyika; nokudaro ndichaita tsitsi pamuri.
Kune avo mukati menyu vakatadza, asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti, kamwechete kano chete, kuitira kubwinya kwangu, uye neruponeso rwemweya ndakuregererai zvitadzo zvenyu.
Ndichakuitirai tsitsi, nokuti ndapa kwamuri umambo.
Uye makiyi ezvakavanzika zveumambo haachatorwa kubva kune muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, kuburikidza nenzira yandakadoma, kana achiri mupenyu, kana achiteerera zvisungo zvangu.
Kune avo vakatsvaga mhosva kwaari pasina chikonzero;
Zvisinei, akatadza; asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ini Ishe, ndinoregerera zvitadzo kune avo vanoreurura zvitadzo zvavo pamberi pangu uye vachikumbira ruregerero, vasina kutadza kusvika pakufa.
Vadzidzi vangu, mumazuva ekare, vaitsvaga kunetsana pachavo pasina chikonzero uye vasingaregererane mumwoyo yavo; uye pamusana pechakaipa ichi vakatambudzwa uye vakarangwa.
Nokudaro ndinoti kwamuri, munofanira kuregererana; nokuti uyo asingaregerere hama yake kukanganisa kwayo anotongwa pamberi paIshe; nokuti kunosara maari chitadzo chikuru.
Ini Ishe ndinoregerera uyo wandinoda kuregerera, asi kwamuri kunodiwa kuti muregere munhu wose.
Uye munofanira kuti mumwoyo menyu—regai Mwari vatonge pakati pangu newe, uye vagokupa mubairo maererano nezviito zvako.

Uye uyo asingatendeuke muzvitadzo zvake, uye asingazvireurure, imi muchamuunza pamberi pechechi, uye moita naye sezvinotaurwa nemagwaro matsvene kwamuri, zvingave maererano nemurairo kana nezvakazarurwa.

Uye izvi muchazviita kuti Mwari vagorumbidzwa—kwete pamusoro pekuti hamudi kuregerera, semusina tsitsi, asi kuti mugorevererwa mumaziso emutemo, kuti musamugumbure uyo anove ndiye mupi wenyu wemutemo—
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti, nechikonzero ichi muchaita zvinhu izvi.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndakamushatirirwa uyo aive muranda wangu Ezra Booth, uyewo nemuranda wangu Isaac Morley, nokuti havana kuchengeta mutemo, kana murairo;
Vakatsvaka kuipa mumwoyo mavo, uye ini Ishe, ndakadzora Mweya wangu. Vakatonga vachiti chakaipa icho chinhu chakanga chisina kuipa; zvisinei ndakaregerera muranda wangu Isaac Morley.

Uye nemuranda wanguwo Edward Partridge, tarisai, akatadza, uye Satani ari kutsvaka kuparadza mweya wake; asi pachaitwa kuti zvinhu izvi vazvizive, uye ivo vakatendeuka kubva mune chakaipa, vacharegererwa.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti zvakafanira kwandiri kuti muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert, mushure memavhiki mashomanani, achadzokera kubasa rake, uye nokuhumiririri hwake munyika yeZioni;
Uye izvo zvaakaona uye akanzwa zvingaitwe kuti zvizivikanwe kuvadzidzi vangu, kuti vasaparare. Uye nechikonzero ichi ndakataura zvinhu izvi.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, muranda wangu Isaac Morley haazoyedzwa kupfuura izvo zvaanokwanisa kutakura, agoraira zvisiri izvo zvinozokukuvadzai, ndakaraira kuti purazi rake rinofanira kutengeswa.

Handizobvumira kuti muranda wangu Frederick G. Williams atengese purazi rake, nokuti ini Ishe, ndichagara ruoko rwangu rwakasimba munyika yeKirtland, kwemakore mashanu, munguva iyoyi handizorasa vakaipa, kuti mukudaro ndingaponese vamwe.
Uye mushure mezuva iroro, ini Ishe, hapana wandinozotarisa seane mhosva uyo achaenda nemwoyo wakasununguka kunyika yeZioni, nokuti ini Ishe, ndinoda mwoyo yevana vevanhu.

Tarisai, zvino zvichiri kushevedzwa kunzi nhasi kusvikira pakuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu, uye zvirokwazvo izuva remupiro, uye nezuva rekubvisiswa chegumi kwevanhu vangu; nokuti uyo akabvisa chegumi haazopiswa pakuuya kwake.

Nokuti mushure mezuva ranhasi kunouya kutsva—uku kutaura sekutaura kunoita Ishe—nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti mangwana vose avo vanodada uye vanoita zvakaipa vachaita semashanga; uye ini ndichavapisa, nokuti ndiri Ishe veHondo; uye hakuna wandinosiya pane vanenge vari muBabironi.
Nokudaro, kana muchitenda ini muchashanda zuva richiripo.

Uye hazvikodzeri kuti varanda vangu, Newel K. Whitney naSidney Gilbert, vatengese chitoro chavo uye nezvinhu zvavanazvo pano, nokuti izvi hausi ungwaru kudakara vakasara vechechi, avo vasara munzvimbo ino, vachakwira kuenda kunyika yeZioni.
Tarisai, zvinonzi mumitemo yangu, kana kurambidzwa, kupinda muchikwereti nevavengi venyu;
Asi tarisai, hapana pazvinombotaurwa kuti Ishe havafanire kutora pavanoda, uye nokubhadhara sezvavanoona zvakanaka.
Nokudaro, sezvo muri vamiririri, muri pabasa raIshe; uye chose chamuchaita maererano nechido chaIshe ibasa raIshe.
Uye vakutumai imi kuti muzoyamura vatendi vavo mumazuva ekupedzisira ano, kuti vagowana nhaka munyika yeZioni.
Uye tarisai, ini Ishe, ndinotaura kwamuri, uye mazwi angu ndeechokwadi uye haazokundikana, kuti vachazoiwana.
Asi zvose zvinhu zvakafanira kuitika nenguva yazvo.
Nokudaro, musanete mukuita zvakanaka, nokuti muri kuhwarika hwaro hwebasa guru. Uye muzvinhu zvidiki ndimo munobva izvo zvikuru.
Tarisai, Ishe vanoda mwoyo uye nepfungwa inoda, uye avo vanoda uye vachiteerera vachadya zvakanana zvenyika yeZioni mumazuva ano ekupedzisira.
Uye vapanduki vacharaswa kubva munyika yeZioni, uye vachitandaniswa, uye havazogara nhaka yenyika.
Nokuti, zvirokwazvo ndinoti vapanduki havasi veropa raEfraimi, nokudaro vachadzurwa.
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndaita chechi yangu mumazuva ano ekupedzisira semutongi agere pachikomo kana panzvimbo yakakwirira, kuitira kutonga marudzi.
Nokuti zvichaitika kuti vagari vemuZioni vachatonga zvose zvinhu zviri maererano neZioni.
Uye varevi venhema nevanyengedzi vachafumurwa navo, uye avo vasiri vaapositori nevaporofita vachazivikanwa.
Uye kana bhishopi, ari iye mutongi, uye nemakurukota ake, kana vasingatendeke muhutariri hwavo vachatongwa uye vamwe vachadyarwa panzvimbo dzavo.
Nokuti tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri kuti Zioni ichabudirira uye kubwinya kwaIshe kuchave pairi.
Uye ichave mureza kuvanhu, uye kuchauya kwairi kubva mukati merudzi rwose rwuri pasi pedenga.
Uye zuva richauya apo marudzi enyika achadedera pamusana payo, uye vachatya pamusoro pevanotyisa vayo. Ishe vazvitaura. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/65.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 65
chapter_summary: 1–2, Makiyi eumambo hwaMwari anopihwa kumunhu panyika uye basa revhangeri richabudirira; 3–6, Umambo hweMereniamu hwekudenga huchauya nokubatanidzwa neumambo hwaMwari panyika.

verses.text: Teererai, uye mutarise, izwi seremumwe atumwa kubva kumusoro. Ane mbiri nesimba, anoenda kumagumo enyika, hongu, uye izwi rake riri kuvanhu—Gadzirai imi nzira yaIshe, itai twunzira twavo twutwasanuke.

Makiyi eumambo hwaMwari akapihwa kuvanhu munyika, uye kubva ipapo vhangeri richakungurutswa kusvika kumagumo enyika, sedombo rachekwa kubva pagomo pasina maoko, richikunguruka richienda kudakara razara pasi pose.
Hongu, izwi riri kuchema—Gadzirirai imi nzira yaIshe, gadzirirai imi kudya kwemanheru kweGwayana, gadzirirai Chikomba.
Namatai kuna Ishe, daidzirai zita ravo dzvene, shambadzai mabasa ake anoshamisa mukati mevanhu.

Daidzirai kuna Ishe, kuti umambo hwavo huve hunoenda mberi munyika, kuti vagari varimo vazvigashire, kuti vave vakagadzirira kumazuva ari kuuya, umo munove Mwanakomana weMunhu achauya pasi kubva kudenga, akapfekedzwa kupenya kwekubwinya kwake, kuzosangana neumambo hwaMwari hwakadzikwa pano pasi.

Nokudaro, umambo hwaMwari ngahufambire mberi, kuti umambo hwekudenga huuye, kuti imi Mwari mubwinyiswe kudenga kana nepano pasi, kuti vavengi venyu vakundwe; nokuti rwenyu rukudzo, simba nokubwinya, kusvika riini nariini. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/66.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 66
chapter_summary: 1–4, Chibvumirano chisingaperi narinhi ivhangeri rizere; 5–8, Magosa anoparidza, kupupura, uye nokutaura nevanhu; 9–13, Kushanda zvakatendeka mubasa rehushumiri kunopa vimbiso yenhaka yeupenyu hwokusingaperi.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe, kune muranda wangu William E. McLellin—Iwe wakaropafadzwa, kana uri wabva kune zvakaipa zvako, uye ukatambira chokwadi changu, vanodaro Ishe Mununuri vako, Muponesi wenyika, kunyangwe weavo vakawanda vanotenda muzita rangu.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, wakaropafadzwa nokugashira chibvumirano changu chisingaperi, kunyangwe vhangeri rangu rizere, rakatumirwa kuvana vevanhu, kuti vave vanowana upenyu uye kuti vagoitwa vamwe vekubwinya uko kucharatidzwa mumazuva ekupedzisira, sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa nevaporofita nevaapositori mumazuva ekare.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri muranda wangu William, kuti wakachena asi kwete zvizere; tendeuka, nokudaro kuzvinhu izvo zvisingafadze mumaziso angu, vanodaro Ishe, nokuti Ishe vachazviratidza kwauri.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ini Ishe ndichakuratidza zvandinoda maererano newe, kana kuti chido changu maererano newe.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, chido changu kuti ushambadze vhangeri rangu kubva munyika nenyika, uye kubva guta neguta, hongu, mumatunhu ayo akatenderedza umo marisati rashambadzwa.
Usagare kwemazuva mazhinji munzvimbo ino; usaende kunyika yeZioni iyezvino; asi nepaunokwanisa kutumira, tumira; kana kuti usambofunga nezvezvinhu zvako.
Enda kunyika dzekumabvazuva, ipa uchapupu munzvimbo yega yega, kuvanhu vose uye nemumasinagogo avo uchitaura nevanhu.
Rega muranda wangu Samuel H. Smith ayende newe, uye usamusiye, uye umupe mirairo yako; uye uyo akatendeka achasimbiswa munzvimbo dzose; uye ini Ishe, ndichaenda nemi.
Gadza maoko ako pane vanorwara, uye vachapona. Usadzoke kudakara ini Ishe, ndakutumira. Ita mwoyo murefu mumatambudziko. Kumbira, uye uchagashira; gogodza, uye uchazarurirwa.
Usatsvake kuzviremedza. Siya kose kusarurama. Usaite hupombwe—chiyedzo icho chaunonetsekana nacho.
Chengeta zvirevo izvi, nokuti ndezvechokwadi uye zvakatendeka; uye iwe uchakudziridza chigaro chako, uye uchisundira vanhu vazhinji kuZioni nenziyo dzerufaro rwusingaperi pamisoro yavo.
Ramba uri muzvinhu izvi kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo, uye uchawana korona yeupenyu hwokusingapere kuruoko rwerwudyi rwaBaba vangu, avo vazere nenyasha nechokwadi.
Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, Mwari vako, Mununuri vako, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/67.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 67
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ishe vanonzwa minamato yemagosa avo uye nokuvachengeta; 4–9, Vanoti kune vakachenjera kupfuura vose itai tione chimwe chezvakazarurwa chakafanana nechangu; 10–14, Magosa akatendeka achamutswa neMweya uye agoona chiso chaMwari.

verses.text: Tarisai, uye muteerere, imi magosa echechi yangu, imi maungana pamwechete, mune minamato yandanzwa, uye mune mwoyo yandinoziva, uye mune zvido zvauya kumusoro pamberi pangu.
Tarisai uye mutarise, maziso angu ari pamuri, uye matenga nenyika zviri mumaoko angu, uye upfumi hwekusingaperi ndehwangu kupa.

Makaedza kutenda kuti munofanira kugashira maropafadzo amakapuhwa; asi tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri makanga muine kutya mumwoyo yenyu, uye zvirokwazvo ndicho chikonzero chakaita kuti murege kugashira.
Uye zvino, ini Ishe, ndinokupai uchapupu hwechokwadi hwemirairo iyi iri pamberi penyu.

Maziso enyu anga ari pamuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uye rurimi rwake mairwuziva, uye nekusarurama kwake maikuziva; uye makatsvaka mumwoyo yenyu ruzivo kuti zvimwe mungataure kupfuura rurimi rwake, izvi naizvowo munozviziva.
Zvino tsvakai kubva muBhuku reMirairo, kunyangwe mudikidiki uyo uri pakati paro, uye mugodoma uyo ane uchenjeri hwakanyanya pakati penyu.
Kana kuti, kana paine mumwe pakati penyu angaite mumwe wakafanana naiwowo, zvino munozorevererwa kana muchiti hamuzive kana zviri zvechokwadi;
Asi kana musingagone kuita chakaita saichocho, muri pasi pekutongwa kana musingagone kupupura kuti ndezvechokwadi.
Nokuti munoziva kuti hamuna kusarurama mazviri, uye icho chakaruruma chinodzika kubva kumusoro, kubva kuna Baba wezviedza.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri kuti ikodzero yenyu uye ndichivimbisa imi makagadzwa muhushumiri huno, maererano nekuzvikurura kubva mushanje nokutya, uye mukazvininipisa pamberi pangu, nokuti hamuna kuzvininipisa zvakakwana, chidzitiro chichatsemurwa uye muchandiona mugoziva kuti Ndini—kwete nezvenyama kana nepfungwa yezvenyama, asi neyemweya.
Nokuti hakuna munhu akaona Mwari panguva ipi zvayo munyama, kunze kwekunge akamutswa neMweya waMwari.
Kana ani zvake munhu wenyama angagare pamberi paMwari, kana mupfungwa yenyama.
Imi hamugone kurarama pamberi paMwari iyezvino, kana hushumiri hwengirozi; nokudaro rambai muine mwoyo murefu kudakara mave vakakwana.
Musarega pfungwa dzenyu dzichicheuka shure; uye kana makakodzera, munguva yangu muchaona uye mugoziva icho chakaiswa pamuri nemaoko emuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/68.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 68
chapter_summary: 1–5, Mazwi emagosa kana vafemerwa neMweya Mutsvene anova magwaro matsvene; 6–12, Magosa anofanira kuparidza nokubhabhatidza, uye zviratidzo zvichatevera vanotenda zvechokwadi; 13–24, Dangwe pakati pevana vaAroni vanogona kushanda saBhishopi Anotungamira (zvinoreva kuti anobata makiyi ehutungamiri sabhishopi) ari pasi pehurairi hweHutungamiri Hwekutanga; 25–28, Vabereki vanoudzwa kuti vadzidzise vhangeri kuvana vavo; 29–35, Vatendi vanofanira kucherechedza Sabata, vashande zvakasimba, uye vanamate.

verses.text: Muranda wangu Orson Hyde, akadaidzwa nokugadzwa kwake kuti ashambadze vhangeri risingaperi, neMweya waMwari mupenyu, kubva kuvanhu kuenda kuvanhu, uye nekubva munyika iyi achienda kunyika iyo, mumagungano evakaipa, mumasinagogo avo, achitaura navo uye nokutsanangura magwaro matsvene ose kwavari.
Uye tarisai, uye mutarise uyu ndiwo mufananidzo kune avo vose vakagadzwa hupirisita huno, avo vakapihwa basa rekuti vabude kunze—
Uye uyu ndiwo mufananidzo kwavari, kuti vachataura sekufemerwa kwavanenge vaitwa neMweya Mutsvene.

Uye kana chiri chavachataura vafemerwa neMweya Mutsvene chichave rugwaro rwutsvene, chichave chido chaIshe, chichave pfungwa dzaIshe, chichave shoko raIshe, chichave izwi raIshe, uye nesimba raMwari rekuponesa.
Tarisai, ichi ndicho chivimbiso chaIshe kwamuri, imi varanda vangu.

Nokudaro, ivai nokufara, uye musatye, nokuti ini Ishe, ndinemi, uye ndichamira nemi; uye imi muchapupura pamusoro pangu, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu, kuti ndiri Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu, kuti ndaive, kuti ndiri, uye nokuti ndichauya.

Iri ishoko raIshe kwauri muranda wangu Orson Hyde, uyewo nekumuranda wangu Luke Johnson, uye nekumuranda wangu Lyman Johnson, uye nekumuranda wangu William E. McLellin, uye nekune vakatendeka vose magosa echechi yangu—
Endai munyika yose, paridzai vhangeri kuchisikwa chose, muchishanda nemvumo yandakakupai, muchibhabhatidza muzita raBaba, nereMwanakomana, nereMweya Mutsvene.
Uye uyo anotenda uye akabhabhatidzwa, achaponeswa, uye uyo asingatende, achatongwa.
Uye uyo anotenda acharopafadzwa nezviratidzo zvinomutevera, kunyangwe sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa.
Uye kwamuri kuchapihwa kuziva zviratidzo zvenguva, uye nezviratidzo zvekuuya kweMwanakomana weMunhu;
Uye sekuwanda kuchaita avo vachapupurirwa naBaba, kwamuri kuchapihwa simba rekuvasunganidza kuupenyu hwokusingaperi. Ameni.
Uye zvino, maererano nezvezvimwe zvinhu pamusoro pezvibvumirano nemirairo, ndezvizvi—
Kune zvimwe mushure menguva ino, munguva yaIshe mamwe mabhishopi anofanira kuiswa munzvimbo muchechi, kuti vashande kunyangwe sezvaiita vekutanga;
Nokudaro, vachave vapirisita vepamusoro vakakodzera, uye vachadomwa neveHutungamiri Hwekutanga hweHupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, kunze kwekunge vari vechizvarwa chechokwadi chaAroni.
Uye kana vari vechizvarwa chaAroni chechokwadi vane kodzero iri pamurau kuhuBhishopi, kana vari matangwe pakati pevanakomana vaAroni;
Nokuti dangwe rine mvumo yekuwana hutungamiri pamusoro pehupirisita uhu, uye nemakiyi kana mvumo yazvo.
Hakuna munhu ane kodzero yakakwana kuve muchinzvimbo ichi, kuve nekiyi dzehupirisita uhu, kunze kwekunge ari chizvarwa chechokwadi chaicho uye ari dangwe raAroni.

Asi semupirisita wepamusoro muhupirisita hwaMerkizedeki ane mvumo yekubata mumabasa ose epasi anogona kubata muchinzvimbo chabhishopi kana pasina chizvarwa chaicho chaAroni chingawanikwe, ndokunge adaidzwa nekutsaurwa ogadzwa kusimba iri, pasi pemaoko eHutungamiri Hwekutanga weHupirisita hwaMerkizedeki.

Uye chizvarwa chaicho chaAroni chinofanirawo kunongedzwa neHutungamiri uhu chowanikwa kuti chakakodzera nokuzodzwa chogadzwa pasi pemaoko uHutungamiri uhwu, kana zvisizvo havana mvumo yakakwana yekuita basa muhupirisita hwavo.

Asi pamusana pechisungo chakaitwa maererano nekodzero yavo yehupirisita uhwo hunobva pana Baba huchienda kumwanakomana, vanogona kutsvaka kuzodzwa kwavo kana vakakwanisa kuratidza, panguva ipi zvayo kuti mutsetse wekuzvarwa kwavo ndeuyu, kana kuzvitsinhira nezvakazarurwa zvinobva kuna Ishe pasi pemaoko eHutungamiri hwabva kutaurwa pamusoro.
Uye zvakare, hakuna bhishopi kana mupirisita wepamusoro, uyo achatsaurirwa kuhushumiri uhu achayedzwa kana kubatwa nemhosva ipi zvayo, kunze kwekunge pari pamberi peHutungamiri Hwekutanga hwechechi.
Kana ari awanikwa aine mhosva pamberi peHutungamiri uhu, neuchapupu husingagone kurambwa, achatongwa.
Uye kana akatendeuka anoregererwa, maererano nezvibvumirano nemirairo yechechi.

Uye zvakare, kana vabereki vaine vana muZioni, kana munechero hoko dzayo dzakarongwa, avo vasingavadzidzise kuti vanzwisise dzidziso yekutendeuka, rutendo munaKristu Mwanakomana waMwari mupenyu, uye nezverubhabhatidzo uye nechipo cheMweya Mutsvene nokugadzwa maoko pamusoro, pakusvitsa makore masere, chitadzo ichocho ngachive pamusoro pevabereki.
Nokuti uyu uchave mutemo kuvagari vemuZioni, kana munechero hoko dzayo dzakarongwa.
Uye vana vavo vachabhabhatidzwa kuti varegererwe zvitadzo zvavo pavanenge vave nemakore masere, uye vachibva vagashira kugadzwa maoko pamusoro.
Uye vachadzidzisawo vana vavo kunamata, uye nokuti vafambe vakatwasanuka pamberi paIshe.
Uye vagari vemuZioni naivowo vachacherechedza Sabata kuti varichengete riri dzvene.
Uye vagari vemuZioni naivowo vanofanira kurangarira kushanda kwavo, kana vari vakadomwa kuti vashande, nomukutendeka kose; nokuti uyo anenungo achave mukurangarirwa pamberi paIshe.

Zvino, ini Ishe, handisi kunyatsofadzwa nevagari vemuZioni, nokuti mune nyope mukati mavo; uye nevana vavo varikukurawo mukati mezvakaipa; havatsvake neshungu upfumi hwekusingapere, asi maziso avo azere nemakaro.
Zvose zvinhu izvi hazvifanire kuvepo, uye zvinofanira kubviswa mukati mavo; nokudaro regai muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery atakure mazwi aya kunyika yeZioni.
Uye ndinovapa murairo—kuti uyo asingacherechedze kuita minamato yake pamberi paIshe nemwaka wakafanira, regai ave mukurangarirwa pamberi pemutongi wevanhu vangu.
Mazwi aya ndeechokwadi uye akatendeka; nokudaro musaatyore, kana kubvisa mamwe mazwi maari.
Tarisai ndini Arfa naOmega, uye ndinokurumidza kuuya. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/69.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 69
chapter_summary: 1–2, John Whitmer achaperekedza Oliver Cowdery kuMissouri; 3–8, Anofanirawo kuparidza uye nokuunganidza, nokuchengetedza uye nokunyora nyaya dzenhoroondo.

verses.text: Teererai kwandiri imi, vanodaro Mwari venyu, pamusana pemuranda wangu Oliver Cowdery. Hazvina ungwaru kwandiri kuti apihwe mirairo nemari zvaachatakura kuenda nazvo kunyika yeZioni, kunze kwekunge kuine mumwe anoenda naye uyo anenge ari pachokwadi uye akatendeka.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe ndinoda kuti muranda wangu, John Whitmer, aende nemuranda wangu Oliver Cowdery;
Uye nokutiwo acharamba achinyora uye achiita nhoroondo rwezvinhu zvose zvakakosha izvo zvaachaona nokuziva pamusoro pechechi yangu.
Uye nokutiwo agashire kurairwa uye nokuyamurwa kubva kumuranda wangu Oliver Cowdery nevamwe.
Uyewo varanda vangu vari pasi pose vanofanira kutumirwa zvavakaita muhutariri hwavo kunyika yeZioni;
Nokuti nyika yeZioni ichave chigaro nenzvimbo yekugashira uye nekuita zvose zvinhu izvi.
Zvisinei, regai muranda wangu John Whitmer afambe nguva dzakawanda achienda kubva nzvimbo nenzvimbo, kubva kuchechi kuenda kuchechi, kuti zvimuitire nyore kuwana ruzivo—

Achiparidza nokutsanangura, achinyora, achitevedzera zvinyorwa zviripo achisarudza, uye nokuwana zvose zvinhu zvichave zvakanaka kuchechi, uye nezvizvarwa zvirikukura izvo zvichakurira munyika yeZioni, kuti ive yavo zvizvarwa nezvizvarwa, nariini nariini. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/70.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 70
chapter_summary: 1–5, Vatariri vanosarudzwa vekuti vashambadze zvakazarurwa; 6–13, Avo vanoshanda muzvinhu zvemweya vanokodzera mubairo wavo; 14–18, Vatendi vanofanira kuve vakaenzana muzvinhu zvemunyika.

verses.text: Tarisai, uye muteerere, imi vagari vemuZioni, uye nemi vanhu vechechi yangu vari kure, uye munzwe izwi raIshe randinopa kumuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uyewo nekumuranda wangu Martin Harris, uyewo nekumuranda wangu Oliver Cowdery, uyewo nekumuranda wangu John Whitmer, uyewo nekumuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon, uyewo nekumuranda wangu William W. Phelps, nenzira yemurairo kwavari.
Nokuti ndinovapa murairo; nokudaro teererai munzwe, ndikokutaura kwaIshe kwavari—
Ini Ishe ndakavadoma, uye ndikavagadza kuti vave vatariri vezvakazarurwa nemirairo iyo yandakavapa, uye neiyo yandichavapa pano;
Uye rondedzero yehutariri uhu ndichaida kwavari muzuva rekutongwa.
Nokudaro, ndadoma kwavari uye iri ndiro basa ravo muchechi yaMwari, kuzvitarisa uye nezvose zvine chekuita nezvazvo, hongu, nezvavanowana mukudaro.
Nokudaro, ndinopa murairo kwavari, kuti havafanire kuzopa zvinhu izvi kuchechi, kana kunyika;
Zvisinei, kana vari vanenge vachigashira zvakawanda kupfuura zvavanofanirwa uye nezvavanoda, zvichapihwa kumba yangu yekuchengetera;
Uye rubatsiro ruchapihwa kuvagari vemuZioni, uye nekuzvizvarwa zvavo, sezvo vachinge vave vagari venhaka maererano nemirau yemuumambo.
Tarisai, izvi ndizvo zvinodiwa naIshe kumunhu wose muhutariri hwake, kunyange seni Ishe, ndadoma kana zvandichadomera kumunhu upi zvake kubva zvino.
Uye tarisai, hapana anosiiwa mumutemo uyu iye ari wechechi yaMwari mupenyu;
Hongu, kana bhishopi, kana mumiririri anochengeta imba yaIshe yekuchengetera, kana uyo anodomwa kuhutariri hwekufambisa zvinhu zvemunyika.
Uyo akadomwa kuti afambise zvinhu zvemweya, iyeyo akakodzera mubairo wake, kunyangwe seavo vakadomwa kuti vave vatariri vanotarira zvinhu zvepano;
Hongu, kunyangwe zvakawanda, uye uko kuwanda kwacho kwakapetwa kazhinji kwavari kuburikidza nezvinoratidzwa neMweya.
Zvisinei, muzvinhu zvenyu zvepano muchaenzana, uye izvi kwete muchinyunyuta, nokuti kuwanda kwezviratidzo zveMweya kungabviswe.
Zvino, uyu murairo ndinoupa kuvaranda vangu kuti zvivabatsire vachiriko, sechiratidzo chemaropafadzo angu pamisoro yavo, uye semubairo wekushingirira kwavo uye kuitira kuvadzivirira;
Kwezvekudya nezvekupfeka; kwenhaka; kwedzimba uye nokwenyika, pari papi zvapo ini Ishe, pandichavaisa, uye kwose zvako, ini Ishe, kwandichavatumira.
Nokuti vanga vakatendeka muzvinhu zvizhinji, uye vakaita zvakanaka mune zvose zvavasina kutadza
Tarisai, ini Ishe, ndine tsitsi uye ndichavaropafadza, uye vachapinda mukufara kwezvinhu izvi. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 71
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joseph Smith naSidney Rigdon vanotumwa kunoparidza vhangeri; 5–11, Vavengi vevatendi vachanyadziswa.

verses.text: Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri imi varanda vangu Joseph Smith Mwana, naSidney Rigdon, kuti nguva, zvirokwazvo yauya kuti zvinofanira uye nokudiwa mandiri, kuti muzarure miromo yenyu mukushambadza vhangeri rangu, zvinhu zveumambo, muchitsanangura zvakavanzika muchizviburitsa mumagwaro matsvene, maererano nemugove uyo weMweya nesimba izvo zvichapihwa kwamuri, kunyangwe sekuda kwangu ini.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, paridzai kunyika mumatunhu akatenderedza, uye nemuchechiwo, kwechinguva chakati kuti, kunyangwe kusvika zvaitwa kuti zviziviswe kwamuri.
Zvirokwazvo iri ibasa rechinguvana, randiri kupa kwauri.
Nokudaro, shandai imi mumunda wangu wemizambiringa. Daidzirai kuvagari vemunyika, uye mupe uchapupu, uye mugadzirire nzira yemirairo nezvakazarurwa izvo zvichauya.
Zvino, tarisai uhu hungwaru; ani zvake anoverenga, regai anzwisise uye agogashirawo;
Nokuti kune uyo anogashira achapihwa zvizhinji zvakawedzerwa, kunyangwe simba.
Nokudaro, kangaidzai vavengi venyu; vadaidzei kuti vasangane nemi kwose, pane vanhu uye nepamunenge muri mega; uye imi kana muri vakatendeka kunyara kwavo kuchaiswa pachena.
Nokudaro, regai vaunze zvikonzero zvavo zvakasimba zvekurwisana naIshe.
Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri—hakuna chombo chinoitirwa kukurwisai chichabudirira;
Uye kana mumwe munhu akasimudza izwi rake achikurwisai, achanyadziswa munguva yangu.
Nokudaro, chengetai mirairo yangu; ndeye chokwadi uye yakatendeka. Kunyangwe saizvovo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/72.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 72
chapter_summary: 1–8, Magosa anofanira kutaura pamusoro pehutariri hwavo kuna bhishopi; 9–15, Bhishopi anochengeta imba yekuchengetera uye achiyamura varombo uye nevanoshaya; 16–26, Mabhishopi achave anotsinhira kukodzera kwemagosa.

verses.text: Teererai, uye munzwe kuizwi raIshe, imi maungana pamwechete, imi muri mapirisita epamusoro echechi yangu, kwamuri kuri kwakapihwa umambo nesimba.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, zvakanaka kwandiri kuti bhishopi adomerwe imi, kana kudomwa nemi, kuchechi muchidimbu chino chemunda wemizambiringa raIshe.
Uye zvirokwazvo muchinhu ichi maita zvakangwara, nokuti zvinodiwa naIshe, kumutariri ega-ega kuti ape rondedzero yehutariri hwake, zvose munguva ino uye nokusingaperi.
Nokuti kune uyo anotendeka uye akangwara nekufamba kwenguva anowanikwa akakodzera kugara nhaka yedzimba dzaakagadzirirwa naBaba vangu.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, magosa echechi chidimu chino chemunda wangu wemizambiringa vachataura nezvebasa ravo kuna bhishopi, uyu achadomwa neni, muchidimu chino chebindu rangu remidzambiringa.
Izvi zvinhu zvichave zvakanyorwa, kuti zvigopihwa kuna bhishopi muZioni.
Uye basa rabhishopi richaziviswa kuburikidza nemirairo iyo yakapihwa, uye nezwi remuchechi mukuru.

Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney ndiye munhu achadomwa uye nokugadzwa kusimba iri. Ichi ndicho chido chaIshe Mwari venyu, Mununuri venyu kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.
Shoko raIshe, kuwedzera pane mutemo wapihwa, rinoita kuti basa rabhishopi rizivikanwe uyo akagadzwa kuchechi muchikamu chino chemunda wemizambiringa, rinova zvirokwazvo rinova—
Kuchengeta hozi yaIshe yekuchengetera; kutambira mari yechechi muchikamu chino chemunda wemizambiringa;
Kugashira zvisumo zvemagosa sekurairwa kwazvakaitwa kare; uye nekuropafadzra kune zvavanoda, avo vachabhadhara izvo zvavanogashira, kana vari vanazvo zvekubhadharisa;
Kuti izvi naizvozvo zvipirwe mukuyamura chechi. Kuvarombo nekune vanoshaya.
Uye uyo asina chekubhadharisa nacho, chikwereti ichocho chichatorwa chonopihwa kuna bhishopi weZioni, uyo achabhadhara chikwereti ichocho neizvo zvichaiswa mumaoko ake naIshe.
Uye kushanda kwevakatendeka avo vanoshanda muzvinhu zvemweya, mukuropafadza basa revhangeri uye nezvinhu zveumambo kuchechi, uye nekunyika, zvinotorwa semuripo wechikwereti kuna bhishopi muZioni;
Ndikokubva kwainoita muchechi, nokuti maererano nemutemo wose munhu anouya kuZioni anofanira kuisa zvose pamberi pabhishopi muZioni.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ose magosa ari muchikamu chino chemunda wemizambiringa akafanira kusuma hutariri hwavo kuna bhishopi muchikamu chino chemunda wemuzambiringa—

Tsamba inotsigira inobva kumutongi kana bhishopi muchikamu chino chemunda wemizambiringa, kana bhishopi muZioni, inoita kuti wose munhu atambirwe, uye inotaura zvose zvinodiwa, kuti ave nenhaka, uye nekuti agashirwe semutariri akangwara uye semushandi akatendeka;
Kana asina, haazogashirwa nabhishopi weZioni.

Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai rose gosa richazvidairira kuna bhishopi wechechi muchikamu chino chemunda wemizambiringa varevererwe nechechi kana machechi, umo maanoshanda, kuti azviratidze iye nezvaanoita kuti zvakakodzera muzvinhu zvose.
Uye zvakare, regai varanda vangu vakadomwa sevatariri pamusoro pezvinetso zvemabhuku zvechechi yangu vave nekodzero yekuyamurwa nabhishopi kana mabhishopi muzvinhu zvose—
Kuti zvakazarurwa zvishambadzwe, uye zviende kumiganhu yenyika; kuti naivowo vawane mari iyo ichayamura chechi muzvinhu zvose;
Kuti vazviratidze kuti vakakodzera muzvinhu zvose, uye vachiverengwa sevatariri vakangwara.
Uye zvino, tarisai uyu uchave mufananidzo kumapazi ose akasiyana-siyana echechi yangu, munyika yose zvayo yaangave amiswa. Uye zvino ndinopedza kutaura kwangu. Ameni.
Mazwi mashomanani ekuwedzera kumutemo yeumambo, pamusoro penhengo dzechechi-avo vakadomwa neMweya Mutsvene kuti vaende kuZioni, uye neavo vakakomborerwa kuenda kuZioni—
Regai vatakure kuna bhishopi tsamba yekutsigira inobva kumagosa matatu echechi, kana tsamba yekutsigira inobva kuna bhishopi;
Zvikasava saizvozvo uyo achaenda kunyika yeZioni haazoverengwa semutariri akangwara. Uyuwo mufananidzo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/73.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 73
chapter_summary: 1–2, Magosa anofanira kuramba achiparidza; 3–6, Joseph Smith naSidney Rigdon vanofanira kuramba vachidudzira Bhaibheri kusvikira rapera.

verses.text: Nokuti zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, zvakafanira kwandiri kuti varambe vachiparidza vhangeri, uye nemukuyambira kumachechi ari mumatunhu akatenderedza, kudakara kwaitwa musangano mukuru.
Uye zvino, tarisai, zvichaziviswa kwavari, nezwi remusangano mukuru, hushumiri hwavo hwakasiyana-siyana.
Zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri varanda vangu, Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon, vanodaro Ishe, zvinofanira kuti mududzire zvakare;
Uye kana zviri zvinoitika, kuti muparidze mumatunhu akatenderedza kudakara musi wemusangano mukuru; uye mushure mezvo munofanira kuenderera mberi nebasa rekududzira kusvikira rapera.
Uye regai zvive mufananidzo kumagosa kudakara kwave nerumwe ruzivo rwakawedzerwa, kunyangwe sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa.
Zvino handichakupai zvimwe nguva ino. Sungirai nguwo dzenyu muchiuno uye muve makatsiga. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/74.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 74
chapter_summary: 1–5, Pauro anoraira Chechi yemazuva ake kuti isachengete mutemo waMosesi; 6–7, Vana vadiki vatsvene uye vakacheneswa kuburikidza neRudzikinuro.

verses.text: Nokuti murume asingatende anocheneswa nemukadzi; uye mudzimai asingatende anocheneswa nemurume; pasina izvozvo vana venyu vainge vasina kuchena, asi zvino vave vatsvene.
Zvino, mumazuva evaapositori mutemo wekudzingiswa waiitwa mukati memaJuda ose avo vakanga vasingatende vhangeri raJesu Kristu.

Uye zvakaitika kuti kwakamuka gakava guru mukati mevanhu pamusoro pemutemo wekudzingiswa, nokuti murume akange asingatende aida kuti vana vake vadzingiswe, kuti vave pasi pemutemo waMosesi, uri mutemo wakanga wazadzikiswa.
Uye zvakaitika kuti vana, sezvo vakarererwa pasi pemutemo waMosesi, vakateerera tsika dzemadzibaba avo uye vakasatenda vhangeri raKristu, mukudaro vakabva vave vasiri vatsvene.

Nokudaro nechikonzero ichi muapositori akanyorera kuchechi, achipa kwavari murairo, kwete waIshe, asi wake iye, kuti mutendi haana kufanira kubatana neasingatende; kunze kwekunge mutemo waMosesi wabviswa pakati pavo.
Kuti vana vavo vagare vasina kudzingiswa; uye nokuti tsika iyoyo ibviswe, iyo inoti vana vadiki havasi vatsvene; nokuti zvaiitwa pakati pemaJuda;
Asi vana vadiki vatsvene, nokuti vakacheneswa kuburikidza nerudzikinuro rwaJesu Kristu; uye izvi ndizvo zvinoreva magwaro matsvene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 75
chapter_summary: 1–5, Magosa akatendeka vanoparidza vhangeri vachawana upenyu hwokusingaperi; 6–12, Namatai kuti mugashire Munyaradzi, uyo anodzidzisa zvose zvinhu; 13–22, Magosa achagara mukutonga avo vanoramba mashoko avo; 23–36, Mhuri dzevashumairi dzinofanira kugashira ruyamuro kubva kuChechi.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, ndiri kutaura kunyangwe nezwi reMweya wangu, kunyangwe Arfa naOmega, Ishe venyu naMwari venyu—
Teererai, imi makapa mazita enyu kuti muende kunoparidza vhangeri rangu, uye nokukwanhurira munda wangu wemizambiringa.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri chido changu kuti muende izvozvi uye musagare, kana kuve neunyope asi kuti mushande nesimba renyu—
Muchisimudza mazwi enyu sekurira kwehwamanda, muchishambadzira chokwadi maererano nezvakazarurwa uye nemirairo iyo yandakakupai.
Uye saka, kana makatendeka muchatakudzwa masvinga mazhinji, uye mugogadzwa nerukudzo, nokubwinya, uye nokusafa, uye noupenyu hwokusingaperi.
Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kumuramda wangu William E. McLellin, ndabvisa hutumwa hwandakapa kwaari kuti ayende kunyika dzekumabvazuva;
Uye ndinopa kwaari hutumwa hutsva uye nemurairo mutsva, umo ini Ishe ndinomuranga pamusana pekugunun’una kuri mumwoyo make;
Uye akaita chitadzo, zvisinei, ndinomuregerera uye ndinoti kwaari zvakare, Enda kunyika dzekuChamhembe.
Uye regai muranda wangu Luke Johnson ayende naye, uye vanoshambadza zvinhu zvandakavaraira—
Vachidaidzira kuzita raIshe kuti vawane Mweya Munyaradzi, uyo achavadzidzisa zvose zvinhu zvakafanira kwavari.
Vachinamata nguva dzose kuti vasanete; uye sekuita kwavanenge vachiita izvi, ndinenge ndinavo kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo.
Tarisai, ichi ndichochido chaIshe Mwari venyu maererano nemi. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, regai muranda wangu Orson Hyde uye nemuranda wangu Samuel H. Smith, vaende rwendo rwavo kunyika dzekumabvazuva, uye vachishambadza zvinhu zvandakavaraira; uye kana varivakatendeka, onai ndinenge ndinavo kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kumuranda wangu Lyman Johnson, nekumuranda wangu Orson Pratt, naivowo vachaenda rwendo rwavo kunyika dzekumabvazuva, uye tarisai, uye muone, ndinavowo, kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kuramunda wangu Asa Dodds uye nekumuranda wangu Calves Wilson, kuti naivowo vachaenda rwendo rwavo kunyika dziri kumadokero, uye vagoshambadza vhangeri rangu, kunyangwe sekuvaraira kwandakaita.
Uye uyo akatendeseka achakurira zvose zvinhu, uye achasimudzwa muzuva rekupedzisira.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kumuranda wangu Major N. Ashley, uye nemuranda wangu Burr Riggs, regai vaende rwendo rwavo kunyika yekuchamhembe.
Hongu, regai vose ivavo vaende rwendo rwavo, sekuraira kwandaita kwavari, vachienda kubva kuimba neimba, uye kubva kumusha nemusha, uye kubva kuguta neguta.
Uye mumba ipi zvayo yamuchapinda, uye vakakutambirai, siyai maropafadzo enyu pamba iyoyo.
Uye mumba ipi zvayo yamuchapinda, uye vakasakutambirai, muchabva nokukurumidza pamba ipapo, uye mozunza guruva retsoka dzenyu seuchapupu pamusoro pavo.
Uye imi muchazadzwa nemufaro nekufara; uye muzive izvi, kuti muzuva rekutongwa imi muchave vatongi vemba iyoyo, uye movatonga.

Uye zvichavenani kuvahedheni muzuva rekutongwa, pane vemba iyoyo; nokudaro, sungirai nguwo dzenyu muchiuno uye muve vakatendeka, uye muchakunda zvose zvinhu, uye mugosimudzwa muzuva rekupedzisira. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.
Uye zvakare, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri, imi magosa echechi yangu, makapa mazita enyu kuti muzive chido chavo pamusoro penyu—
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, ibasa rechechi kuyamura mukuriritira mhuri dzavo, uyewo nokuriritira mhuri dzeavo vakadaidzwa uye vari vanofanira kutumwa munyika kunoshambadza vhangeri kunyika.
Nokudaro, ini Ishe, ndinopa kwamuri murairo, kuti muwane nzvimbo dzemhuri dzenyu, kana hama dzenyu dzichida kuzurura mwoyo yadzo.
Uye regai avo vose vanokwanisa kuwana nzvimbo dzemhuri dzavo, uye nerutsigiro rwechechi kwavari, vasatadze kuenda munyika, kana kumabvazuva kana kumadokero, kana kumaodzanyemba, kana kuchamhembe.
Regai vakumbire uye vachagashira, vagogodze uye vachazarurirwa, uye zvichibva zvaziviswa kubva kumusoro kunyangwe naMweya Munyaradzi, kwavachaenda.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti wose munhu anosungirwa kuriritira mhuri yake, anofanira kuiriritira, uye haazorasikirwa nengundu yake; uye regai ashande muchechi.
Regai munhu wose ashande nesimba muzvinhu zvose; uye nyope haizove nenzvimbo muchechi kunze kwekunge atendeuka uye agadziridza nzira yake.
Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Simeon Carter uye nemuranda wangu Emer Harris vabatane muhushumiri;
Uyewo nemuranda wangu Ezra Thayre nemuranda wangu Thomas B. Marsh;
Nemuranda wanguwo Hyrum Smith uye nemuranda wangu Reynolds Cahoon;
Uyewo nemuranda wangu Daniel Stanton uye nemuranda wangu Seymour Brunson;
Uyewo nemuranda wangu Sylvester Smith uye nemuranda wangu Gideon Carter;
Uyewo nemuranda wangu Ruggles Eames nemuranda wangu Stephen Burnett;
Uye nemuranda wangu Micah B. Welton uyewo nemuranda wangu Eden Smith. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/76.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 76
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ishe ndivo Mwari; 5–10, Zvakavanzika zveumambo zvicharatidzwa kune vose vakatendeka; 11–17, Vose vachauya mukumuka kuvakafa kwevakarurama kana kwevasina kururama; 18–24, Vagari venyika dzakawanda vanakomana nevanasikana vakaberekwa kuna Mwari kuburikidza nerudzikinuro rwaJesu Kristu; 25–29, Ngirozi yaMwari yakapunzika ikave dhiabhorosi; 30–49, Vanakomana vekuraswa vanoraswa kwokusingaperi; vose vamwe vanotowana chimwe chinhanho cheruponeso; 50–70, Kubwinya nemubairo wevanhu vakakwiridzirwa muumambo hweseresitiyaro zvinotsanangurwa; 71–80, Avo vachawana nhaka yeumambo hweteresitiyaro vanotsangurwa; 81–113, Zvinzvimbo zveavo vari mukubwinya kwetiresitiyaro, nekweteresitiyaro, nekweseresitiyaro zvinotsanangurwa; 114–119, Vakatendeka vangaone uye nokunzwisisa zvakavanzika zveumambo hwaMwari nesimba reMweya Mutsvene.

verses.text: Inzwai, imi matenga, uye upe nzeve, iwe nyika, uye mufare imi vagari vemo, nokuti Ishe ndiMwari, uye kunze kwavo hakuna mumwe Muponesi.
Hukuru ungwaru hwavo, dzinoshamisa nzira dzavo, mwero wekuita kwavo hauna anouwana.
Zvinangwa zvavo hazvitadzike, uye hakuna kana ani anorambidza ruoko rwavo.
Kubva kwokusingaperi kusvika kwokusingaperi ndivo vamwechetevo, uye makore avo haagume.
Nokuti ndiko kutaura kwaIshe—ini Ishe, ndine tsitsi uye ndine nyasha kune avo vanonditya, uye ndinofara kuparukudzo kune avo vanondishandira mukururama uye muchokwadi kusvika kumagumo.
Mubairo wavo uchave mukuru uye nokubwinya kwavo kuchave kwokusingaperi.

Uye kwavari ndicharatidza zvose zvakavanzika, hongu, zvose zvakavanzika zveumambo hwangu zvakavanzika kubvira kumazuva ekare, uye nezvemakore achauya ndichazviita kuti vazive zvinofadza chido changu pamusoro pezvinhu zvose zveumambo hwangu.
Hongu, kunyangwe zvishamiso zvekwekusingaperi vachazviziva, uye nezvinhu zvichauya ndichavaratidza, kunyangwe zvinhu zvezvizvarwa zvizhinji.
Uye ungwaru hwavo huchave hukuru, uye kunzwisisa kwavo kuchasvika kudenga; uye pamberi pavo ungwaru hwevachenjeri hunoparara, uye nokunzwisisa kwevakangwarira kunova kwenhando.

Nokuti neMweya wangu ndichavajekesera, uye nesimba rangu ndichazivisa kwavari zvakavanzika zvechido changu—hongu, kunyangwe izvo zvinhu zvisati zvaonekwa neziso, kana kunzwikwa nenzeve, kana zvisati zvambopinda mumwoyo wemunhu.
Isu, Joseph Smith, Mwana, naSidney Rigdon, tiri muMweya muzuva regumi nenhanhatu raKukadzi, mugore raIshe wedu rechiuru chine mazana masere nemakumi matatu nemaviri—
Nesimba reMweya maziso edu akazarurwa uye nokunzwisia kwedu kukajekeswa, kuti tione uye togonzwisisa zvinhu zvaMwari—

Kunyangwe izvo zvinhu zvakanga zviri kubvira pekutanga nyika isati yavepo, izvo zvakagadzwa naBaba, kuburikidza nekuMwanakomana wavo Mumwechete Akaberekwa, uyo akanga ari pachipfuva chaBaba, kunyangwe kubvira pakutanga;
Uyo watinopupura; uye uchapupu hwatinopa ndehwevhangeri rizere raJesu Kristu, uyo anova Mwanakomana, uyo watakaona uye tikataura naye muchiratidzo chekudenga.
Nokuti patakanga tichiita basa rekududzira, iro Ishe ravakanga vatidomera, takauya pandima yemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe muchitsauko chechishanu chaJohane, icho chakapihwa kwatiri sezvizvi—
Tichitaura nezvekumuka kwevakafa, maererano neavo vachanzwa izwi reMwanakomana weMunhu;
Vachauya mberi; avo vakaita zvakanaka, mukumuka kuvakafa kwevakarurama; uye avo vakaita zvakaipa, mukumuka kuvakafa kwevasina kururama.
Zvino izvi zvakaita kuti tishamiswe, nokuti zvakapihwa kwatiri neMweya.
Uye tichiri kufunga pamusoro pezvinhu izvi, Ishe vakabata maziso ekunzwisisa kwedu uye akazururwa, uye kubwinya kwaIshe kwaratidza kukatenderedza kwose.
Uye takaona kubwinya kweMwanakomana, kurudyi rwaBaba, uye tikagashira kuzara kwake;
Uye tikaona ngirozi tsvene, uye neavo vakacheneswa pamberi pechigaro chavo, vachinamata Mwari neGwayana, avo vanomunamata nariini nariini.
Uye zvino, mushure meuchapupu hwakawanda hwakapihwa pamusoro pake, uhu ndihwo uchapupu, hwekupedzisira hwevose, hwatinopa pamusoro pake: Kuti mupenyu!
Nokuti takamuona, kunyangwe kurwudyi rwaMwari; uye takanzwa izwi richipupura kuti ndiye Mumwechete Akaberekwa waBaba—
Kuti naiye, uye kuburikidza naiye, muna iye, nyika dziripo, uye dzakasikwa, uye nevagari vemo vanakomana nevanasikana vakaberekwa kuna Mwari.

Uye izvi takazvionawo, uye tinopupura, kuti ngirozi yaMwari iyo yakange ichitungamira pamberi paMwari, iyo yakapandukira Mumwechete Akaberekwa uyo aidiwa naBaba uye aive muchipfuva chaBaba, yakakandwa pasi kubva pamberi paMwari uye neMwanakomana.
Uye ikadaidzwa kunzi Kuraswa. Nokuti matenga akamuchema—aiva Rusifa mwanakomana wemangwanani.
Uye takaona, uye onai, apunzika! Apunzika, kunyangwe mwanakomana wamangwanani!

Uye tichiri mumweya kudaro, Ishe vakatiraira kuti tinyore chiratidzo ichi; nokuti takaona Satani, iye nyoka yakare, kana dhiabhorosi, akapandukira Mwari uye akatsvaka kutora umambo hwaMwari vedu naKristu wake—
Nokudaro, anoita hondo nevatendi vaMwari, uye anovakomberedza.
Uye takaona chiratidzo chekutambudzika kweavo vaakaita hondo navo akavakunda, nokuti uku ndikokuuya kwakaita izwi raIshe kwatiri;

Vanodaro Ishe maererano neavo vose vanoziva simba rangu, uye vakaitwa kuti vavewo naro, uye vakazvibvumira kuburikidza nesimba radhiabhorosi kuti vakundwe. Uye nokuramba chokwadi uye nokuramba simba rangu—
Ivavo ndivo vanakomana vekuraswa, avo vandinoti zvingadai zvirinani kwavari dai vasina kuzvarwa;
Nokuti midziyo yehasha, vakashurikidzirwa kutambudzwa nehasha dzaMwari, pamwechete nadhiabhorosi nengirozi dzake nokusingaperi;
Pamusoro peavo vandataura havana ruregerero munyika ino kana munyika ichuaya—
Varamba Mweya Mutsvene mushure mekuugashira, uye varamba Mwanakomana Mumwechete Akaberekwa waBaba, uye vamurovera pachavo uye vakamunyadzisa pachena.
Ava ndivo vachaenda kunopinda mudziva remoto nesuriferi nadhiabhorosi nengirozi dzake—
Uye ndivo chete vachakurirwa nerufu rwechipiri.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo, ndivo chete vasingazodzikinurwa nguva yakwana yaIshe, mushure mekutambudzwa nehasha dzavo.
Nokuti vamwe vose vachaunzwa nekumutswa kwevakafa, kuburikidza nokukunda nokubwinya kweGwayana, uyo akauraiwa,uyo akange ari pachipfuwa chaBaba nyika dzisati dzaitwa.
Uye iri ndiro vhangeri, mashoko anofadza ayo akapupurwa kwatiri nezwi rematenga—
Kuti akauya munyika, kunyangwe Jesu, kuti azoroverwa pamusoro penyika uye kuti atakure zvitadzo zvenyika, uye nokuchenesa nyika, uye nokuisuka kubva kune kwose kusarurama;
Kuti kuburikidza nemaari, vose vangaponeswe avo vakanga vaiswa naBaba musimba ravo uye vavakasika kuburikidza naye;
Anokudza Baba, uye achiponesa ose mabasa emaoko avo, kunze kweavo vanakomana vekuraswa vanoramba Mwanakomana mushure mekunge Baba vamuratidza.

Nokudaro, anoponesa vose kusara kweavo—vachaenda mukurangwa kusingaperi, uko kurangwa kusinamagumo, uko kurangwa kwokusingaperi, vachitonga vaina dhiabhorosi nengirozi dzake kwekusingaperi, uko honye yavo kwaisingafe, uye moto wacho haudzimwe, kunove ndiko kurwadziwa kwavo.
Uye kuguma kwacho, kana nzvimbo yacho kana kurwadziwa kwavo, hakuna munhu anoziva;
Hazvina kumboratidzwa, hazviratidzwe, uye hazvichazoratidzwa kumunhu, kunze kwekune avo vakaitwa kuti vavemo;
Zvisinei, ini Ishe, ndinozviratidza kuburikidza nemuchiratidzo kune vazhinji, asi pakarepo ndobva ndachipfiga zvakare;
Nokudaro, magumo, hupamhi, kureba, hudzami, uye nokusuwa kwacho, havanzwisise, kana ani zvake munhu kunze kweavo vakagadzirwa mukutongwa uku.
Uye takanzwa izwi, richiti: Nyorai chiratidzo ichi, nokuti onai, uko ndiko kupera kwechiratidzo chekutambudzika kwevasina humwari.
Uye zvakare tinopupura—nokuti takaona tikanzwa, uye uhwu ndihwo uchapupu hwevhangeri raKristu pamusoro peavo vachauya mukumuka kuvakafa kwevakarurama—
Ndivo vakagashira uchapupu hwaJesu, uye vakatenda muzita rake uye vakabhabhatidzwa netsika yekuvigwa kwake, vachivigwa mumvura muzita rake, uye izvi zviri maererano nemurairo waakapa—
Kuti nekuchengeta mirairo vangagezwe uye nokucheneswa zvitadzo zvavo, nokugashira Mweya Mutsvene nekugadzwa maoko neuyo akagadzwa uye akasimbiswa musimba iri.
Uye avo vanokunda nerutendo, uye vari vakasimbiswa neMweya Mutsvene weruvimbiso, uyo Baba wavanofemera kune vose avo vakarurama uye vari pachokwadi.
Ava ndivo vaya vanove chechi yeDangwe.
Ndivo vaye vakapihwa zvose zvinhu mumaoko avo naBaba.
Ndivo ivava vave vapirisita nemadzimambo, vakagashira kuzara kwavo, uye nokubwinya kwavo;
Uye vapirisita vehurongwa Hwepamusoro-soro hwaMerkezedeki, hwakanga huri muhurongwa hwaEnoki, hwakanga huri hurongwa hweMwanakomana Mumwechete Akaberekwa.
Nokudaro, sekunyorwa kwazvakaita, ndivana mwari, kunyangwe vanakomana vaMwari—
Nokudaro, zvose zvinhu ndezvavo, zvingave upenyu kana rufu, kana zvinhu zviripo, kana zvinhu zvichauya, zvose ndezvavo uye ndezvaKristu, uye Kristu ndewaMwari.
Uye vachakunda zvinhu zvose.
Nokudaro musarege munhu achivimba nemunhu, asi avimbe zvake muna Mwari, avo vachakurira vose vavengi pasi petsoka dzavo.
Ivava vachagara pamberi paMwari uye naKristu wavo nariini nariini.
Ivava ndivo vaachauya navo, paachauya mumakore ekudenga kuzotonga pasi pamusoro pevanhu vake.
Ndivo ivava vachave mukumuka kuvakafa kwekutanga.
Ndivo vachauya mukumuka kuvakafa kwekururama.
Ndivo ivava vanouya kuGomo reZioni, uye nemuguta raMwari mupenyu, nzvimbo yekudenga tsvene kupfuura dzose.
Ndivo ivava vauya kugungano rengirozi dzisingaverengeke, kugungano revose uye nechechi yaEnoki, uye nereDangwe.
Ndivo ivava vane mazita akanyorwa kudenga, uko Mwari naKristu ndivo vatongi vevose.
Ivava ndivo vaye vanova vanhu vakarurama vakaitwa vakakwana kuburikidza naJesu munyai wechibvumirano chitsva, uyu wakashanda urwu rudzikinuro rwakakwana kuburikidza nekudeura ropa rake.

Ndivo ivava vane miviri yeseresitiyaro, uye kubwinya kwavo kuri uko kwezuva kana kubwinya kwaMwari vari pamusoro-soro pavo vose, kubwinya kwacho kunonyorwa kuchienzaniswa nekubwinya kunoita zuva muhudzikwa.

Uye zvakare, takaona nyika yeteresitiyaro, uye tarisai, uye onai ava ndivo vemuteresitiyaro, vane kubwinya kwakasiyana neuko kwechechi yeDangwe avo vakagashira kuzara kwaBaba, kunyangwe sekusiyana kwakaita kwemwedzi nekwezuva muhudzikwa.
Tarisai, ivava ndivo vakafa vasina mutemo;
Uyewo avo vanove mweya yevanhu yachengetedzwa mutirongo, avo vakashanyirwa neMwanakomana, uye akaparidza vhangeri kwavari kuti vagotongwa maererano nevanhu munyama.
Vasina kugashira uchapupu hwaJesu munyama, asi musure vakazohugashira.
Ivava ndivo vanhu vanoremekedzwa vemunyika, vakanga vakapofomadzwa nekunyengedza kwevanhu.
Ivava ndivo vanogashira kubwinya kwake, asi kwete kuzara kwakwe.
Ivava ndivo vanogashira nokuve pamberi peMwanakomana, asi kwete nokuzara kwaBaba.
Nokudaro, miviri yeteresitiyaro, uye kwete miviri yeseresitiyaro, uye zvakasiyana mukubwinya sekusiyana kwakaita mwedzi nezuva.
Ivava ndivo vasina kushinga muuchapupu hwaJesu, nokudaro, havawane korona muumambo hwaMwari.
Uye zvino uko ndikokupera kwechiratidzo chatakaona cheteresitiyaro, icho Ishe chavakatiudza kuti tinyore tichiri muMweya.
Uye zvakare, takaona kubwinya kwetiresitiyaro, kubwinya kwacho kuri kushoma, kunyangwe sekusiyana kwakaita kubwinya kwenyenyedzi nokubwinya kwemwedzi muhudzikwa.
Ivava ndivo vasina kugashira vhangeri raKristu, kana uchapupu hwaJesu.
Ivava ndivo vasingarambe Mweya Mutsvene.
Ivava ndivo vanokandwa pasi kugehena.
Ivava ndivo vasinganunurwe kubva kuna dhiabhorosi kudakara kumuka kuvakafa kwekupedzisira, kudakara Ishe, kunyangwe Kristu Gwayana, vachinge vapedza basa ravo.
Ivava ndivo vasingagashire kuzara kwake munyika yokusingapere, asi kweMweya Mutsvene kuburikidza nehushumiri hwetiresitiyaro;
Uye teresitiyaro kuburikidza nehushumiri kweseresitiyaro.
Uyezve yetiresitiyaro zvinogashira nokuropafadzwa kwengirozi dzakaidomwa kuti dzishumire kwavari, kana kuti dzakadomwa kuti dzive mweya inoshumira kwavari; nokuti vachave vagari venhaka yeruponeso.
Uye ndikokuona kwatakaita, muchiratidzo chekudenga, kubwinya kwetiresitiyaro, kunopfuura kwose kunzwisisa.
Uye hakuna munhu anoziva kunze kweuyo akazviratidzwa naMwari.
Uye ndikokuona kwatakaita kubwinya kweteresitiyaro kunopfuura muzvinhu zvose, kunyangwe kubwinya kwetiresitiyaro mukubwinya, nemusimba, nemuhukuru nemuhutongi.
Uye ndikokuona kubwinya kweseresitiyaro. Uko kunokunda muzvinhu zvose—uko Mwari, kunyangwe Baba, vanotonga vari pachigaro chavo nariini nariini;
Pamberi pechigaro chavo zvose zvinokotama murukudzo rwakapfava, uye zvichivapa kubwinya nariini nariini.
Avo vanogara pamberi pake ndevechechi yeDangwe; uye vanoona sekuonekwa kwavanoitwa, uye vagoziva sekuzivikanwa kwavanoitwa, vari vakagashira kuzara kwake uye nenyasha dzake.
Uye anovaita kuti vaenzane musimba, uye nemuhukuru, nemukutonga.
Uye kubwinya kweseresitiyaro kumwe, kunyangwe sekubwinya kwezuva kuri kumwe.
Uye kubwinya kweteresitiyaro kumwe, kunyangwe sekubwinya kwemwedzi kuri kumwe.

Uye kubwinya kwetiresitiyaro kumwe, kunyangwe sekubwinya kwenyenyedzi kuri kumwe, nokuti sekusiyana kunoita imwe nyenyedzi neimwe mukubwinya, kunyangwe saizvozvo mumwe anosiyana nemumwe mukubwinya munyika yetiresitiyaro;
Nokuti ivava ndivovaye vanove vaPauro, uye nevaApollos, uye nevaKefasi.
Ivava ndivovanoti tiri vanhingi vamwe vachiti tiri vanhingi—vamwe vaKristu uye vamwe vaJohane, uye vamwe vaMosesi, uye vamwe vaEria, uye vamwe vaIsayasi, uye vamwe vaIsaya, uye vamwe vaEnoki;
Asi vasina kugashira vhangeri, kana uchapupu hwaJesu, kana maporofita, kana chibvumirano chisingaperi.
Chokupedzisira kune zvose, ava vose ndivo vaye vasingazoungana nevatendi, kundogashirwa muchechi yeDangwe, uye vagogashirwa mugore.
Ava ndivovanonyepa, ndeve mapipi, uye nemhombwe, uye nepfambi, uye ani zvake anoda nekuita nhema.
Ivava ndivovanotambudzika nehasha dzaMwari pano pasi.
Ivava ndivovanotambudzika nokutsividzwa nemoto wekusingaperi.
Ivava ndivovanokandwa pasi kugehena uye vagotambudzika nehasha dzaSamasimba Mwari, kudakara kuzara kwenguva, apo Kristu anenge akurira vose vavengi vave pasi petsoka dzake, uye akwanisa basa rake;

Apo paachaunza umambo, uye agohuratidza kuna Baba husina kana kavara, achiti: Ndakakunda uye ndikatsika-tsika chisvino chewaini ndega, kunyangwe chisvino chewaini chekutyisa kwehasha dzaSamasimba Mwari.
Zvino ndipo paachapfekedzwa korona yekubwinya kwake. Kuti agare pachigaro chesimba rake kuti atonge nariini nariini.

Asi tarisai, uye onai, takaona kubwinya uye nevagari vemunyika yetiresitiyaro, kuti vakanga vakawanda vasingaverengeke senyeredzi dziri muhudzikwa hwedenga, kana sejecha riri kumahombekombe kwegungwa;
Uye tikanzwa izwi raIshe richiti: Ava vose vachapfugama mabvi, uye ndimi dzose dzichareurura kwavari avo vagere pachigaro nariini nariini;
Nokuti vachatongwa maererano nemabasa avo, uye wose munhu achatambira maererano nemabasa ake, nechinzvimbo chake, mudzimba dzakagadzirwa;
Uye vachave varanda vewePamusoro-soro; asi uko kugere Mwari naKristu havangakuuye, nyika dzisingagume.
Uku ndikokuguma kwechiratidzo chatakaona, icho chatarairwa kuti tinyore tichiri muMweya.
Asi makuru uye anoshamisa mabasa aIshe, uye nezvakavanzika zveumambo hwavo zvavakaratidza kwatiri, zvinopfuura kwose kunzwisisa mukubwinya, uye nomumasimba, uye nemuhutongi;
Izvo zvavakatiraira kuti tisanyore patakanga tichiri muMweya, uye zvisiri mumutemo kuti munhu azvitaure;
Kana munhu haakwanise kuita kuti zvizivikanwe, nokuti zvinoda kuwonekwa chete uye nokunzwisiswa nesimba reMweya Mutsvene, iro rinoiswa naMwari pane avo vanovada, uye vachizvichenesa pamberi pavo;
Kune avo vavanopa mukana wekuona nekuzvizivira pachavo;
Kuti kuburikidza nesimba nekubuda pachena kweMweya, vari munyama, vanozogona kukwanisa kuve pavari munyika yekubwinya.
Uye kuna Mwari uye neGwayana ngakuve nekurumbidzwa, nerukudzo, uye nohukuru nariini nariini. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/77.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 77
chapter_summary: 1–4, Mhuka dzine mweya uye dzichagara mukufara kwokusingaperi munyika yokusingaperi; 5–7, Nyika ino ine guva inoguma yekuvepo yezviuru zvinomwe zvemakore; 8–10, Ngirozi dzakasiyana-siyana dzinodzorera vhangeri pakare uye dzichishumira panyika; 11, Kusimbiswa kwevane zana nemakumi mana ane mana ezviuru; 12–14, Kristu anouya mukutanga kwechiuru chechinomwe chemakore; 15, Maporofita vaviri vachamutswa murudzi rwemaJuda.

verses.text: Mubvunzo. Chiiko chinonzi gungwa regirazi rinotaurwa naJohane, muchitsauko chechina, uye nemundima yechitanhatu muna Zvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Inyika, yacheneswa, isisafe, uye yave yokusingaperi.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kunzwisisa nezvemhuka ina, dzinotaurwa mundima imwecheteyo?Mhinduro. Mifananidzo inoshandiswa mukutaura. Yakashandiswa neMuzaruri Johane, mukutsanangura denga, paradhiso yaMwari, rufaro rwemunhu, uye nekwemhuka, uye nekwezvinhu zvinokambaira, uye nekweshiri dzemudenga; icho chemweya chiri chinofananidzwa neicho chenyama; uye icho chenyama chichifananidzwa nechecho chemweya, mweya wemunhu uchifananidzwa nezvaari, zvimwechetezvo nemweya wemhuka, uye nechimwe chose chisikwa chakasikwa naMwari.

Mubvunzo. Mhuka ina idzi dzakangozvimirira idzo chete here, kana kuti dzakamirira zvikwata kana marongerwo?Mhinduro. Dzinongove mhuka ina idzodzo, idzo dzakaratidzwa Johane, kuti dzimirire hukuru hwemapoka ezvisikwa muhurongwa kana kuti nzvimbo dzakatarwa dzekusikwa kwadzo, mukunakirwa kwadzo murufaro rwadzo kwokusingaperi.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kunzwisisa nemaziso nemapapiro, aive nemhuka idzi?Mhinduro. Maziso adzo akamirira chiedza neruzivo, kureva kuti, dzizere neruzivo; uye mapapiro adzo anomirira simba rekufamba, nekuita, nezvimwe zvakadaro.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kunzwisisa nezvemagosa mana nemakumi maviri, akaturwa naJohane?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti magosa aya akaonekwa naJohane, magosa akanga akatendeka mubasa rehushumiri uye vari vakafa; vakanga vari chechi nomwe, uye vakange zvino vave muparadiso yaMwari.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvebhuku iro rakaonekwa naJohane, iro rakanga rakanamwa nezvidzivo zvinomwe?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti rine chido chakazarurwa, zvakavanzika, uye nemabasa aMwari; zvinhu zvakavigwa zvehurongwa hwake huri maererano nepasi pano munguva yezviuru zvinomwe zvemakore iripa nyika, kana kuti nguva yekuve pano kwayo.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva pamusoro pezvidziwo zvinomwe zvarakanamwa nazvo?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti chidziwo chekutanga chine zvinhu zvechiuru chekutanga chemakore, uye chechipiri naichowo chine zvinhu zvechiuru chemakore chechipiri, zvichidaro kudakara mune chechinomwe.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvengirozi ina, idzo dzinotaurwa muchitsauko chechinomwe uye mundima yekutanga yeZvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti ingirozi ina dzakatumwa kubva kuna Mwari, dziri idzo dzakapihwa simba pamusoro pemativi mana enyika, kuchengeta upenyu uye nokuparadza; idzodzi ndidzo dzine vhangeri risingaperi rekuparidzirwa kumarudzi ose, nemadzinza, nendimi, nevanhu, dziine simba rekuzarira matenga, kudzika mhiko muupenyu, kana kukanda pasi kumatunhu erima.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvengirozi iri kukwira kubva kumabvazuva, chitsauko chechinomwe cheZvakazarurwa ndima yechipiri?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti ngirozi iri kukwira ichibva nechekumabvazuva, ndiyo inopihwa chisimbiso chaMwari vapenyu pamusoro pemarudzi gumi nemaviri eIsraeri; nokudaro, inodaidzira kungirozi ina dzine vhangeri rekusingaperi, ichiti: Musarwadzise nyika, kana gungwa, kana miti, kudakara taisa chisimbiso pavaranda vaMwari vedu, pamhanza dzavo. Uye kana muchida kuzvigashira, ndiye Eria aizouya kuzounganidza pamwechete marudzi aIsraeri uye nokudzorera pakare zvose zvinhu.
Mubvunzo. Inguva ipi ichaitika zvinhu zviri kutaurwa muchitsauko chino?Mhinduro. Zvichaitika mugore rechiuru chechitanhatu, kana kuti mukuzururwa kwechidziwo chechitanhatu.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvechisimbiso chakaiswa pazana nezviuru zvine makumi mana nemana kubva kumarudzi ose aIsraeri, zviuru gumi nezviviri kubva kurudzi rwega-rwega?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti avo vanosimbiswa vapirisita vepamusoro, hutsvene hwaMwari, kuparidza vhangeri risingaperi, nokuti ivava ndivovanogadzwa kubva mumarudzi ose, nemadzinza, nendimi, uye nevanhu, nengirozi idzo dzinopihwa simba pamusoro pemarudzi epanyika, kuunza vose vanouya kuchechi yeDangwe.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvekuridzwa kwehwamanda, iyo inotaurwa muchitsauko chesere cheZvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti sezvo Mwari vakaita nyika mumazuva matanhatu, uye muzuva rechinomwe vakapedza basa ravo, uye vakariita dzvene, uyewo vakaita munhu kubva muvhu renyika, kana saizvozvo, mukutanga kwechiuru chemakore chechinomwe ndipo Ishe Mwari pavachaita nyika kuti ive tsvene, uye nokupedzisa ruponeso rwevanhu, uye kutonga zvinhu zvose, agodzikinura zvinhu zvose, kunze kwechocho chavanenge vasina kuisa musimba ravo, apo pavanenge vasimbisa zvose zvinhu, mukupera kwezvinhu zvose; uye nokuridzwa kwehwamanda dzengirozi nomwe ndikokugadzirira uye nokupedzisa kwebasa ravo, mukutanga kwechiuru chemakore chechinomwe—kugadzirirwa kwenzira nguva yekuuya kwavo isati yasvika.
Mubvunzo. Zvinhu izvi zvichaitika riini zvanyorwa muchitsauko chepfumbamwe cheZvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Zvichaitika mushure mekuzururwa kwechidziwo chechinomwe, Kristu asati auya.

Mubvunzo. Chii chatinofanira kuziva nezvekabhuku kadiki kakadyiwa naJohane, sekutaurwa kwazvakaitwa muchitsauko chegumi cheZvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Tinofanira kuziva kuti raive basa, nechisungo, kuti iye aunganidze marudzi aIsraeri; tarisai, uyu ndiEria, uyo sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa, anofanira kuuya kuzodzorera pakare zvose zvinhu.

Mubvunzo. Chii chinofanirwa kuzivikanwa nevapupuri vaviri muchitsauko Chegumi neimwechete cheZvakazarurwa?Mhinduro. Pane vaporofita vaviri vachamutswa kurudzi rwemaJuda mumazuva ekupedzisira, munguva yekudzorerwa pakare, uye nokuporofita kumaJuda mushure mekunge vaunganidzwa uye vavaka guta reJerusarema munyika yemadzibaba avo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/78.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 78
chapter_summary: 1–4, Vatendi vanofanira kuronga kumisa imba yekuchengetera; 5–12, Kungwara pakushandisa midziyo yavo kunokwezvera kuruponeso; 13–14, Chechi yakafanira kuve yakazvimiririra kubva kumasimba enyika; 15–16, Mikaeri (Adama) anoshanda ari pasi peMutsvene (Kristu); 17–22, Vakaropafadzwa vakatendeka, nokuti vachagara nhaka yezvinhu zvose.

verses.text: Ishe vakatuara kuna Joseph Smith, Mwana, vachiti: Teererai kwandiri, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, imi makagadzwa kuhupirisita hwepamusoro hwechechi yangu, imi maungana pamwechete;
Uye teererai kuraira kwavo avo vakakugadzai kubva kumusoro, vachatura munzeve dzenyu mazwi eungwaru, kuti ruponeso rwuve kwamuri mune icho chamaisa pamberi pangu, vanodaro Ishe Mwari.

Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, nguva yasvika, iyezvino yave pedyo; uye tarisai, uye onai, kunofanira kuve nekurongwa kwevanhu vangu, mukufambisa nokumisa nyaya dzemba yekuchengetera yevarombo vevanhu vangu, kwose munzvimbo ino nemunyika yeZioni—
Kuitira kuti hurongwa nechiumbo chichagara chiripo uye chisingaperi kuchechi yangu, kusimudzira basa, iro ramazvipira, mukuponeswa kwemunhu, uye nomukubwinya kwaBaba venyu vari kudenga.
Kuti muve makayenzana muzvisungo zvezvinhu zvekudenga, hongu, uye nemuzvinhu zvepasiwo, kuitira kuti muwane zvinhu zvekudenga.
Nokuti kana musina kuenzana muzvinhu zvepasi hamungaenzane mukuwana zvinhu zvekudenga;
Nokuti kana muchida kuti ndikupei nzvimbo munyika yeseresitiyaro, makafanira kuzvigadzirira nokuita zvinhu zvandakakurairai uye zvandinoda kubva kwamuri.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, zvakafanira kuti zvinhu zvose zviitirwe kubwinya kwangu, nemi imi makabatana pamwechete muhurongwa uhu;
Kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, regai muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney uye nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana uye nemuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon vagare dare nevatendi avo varimuZioni;
Nokuti Satani anotsvaka kubvisa mwoyo yavo pachokwadi, kuti vapofomadzwe uye vagotadza kunzwisisa zvinhu zvavakagadzirirwa.
Nokudaro, ndinokupai murairo, kuti mugadzirire uye nokuronga pachenyu chisungo kana chibvumirano chisingaperi icho chisingatyorwe.
Uye uyo anochityora acharasikirwa nechinzvimbo chake uye nechimiro chake muchechi, uye achaiswa mukunetswa naSatani kudakara zuva rerununuro.
Tarisai, uku ndikokugadzirira kwandinokugadzirirai nako, uye nehwaro, uye nomufananidzo wandinokupai, uyo uchakubatsirai kuti muzadzikise mirairo yamakapihwa;
Kuti kuburikidza neruyamuro rwangu, zvisinei nematambudziko achawira pamuri, kuti chechi rimire rega pamusoro pezvimwe zvisikwa zvose zviri pasi penyika yeseresitiyaro;
Kuti mungakwire kumusoro kukorona yamakagadzirirwa, uye moitwa vatongi veumambo hwakawanda, vanodaro Ishe Mwari, Mutsvene veZioni, avo vakamisa hwaro hweAdama-ondi-Amani;

Avo vakadoma Mikaeri sejinda renyu, uye nokumisa tsoka dzake, uye vakamuisa pamusoro, uye vakapa kwaari makiyi eruponeso pasi pemurairo uye nohutungamiri hwaIvo Mutsvene, avo vasina mavambo emazuva kana magumo eupenyu.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, muri vana vadiki, uye hamusati mave kunzwisisa kukura kwemaropafadzo anaBaba mumaoko avo uye akagadzirirwa imi;
Uye hamukwanise kutakura zvinhu zvose iyezvino, zvisinei ivai makafara, nokuti ini ndichakutungamirai. Umambo ndehwenyu uye nemaropafadzo arimo ndeenyu, uye neupfumi hwekusingaperi ndehwenyu.
Uye uyo anogashira zvose zvinhu nokutenda acharopafadzwa; uye zvinhu zvepano pasi zvichapamidzirwa kwaari, kunyangwe zvakapetwa kazana, hongu, kana kupfuura.
Nokudaro, itai zvinhu zvandakakurairai, anodaro Mununuri wenyu, kunyangwe Mwanakomana Amani, uyo anogadzira zvose zvinhu asati akutorai;
Nokuti imi muri chechi yeDangwe, uye achakutorai mugore uye agogovera wose munhu chikamu chake.
Uye uyo anenge ari mutariri akatendeka uye akangwara achagara nhaka yezvinhu zvose. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/79.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 79
chapter_summary: 1–4, Jared Carter anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri naMunyaradzi.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ichido changu kuti muranda wangu Jared Carter anofanira kuenda zvakare kunyika dzekumabvazuva, nzvimbo nenzvimbo, uye guta neguta, musimba rekugadzwa kwaakagadzwa nako, kuparidza mashoko akanaka emufaro mukuru, kunyangwe vhangeri rekusingaperi.
Uye ndichamutumira paari Mweya Munyaradzi, uyo achamudzidzisa chokwadi uye nenzira yaachaenda nayo;
Uye sekutendeseka kwaanenge akaita, ndichamupfekedza zvakare korona yemasvinga.
Nokudaro, rega mwoyo wako ufare, muranda wangu Jared Carter, uye usatye, vanodaro Ishe venyu, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/80.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 80
chapter_summary: 1–5, Stephen Burnett naEden Smith vanodaidzwa kuti vaparidze munzvimbo ipi zvayo yavanenge vasarudza.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwauri muranda wangu Stephen Burnett; Enda iwe, enda iwe munyika uye unoparidza vhangeri kuchisikwa chose chinouya pasi pezwi rako.
Uye sekuda kwaunoita kuti uve neshamwari, ndichakupa muranda wangu Eden Smith.
Nokudaro, endai imi munoparidza vhangeri rangu, kana kumaodzanyemba kana kuchamhembe, kumabvazuva kana kumadokero, hazvina mhosva, nokuti hamungamboende padivi.
Naizvozvo, taurai zvinhu zvamanzwa, uye zvamunotenda zvirokwazvo, uye zvamunoziva kuti ichokwadi.
Tarisai ndichochido cheuyo akudaidzai, Mununuri wenyu, kunyangwe Jesu Kristu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/81.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 81
chapter_summary: 1–2, Makiyi eumambo nguva dzose anobatwa neveHutungamiri Hwekutanga; 3–7, Kana Frederick G. Williams akatendeka muhushumiri hwake, achawana upenyu hwokusingaperi.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri muranda wangu Frederick G. Williams: Teerera kuizwi reuyo ari kutaura, kushoko raIshe Mwari vako, uye uteerere mukudaidzwa kwawaitwa, kunyangwe kuve mupirisita wepamusoro muchechi yangu, uye negurukota kumuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana;
Ari uyu wandapa makiyi eumambo, ayo anogara nguva dzose ari eHutungamiri hweHupirisita Hwepamusoro;

Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinomutambira uye ndichamuropafadza, uye newewo, kana uchinge wakatendeka mukuraira, muchinzvimbo chandadoma kwauri, mumunamato nguva dzose, uchidaidzira uye nemumwoyo, pachena, nemuruvande uye muhushumiri hwako mukushambadza vhangeri munyika yavapenyu, uye nepakati pehama dzako.
Uye mukuita zvinhu izvi uchaita zvinhu kupinda zvimwe zvose zvakanaka kune vamwe vako, uye uchikuridzira kubwinya kwavo avo Ishe vako.
Nokudaro, iva unotendeka, mira muchinzvimbo chandadoma kwauri; yamura vasina kusimba, simudza maoko akarembera, uye usimbise mabvi asina simba.
Uye kana uri wakatendeka kusvika kumagumo uchave nekorona yekusafa, uye neupenyu hwokusingaperi mudzimba dzandakagadzira mumba maBaba vangu.
Tarisai, uye ona, aya mazwi aArfa naOmega, kana Jesu Kristu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/82.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 82
chapter_summary: 1–4, Panopihwa zvakawanda, panodiwa zvakawanda; 5–7, Rima rinotonga munyika; 8–13, Ishe vanosungirwa kana tichiita zvavanotaura;14–18, Zioni inofanira kukura murunako, nemuhutsvene; 19–24, Wose munhu anofanira kutsvaka zvinofadza muvakidzani wake.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, varanda vangu, kuti sezvo muchinge maregererana kutadzirana kwenyu, kunyangwe saizvozvo, ini Ishe, ndinokuregererai.

Zvisinei, kune avo pakati penyu vakatadza zvakapfuuridza; hongu, kunyangwe mose imi makatadza, asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, chenjerai kubvira zvino, uye murege chitema, potse kutongwa kunorwadza kungawire pamisoro yenyu.
Nokuti kubva kune uyo anopihwa zvizhinji kunodiwawo zvizhinji; uye uyo anotadzira chiedza chikuru achagashirawo kurangwa kukuru.

Imi munodaidza zita rangu kuti muwane zvakazarurwa, uye ini ndinozvipa kwamuri; sekutadza kuchengeta kwamunoita zvirevo zvangu, izvo zvandinopa kwamuri, munobva mave vatadzi; uye kuenzanisa nekutonga ndichochirango chakaiswa pamutemo wangu.
Nokudaro, chandinotaura kumumwechete, ndinochitaura kune vose: Garirirai, nokuti muvengi ari kuparadzira hutongi hwake nerima rinotonga;
Uye kushatirwa kwaMwari kunotungidzwa pamusoro pevagari vepasi; uye hakuna anoita zvakanaka, nokuti vose vakaenda kunze kwenzira.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ini Ishe, handikupei mhosva yechitadzo chipi zvacho; endai musazotadzazve; asi kune mweya uyo unotadza, zvivi zvakare zvichadzoka, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai murairo mutsva, kuti munzwisise chido changu pamusoro penyu;
Kana kuti, nemamwe mazwi, ndinokupai maitirwo ekuti munoita sei pamberi pangu, kuti zvigotendeukira kwamuri mukuponeswa kwenyu.
Ini Ishe, ndakasungirwa kana muchiita zvandinotaura asi kana musingaite zvandinotaura, hamuna chivimbiso.

Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvakafanira kuti varanda vangu Edward Partridge naNewel K. Whitney, A. Sidney Gilbert naSidney Rigdon, nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, naJohn Whitmer naOliver Cowdery, naW. W. Phelps naMartin Harris vasungirwe pamwechete nechisungo nechibvumirano chisingagone kutyorwa nekutadza, kunze chete kwekuti kutongwa kuchatevera pakarepo, muhutariri hwenyu hwakasiyana-siyana—
Kutarisa nyaya dzevarombo, uye nezvinhu zvose zviri maererano nezvehubhishopi kwose munyika yeZioni nemunyika yeKirtland;
Nokuti ndakapira nyika yeKirtland munguva yangu yandakatara kuitira kupundutswa kwevatendi veUyo aripamusoro-soro, uye kuti ive hoko kuZioni.

Nokuti Zioni yakafanira kukura murunako, nemuhutsvene; miganhu yayo yakafanira kukudzwa; hoko dzayo dzinofanira kusimbiswa; hongu, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, Zioni inofanira kusimuka uye igoshonga nhumbi dzayo dzakanaka.
Naizvozvo, ndiri kupa kwamuri murairo uyu kuti muzvisunge nechibvumirano ichi uye zvichaitwa zviri maererano nemitemo yaIshe.
Tarisai, houno ungwaru zvakare mandiri kuti zvinakire imi.

Uye muchave makaenzana, kana nemamwe mazwi, muchafanira kuve nemugove wakafanana mumidziyo, kuti muyamurike pakuita basa rehutariri hwenyu, munhu wose maererano nezvaanoda nezvaanoshaya, zvichienderana nekuti zvaanoda zvakarurama—

Zvose izvi zviri zvinoyamura chechi yaMwari mupenyu, kuti munhu wose avandudzire chipo chake, kuti wose munhu agowana mamwe matarenda, hongu, kunyangwe zvakapetwa kazana, kuti zvikandwe muimba yekuchengetera yaIshe, kuti zvive zvechechi dzose—
Wose munhu achitsvaga zvakanakira muvakidzani wake nekuiita zvose zvinhu neziso rakanangana nokubwinya kwaMwari.
Hurongwa uhu ndahudoma kuti huve hurongwa husingaperi kwamuri, nekune vachakuteverai, kana musingazotadza.
Uyo mweya uchatadzira chibvumirano chino, uchiomesa mwoyo wawo kwachiri, uchatongwa maererano nemitemo yechechi yangu, uchaiswa mukunetswa naSatani kusvika zuva rerununuro.
Zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uye uhu huri ungwaru, itai ushamwari neveupfumi hwekusarurama, uye havazokuparadzai.
Siyai kutonga kwega kuineni, nokuti ndekwangu uye ndinoripira. Runyararo ngarwuve nemi, maropafadzo angu arambe ainemi.
Nokuti kunyangwe izvozvi umambo ndehwenyu, huchave nariini, kana mukasapunzika kubva pakushingirira kwenyu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/83.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 83
chapter_summary: 1–4, Madzimai nevana vanekodzero yekutarisa kuvarume nekumadzibaba avo kutsvaka kuriritirwa kwavo; 5–6, Shirikadzi nenherera vanotarisira kuChechi kuti variritirwe.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, pamusoro pemitemo yechechi iyi maererano nevakadzi nevana, avo vari muchechi, vakarasikirwa nevarume kana madzibaba:
Vakadzi vanekodzero kuvarume vavo yekuchengetwa kwavo, kusvika varume vavo vatorwa; uye kana vasina kubatwa nokutadza vachawana ruwadzano muchechi.
Uye kana vasingatendeke, havazove nekuwadzana muchechi; asi vanogona kuramba vari munhaka dzavo maererano nemitemo yenyika.
Vose vana vanekodzero kuvabereki vavo yekuriritirwa kusvika vabva zera.
Mushure mezvo, vanekodzero kuchechi, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, pamusoro peimba yekuchengetera yaIshe, kana vabereki vavo vasina chekuvapa senhaka.
Uye imba yekuchengetera iyi ichachengetwa nemipiro yechechi; uye shirikadzi nenherera vachariritirwa, nevarombowo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 84
