chapter_summary: 1–5, Jerusarema Idzva netemberi zvichavakwa muMissouri; 6–17, Mutsetse wehupirisita kubva kuna Mosesi kusvika kuna Adama unopihwa; 18–25, Hupirisita hukuru ndounobata kiyi yekuziva Mwari; 26–32, Hupirisita hudiki hune kiyi yehushumiri hwengirozi nevhangeri rekugadzirira; 33–44, Vanhu vanowana upenyu hwokusingaperi kuburikidza nemhiko nechibvumirano chehupirisita; 45–53, Mweya waKristu unojekesera vanhu, nenyika igere muchitadzo; 54–61, Vatendi vanofanira kupupura nezvinhu izvo zvavakagashira; 62–76, Vanofanira kuparidza vhangeri, uye zviratidzo zvichavatevera; 77–91, Magosa anofanira kuenda izvozvi asina chikwama kana mbuva, uye Ishe vachavachengeta mune zvavanoshaya; 92–97, Zvirwere nekutukwa zvakamirira avo vanoramba vhangeri; 98–102, Rwiyo rwutsva rwerununuro rweZioni rwunopihwa; 103–110, Wose munhu ngaamire muchinzvimbo chake, ashande mubasa rake; 111–120, Varanda vaIshe vanofanira kushambadzira chinyangadzo chinoparadza chemazuva ekupedzisira.

verses.text: Chakazarurwa chaJesu Kristu kumuranda wake Joseph Smith, Mwana, nemagosa matanhatu, sekubatana kwavakaita mumwoyo nekusimudza mazwi avo pamusoro.

Hongu, izwi raIshe riri maererano nechechi yavo, yakamiswa mumazuva ekupedzisira kuitira kudzorera pakare vanhu vavo, sekutaura kwavakaita nemiromo yevaporofita vavo, nekuungana kwevatendi vavo kuti vamire paGomo reZioni, iro richave guta reJerusarema Idzva.

Riri guta richavakwa, kutangira panzvimbo yetemberi, iyo yakadomwa nemunwe waIshe, kumiganhu yekumadokero eDunhu reMissouri, yakakumikidzwa neruoko rwaJoseph Smith, Mwana, nevamwe avo Ishe vavaifadzwa navo.

Zvirokwazvo iri ndiro izwi raIshe, kuti guta reJerusarema Idzva richavakwa kuburikidza nokuungana kwevatendi, kutangira panzvimbo iyi, kunyangwe nzvimbo yetemberi, iri temberi ichasimudzwa muchizvarwa chino.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo chizvarwa chino hachizopfuura chose kudakara imba yavakirwa Ishe, gore richamhara pairi, gore iroro richave kunyangwe kubwinya kwaIshe, uko kuchazadza imba iyi
Uye vanakomana vaMosesi, maererano neHupirisita Hutsvene uhwo hwaakagashira neruoko rwavatezvara vake Jetero;
NaJetero akahugashira pasi peruoko rwaKarebi;
NaKarebi akahugashira pasi peruoko rwaErihu;
NaErihu pasi peruoko rwaJeremia;
NaJeremia pasi peruoko rwaGadi;
NaGadi pasi peruoko rwaIsayasi;
NaIsayasi akahugashira pasi peruoko rwaMwari.
Isayasi naiyewo akagara mumazuva aAbrahama, akaropafadzwa naye—
Uyo Abrahama akagashira hupirisita kubva kuna Merkizedeki, uyo akahugashira kuburikidza nemutsetse wemadzibaba ake, kunyangwe kusvika kuna Noa;
Nekubvira kuna Noa kusvika kuna Enoki, nemumadzinza emadzibaba avo.

Uye kubvira kuna Enoki kusvikira kuna Aberi, uyo akauraiwa nehunyengedzi hwemukoma wake, uyo akagashira hupirisita kuburikidza nemirairo yaMwari, neruoko rwababa vake Adama, uyo akanga ari munhu wekutanga—
Huri Hupirisita hunoramba huri muchechi yaMwari muzvizvarwa zvose uye hauna kutanga kwemazuva kana kuguma kwemakore.

NaIshe vakasimbisa hupirisita zvakare pana Aroni nembeu yake, kuzvizvarwa zvavo zvose, huri hupirisitawo hunoramba huripo huchigara narinhi nehupirisita huri maererano nehurongwa hutsvene tsvene hwaMwari.
Nehupirisita hukuru uhu hunoshumira vhangeri huchibata kiyi dzezvakavanzika zveumambo, kana kunyangwe yeruzivo rwaMwari.
Naizvozvo, muzvisungo zvahwo, simba rehumwari rinoonekwa.
Uye pasina zvisungo zvahwo, nemvumo yehupirisita simba rehumwari harionekwe kumunhu munyama;
Nokuti pasina izvi hakuna munhu angaone chiso chaMwari, kunyangwe Baba, akararama.
Zvino izvi Mosesi akadzidzisa pachena kuvana vaIsraeri murenje, akatsvaka zvakaperera kuti achenese vanhu vake kuti vagogona kutarisa chiso chaMwari;

Asi vakaomesa mwoyo yavo vakatadza kutsungirira pamberi pavo; naizvozvo Ishe muhasha dzavo, nokuti hasha dzavo dzakanga dzatungidzwa pamusoro pavo, vakapika kuti havafanire kuti vapinde muzororo ravo vachiri murenje, zororo iri riri iro kuzara kwokubwinya kwavo.
Naizvozvo, vakabvisa Mosesi pakati pavo, neHupirisita Hutsvenewo;
Nehupirisita hudiki hwakaramba huripo, huri hupirisita hune kiyi dzekuparidza kwengirozi nevhangeri regadziriro.

Irori vhangeri riri vhangeri rekutendeuka, nererubhabhatidzo, nokuregererwa kwezvitadzo, nemutemo wemirairo yenyama, iyo yakaitwa naIshe pamusana pehasha dzavo, kuti irambe irimo mumba maAroni pakati pevana vaIsraeri kudakara Johane, uyo akasimudzwa naMwari, akazadzwa neMweya Mutsvene kubvira mudumbu raamai vake.

Nokuti akabhabhatidzwa achiri muhudiki hwake, akagadzwa nengirozi yaMwari panguva yaakanga aine mazuva masere ekuberekwa, kusimba irori, kuti apunze umambo hwemaJuda, uye kutwasanudza nzira yaIshe pamberi pezviso zvevanhu vavo, kuvagadzirira kuuya kwaIshe, avo vakapihwa simba rose mumaoko avo.
Uye zvakare, zvinzvimbo zvehugosa nabhishopi zvibatanidzwa zvinodiwa zvinove zvekuhupirisita hwepamusoro.
Uye zvakare, zvinzvimbo zvemudzidzisi nemudhikoni zvibatanidzwa zvinodiwa zvinove zvekuhupirisita hudiki, huri hupirisita hwakasimbiswa kuna Aroni nevanakomana vake.

Naizvozvo, sezvandataura pamusoro pevanakomana vaMosesi—nokuti vanakomana vaMosesi nevanakomanawo vaAroni vachapira mupiro nechibairo zvinobvumwa mumba maIshe, iri imba ichavakirwa Ishe muchizvarwa chino, panzvimbo yakapirwa sezvandaka doma—
Nevanakomana vaMosesi nevaAroni vachazadzwa nokubwinya kwaIshe, paGomo reZioni mumba maIshe, vana vake vanova imi, neavowo vazhinji, vandakadaidza, ndikatumira kunovaka chechi yangu.
Nokuti ani zvake akatendeka mukuwana hupirisita huviri uhu hwandataura nezvahwo, vachikudza basa ravo, vanocheneswa neMweya mukuita miviri yavo kuti ive mitsva.
Vanobva vave vanakomana vaMosesi nevaAroni nembeu yaAbrahama, nevechechi neumambo, nevakasarudzwa naMwari.
Uyewo vose avo vanogashira hupirisita uhu, vanogashira ini, vanodaro Ishe;
Nokuti uyo anogashira varanda vangu anogashira ini.
Uyo anogashira ini anogashira Baba vangu;
Neuyo anogashira Baba vangu anogashira umambo hwaBaba vangu; nokudaro zvose izvo zvina Baba vangu zvichapihwa kwaari.
Neizvi zviri maererano nemhiko nechibvumirano chehupirisita.
Naizvozvo, vose avo vanogashira hupirisita vanogashira nemhiko iyi nechibvumirano chaBaba vangu, icho chavasingakwanise kutyora, kana kuti chibvisike.
Asi ani zvake achatyora chibvumirano ichi mushure mekunge achigashira, obva kwachiri, haazowana ruregerero rwezvitadzo munyika muno kana munyika ichauya.

Uye nhamo kune vose vasingauye kuhupirisita uhu hwamatambira imi, uhwo hwandave kusimbisa pamuri imi muri pano nhasi, nezwi rangu rinobva kumatenga; kunyangwe ini ndakapa hondo dzekudenga nengirozi dzangu simba maererano nemi.
Zvino ndavekukupai murairo kuti muzvichenjerere, kuti mutererese kumazwi eupenyu hwokusingapere.
Nokuti muchararama nezwi rose rinobva mumuromo waMwari.
Nokuti izwi raIshe ichokwadi, chose zvacho chiri chechokwadi chiedza, chose zvacho chiri chiedza Mweya, kunyangwe Mweya waJesu Kristu.
Uye Mweya unopa chiedza kumunhu wose anouya munyika; neMweya unojekesera munhu wose ari munyika, anoteerera kuizwi reMweya.
Newose anoteerera kuizwi reMweya anouya kuna Mwari kunyangwe Baba.
NaBaba vanomudzidzisa nezvechibvumirano icho chavakavandudza vakachisimbisa pamuri, icho chakasimbisiswa pamuri pamusana penyu kwete imi chete, asi kuitira nyika yose.
Nenyika yose igere muchitadzo, inogomera pasi pehusungwa hwerima nepehusungwa hwechitadzo.
Nezvizvi munoziva kuti vari pasi pehusungwa hwechitadzo, nokuti havauye kwandiri.
Nokuti ani zvake asingauye kwandiri ari pasi pehusungwa hwechitadzo.
Naani zvake asingagashire izwi rangu haana kujaira izwi rangu, uye haazi wangu.
Nezvizvi munoziva vakarurama kubva kunevakaipa, nepasi pose pari kugomera pasi pechitadzo uye nerima kunyangwe iye zvino.
Uye pfungwa dzenyu munguva dzakapfuura dzakanga dzakasvibiswa nekusatenda, uye nokuti makazvitora sezvisina maturo zvinhu zvamakagashira—
Kuri kushaya hunhu nekusatenda kwaunza chechi yose pasi pekutongwa.
Uye kutongwa uku kuri pavana veZioni, kunyangwe vose.

Vacharamba vari pasi pekutongwa uku kusvika vatendeuka nokuyeuka chibvumirano chitsva, kunyangwe Bhuku raMormoni nemirairo yakare yandakange ndakavapa, kwete kungotaura chete, asi kuita maererano neizvo zvandakanyora—
Kuti vaunze michero yakakodzera umambo hwaBaba wavo; zvikasadaro kucharamba kuine kurangwa nekutongwa kunodirwa pavana veZioni.
Nokuti vana veumambo vangasvibise here nyika yangu tsvene? Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, Kwete.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri imi zvino muri kunzwa mashoko angu, ayo anova izwi rangu, makaropafadzwa kana muri munogashira zvinhu izvi;
Nokuti ndichakuregererai zvitadzo zvenyu nemurairo uyu—kuti murambe makatsiga mupfungwa dzenyu mukuyera nemumweya wemunamato, mukupa uchapupu kunyika yose hwezvinhu izvo zvinotaurwa kwamuri.
Naizvozvo, endai imi munyika yose; panzvimbo ipi zvayo yamusingagone kuenda muchaita zvekuraira, kuti uchapupu huende kubva kwamuri huchienda munyika yose kuchisikwa chose.

Sezvandakataura kuvaapositori vangu, kunyangwe saizvozvo ndinotaura kwamuri, nokuti muri vaapositori vangu, kunyangwe vapirisita vepamusoro vaMwari; imi ndimi avo vandapihwa naBaba vangu; ndimi shamwari dzangu;
Naizvozvo, sekutaura kwandakaita kuvaapositori vangu ndinotaura kwamuri zvakare kuti wose mweya unotenda kumazwi enyu, ukabhabhatidzwa nemvura kuregererwa zvitadzo, achagashira Mweya Mutsvene.
Nezviratidzo izvi zvichatevera avo vanotenda—
Muzita rangu vachaita mabasa akawanda anoshamisa;
Muzita rangu vachatandira kunze anadhiabhorosi;
Muzita rangu vacharapa vanorwara;
Muzita rangu vachazurura maziso emapofu, nokudziura nzeve dzematsi;
Rurimi rwechimumumu rwuchataura;
Uye kana munhu upi zvake akavaisira chepfu haizovakuvadza;
Uye uturu hwenyoka huchashaya simba rekuvakuvadza.
Asi ndinovapa murairo, kuti havafanire kuzvikudza nezvinhu izvi, kana kuzvitaura kunyika, nokuti zvinhu izvi zvinopihwa kwamuri kuitira pundutso yenyu nekuponeswa kwenyu.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, avo vasingatende kumazwi enyu, vasina kubhabhatidzwa mumvura muzita rangu, kuitira kuregererwa zvitadzo zvavo, kuti vagotambira Mweya Mutsvene, vacharaswa, havazopinda muumambo hwaBaba vangu uko kunaBaba vangu neni.
Chakazarurwa ichi, nemurairo kwamuri, zvavanesimba kubvira munguva ino munyika yose, nevhangeri ririkunevese vasati varigashira.

Asi, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kune vose avo vakapihwa umambo kubva kwamuri rakafanira kuparidzwa kwavari, kuti vagotendeuka kumabasa ekare avo akaipa; nokuti vanofanira kutsiurwa pamusana pemwoyo yavo yakaipa isingatende, uye nehama dzenyu muZioni pamusana pekukupandukirai kwavo panguva yandakakutumai.

Zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, nokuti kubvira zvino ndichakudaidzai kuti shamwari, zvinofanira kuti ndikupei uyu murairo, kuti muve kunyangwe seshamwari dzangu mumazuva andakange ndiinadzo, tichifamba kunoparidza vhangeri musimba rangu;
Nokuti handina kuvabvumira kuti vave nechikwama kana mbuva, kana mabhatyi maviri.
Tarisai, ndinokutumirai kuti muyedze nyika, uye mushandi anokodzerana nemubairo wake.

Ani zvake munhu achaenda akanoparidza vhangeri iri reumambo, akasatadza kuve akatendeka muzvinhu zvose, haazoneta mupfungwa, kana kudzimirwa, kana mumuviri, munhengo, kana mumapfupa; kana kavhudzi kemusoro wake hakazombowira pasi kakasaonekwa. Uye havazombofa nenzara, kana nenyota.
Naizvozvo, musafunge nezvamangwana, kuti muchadyei, kana muchanwei, kana muchapfekeyi.
Nokuti, fungai nezvemaruva esango, kuti anokurasei, haashande, kana kuruka; uye umambo hwenyika, mukubwinya kwahwo kwose, hauna kushongedzwa serimwe rawo.
Nokuti Baba venyu, vari kudenga, vanoziva kuti munozvida zvose zvinhu izvi.
Naizvozvo, regai ramangwana rifunge pfungwa dzezvinhu zvaro.
Kana kufanoita pfungwa kuti muchataura muchitii; asi chengetedzai mupfungwa dzenyu nguva dzose mazwi eupenyu, uye zvichapihwa kwamuri munguva iyoyo chidimu chakapimirwa kumunhu wose.

Naizvozvo, musaregere mumwe munhu pakati penyu, nokuti murairo uyu uri kune vakatendeka vose vakadaidzwa naMwari muchechi muhushumiri, kubvira panguva ino kutora chikwama kana mbuva, avo varikuenda kunoparidza vhangeri rino reumambo.
Tarisai, ndinokutumirai kunze munotsiura nyika pamusana pemabasa avo asina kururama, nokuvadzidzisa nezvekutongwa kuchauya.

Uye ani zvake achakugashirai, ipapo ndichavepowo, nokuti ndichaenda pamberi pehuso hwenyu. Ndichange ndiri kurudyi rwenyu nokuruboshwe, Mweya wangu uchange uri mumwoyo yenyu, uye ngirozi dzangu dzakakukomberedzai, kuti dzikusimudzirei pamusoro.
Ani zvake anokugashirai anogashira ini; iyeyo achakuchengetai, nokukupfekedzai, nokukupai mari.
Uye uyo anokupai zvekudya, kana kukupfekedzai, kana kukupai mari, haazomborasikirwa nemubairo wake.
Neuyo asingaite zvinhu izvi haasi mudzidzi wangu; nezvizvi munogona kuziva vadzidzi vangu.

Uyu asingakugashirei, ibvai paari muende mega pachenyu, moshambidza tsoka dzenyu kunyangwe nemvura, mvura yakachena, mukupisa kana mukutonhora, mozvipupura kuna Baba venyu vari kudenga, musazodzokera zvakare kumunhu iyeyo.
Nemumusha upi zvawo kana guta ramunopinda, itai zvimwechetezvo.
Zvisinei, nzverai neshungu, musawane chamunosiya; inhamo kumba iyoyo, kana musha iwoyo kana guta rinokurambai, kana mazwi enyu, kana uchapupu hwenyu huri maerererano neni.
Nhamo, ndinodaro zvakare, kumba iyoyo kana musha iwoyo kana guta rinokurambai, kana mazwi enyu, kana uchapupu hwenyu maerererano neni;
Nokuti, ini Samasimba, ndakaisa maoko angu pamarudzi, kuvarova pamusana pehuipi hwavo.
Nezvirwere zvichapararira, hazvizobviswa panyika kusvika ndapedza basa rangu, iro richadimburirwa mukururama—

Kudakara vose vave kundiziva vachasara, kunyangwe kubvira pamudikidiki kusvika pamukuru-kuru, uye vachazadzwa neruzivo rwaIshe, uye vachapindirana, uye vachasimudza mazwi avo, uye nemazwi pamwechete vachaimba rwiyo rwutsva urwu, vachiti;
Ishe vaunza zvakare Zioni;Ishe vanunura vanhu vavo, Israeri,Maererano nekusarudza kwenyasha,Uko kwakaitwa kuti kuitike nerutendoNechibvumirano chamadzibaba avo.
Ishe vanunura vanhu vavo;NaSatani asungwa nguva hapachina.Ishe vaunganidza zvose zvinhu muchimwechete.Ishe vaunza pasi Zioni kubva kumusoro.Ishe vaunza Zioni kubva pasi.
Nyika yakarwadziwa ikabara simba rayo;Nechokwadi chakaiswa muhura hwayo;Nematenga ayinyemwerera;Uye yakapfekedzwa nokubwinya kwaMwari vayo;Nokuti vanomira pakati pevanhu vavo.
Kubwinya, nerukudzo, nesimba, nokusimba,Ngazvipihwe kuna Mwari vedu; nokuti vazere netsitsi,Kuenzanisa, nyasha, nechokwadi, nerunyararo.Nariini nariini. Ameni.

Zvakare, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, zvakafanira kuti wose munhu anoenda kunotaura vhangeri rangu risingaperi, kuti kana vaine mhuri, vachitambira mari sechipo, kuti vanofanira kuitumira kwavari kana kuishandisa kuti ivayamure, sezvavanenge vataurirwa naIshe, nokuti ndizvo zvandinoona zvakanaka.

Nevose avo vasina mhuri, vanogashira mari, ngavaitumire kuna Bhishopi muZioni, kana kuna bhishopi ari kuOhio, kuti itsaurwe kuitira kuunzwa kwezvakazarurwa nokudhindwa kwazvo, nekuitira kumiswa kweZioni.
Uye kana ari ani zvake achapa mumwe wenyu bhatyi, kana sutu, torai dzaru murikande kuvarombo, muende munzira menyu muchifara.
Kana paine pakati penyu mumwe akasimba muMweya, ngaaende neuyo asina kusimba, kuti agosimudzirwa mukupfava, kuti naiyewo agosimba.
Naizvozvo, endai neavo vakagadzwa kuhupirisita hudiki muvatumire mberi kwenyu kuti vafanotara nguva yemichechi, nokugadzira nzira, nokuzadzikisa michechi iyo imi pachenyu yamusingagone kuzadzikisa.
Tarisai, iyi ndiyonzira vaapositori vangu mumazuva akare yavakavaka nayo chechi yangu kwandiri.
Nokudaro, regai wose munhu amire muchinzvimbo chake, ashande ari maakadaidzwa, kurege kuti musoro uti hauna basa netsoka; nokuti pasina tsoka muviri ungamire nei?
Naiwowo muviri unoda nhengo dzose, kuti vose vagosimudzirwa pamwechete kuti hurongano huchengetedzwe hwakakwana.
Tarisai, vapirisita vepamusoro vanofanira kufamba, nemagosawo, nevapirisita vadiki; asi madhikoni nevadzidzisi vanofanira kudomwa kuti vatarire chechi, kuti vave vashumiri vanomirira muchechi.
Nabhishopi, Newel K. Whitney, naiyewo anofanira kufamba achitenderera chechi dzose, achitsvaka varombo kuti avaropafadze kunezvavanoshaya, nokuninipisa vapfumi nevanozvikudza.
Anofanirawo kupinza munhu basa semumiriri anotora basa nokumuitira mabasa emunyika sekurairwa kwaanenge achiitwa.

Zvisinei, bhishopi ngaaende kuguta reNew York, uyewo nekugutawo reAlbany, nekuguta reBoston, ayambire vanhu vemaguta aya neruzha rwevhangeri, nezwi repamusoro, nezvekuparadzwa nekurambidzwa zvachose kwakavamirira kana vakaramba zvinhu izvi.
Nokuti kana vakaramba zvinhu izvi nguva yekutongwa kwavo yave pedyo, neimba yavo ichasiiwa kwavari yaparadzwa.
Ngaavimbe neni haazokangaidzwa; kana kavhudzi kake hakanga pupurikire pasi zvisinakuonekwa.

Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ruzhinji rwevaranda vangu, endai sekukwanisa kwenyu, mukudaidzwa kwenyu, kumaguta nemisha mikuru inoremekedzwa, muchitsiura nyika mukururama, mune zvose zvavo zviito zvisina kururama nezvisina humwari, muchiisa zviripachena uye zvinonzwisisika kuparadza kwechinyangadzo mumazuva ekupedzisira.
Nokuti, nemi vanodaro Ishe Samasimba, ndichabvarura umambo hwavo, handizozunguza nyika chete, asi kana matenga azere nenyenyedzi achadedera.
Nokuti, ini Ishe, ndatambanudza ruoko rwangu kushandisa masimba ekudenga; imi hamugone kuzviona zvino, asi muchinguvana muchazviona, mugoziva kuti ndini, kuti ndichauya ndigozotonga nevanhu vangu.
Ndini Arfa naOmega, kutanga nokuguma. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/85.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 85
chapter_summary: 1–5, Nhaka muZioni dzinogashirwa kuburikidza nokutsaurwa; 6–12, Mumwe ane hukuru akasimba achapa Vatendi nhaka yavo muZioni.

verses.text: Ibasa remunyori waIshe, uyo waakadoma, kuti achengete nhoroondo, nezvinyorwa zvose zvechechi zvezvinhu zvose zvinoitika muZioni, neavo vose vanopira midziyo, uye vachigashira nhaka zviri mumurau kubva kuna bhishopi;
Uyezve nemagariro avo, rutendo rwavo, nemabasa; uyewo nevakarasika pachitendero avo vanorasika mushure mekuwana nhaka dzavo.

Hazvipindirane nechido nemurairo waMwari kuti avo vasingagashire nhaka dzavo kuburikidza nekutsaura, zvinobvumirana nemutemo wavo, uyo wavakapa, kuti vagobvisisa chegumi vanhu vavo, kuvagadzirira zuva rokutsiva nokupisa, kuti vave nemazita avo akanyorwa pamwechete nemazita evanhu vaMwari.
Kana nhoroondo yemadzinza avo haichengetwe, kana kuwanikwa painofanira kuwanikwa pazvinyorwa zvipi zvazvo kana nhoroondo yechechi.
Mazita avo haazowanikwa, kana mazita emadzibaba, kana mazita evana haanyorwe mubhuku remutemo waMwari, vanodaro Ishe veHondo.
Hongu, kanodaro kazwi kadiki kakanyarara, kanoita kazevezeve kachibaya zvose zvinhu, uye nguva zhinji kanoita kuti mapfupa angu abvunde kana kachidudzira, kachiti;

Uye zvichaitika kuti ini Ishe, Mwari, ndichatuma uyo ane hukuru uye akasimba, akabata tsvimbo yesimba muruoko rwake, akapfekedzwa chiedza sechiputiro, uye ane muromo uchataura mazwi, mazwi ekusingaperi; ihwo hura hwake huri tsime rechokwadi, kugadziridza imba yaMwari, nokuronga nemijenya nhaka dzevatendi vane mazita anowanikwa, nemazita emadzibaba avo, nevana vakanyorwa mubhuku remutemo waMwari;
Apo uyo munhu, akadaidzwa naMwari uye akadomwa, anoisa ruoko rwake kutsigira areka yaMwari, achawira pasi nemuseve werufu, kufanana nemuti unorohwa nekupenya kwakasimba kwemheni.

Uye vose avo vanowanikwa vasina kunyorwa mubhuku rendangariro havana nhaka dzavanowana muzuva iroro, asi vachadimurwa nepakati, uye mugove wavo uchadomerwa kwavari pakati pevasingatende, umo mune kuwuwura nekugeda-geda kwemeno.
Izvi zvinhu handizvitaure ini pachangu; nokudaro sekutaura kunoita Ishe, vachazvizadzikisa.

Uye avo veHupirisita Hwepamusoro, vane mazita asingawanikwe akanyorwa mubhuku remutemo, kana avo vanowanikwa vakarasika pachitendero, kana vanowanikwa vakabviswa muchechi, uye nekuhupirisita hudiki, kana nhengo, muzuva iroro havawane nhaka pakati pevatendi vewePamusoro-soro;

Naizvozvo, zvichaitwa kwavari kufanana nezvakaitwa kuvana vemupirisita sezvinowanikwa zvakanyorwa muchitsauko chechipiri mundima yemakumi matanhatu neimwechete neye makumi matanhatu nembiri yebhuku raEzra.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/86.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 86
chapter_summary: 1–7, Ishe vanopa zvinoreva rungano rwemufananidzo wegorosi nemasawi; 8–11, Vanotsanangura maropafadzo ehupirisita kune avo vagari venhaka vari mumurau, maererano nezvenyama.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri imi varanda vangu, maererano nerungano rwemufananidzo wegorosi newemasawi:
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti, munda wakanga uri nyika, uye vaapositori ndivo vakanga vari vadyari vembeu.

Uye mushure mekunge varara, mutambudzi mukuru wechechi, uyo akarasika pachitendero, mhombwe, kunyangwe Babironi, iyo inoita kuti marudzi ose anwe mukombe wayo, mumwoyo yavo muvengi, kunyangwe Satani agere achitonga, tarisai anodyara sawi; nokudaro, sawi rinovhunga gorosi uye nokuisa chechi murenje.
Asi tarisai, mumazuva ekupedzisira, kunyangwe iye zvino apo Ishe vavekutanga kuunza izwi, uye sora riri kubuda uye richiri dete—
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ngirozi dziri kuchema kuna Ishe masikati nehusiku, dziri dzakamirira kutumwa kuti dzizokohwa minda;
Asi Ishe vanoti kwavari, musatanhe sawi shizha richiridete (nokuti zvirokwazvo rutendo rwenyu haruna kusimba), potse mungaparadze negorosiwo.

Naizvozvo, regai gorosi nesawi zvikure pamwechete kudakara gohwo raibva; ndipo pamuchatanga kuunganidza gorosi kubva kusawi; uye mushure mokuunganidza gorosi, tarisai, uye muone, sawi rinosungwa masvinga, uye munda wosarira kupiswa.
Naizvozvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri, imi maramba muine hupirisita kuburikidza nemutsetse wedzinza remadzibaba enyu—
Nokuti ndimi vagari venhaka vari pamurau, maererano nezvenyama, uye mange makavigwa kunyika naKristu muna Mwari—

Naizvozvo upenyu hwenyu nehupirisita hwaramba huripo uye hunofanira kuti huvepo kuburikidza nemi uye nemutsetse wedzinza renyu kudakara kudzorerwa pakare kwezvinhu zvose zvakataurwa nemiromo yevaporofita vatsvene vose kubvira pakutanga kwenyika.
Naizvozvo, makaropafadzwa imi kana mukaramba muri mukunaka kwangu, chiedza kuvaJentairi, uye kuburikidza nehupirisita huno, muponesi kuvanhu vangu Israeri. Ishe vazvitaura. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/87.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 87
chapter_summary: 1–4, Hondo inotaurwa kuti ichaitika pakati penyika dzeKumaodzanyemba nedzeKuchamhembe; 5–8, Matambudziko makuru achawira pane vagari vepasi.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe pamusoro pehondo dzichauya muchinguva chiri kutevera, kutangira pakupanduka kweSouth Carolina, uko kuchagumisira nokuparadzwa nerufu nekusuwa kwemweya mizhinji;
Uye nguva ichasvika yekuti hondo ichadirwa panyika dzose, kutangira panzvimbo ino.

Nokuti tarisai, nyika dzeKuchamhembe dzichapesana nenyika dzeKumaodzanyemba, nyika dzeKuchamhembe dzichadaidza mamwe marudzi, kana kunyangwe rudzi rweGreat Britain, sezvainodaidzwa, vachadaidzawo mamwe marudzi, kuti vazvidzivirire kune mamwe marudzi, ipapo hondo ichadirwa pamarudzi ose.
Uye zvichaitika kuti mushure memazuva mazhinji, nhapwa dzichapandukira vana tenzi vadzo, avo vachange vakarongwa nokudzidziswa zvehondo.
Uye zvichaitikawo zvakare kuti vanosaririra venyika vanenge vasara vachazvironga pachavo, vagoshatirwa zvakapfuuridza, vagonetsa maJentairi nokunetsa kunorwadza.

Saizvozvo, nemunondo nekudeurwa kweropa vagari vepasi vachachema; nenzara, zvirwere, nekundengendeka kwenyika, nokutinhira kwedenga, pamwe nemheni inopenya zvinotyisa, vagari vepasi vachaitwa kuti vanzwe hasha nekugumbuka, neruoko rwunoranga rwaMwari Samasimba, kudakara kuparadzwa kwakadzikwa kwapedza zvizere, ose marudzi;
Kuti kuchema kwevatendi, nokweropa revatendi, kurege kukwira kunzeve dzaIshe veSabaoti, kubva pasi, kuti vagotsivirwa vavengi vavo.
Nokudaro, mirai imi munzvimbo tsvene, musabviswe, kudakara zuva raIshe rauya, nokuti tarisai, rinouya nokukurumidza, vanodaro Ishe. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/88.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 88
chapter_summary: 1–5, Vatendi vanotendeka vanogashira Mweya Munyaradzi, chiri icho chivimbiso cheupenyu hwokusingaperi; 6–13, Zvose zvinhu zvinobatwa nokutongwa neChiedza chaKristu; 14–16, Kumuka kuvakafa kunouya kuburikidza neRununuro; 17–31, Kuteerera mutemo weseresitiyaro, teresitiyaro, kana tiresitiyaro, kana wepasi, kunogadzirira vanhu kupinda muumambo ihwowo nekubwinya kwahwo; 32–35, Avo vanoda kugara muchitadzo vanogara vakasviba; 36–41, Hwose umambo hunotongwa nemutemo; 42–45, Mwari vakapa mutemo kuzvinhu zvose; 46–50, Munhu achasvika pakunzwisisa kunyangwe Mwari; 51–61, Rungano rwemufananidzo wemurume akatumira varanda vake kumunda uye achizoshanyira mumwe nemumwe; 62–73, Swederai pedyo naIshe, uye munozoona chiso chavo; 74–80, Zvichenesei mega uye mudzidzisane dzidziso dzeumambo; 81–85, Wose munhu akayambirwa anofanira kuyambira muvakidzani wake; 86–94, Zviratidzo, mhirizhonga dzezviumbiswa, nengirozi zvinogadzirira nzira yekuuya kwaIshe; 95–102, Hwamanda dzengirozi dzinodaidza vakafa mukurongwa kwavo; 103–116, Hwamanda dzengirozi dzinoshambadza kudzoserwa pakare kwevhangeri, kupunzika kweBabironi, uye hondo yaMwari mukuru; 117–126, Tsvakai kudzidza, misai imba yaMwari (Temberi), uye muzvishongedze nechishongo cherudo rwakadzama; 127–141, Kurongwa kweChikoro cheVaporofita kunoitwa, pamwechete nechisungo chekugeza tsoka.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri maungana pachenyu pamwechete kuti mugashire chido chavo pamusoro penyu;

Tarisai, izvi zvinofadza kuna Ishe venyu, uye ngirozi dzinofara pamusoro penyu; zvipo zveminamato yenyu zvauya kunzeve dzaIshe weSabaoti, uye zvanyorwa mubhuku remazita evakacheneswa, kunyangwe ivavo venyika yeseresitiyaro.

Nokudaro, ndavekutumira pamuri mumwe Mweya Munyaradzi, kunyangwe pamuri shamwari dzangu, kuti zvigare mumwoyo menyu, kunyangwe Mweya Mutsvene weruvimbiso; uyo mumwe Mweya Munyaradzi ari mumwecheteyo andakavimbisa kuvadzidzi vangu, sezvakanyorwa muuchapupu hwaJohane.
Uyu Mweya Munyaradzi ndiye ruvimbiso rwandinopa kwamuri rweupenyu hwokusingaperi, kunyangwe kubwinya kweumambo hweseresitiyaro;
Kubwinya uku kuri iko kwechechi reDangwe, kunyangwe Mwari vatsvene kupfuura vose, kuburikidza naJesu Kristu Mwanakomana wavo—
Uyo akakwira kumusoro, sekudzika zvakare kwavakaita pasi pezvinhu zvose, mukudaro vanonzwisisa zvinhu zvose, kuti vave mune zvose uye vave kuburikidza nemune zvose zvinhu, chiedza chechokwadi;
Chiri chokwadi chinopenya. Ichi ndichochiedza chaKristu. Sezvaariwo ari muzuva, uye chiedza chezuva, uye nesimba raro iro rarakagadzirwa naro.
Sezvo ariwo mumwedzi, uye ari chiedza chemwedzi, uye nesimba rawo iro rawakagadzirwa naro;
Sechiyedza chenyenyedziwo, uye nesimba radzo iro radzakagadzirwa naro;
Uye nenyikawo, uye nesimba rayo, kana nyika yamumire pairi.
Uye chiedza chinopenya, icho chinokupai chiedza, chinoburikidza naiye anovhenekera maziso enyu, chiri icho chiedza chimwechetecho chinomutsa kunzwisisa kwenyu;
Chiri icho chiedza chinobva pamberi paMwari chichizadza hukuru hwemukaha—

Chiedza icho chiri muzvinhu zvose, icho chinopa upenyu kuzvinhu zvose, uri iwo mutemo unotongwa nawo zvinhu zvose, kunyangwe simba raMwari avo vagere pachigaro chavo cheumambo, avo vari muchipfuva chekusingapere, avo vari pakati pezvinhu zvose.
Zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti kuburikidza nerununuro urwo rwakaitirwa imi rwunounza kumuka kuvakafa.
Uye mweya nemuviri ndiwo mweya wemunhu.
Uye kumuka kuvakafa ndiko kununurwa kwemweya.
Uye kununurwa kwemweya kunoburikidza naiye anopa zvinhu zvose upenyu, muchipfuva make makadzikwa kuti varombo uye nevanyoro venyika vachaigara nhaka.
Naizvozvo, inofanira kucheneswa kubva kune kusarurama kwose, kuti igadzirirwe kubwinya kweseresitiyaro;
Nokuti mushure mekunge yazadzikisa zvayakasikirwa, ichapfekedzwa korona yekubwinya, kunyangwe kuve panaMwari Baba;
Kuti miviri iyo iri yeumambo hweseresitiyaro ive nako nariini nariini, nokuti nechinangwa ichi yakagadzirwa nokusikwa, uye nechinangwa ichi vanocheneswa.
Uye vasina kucheneswa kuburikidza nemutemo uyu wandakapa kwamuri, kunyangwe mutemo waKristu, vanofanira kugara nhaka yehumwe umambo, kunyangwe uhwo umambo hweteresitiyaro, kana iyo yetiresitiyaro.
Nokuti uyo asingagone kuteerera mutemo weumambo hweseresitiyaro haangagone kugara mukubwinya kweseresitiyaro.
Uye uyo asingagone kugara mumutemo weumambo hweteresitiyaro haagone kugara mukubwinya kweteresitiyaro.

Uye uyo asingagone kugara mumutemo weumambo hwatiresitiyaro haagone kugara mukubwinya kwetiresitiyaro, naizvozvo haana kukodzera umambo hwekubwinya. Naizvozvo anofanira kugara muumambo husiri umambo hwekubwinya.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, nyika inogara mumutemo weumambo hweseresitiyaro, nokuti inozadzikisa zvayakasikirwa, uye isingatyore mutemo—
Nokudaro, ichacheneswa; hongu, zvisinei kuti ichafa, ichamutswa kuupenyu zvakare, uye ichagara musimba rakaimutsa, uye vakaruruma vachaigara nhaka.
Nokuti zvisinei kuti vanofa, naivowo vachamuka zvakare, muviri wemweya.

Avo vari vemweya weseresitiyaro vachagashira muviri iwoyo waive muviri wenyama; kunyangwe imi muchagashira miviri yenyu, uye kubwinya kwenyu kuchave kubwinya kunove kunoita kuti miviri yenyu inomutsiridzwa.
Imi munomutsiridza nechidimu chekubwinya kweseresitiyaro muchatambira kumwechetekwo kunyangwe kuzere.
Uye avo vanomutsiridzwa nechidimbu chekubwinya kweteresitiyaro vachagashirawo kumwechetekwo, kunyangwe kuzere.
Uye naivowo vanomutsiridzwa vapenyu nechidimbu chekubwinya kwetiresitiyaro, naivowo vachagashira kumwechetekwo, kunyangwe kuzere.
Uye kana avo vachasara vachamutsiridzwawo; zvisinei vachadzoka zvakare kunzvimbo yavo, kunofadzwa neicho chavanoda kugashira, nokuti vakanga vasingade kufadzwa neicho chavangadai vakagashira.
Ko zvinoyamureiko munhu kana chipo chikaiswa paari, uye iye akasagashira chipo? Tarisai, haafare muneicho chinopihwa kwaari, kana kufarira mune uyo anove ndiye mupi wechipo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti icho chinotongwa nemutemo chinochengetedzwawo nemutemo uye chichakwaniswa uye nokucheneswa nechimwechetecho.

Icho chinotyora mutemo, uye chisingagare mumutemo, asi chichitsvaka kuve mutemo pachacho, uye chichida kugara muchitadzo, uye chichigara muchitadzo zvachose, hachikwanise kucheneswa nemutemo, kana netsitsi, kuenzanisa kana kutonga. Naizvozvo, zvinofanira kugara zvakasviba kudaro.
Hwose umambo hune mutemo unopihwa;
Uye kune umambo hwakawanda; nokuti hakuna nzvimbo isina umambo; uye hakuna umambo husina nzvimbo, hungave umambo hukuru kana hudiki.
Uye kuumambo hwose kunopihwa mutemo; uye kumutemo wose kune zvisungo uyewo nemamiriro.
Zvisikwa zvose zvisingagare mumamiriro iwayo hazvirevererwe.

Nokuti njere dzinobatirira panjere; ungwaru hunogashira ungwaru; chokwadi chinombundikira chokwadi; hunhu hunoda hunhu; chiedza chinobatirira pachiedza; tsitsi dzinoitira mwoyo munyoro tsitsi uye dzinoda wekwadzo; kuenzanisa kunoramba kuri mugwara rako kuchida zvekwako; kutonga kunoenda pamberi peuso hweuyo agere pachigaro chehushe uye achitonga uye achitemera zvinhu zvose.

Vanonzwisisa zvinhu zvose, uye zvinhu zvose zviri pamberi pavo, zvinhu zvose zvakamukomberedza; vari pamusoro pezvinhu zvose, uye vari muzvinhu zvose, uye vari kuburikidza nemuzvinhu zvose, uye vakatenderedza zvinhu zvose; uye zvinhu zvose zvakaitwa naivo, uye ndezvavo, kunyangwe, Mwari nariini nariini.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, vakapa mutemo kuzvinhu zvose, uyo wazvinofamba nawo munguva dzazvo uye nemwaka yazvo;
Uye makwara adzo akadzikwa, kunyangwe nzira dzematenga uye nenyika, dzinonzwisisa nyika nepasi rose.

Uye dzinopanana chiedza munguva dzadzo uye nemumwaka yadzo, nemuzvidimbu zvenguva dzavo, nemuzvikamu zvenguva dzazvo, nemumazuva adzo, mumasvondo adzo, mumwedzi yadzo, mumakore adzo—zvose izvi igore rimwechete kuna Mwari, asi kwete kumunhu.

Nyika inokunguruka pamapapiro ayo, uye zuva rinopa chiedza charo masikati, uye mwedzi unopa chiedza chawo usiku, uye nenyenyedziwo dzinopa chiedza chadzo, sekukunguruka kwadzinenge dzichiita pamapapiro adzo mukubwinya kwadzo, mukati mesimba raMwari.
Ndingahufananidze nei, umambo uhu kuti munzwisise?
Tarisai, zvose izvi umambo, uye ani munhu aona hupi zvahwo kana hudiki-diki hwawo aoona Mwari vachifamba muhukuru hwavo nesimba.
Ndinoti kwamuri, akamuona, zvisinei, uyo akauya kune vekwake haana kunzwisiswa.
Chiedza chinopenya murima, uye rima harichinzwisise; zvisinei, zuva richauya ramuchanzwisisa kunyangwe Mwari, muri munoitwa kuti muve vapenyu mavari uye naivo.
Ipapo muchaziva kuti mandiona, kuti ndini, uye nekuti ndini chiedza chechokwadi icho chiri mamuri, uye nokuti imi muri mandiri, dai pasina izvozvo hamaibudirira.
Tarisai, ndichafananidza umambo uhu kumurume ane munda uye akatumira varanda vake kumunda kuti vanotimba mumunda.
Uye akati kune wekutanga: Enda unoshanda mumunda, uye muchikamu chekutanga chenguva ndichauya kwauri, uye uchaona kufara kweuso hwangu.
Uye akati kune wechipiri: Endawo newe kumunda, uye chikamu chechipiri chenguva ndichakushanyira nokufara kwechiso changu.
Uyewo kune wechitatu; achiti ndichakushanyira;
Uyewo nekune wechina zvichidaro kusvika kune wechigumi nevaviri.
Uye ishe wemunda akaenda kune wekutanga munguva yekutanga, uye akagara naye nguva yose iyoyo, uye akafadzwa nechiedza cheuso hwashe wake.
Uye ndokubva abva pane wekutanga kuti ashanyirewo wechipiri, uye newechitatu, newechina, zvichidaro kusvika kune wechigumi nevaviri.
Uye naizvozvo vose vakagashira chiedza cheuso hwashe wavo, wose munhu muchikamu chenguva chake, uye nemunguva yake, uye nemumwaka wake—
Kutanga pane wekutanga, uye zvichidaro kusvika pane wekupedzisira, uye nekubva kune wekupedzisira kuenda kune wekutanga, uye kubvira pane wekutanga kusvika wekupedzisira;

Wose munhu muhurongwa hwake, kudakara chikamu chake chenguva chapera, kunyangwe nemaererano nezvaakanga arairwa naishe wake, kuti ishe wake agorumbidzwa maari, uye naiye munaishe wake, kuti vose vagorumbidzwa.

Naizvozvo, kurungano rwemufananidzo urwo ndichafananidza umambo hwose uhu, uye nevagari vacho varimo—hwose umambo muchikamu chenguva yahwo, uye nenguva yahwo, uye nemumwaka wahwo, kunyangwe maererano nezvakadzikwa zvikaitwa naMwari.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri shamwari dzangu, ndinosiya zvirevo izvi nemi kuti muzvifungisise mumwoyo yenyu, nemurairo uyu wandinopa kwamuri, kuti mundidaidze ndichiri pedyo—
Swederai pedyo neni uye ini ndichaswedera pedyo nemi; nditsvakei nokushingaira uye muchandiwana, kumbirai uye muchagashira; gogodzai, uye muchazarurirwa.
Chose zvacho chamunokumbira kuna Baba muzita rangu chichapihwa kwamuri, chinova chakafanira kwamuri;
Uye mukakumbira chipi zvacho chisina kufanira kwamuri, chichakupindukirai chokutongesai.

Tarisai, icho chamunonzwa chinoita seizwi remumwe ari kuchema murenje—murenje, nokuti hamukwanise kumuona—izwi rangu, pamusana pekuti izwi rangu Mweya; Mweya wangu ichokwadi; chokwadi chinogara uye hachina magumo; uye kana chiri mamuri chichawanda.
Uye kana ziso renyu rakanangana bedzi nekubwinya kwangu, miviri yenyu yose ichazadzwa nechiedza, uye hakuzove nerima mamuri, uye muviri iwoyo uzere nechiedza unonzwisisa zvinhu zvose.

Naizvozvo, zvichenesei pachenyu kuti pfungwa dzenyu dzive dzakaperera panaMwari chete, uye mazuva achauya ekuti muchamuona, nokuti vachafugura huso hwavo kwamuri, uye zvichave munguva yake, uye nenzira yavo, uye zviri maererano nechido chavo.
Rangarirai vimbiso huru uye yekupedzisira yandakaita kwamuri; bvisai pfungwa dzenyu dzisina maturo uye nokuseka kwenyu kwakapfuuridza, zviende kure nemi.
Garai imi, garai imi munzvimbo ino, uye mudaidze gungano dzvene, kunyangwe reavo vanove vashandi vekutanga muumambo huno hwekupedzisira.
Uye regai avo vavakayambira munzendo dzavo vadaidze kuna Ishe, uye vachifunga yambiro mumwoyo yavo iyo yavakagashira, kwechinguvana.
Tarisai, uye muone ndichachengeta zvipfuwo zvenyu, uye ndichamisa magosa uye ndigovatumira kwavari.
Tarisai, ndichakurumidzisa basa rangu munguva yaro.

Uye ndinopa kwamuri imi vashandi vekutanga muumambo huno hwekupedzisira, murairo wekuti muzviunganidze pachenyu pamwechete, mugozvironga pachenyu, nokuzvigadzirira pachenyu, nokuzvichenesa pachenyu; hongu, chenesai mwoyo yenyu, mugeze maoko enyu netsoka dzenyu pamberi pangu, kuti ndikuitei makachena;

Kuti ndigopupura kuna Baba venyu, uye naMwari venyu, naMwari vangu, kuti makachena kubva kuropa rechizvarwa chakaipa ichi; kuti ndizadzikise chivimbiso ichi, chivimbiso chikuru ichi chekupedzisira, icho chandakaita kwamuri, kana ndavekuda.
Zvakare, ndinopa kwamuri murairo kuti murambe muri mukunamata nekutsanya kubvira panguva ino zvichienda mberi.
Uye ndinopa kwamuri murairo kuti mudzidzisane dzidziso dzeumambo.

Dzidzisai imi nesimba uye nyasha dzangu dzichave nemi, kuti mugorairwa zvakawedzerwa zvakakwana muruzivo, muchokwadi, mudzidziso, mumutemo wevhangeri rangu, muzvinhu zvose zviri maererano neumambo hwaMwari, izvo zvinofanirwa kuti munzwisise;

Muzvinhu zviri kudenga uye nezviri pasi, uye nezviri pasi penyika; zvinhu zvakange zviripo, zvinhu zviripo, zvinhu zviri pedyo nekuzoitika; zvinhu zviri mumusha, zvinhu zviri mhiri; hondo uye nematambudziko emarudzi, nekutongwa kuri panyika; uye neruzivo zvakare rwenyika uye neumambo—
Kuti mugare makagadzirira muzvinhu zvose pandichakutumai zvakare kuti mukudze basa randakakudeedzerai, uye nehushumiri hwandakati muve nahwo.
Tarisai, ndakakutumai kuti munopupura nokuyambira vanhu, uye zviri kumunhu wose ayambirwa kuti ayambire muvakidzani wake.
Naizvozvo, vanosara vasina chikonzero, uye zvitadzo zvavo zviri pamisoro yavo.
Uyo anonditsvaka nokukurumidza achandiwana, uye haazoraswa.

Naizvozvo, garai imi uye mushingaire kushanda, kuti muve munokwaniswa muhushumiri hwenyu kuti muende mukati memaJentairi kekupedzisira, sekuwanda kuchadomwa nemuromo waIshe, kusunga mutemo uye nokusimbisa uchapupu, uye nokugadzirira vatendi nguva yekutongwa iyo ichauya;

Kuti mweya yavo igopunyuka hasha dzaMwari, kuparadza kwechinyangadzo uko kwakamirira vakaipa, kwose munyika ino uye nemunyika ichauya. Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, regai avo vasiri magosa ekutanga varambe vari mumunda wemizambiringa kudakara muromo waIshe wavadaidza, nokuti nguva yavo haisati yasvika, nguwo dzavo hadzina kuchena kubva paropa rechizvarwa chino.
Garai imi murusununguko urwo rwamunosunungurwa narwo; musazvipiringishe muchitadzo, asi maoko enyu ngaave akachena, kusvika Ishe vauya.

Nokuti hakuna mazuva akawanda nyika isati yabvunda uye ichizeya mberi nesure semunhu akadhakwa; uye zuva richavanza chiso charo, uye rigoramba kupa chiedza; uye mwedzi uchagezwa muropa; uye nyenyedzi dzichashatirwa zvikuru, uye dzichadonhera pasi seguyu rinodonha kubva mumuti wemukuyu.
Uye mushure meuchapupu hwenyu kunouya hasha uye nokugumbuka pavanhu.
Nokuti mushure meuchapupu hwenyu kunouya uchapupu hwekundengendeka kwenyika, uko kuchakonzera kugomera pakati payo, uye vanhu vachawira pasi uye vagotadza kusimuka.
Uye kouyawo uchapupu hweizwi remabanan’ana uye neizwi remheni, uye neizwi redutu guru, uye neizwi remasaisai egungwa achisairirana kupfuurira miganhu yawo.
Uye zvinhu zvose zvinenge zvongopishana; uye chokwadi mwoyo yevanhu ichakundikana, nokuti kutya kuchauya pamunhu wose.

Uye ngirozi dzichabhururuka nepakati pedenga dzichichema nezwi guru, dzichiridza hwamanda yaMwari, dzichiti: Gadzirirai imi, gadzirirai imi, imi vagari vepasi; nokuti kutonga kwaMwari wedu kwauya. Tarisai, uye muone Chikomba chauya; endai munomuchingura.
Uye pakarepo pachaonekwa chiratidzo chikuru mudenga, uye vanhu vose vachachiona pamwechete.

Uye imwe ngirozi icharidza hwamanda yayo, ichiti: Chechi huru iya, amai vehuipi, iyo yakaita kuti marudzi ose anwe waini yehasha dzehupombwe hwayo, iyo inotambudza vatendi vaMwari, iyo inodeura ropa ravo—iyo igere pamusoro pemvura dzakawanda uye nemuzvitsuwa zvegungwa—tarisai, ndiyosawi renyika; rakasungwa mumasvinga; majoto ayo anoitwa akasimba, hakuna munhu angaasunungure; naizvozvo yakatomirira kupiswa. Uye icharidza hwamanda yayo kwenguva huru uye zvine ruzha, uye ose marudzi achainzwa.

Uye kuchanyararwa kudenga kwechikamu chepakati nepakati chenguva; uye pakarepo mushure macho, chidzitiro chekudenga chichatambanudzwa sekutambanudzwa kunoitwa gwaro mushure mekunge rapetwa, uye chiso chaIshe chichafugurwa;
Uye vatendi vari pamusoro penyika, vachiri vapenyu, vachapamhidzirwa upenyu vobva vabatwa mudenga kunomuchingura.
Uye avo vanga varere mumakuva avo vachauya, nokuti makuva avo achazururwa; uye naivowo vachabatwa kuti vanomuchingura pakati peshongwe yekudenga—
NdevaKristu, michero yekutanga, avo vachatanga kudzika naye, uye neavo vari panyika uye mumakuva avo vanobatwa kudenga kuti vamuchingure; uye zvose nezwi rekuridzwa kwehwamanda yengirozi yaMwari.

Uye mushure mezvizvi imwe ngirozi icharidza, inove ndiyohwamanda yechipiri; uye zvino kwouya rununuro rweavo vari vaKristu pakuuya kwake; avo vakagashira chidimbu chavo mutirongo ravakagadzirirwa ivo kuti vagashire vhangeri, uye vagotongwa maererano nevanhu munyama.
Uye zvakare, imwe hwamanda icharira, iri iyo hwamanda yechitatu; uye zvino kwouya mweya yavanhu avo vachatongwa, uye vagoonekwa vari pasi pekutongwa;
Uye ava ndivovose vanhu vakafa; uye havazorarama zvakare kudakara chiuru chamakore chapera, kana zvakare, kudakara kuguma kwepasi.
Uye imwe hwamanda icharidzwa, iri hwamanda yechina, ichiti: kunowanikwa pakati peavo vanosara kudakara zuva riya guru uye rekupedzisira, kunyangwe magumo vacharamba vakasviba zvakadaro.
Uye imwe hwamanda icharidzwa, iyo iri hwamanda yechishanu, iri ngirozi yechishanu iyo inopa vhangeri risingaperi—ichiburuka nepakati pedenga, kumarudzi ose, madzinza, ndimi, nevanhu vose;

Uye ukwu ndikokuchave kurira kwehwamanda yake, ichiti kune vanhu vose, vose vari kudenga nevari pasi, uye neavo vari pasi pevhu—nokuti yose nzeve ichazvinzwa, uye rose ibvi richapfugama, uye rurimi rwose rwuchareurura, apo pavanenge vachinzwa kurira kwehwamanda, ichiti: Ityai Mwari, uye mupe kubwinya kwavari avo vagere pachigaro cheumambo nariini nariini, nokuti nguva yekutonga kwavo yasvika.
Uye zvakare, imwe ngirozi icharidza hwamanda yayo, iyo iri iyo ngirozi yechitanhatu, ichiti: Apunzika uyo akaita kuti ose marudzi anwe waini yehasha dzehupombwe hwake, apunzika, apunzika!

Uye zvakare, imwe ngirozi icharidza hwamanda yayo, iri iyo ngirozi yechinomwe, ichiti Zvapera; Zvapera! Gwayana raMwari rakunda rikatsika-tsika rega musviniro wewaini, kunyangwe chisvino chewaini chekutyisa kwehasha dzaMwari Samasimba.
Uye zvino ipapo ngirozi dzichaiswa korona yekubwinya kwehukuru hwavo, uye vatendi vachazadzwa nekubwinya kwavo, uye vagogashira nhaka yavo uye vagoitwa kuti vaenzane navo.
Uye zvino ngirozi yekutanga icharidza zvakare hwamanda yayo munzeve dzevose vapenyu, uye nokuratidza zviito zvemuruvande zvevanhu, uye nemabasa makuru aMwari muchiuru chekutanga chemakore.

Uye zvino ndipongirozi yechipiri paicharidza hwamanda yayo, uye igoratidza zviito zvemuruvande zvevanhu, uye nepfungwa uye nezvinangwa zvemwoyo yavo, uye nemabasa makuru aMwari muchiuri chechipiru chemakore—

Uye zvichidaro, kusvika ngirozi yechinomwe yaridza hwamanda yayo; uye ichamira pamusoro penyika uye pamusoro pegungwa, uye igopika nezita raivo vagere pachigaro chekutonga, kuti kuchazovepo nguva, Satani yaachave akasungwa, nyoka iya yekare, inonzi dhiabhorosi, uye haizosunungurwa kwemukana wechiuru chemakore.
Uye zvino anozosunungurwa kwemwaka mupfupi kuti agounganidza mawuto ake.
Uye Mikaeri, ngirozi yechinomwe, achaunganidza mawuto ake pamwechete, kunyangwe hondo dzekudenga.
Uye dhiabhorosi achaunganidza mawuto ake pamwechete; kunyangwe hondo dzegehena, uye achauya kuzorwisa Mikaeri nemawuto ake.
Uye zvino kouya kurwa kwaMwari vakuru; uye dhiabhorosi nemauto ake vachakandwa munzvimbo yavo, kuti vasazowana simba pamusoro pevatendi zvakare.
Nokuti Mikaeri acharwa hondo dzavo, uye achakurira uyo anotsvaka chigaro chekutonga chaivo vagere pachigaro chekutonga, kunyangwe iro Gwayana.
Uku ndiko kubwinya kwaMwari, uye neavo vakacheneswa; uye ivavo havachazoona rufu zvekare.
Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, daidzirai musangano wenyu wakakosha, sekukurairai kwandakakuitai.
Uye sezvo vose vasina rutendo, shingairai kutsvaka uye mudzidzisane mazwi eungwaru; hongu, tsvakai kubva mumabhuku akanaka mazwi eungwaru; tsvakai kudzidza, kunyangwe nokuverenga uyewo nerutendo.
Zvirongei; gadzirirai chose chingadiwe; uye mumise imba, kunyangwe imba yemunamato, imba yekutsanya, imba yerutendo, imba yekudzidzira, imba yekubwinya, imba yakarongwa, imba yaMwari;
Kuti kupinda kwenyu kuve kuri muzita raIshe; kuti nekubuda muchienda kwenyu kuve muzita raIshe; kuti kwose kukwazisana kwenyu kuve muzita raIshe, uye nemaoko akasimudzirwa kune vari Pamusoro-soro.
Naizvozvo, regai zvekutaura zvisina maturo, kusekesesa kwose, rwose ruchiva rwenyu, kuzvikudza kwenyu kwose uye nehunzenza, uye nezviito zvenyu zvose zvakaipa.

Domai pakati penyu mudzidzisi, musaite kuti mose muve vatauri pamwechete, regai kutaure mumwechete vamwe vose vateerere kutaura kwake, kuti kana vose vataura vose vagosimudzirana, kutiwo munhu wose ave nemukana wakaenzana.
Onai kuti munodanana; regai zvekuchiva; dzidzai kupanana sezvinodiwa nevhangeri.

Regai zveunyope. Regai zvekuve netsvina, regai zvekutsvakirana mhosva, regai kurara zvakapfuura zvinodiwa; endai kunorara nokukurumidza, kuti musazove makaneta; mukai rungwanani, kuti miviri yenyu nepfungwa dzenyu zvisimbiswe.
Uye pamusoro pezvinhu zvose, zvishongedzei nechisungo cherudo rwakadzama, sezvamunoita nguwo, chinova chisungo chekukwana uye nerunyararo.
Namatai nguva dzose, kuti musaore mwoyo, kusvika ndauya. Tarisai, uye muone, ndichauya nokukurumidza, uye ndigokugashirai kwandiri. Ameni.

Uye zvakare, hurongwa hwemba yakagadzirirwa vatungamiri vechikoro chevaporofita chakaitirwa kudzidziswa kwavo muzvinhu zvose zvakavafanira, kunyangwe zvevashandi vechechi, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, avo vanodaidzwa kuhushumiri hwemuchechi, kutangira pavapirisita vepamusoro, kunyangwe kusvika pasi kune mudhikoni—
Uye uwu ndihwo hwuchave hurongwa hwemba yehutungamiri hwechikoro; uyo anodomwa kuva mutungamiri kana mudzidzisi, achawanikwa amire munzvimbo yake, mumba yaachagadzirirwa.
Naizvozvo, achave wekutanga mumba maMwari, munzvimbo iyo yekuti gungano riri mumba rinzwe mazwi ake zvakanaka, uye zvakajeka, kwete nezwi guru.
Uye paanouya mumba maMwari, nokuti ndiye anofanira kuve wekutanga mumba umu—tarisai, izvi zvakanaka, kuti ave semufananidzo—
Ngaazvipire nomunamato ari pamabvi ake pamberi paMwari, muchiratidzo kana mukurangarira chibvumirano chisingaperi.
Uye kana ani zvake akauya achimuda, mudzidzisi ngaasimuke, uye nemaoko akasimudzirwa kudenga, hongu, kana ikoko chaiko, akwazise hama yake kana hama dzake nemazwi aya:

Uri hama kana kuti muri hama here? Ndinokukwazisai muzita raIshe Jesu Kristu, muchiratidzo kana mukurangarira chibvumirano chisingaperi, chiri icho chibvumirano chandinokugashirai nacho mukuwadzana, uye nekushinga kwakadzikwa, kusingatsukunyuke, uye kusingapindurike, kuti ndive shamwari nehama yenyu kuburikidza nenyasha dzaMwari muzvisungo zverudo, kufamba mumirairo yose yaMwari tisina mhosva, mukutenda, nariini nariini. Ameni.
Uye uyo anowanikwa asina kukodzera kukwaziswa nomutowo uyu, haawane nzvimbo pakati penyu; nokuti hamufanire kubvumira kuti imba yangu isvibiswe naye.

Neuyo anouya achipinda akatendeka pamberi pangu, uye ari hama, kana dziri hama, vachakwazisa mutungamiri kana mudzidzisi nemaoko akasimudzirwa kudenga, uye nemunamato nechibvumirano chimwechetecho, kana nokuti Ameni, murupawo rwumwecheterwo.
Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, uyu mufananidzo kwamuri wekukwazisana kwamunoita mumba maMwari, muchikoro chevaporofita.

Munodaidzwa kuti muite izvi nemunamato nekutenda, sekupihwa kwamuchange muchiitwa mashoko neMweya mune zvamunoita zvose mumba maIshe, muchikoro chevaporofita, kuti ive nzvimbo inoyera, netabernakeri yeMweya Mutsvene yokukusimbisai.
Hamuzotambira ani zvake pakati penyu muchikoro ichi kunze kwekunge ari akachena kubva kuropa rechizvarwa chino;
Uye achatambirwa nechisungo chekushambidza tsoka, nokuti ichochi ndichochinangwa chakaitirwa chisungo chekugeza tsoka.
Uye zvakare, chisungo chekugeza tsoka chinoitwa nemutungamiri, kana gosa riri kutungamira chechi.
Zvinofanira kutanga nemunamato; mushure mekudya chingwa newaini, anofanira kuzvisunga maererano netsika yakapihwa muchitsauko chegumi netatu cheuchapupu hwaJohane pamusoro pangu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/89.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 89
chapter_summary: 1–9, Kushandiswa kwewaini, zvinwiwa zvinodhaka, fodya, uye kunwa zvinopisa zvakarambidzwa; 10–17, Makwenzi michero, nyama uye nembeu zvakaiswa kuti zvishandiswe nemunhu nemhuka; 18–21, Kuteerera mutemo wevhangeri, pamwechete nekuShoko reUngwaru, zvinounza maropafadzo enyama neemweya.

verses.text: Izwi Shoko reUngwaru, rekuyamura dare revapirisita vepamusoro, vakaungana muKirtland, nechechi, uyewo nekuvatendi varimuZioni—

Kuti vatumirwe kwaziso; kwete nemurairo kana nokumanikidzwa, asi nezvakazarurwa uye neShoko reUngwaru, zvichiratidza hurongwa uye nechido chaMwari mukuponesa vatendi vose munyama mumazuva ekupedzisira—
Zvakapihwa semutemo une chivimbiso; zvikaitwa kuti zvive zvinokwanisika kune vakaneta nekune vakanetesesa vevatendi vose, vanove kana vangave vanodaidzwa kunzi vatendi.

Tarisai zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri: Nechikonzero chezvakaipa uye nezvirongwa zviripo uye zvichagara zviripo mumwoyo yavanhu vanofurirana mumazuva ekupedzisira, ndakakuyambirai, uye nokufanokuyambirai, nokukupai shoko iri reungwaru kuburikidza nezvakazarurwa—

Kuti sezvo munhu upi zvake akanwa waini kana zvinodhaka pakati penyu, tarisai hazvina kunaka, kana kufanira mumaziso aBaba venyu, asi chete mukuungana kwenyu pamwechete kuti mupire sakaramende yenyu pamberi pavo.
Uye, tarisai iyi inofanira kuve waini, hongu, waini yakachena yemudzambiringa, yamazvigadzirira mega.
Uye zvakare, zvinwiwa zvinodhaka, hazvizi zvedumbu, asi zvekugezesa miviri yenyu.
Uye zvakare, fodya haisi yemuviri, kana dumbu, uye haina kunaka kumunhu, asi igwenzi remavanga emombe dzose dzinorwara, inofanira kushandiswa neungwaru uye neruzivo.
Uye zvakare, zvinwiwa zvinopisa hazvisi zvemuviri kana dumbu.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ose makwenzi akanaka Mwari vakaagadza kuumba, chimiro nekushandiswa nemunhu—
Rose gwenzi mumwaka yaro, uye nemuchero wose mumwaka wawo, zvose izvi kuti zvishandiswe neungwaru nekutenda.
Hongu, nyamawo yemhuka neyeshiri dzedenga, ini Ishe, ndakadzigadza kuti dzishandiswe nevanhu nokutenda; zvisinei, dzinoda kushandiswa zviri pamwero;
Uye zvinondifadza kuti hazvina kufanira kushandiswa, kunze kwekunge dziri nguva dzechando, kana dzekutonhora, kana dzenzara.

Dzose mbeu dzakagadzwa kushandiswa nemunhu nemhuka, kuti dzive musimboti weupenyu, kwete kumunhu chete, asi nekumhuka dzesango, uye neshiri dzedenga, uye dzose mhuka dzesango dzinomhanya kana kukambaira munyika;
Uye izvi zvakaitwa naMwari kuti munhu ashandise chete munguva dzenzara uye nemunzara yakapfuurikidza.
Dzose mbeu dzakanaka sechidyo kumunhu; semucherowo wemudzambiringa; idzo dzinobereka michero, mungave muvhu kana pamusoro pevhu—

Zvisinei, gorosi kumunhu, nechibage kumombe, uye mapfunde kumabhiza, nemhunga kuhuku nenguruve, nemhuka dzose dzesango, nerukweza kumhuka dzose dzinoshandiswa, uye nokugadzirisa zvekunwa zviri pakati nepakati, sedzimwe mbeuwo.
Uye vose vatendi vanorangarira kuchengeta nekuita zviri kutaurwa izvi vachifamba mukuteerera mirairo, vachagashira hutano muhura hwavo nemwongo mumapfupa avo;
Uye vachawana ungwaru neupfumi hukuru hweruzivo, kunyangwe upfumi hwakavanzikwa;
Uye vachamhanya uye vasingazoneta, uyezve vachafamba vasingazorukutika.
Uye ini Ishe, ndinopa kwavari chivimbiso, kuti ngirozi inoparadza ichavapfuura, sevana veIsraeri, uye isingavauraye. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 90
chapter_summary: 1–5, Makiyi eumambo anopihwa kuna Joseph Smith uye kuburikidza naye kuChechi; 6–7, Sidney Rigdon naFrederick G. Williams vanofanira kushanda muHutungamiri Hwekutanga; 8–11, Vhangeri rinofanira kuparidzwa kumarudzi eIsraeri, kuvaJentairi, uye nekumaJuda, wose munhu achizvinzwira mururimi rwake; 12–18, Joseph Smith nevatevedzeri vake vanofanira kuronga Chechi; 19–37, Vanhu vakasiyana vanorairwa naIshe kuti vafambe zvakatwasanuka uye nokushandira muumambo hwavo.

verses.text: Vanodaro Ishe, zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri mwanakomana wangu, zvitadzo zvako wazviregererwa, maererano nekuchema kwako, nokuti minamato yako neminamato yehama dzako yakwira kunzeve dzangu.
Nokudaro iwe waropafadzwa, kubvira zvino iwe wakatakura makiyi eumambo akapihwa kwauri; huri umambo huri kuuya kwenguva yekupedzisira.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, makiyi eumambo huno haazombotorwa kubva kwauri, kana uchinge uri panyika, kana munyika ichauya;
Zvisinei, kuburikidza newe zvitaurwa zvichapihwa kune mumwe, hongu, kunyangwe kuchechi.

Uye vose vanogashira mashoko aMwari, ngavachenjere kuti vanoabata sei potse vangangoaita kuti aonekwe sechinhu chisina basa, uye vakaunzwa pasi pekutongwa nekuda kwaizvozvo, uye vakagumburwa uye vakapunzika panouya dutu, nemhepo ichivhuvhuta, uye mvura yonaya, nekurova pamba pavo.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kuhama dzako, Sidney Rigdon naFrederick G. Williams, zvitadzo zvavo zvaregererwawo, uye vanoverengwa sevakaenzana newe mukubata makiyi eumambo huno hwekupedzisira;
Zvimwechetewo kuburikidza nokutungamira kwako makiyi echikoro chevaporofita icho chandati chirongwe;
Kuti naizvozvo vaitwe vakakwana muhushumiri hwavo kuitira ruponeso rweZioni, uye nekwemarudzi eIsraeri, uye nerwevaJentairi, nehuwandu hwavachatenda;

Kuti nokuburikidza nekutungamira kwako vagashire shoko, uye kuburikidza nekutungamira kwavo shoko riende kumiganhu yepasi, kutanga kumaJentairi, uye zvino tarisai, uye muone, vachapindukira kuma Juda.
Uye zvino kwouya zuva iro ruoko rwaIshe rwucharatidzwa musimba mukupwisa marudzi, marudzi emaHedheni, imba yaJosefa, nezvevhangeri reruponeso rwavo.

Nokuti zvichaitika kuti muzuva iroro, kuti munhu wose achanzwa kuzara kwevhangeri mururimi rwake, uye nemumutauro wake, kuburikidza nekune avo vakagadzwa kusimba iri, nokutungamira kwaMweya Munyaradzi, vadurirwa pavari kuitira kuburitswa pachena kwaJesu Kristu.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai murairo kuti murambe muri muhushumiri nehutungamiri.
Uye kana muchinge mapedza kududzira zvavaporofita, munobva mabvira ipapo kutungamira nyaya dzechechi nedzechikoro;
Uye kubva nguva nenguva, sezvicharatidzwa naMweya Munyaradzi, muchagashira zvakazarurwa zvinopetenura zvakavanzika zveumambo.
Uye nokuronga chechi, uye kuverenga nokudzidza, uye nokuziva ose mabhuku akanaka, uye nemitauro, nendimi, nevanhu.
Uye iri ndirorichave basa renyu uye nechinangwa muupenyu hwenyu mose, kutungamira dare, uye nokuronga dzose nyaya dzechechi ino neumambo.
Musanyare, kana kunyadziswa, asi tsiurwai mukuzvida uye nekuzvikudza kwenyu kwose, nokuti zvinounza kuteiwa pamweya yenyu.
Rongai dzimba dzenyu, isai kure nemi nungo netsvina.
Zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ngakuve nenzvimbo inorongwa, nokukurumidza, kuitira mhuri yemutevedzeri wako nemunyori, kunyangwe Frederick G. Williams.
Uye regai muranda wangu akwegura Joseph Smith, Baba, arambe aine mhuri yake panzvimbo paarikugara iyezvino; uye haifanire kutengeswa kudakara muromo waIshe wataura.
Uye regai mutevedzeri wangu, kunyangwe Sidney Rigdon, arambe ari paagere iye zvino kudakara muromo waIshe wataura.
Regai bhishopi atsvake nesimba kuti awane mumiririri, uye ngaave munhu ane upfumi hwakaunganidzwa—munhu waMwari, uye werutendo rwakasimba—
Kuti naizvozvo agove anokwanisa kuripa chose chikwereti, kuti imba yekuchengetera yaIshe isave inoshorwa pamberi pevanhu.

Shingirirai kutsvaga, namatai nguva dzose, uye muve munotenda, uye zvinhu zvose zvichashanda pamwechete kukupundutsai, kana mukafamba makatwasanuka uye muchirangarira chibvumirano icho chamakabvumirana.
Regai mhuri dzenyu dzive diki, kunyanya yemuranda wangu akwegura Joseph Smith, Baba, semaererano neavo vasiri vemhuri dzenyu;
Kuti izvo zvinhu zvamunopihwa, kuti basa rangu riitwe zvirege kutorwa kwamuri uye zvichipihwa kune avo vasingakodzere—
Uye naizvozvo motadziswa kuita izvo zvinhu zvandakakurairai kuti muite.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, chido changu kuti murandakadzi wangu Vienna Jaques anofanira kugashira mari yekumuyamura, uye kuti akwire kuenda kunyika yeZioni;
Uye mari inosara inogona kutsaurirwa kwandiri, uye iye ozopihwa mubairo nenguva yangu.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti zvakanaka mumaziso angu kuti anofanira kukwira kuenda kunyika yeZioni, uye kuti agogashira nhaka kubva muruoko rwabhishopi;
Kuti agogara murunyararo sekutendeka kwaanenge akaita, uye asave nenungo mumazuva ake kubvira ipapo.

Uye tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti muchanyora murairo uyu, uye moti kuhama dzenyu muZioni, murudo muchikwazisana, kuti ndakudaidzaiwo zvakare kuti mutungamire Zioni munguva yangu kana yakwana.
Naizvozvo, ngavarege kundinetsa pamusoro penyaya iyi.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, hama dzenyu dziri muZioni dzatanga kutendeuka, uye ngirozi dzinofara pamusoro pavo.

Zvisinei, handina kunyatsofadzwa nezvinhu zvakawanda; uye handinyatsofadzwa nemuranda wangu William McLellin, kana nemuranda wangu Sidney Gilbert; uye kana bhishopiwo, uye vamwe vane zvinhu zvizhinji zvavakafanira kutendeuka kwazviri.
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ini Ishe, ndichanetsana neZioni, uye ndigonyengetedzana nevakasimba vayo, uye ndigoiranga kudakara yakunda uye yachena pamberi pangu.
Nokuti haizobviswa munzvimbo mayo. Ini Ishe, ndazvitaura. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/91.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 91
chapter_summary: 1–3, Apokirifa yakadudzirwa zvakanaka asi inezvimwe zvakawanda zvakapfekerwa nemaoko evanhu zvisiri zvechokwadi; 4–6, Inoyamura avo vakajekeserwa neMweya.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri pamusoro peApokirifa—Kune zvinhu zvizhinji zviri mairi zviri zvechokwadi, uye zvizhinji zvacho zvakadudzirwa nemazvo;
Kune zvinhu zvizhinji zviri mairi zvisiri zvechokwadi zviri zvinhu zvakapamhidzirwa nemaoko evanhu.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, hazvina kukosha kuti Apokirifa idudzirwe.
Naizvozvo, uyo anizvake anoiverenga, ngaanzwisise, nokuti Mweya unoratidza chokwadi.
Uye anizvake anojekeserwa neMweya achawana kupunduka kubvamo;
Uye uyo asingagashire neMweya, haangayamurwe. Nokudaro, hazvina basa kuti idudzirwe. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/92.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 92
chapter_summary: 1–2, Ishe vanopa murairo pamusoro pemapinzirwo emuhurongwa hwemubatanidzwa.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, ndinopa hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa hwakarongwa zvinopindirana nemurairo wakambopihwa kare, chakazarurwa nemurairo zviri maererano nemuranda wangu Frederick G. Williams, kuti muchamugashira muhurongwa. Zvandinotaura kumumwechete, ndinozvitaura kune vose.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwauri muranda wangu Frederick G. Williams, uchave wakamuka kwazvo muhurongwa uhwu; uye kana uri wakatendeka mukuchengeta yose mirairo yandakapa ucharopafadzwa nokusingaperi. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/93.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 93
chapter_summary: 1–5, vose avo vakatendeka vachaona Ishe; 6–18, Johane akapupura achiti Mwanakomana waMwari akabva munyasha achienda munyasha kudakara agashira kuzara kwekubwinya kwaBaba; 19–20, Vanhu vakatendeka, vacharamba vachikura munyasha, naivowo vachagashira kuzara kwake; 21–22, Avo vakaberekwa kuburikidza naKristu ndivoChechi yeDangwe; 23–28, Kristu akagashira kuzara kwechokwadi chose, uye munhu kuburikidza nekuteerera anogona kudarowo; 29–32, Munhu akanga aripo pakutanga naMwari; 33–35, Zviumbiswa ndezvisingaperi, uye munhu anogona kugashira kuzara kwerufaro muKumuka kuvakafa; 36–37, Kubwinya kwaMwari ruzivo; 38–40, Vana havana mhosva pamberi paMwari pamusana perununuro rwaKristu; 41–53, Hama dzinotungamira dzinorairwa kuti dzigadzirise mhuri dzadzo.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, zvichaitika kuti munhu wose anosiya zvitadzo zvake uye ouya kwandiri, nekudaidza zita rangu, nekuteerera izwi rangu, uye achichengeta mirairo yangu, achaona chiso changu uye agoziva kuti ndini.
Uye kuti ndini chiedza chechokwadi chinojekesera munhu wose anouya munyika;
Nokuti ndiri munaBaba, uye Baba vari mandiri, Baba neni tiri vamwechete—
Baba pamusana pekuti vakandipa kuzara kwavo, uye Mwanakomana pamusana pekuti ndakanga ndiri munyika uye ndikaita nyama tabernakeri yangu, uye ndikagara pakati pevanakomana vevanhu.
Ndakanga ndiri munyika uye ndikagashirwa naBaba vangu, uye mabasa avo akaratidzwa pachena.
Uye Johane akaona uye akapupura nokuzara kwekubwinya kwangu, uye kuzara kweuchapupu hwaJohane kucharatidzwa pashure.
Uye akapupura achiti: Ndakaona kubwinya kwake, kuti akange aripo pakutanga, nyika isati yavepo;
Nokudaro, pakutanga pakanga paine Izwi, nokuti ndiye aive Izwi, kunyangwe mutumwa weruponeso—
Chiedza noMununuri wenyika; Mweya wechokwadi, uyo waka uya munyika, nokuti nyika yakaitwa naiye uye maari maive neupenyu hwevanhu uye nechiedza chevanhu.
Nyika dzakaitwa naiye; vanhu vakaitwa naiye, zvose zvinhu zvakaitwa naiye, uye nokuburikidza naiye, uye zvichiitwa naiye.

Uye ini Johane, ndinopupura kuti ndakaona kubwinya kwake, sekubwinya kwaIyeyo Mumwechete Akaberekwa waBaba, azere nenyasha nechokwadi, kunyangwe Mweya wechokwadi, uyo akauya akagara munyama, uye akagara pakati pedu.
Uye ini Johane, ndakaona kuti haana kugashira kuzara pakutanga, asi akagashira nyasha pane dzimwe nyasha;
Uye haana kugashira kuzara pakutanga, asi akaramba ari munyasha nenyasha, kudakara agashira kuzara;
Uye ndikokudaidzwa kwaakaitwa kunzi Mwanakomana waMwari, nokuti haana kugashira kuzara pakutanga.

Uye ini Johane, ndinopupura, uye onai, matenga akazuruka uye Mweya Mutsvene ukaburuka paari nechiratidzo chenjiva, ukagara paari, uye kukauya izwi richibva kudenga richiti: Uyu Mwanakomana wangu wandinoda.
Uye ini Johane, ndinopupura kuti akagashira kuzara kwekubwinya kwaBaba;
Uye akagashira simba rose, kwose kudenga uye nepano pasi, uye kubwinya kwaBaba kwakange kuinaye, nokuti akange agere mavari.
Uye zvichaitika kuti, kana muri vanotendeka muchagashira kuzara kweuchapupu hwaJohane.
Ndinokupai mashoko aya kuti munzwisise nokuziva kunamata, uye nokuziva chamunonamata, kuti mugouya kuna Baba muzita rangu, uye nenguva yakafanira mugogashira kuzara kwavo.
Nokuti kana mukachengeta mirairo yangu muchagashira kuzara kwavo, uye mugobwinya mandiri sezvandiri muna Baba; naizvozvo ndinoti kwamuri, muchagashira nyasha kunyasha.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndaivepo pakutanga ndiina Baba, uye ndini Dangwe;
Uye avo vose vanoberekwa kuburikidza neni, vagashiri vekubwinya ikoko, uye ndevechechi yeDangwe.
Kana nemi maivepo pakutanga muina Baba; avo vanova mweya, kunyange Mweya wechokwadi;
Uye chokwadi ruzivo rwezvinhu sezvazviri, uye nezvazvakange zviri, uye sekuzouya kwazvichaita;
Uye chose zvacho chizhinji kana chishoma pane izvi, mweya weuyo akaipa akanga ari munyepi kubvira pakutanga.
Mweya wechokwadi ndewaMwari. Ndini Mweya wechokwadi, uye Johane akapupura nezvangu, achiti: Akagashira kuzara kwechokwadi, hongu, kunyangwe kwechokwadi chose;
Uye hakuna munhu anogashira kuzara kunze kwekunge achichengeta mirairo yavo.
Uyo anochengeta mirairo yavo anogashira chokwadi nechiedza, kudakara abwinyiswa muchokwadi uye ave kuziva zvose zvinhu.
Munhu naiyewo akanga aripo pakutanga naMwari. Ruzivo kana chiedza chechokwadi, hazvina kusikwa kana kuitwa, uyezve hazvingaitwe.
Chose chokwadi chakazvimirira munzvimbo yachakaiswa naMwari, kuti chizviitire, zvimwechetezvo neruzivo rwesewo, dai zvisirizvo hakuna chingavepo.
Tarisai, hokuno kuzvimiririra kwemunhu, uye hokuno kutongwa kwemunhu, nokuti icho chakanga chiripo kubva pakutanga chanyatsoiswa pachena kwavari, uye havagashire chiedza.
Uye wose munhu ane mweya usingagashire chiedza ari pasi pekutongwa.
Nokuti munhu mweya. Zviumbiswa ndezvisingaperi, uye mweya nezviumbiswa, zvakabatana zvisingapatsanuke, zvinogashira kuzara kwerufaro;
Uye kana zvikapatsanurwa, munhu haangagashire kuzara kwerufaro.
Zviumbiswa ndizvo tabernakeri yaMwari, hongu, munhu itabernakeri yaMwari, kana temberi; uye kana ipi zvayo temberi ikasvibiswa, Mwari vachaparadza temberi iyoyo.
Kubwinya kwaMwari izivo, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, chiedza nechokwadi.
Chiedza nechokwadi zvinodzinga uyo akaipa.
Wose mweya wemunhu wakanga usina mhosva pakutanga; uye Mwari vanunura munhu kubva mukupunzika, munhu akave zvakare sepahucheche hwake, asina mhosva pamberi paMwari.
Uye uyo akaipa anouya uye obvisa chiedza nechokwadi kuburikidza nekusateerera, kunobva kuvana vevanhu, uye nepamusana petsika dzamadzibaba avo.
Asi ndakurairai kuti mukudze vana venyu muchiedza nechokwadi.
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, muranda wangu Frederick G. Williams, waramba uri pasi pekutongerwa izvi;
Hauna kudzidzisa vana vako chiedza nechokwadi, maererano nemirairo, uye uyo akaipa achiine simba pauri, uye ichi ndichochikonzero chedambudziko rako.
Uye zvino ndinokupa murairo—kana ukasasunungurwa uchagadzirisa imba yako, nokuti mune zvinhu zvizhinji zvisina kunaka mumba mako.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kumuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon, kuti mune zvimwe zvinhu haana kuchengeta mirairo maererano nevana vake; naizvozvo, tanga wagadzirisa imba yako.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kumuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, ndichakudaidzai kuti shamwari dzangu, nokuti muri shamwari dzangu, uye muchave nenhaka neni—
Ndakakudaidzai kuti varanda pamusana penyika, uye muri varanda vavo pamusana pangu—
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kuna Joseph Smith, Mwana—Hauna kuchengeta mirairo, uye unofanira kutsiurwa pamberi paIshe;
Mhuri yako inofanira kuti itendeuke uye isiye zvimwe zvinhu, uye itore hanya zvikuru kune zvaunotaura, kana kuti votobviswa kubva panzvimbo yavo.
Chandinotaura kune mumwechete ndinotaura kune vose; namatai nguva dzose potse uyo akaipa angawane simba pamuri, uye akakubvisai panzvimbo dzenyu.

Muranda wanguwo Newel K. Whitney, bhishopi wechechi yangu, anofanira kurangwa, uye agadzirise mhuri yake, uye aone kuti vanoshingaira uye nekuve nehanya nemisha yavo kumba uye vachinamata nguva dzose, kana kuti vangazobviswa panzvimbo yavo.

Zvino, ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, regai muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon aende kurwendo rwake, akurumidze, ashambadze gore raIshe rakanaka, nevhangeri reruponeso, sekumupa kwandichaita zvekutaura; kuburikidza nemunamato wenyu werutendo nekubvumirana pamwechete ndichamutsigira.

Uye regai varanda vangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, naFrederick G. Williams vakurumidzewo, uye zvichapihwa kwavari kunyangwe maererano nemunamato werutendo; maererano nekuchengeta kwamunoita zvandinotaura hamuzonyadziswa munyika muno, kana munyika ichauya.

Uye, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, kuti chido changu kuti ukurumidze kududzira magwaro matsvene angu, nokuwana ruzivo rwenhoroondo, nerwenyika, nerweumambo, rwemitemo yaMwari nemunhu, zvose izvi kuitira kuponeswa kweZioni. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/94.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 94
chapter_summary: 1–9, Ishe vanopa murairo uri maererano nekumiswa kwemba yebasa reHutungamiri; 10–12, Imba yekudhindira yakafanira kuvakwa; 13–17, Dzimwe nhaka dzinopihwa.

verses.text: Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, ndinokupai murairo, kuti mutange basa rekuhwarika uye nokugadzirira pekutangira uye nehwaro hweguta rehoko yeZioni, muno munyika yeKirtland, kutangira paimba yangu.
Uye tarisai, zvakafanira kuitwa maererano nemutowo wandakupai.

Uye itai kuti nzvimbo yekutanga nechekuchamhembe itsaurirwe kwandiri kuti pavakwe imba yevatungamiri, kuitira basa revatungamiri, mukuwana zvakazarurwa; uye nokuitira basa rehushumiri hwevatungamiri, muzvinhu zvose zviri maererano nechechi neumambo.
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ichavakwa iri makumi mashanu anemashanu nemakumi matanhatu anemashanu ezvinhano mukupamhama uye nemukureba, nechemukati.
Uye kuchave nedare remhosva repazasi uye nerepamusoro, maererano nemutowo wamuchapihwa mushure meizvi.
Uye ichapirwa kuna Ishe kubvira ichiri pahwaro hwayo, maererano nehurongwa hwehupirisita maererano nemutowo wamuchapihwa pano.
Uye ichapirwa yose zvayo kuna Ishe kuitira basa revatungamiri.
Uye hamufanire kubvumira chero chinhu chose chisina kuchena kuti chipinde mairi; uye kubwinya kwangu kuchavepo, uye ini ndichavepo.
Asi kana kukauya chisina kuchena, kubwinya kwangu hakuzovepo; uye ini handizopinda mairi.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, nzvimbo yechipiri kuchamhembe ichapirwa kwandiri, muchaitirwa basa rekudhindira zvakadudzirwa zvemagwaro angu matsvene, uye nezvinhu zvose zvose zvazvo zvandichakutaurirai.
Uye ichave zvinhano makumi mashanu nemashanu nemakumi matanhatu ane zvinhano zvishanu mukupamhama uye nemukumba kwayo, nechemukati uye muchave nezvimbo yepasi neyepamusoro.

Imba iyi ichapirwa yose kuna Ishe kubvira pahwaro hwayo, mubasa rekudhinda, muzvinhu zvose zvazvo zvandichakuudzai, kuti ive tsvene isina tsvina, maererano nemutowo muzvinhu zvose sekupihwa kwazvichaitwa kwamuri.
Panzvimbo yechitatu muranda wangu Hyrum Smith ndipo paachagashira nhaka yake.
Panzvimbo yekutanga neyechipiri kumaodzanyemba varanda vangu Reynolds Cahoon naJared Carter ndipo pavachagashira nhaka dzavo—
Kuti vaite basa randakapa kwavari, kuti vave dare rekuvaka dzimba dzangu, maererano nemurairo uyo ini Ishe Mwari, wandakakupai.
Idzi dzimba mbiri hadzivakwe kudakara ndapa kwamuri murairo pamusoro padzo.
Zvino handichakupai zvimwe panguva ino. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/95.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 95
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vatendi vanorangwa pamusana pekutadza kwavo kuvaka imba yaIshe; 7–10, Ishe vanoda kushandisa imba yavo kuti vape vanhu vavo masimba anobva kumusoro; 11–17, Imba ichakumikidzwa senzvimbo yekunamata, uye sechikoro cheVaapositori.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwamuri imi vandinoda, uye avo vandinoda ndinovarangawo kuti zvitadzo zvavo zvigoregererwa, nokuti nokuranga ndinogadzira nzira yekubviswa kwavo muzvinhu zvose kubva mukuyedzwa, uye ndakakudai—
Nokudaro, munofanira kurangwa uye mugomira makatsiurwa pameso pangu;
Nokuti makanditadzira chitadzo chakaipa zvikuru, mukuti hamuna kufunga murairo mukuru muzvinhu zvose, uyo wandakakupai maererano nokuvakwa kwemba yangu;

Yekugadzirira uko kwandakaronga kuti ndigadzirire vaapositori vangu kuti vakwanhurire munda wangu wemizambiringa kwenguva yekupedzisira, kuti ndigoita kuti chiitiko changu chinoshamisa chiitike, kuti ndigodira Mweya wangu panyama yose—
Asi tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kune vazhinji vakagadzwa pakati penyu, vandakadaidza asi vashoma vavo vakasarudzwa.
Avo vasina kusarudzwa vakatadza chitadzo chakaipa kwazvo, mukuti vari kufamba murima masikati.

Uye nechikonzero ichi ndakakupai murairo kuti munofanira kudaidzira gungano renyu rinoyera, kuti kutsanya kwenyu nokuchema kwenyu kukwire kunzeve dzaIshe weSabaoti, vanonzi pakududzira, musiki wezuva rekutanga, mavambo nemagumo.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndakapa kwamuri murairo kuti munofanira kuvaka imba, imba inove yandakaronga kuti, ndigopira avo vandakasarudza masimba anobva kumusoro;
Nokuti ichi ndichochivimbiso chaBaba kwamuri; naizvozvo ndinokurairai mugare, kuti kunyangwe sevaapositori vangu paJerusarema.

Zvisinei varanda vangu vakatadza nechitadzo chakaipa kwazvo; uye kukamuka kusawirirana muchikoro chemaporofita; uko kwakandishungurudza zvikuru, vanodaro Ishe venyu; nokudaro ndakavatumira kuti vanorangwa.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, chido changu kuti muvake imba. Kana mukachengeta mirairo yangu muchawana simba rekuivaka.
Kana musingachengete mirairo yangu, rudo rwaBaba harwurambe rwuinemi, nokudaro muchafamba murima.
Zvino houno ungwaru, uye nepfungwa dzaIshe—imba ngaivakwe, kwete nenzira yenyika, nokuti handipe kwamuri kuti mugogara nenzira yemunyika;
Naizvozvo, ngaivakwe, maererano nenzira yandichakuratidzai kune vatatu venyu, vamuchadoma mugovagadza musimba iri.
Uye kukura kwayo kuchave zvinhano makumi mashanu neshanu hupamhi, uye yoita makumi matanhatu neshanu ezvinhano kureba, munzvimbo yemukati.

Uye regai chikamu chepasi, chenzvimbo yemukati, chikumikidzwe kwandiri, kuitira kupira sakaramende kwenyu uye nokuparidza kwenyu, uye nokutsanya, uye nokunamata, uye nokuunza kwenyu zvido zvenyu zvitsvene kwandiri, vanodaro Ishe.

Uye moita kuti nzvimbo yepamusoro pemba yemukati ipirwe kwandiri kuti ive chikoro chavaapositori vangu, anodaro Mwanakomana Amani; kana kuti nemamwe mazwi Arfasi kana kuti nemamwe mazwi; Omegasi; kunyangwe Jesu Kristu Ishe venyu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/96.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 96
chapter_summary: 1, Hoko yeKirtland muZioni inofanira kusimbiswa; 2–5, Bhishopi anofanira kugovanisa nhaka yeVatendi; 6–9, John Johnson achave nhengo yehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa.

verses.text: Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, houno ungwaru, uhwo hwunoita kuti muzive zvekuita maererano nenyaya iyi, nokuti zvakanaka kwandiri kuti hoko iyi yandaisa kuitira simba reZioni ive inosimbiswa.
Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney atore nzvimbo iyoyi iyo yakadaidzwa pakati penyu, pandiri kuda kuvakira imba yangu tsvene.
Uye zvakare, ngaidimurwe-dimurwe, maererano neungwaru, kuyamura avo vari kutsvaka nhaka, sezvinenge zvabvumiranwa mudare pakati penyu.
Nokudaro, onai kuti matarisa nyaya iyi, uye icho chidimu icho chinofanirwa kuvepo kuti chibatsire hurongwa hwangu kuitira chinangwa chekuunza shoko rangu kuvana vevanhu.

Nokuti tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ichi ndichochakanyanya kufanira mandiri, kuti shoko rangu riende kuvana vevanhu, nechinangwa chekukunda mwoyo yevana vevanhu kuitira kuti zvikunakirei. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ungwaru uye zvakafanira kwandiri, kuti muranda wangu John Johnson, uyo ane mupiro wandabvuma, uye ane minamato yandanzwa, kwaari ndinopa chivimbiso cheupenyu hwokusingaperi kana ari anochengeta mirairo yangu kubvira zvino—
Nokuti chizvarwa chaJosefa uye ari mugashiri wemaropafadzo echivimbiso chakaitwa kumadzibaba ake—
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvakanaka kwandiri kuti ave nhengo yehurongwa, kuti agoyamura mukuunza shoko rangu kuvana vevanhu.
Naizvozvo muchamugadza mumaropafadzo aya, uye achatsvaka nokushingaira kuti abvise zvibinga mupinyi zvose zviri pamba zvakataurwa pakati penyu, kuti agogara mairi. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/97.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 97
chapter_summary: 1–2, Vazhinji veVatendi muZioni (muRuwa rweJackson, Missouri) vanoropafadzwa pamusoro pekutendeka kwavo; 3–5, Parley P. Pratt anotendwa pamusana pekushanda kwake muchikoro chiri muZioni; 6–9, Avo vanochengeta zvibvumirano zvavo vanotambirwa naIshe; 10–17, Imba ichave inovakwa muZioni umo vakachena mumwoyo vachaona Mwari; 18–21, Zioni ndiyo yakachena mumwoyo; 22–28, Zioni ichapunyuka shamu yaIshe kana iri yakatendeka.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri shamwari dzangu, ndinotaura kwamuri nezwi rangu, kunyangwe izwi reMweya wangu, kuti ndiratidze kwamuri chido changu pamusoro pehama dzenyu dziri munyika yeZioni, vazhinji vavo vanove vakazvininipisa zvechokwadi uye vachitsvaka nokushingaira kuti vadzidze ungwaru uye nokutsvaka chokwadi.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, vakaropafadzwa ivavo, nokuti vachawana; nokuti ini Ishe ndinoratidza tsitsi kune vose vakazvirereka, uye nepane vose zvavo vandinoda, kuitira kuti ndigowana kodzero apo pandichavaunza mukuzotongwa.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, maererano nechikoro chiri muZioni, ini Ishe ndinofara chaizvo kuti muve nechikoro muZioni, uye nemuranda wangu Parley P. Pratt, nokuti anogara mandiri.
Uye kana akaramba agere mandiri acharamba achitungamira chikoro munyika yeZioni kudakara ndapa kwaari mimwe mirairo.
Uye ndichamuropafadza nemaropafadzo akapetwa kakawanda, mukutsanangura magwaro matsvene ose uye nezvakavanzika mukusimbiswa kwechikoro, uye nekwechechi muZioni.
Uye kune vanosara vechikoro, ini Ishe ndinoda kuratidza tsitsi, zvisinei, kune avo vanofanira kurangwa, mabasa avo achaitwa kuti azivikanwe.
Demo raiswa pamudzi yemiti; uye wose muti usingaunze michero yakanaka uchatemwa wokandwa mumoto. Ini Ishe, ndazvitaura.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, vose vari pakati pavo vanoziva kuti mwoyo yavo inovimbika, uye yakatyoka, uye mweya yavo yakazvirereka, uye vanoda kuchengeta zvibvumirano nemupiro yavo—hongu, wose mupiro uyo ini Ishe, wandichataura—vanotambirwa neni.
Nokuti ini Ishe, ndichaita kuti vabereke semuti unobereka kwazvo wakadyarwa mumunda wakanaka, pedyo nerukova rwakachena, unounza michero mizhinji yakanaka.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti chido changu kuti imba inofanira kuvakwa kwandiri munyika yeZioni, nemutowo wandakakupai.
Hongu, ngaivakwe nokukurumidza, nechegumi chevanhu vangu.
Tarisai, ichi ndichochegumi uye nekuzvipira ukwo ini Ishe, kwandinoda kubva mumaoko avo, kuti kuve nemba inovakwa kwandiri kuti kuve neruponeso rweZioni—
Kuitira nzvimbo yekupa kutenda yevatendi vose, uye nenzvimbo yekudzidziswa kune avo vose vakadaidzwa kubasa rekuhushumiri mukudaidzwa kwavo kwose kwakasiyana-siyana nezvigaro;
Kuti vave vakakwana mukunzwisisa hushumiri hwavo, mupfungwa, mumitemo, uye nemudzidziso, muzvinhu zvose zviri maererano neumambo hwaMwari pano pasi, makiyi eumambo uhu akaiswa pamuri.
Sekuvaka kunenge kwaita vanhu vangu imba kwandiri muzita raIshe vorega kubvumira kana chipi zvacho chinhu chisina kuchena kuti chiuye mairi kuti isasvibiswe, kubwinya kwangu kuchagara pamusoro payo.
Hongu, uye ndichavepo, nokuti ndichauya kwairi uye vose vakachena mumwoyo vachauya kwairi vachaona Mwari.
Asi kana iri yasvibiswa handiuye mairi, uye kubwinya kwangu hakuzovemo; nokuti handiuye kutemberi dzisiri tsvene.
Uye zvino, tarisai kana Zioni ikaita zvinhu izvi ichabudirira, uye igozvitambanudza uye igokudzwa zvikuru, iine mbiri kwazvo, uye ichityisa zvikuru.
Uye marudzi epasi achaikudza, uye achati: Chokwadi Zioni iguta raMwari vedu, uye chokwadi Zioni haingapunzike, kana kubviswa panzvimbo payo, nokuti ndipo panaMwari, uye neruoko rwaIshe rwuripo.
Uye vakapika nesimba rehukuru hwavo kuti vave ruponeso rwayo neshongwe refu yaro.
Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, Zioni ngaifare, nokuti ino ndiyoZioni—vakachena mumwoyo; nokudaro regai Zioni ifare, vose vakaipa vachachema.
Nokuti tarisai, uye muone, kudzorera kunouya nokukurumidza kune vasina humwari sechamupupuri; uye ndiani achachipunyuka?
Uye shamu yaIshe ichapfuura neusiku uye namasikati, uye zvichataurwa ipapo zvichanetsa vanhu vose; hongu, haizomiswa kudakara Ishe vauya;
Nokuti kugumbuka kwaIshe kwakatungidzirwa kuipa kwavo uye nokuipa kwemabasa avo ose.
Zvisinei, Zioni ichapunyuka kana ikacherechedza kuita zvose zvinhu zviri zvipi zvazvo zvandakairaira.
Asi kana ikasacherechedza kuita chose zvacho chandakairaira, ndichaishanyira maererano nemabasa ayo ose, nedambudziko rakaoma, nezvirwere, nehosha, nemunondo, nekutsiva, nemoto unoparadza.
Zvisinei ngazviverengwe kamwechete aka kunzeve dzayo, kuti ini Ishe, ndatambira kupira kwayo; uye ikasatadza zvakare, hapana chimwechete chezvinhu izvi chichauya pairi;
Uye ndichairopafadza nemaropafadzo, uye ndigopeta ndapetazve maropafadzo akawanda pairi, uye nepazvizvarwa zvayo nariini nariini, vanodaro Mwari wenyu. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/98.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 98
chapter_summary: 1–3, Kutambudzwa kweVatendi kuchave kwakanakira ivo; 4–8, Vatendi vanofanira kushamwaridzana nebumbiro remutemo venyika; 9–10, Varume vanovimbika, vanoruzivo, nevarume vakanaka vanofanira kutsigirwa muharumende yezvenyika; 11–15, Avo vanopira upenyu hwavo mubasa raIshe vachave neupenyu hwokusingaperi; 16–18, Rambai hondo, mushambadze runyararo; 19–22, Vatendi vari muKirtland vanotsuurwa, nekuudzwa kuti vatendeuke; 23–32, Ishe vanoratidza mitemo yavo inotonga kutambudzwa nokunetswa kwakaiswa pavanhu vavo; 33–38, Hondo inorevererwa chete kana yataurwa naIshe; 39–48, Vatendi vanofanira kuregerera vavengi vavo, avo vekuti, kana vatendeuka, vanozopunyukawo kudzorera kwaIshe.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri shamwari dzangu, musatye, mwoyo yenyu ngainyaradzwe; hongu farai nokusingaperi, nemuchinhu chose ipai kutenda;
