Mirirai nemwoyo murefu pana Ishe, nokuti minamato yenyu yapinda munzeve dzaIshe weSabaoti, ikanyorwa nechisimbiso ichi nechisungo—Ishe vapika uye vakadzika kuti vachapihwa.

Naizvozvo, vanopa chivimbiso ichi kwamuri, nechibvumirano chisingagone kupindurwa kuti zvichazadzikiswa; zvose zvinhu zvamakatambudzwa nazvo zvichashanda pamwechete kuitira kupunduka kwenyu, nokubwinya kwezita rangu, vanodaro Ishe.
Uye nazvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri nezvemitemo yenyika, chido changu kuti vanhu vangu vanofanira kucherechedza nokuita zvose zvinhu zvipi zvazvo zvandinovaraira.
Uye mutemo iwoyo wenyika uri bumbiro remitemo, uchitsigira hurongwa hwerusununguko mukuchengetedza kodzero nezvaunokodzera, ndewe vanhu vose, uye zvinonatsika pamberi pangu.
Nokudaro ini Ishe, ndinokureverera, uye nevazvarwa vako vechechi yangu, mukushamwaridzana nemutemo uyo unove ndiwobumbiro remutemo wenyika;
Uye maererano nemutemo wemunhu, chipi zvacho chizhinji kana chishoma pane izvi chinouya nehuipi.
Ini Ishe Mwari, ndinokuitai kuti musununguke, nokudaro masununguka zvechokwadi; uye nemutemo unoitawo kuti musununguke.
Zvisinei, kana vakaipa vachitonga vanhu vanochema.

Nokudaro, varume vakavimbika uye nevarume vakangwara vanofanira kutsvagwa nesimba, uye vanhu vakanaka nevanhu vakangwara munofanira kuvacherechedza kuti muvatsigire; nokuti chose chishoma pane izvi chinobva kune wakaipa.
Uye ndinopa kwamuri murairo, kuti munofanira kusiya kuipa kwose uye mugobatirira pane zvose zvakanaka, kuti mugorarama neshoko rose rinobva mumuromo waMwari.
Nokuti achapa kune vanotendeka mutsetse nemutsetse uye mutemo nemutemo; uye ndichakuedzai nokukusimbisai naizvozvi.
Uye ani zvake anopira upenyu hwake mubasa rangu, nekuda kwezita rangu achahuwana zvakare, kunyangwe upenyu hwokusingaperi.

Nokudaro, musatye vavengi venyu, nokuti ndadzika mumwoyo mangu, vanodaro Ishe, kuti ndichakuyedzai muzvinhu zvose, kuti muchagara here muchibvumirano changu, kunyangwe kusvika pakufa. Kuti muwanikwe makakodzera.
Nokuti kana musingagare muchibvumirano changu hamukodzere kuve vangu.
Nokudaro, rambai hondo uye muparidze runyararo, uye mushingaire kutsvaka kuti mutendeutsire mwoyo yevana kumadzibaba, uye nemwoyo yemadzibaba kuvana;
Uye zvakare, mwoyo yevaJuda kuvaporofita, uye maporofita kuvaJuda; nokuti ndingazouya ndikarova nyika yose nechituko, uye yose nyama ikapera pamberi pangu.
Mwoyo yenyu ngairege kutambudzika; nokuti mumba mababa vangu mune dzimba dzakawanda, uye ndakakugadzirirai nzvimbo, uye pana Baba vangu neni ipapo ndipopamuchavewo.
Tarisai, ini Ishe handinyatsofara nevazhinji vari muchechi kuKirtland;

Nokuti havasikusiya zvitadzo zvavo, uye nenzira dzavo dzakaipa, kuzvikudza kwemwoyo yavo, uye noruchiva rwavo, uye nezvinhu zvavo zvose zvakashoreka, uye nokucherechedza mashoko eungwaru neupenyu hwokusingaperi hwandakavapa.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti ini Ishe, ndichavaranga uye ndichaita zvose zvandinenge ndada, kana vasingatendeuke uye vachicherechedza zvinhu zvose izvo zvandakataura kwavari.
Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri kana mukacherechedza kuita chose chandinokurairai, ini Ishe, ndichabvisa kwose kushatirwa uye nokugumbuka kubva kwamuri, uye misuwo yegehena haizokumirirai.
Zvino, ndinotaura kwamuri pamusoro pemhuri dzenyu—kana vanhu vakakurovai, kana mhuri dzenyu, kamwechete, uye nemwoyo murefu chinyararire, uye mukasadzorera, kana kutsvaka kutsiva, muchawana mubairo;
Asi mukasava nemwoyo murefu, zvichatorwa kwamuri sekupihwa kuyananiswa kwakafanira kwamuri.
Uye zvakare, kana muvengi wenyu akakurovai kechipiri, uye imi mukasamudzosera muvengi wenyu, uye mukazvitora nemwoyo murefu, mubairo wenyu uchave wakapetwa kazana.
Uye zvakare, kana akakurovai kechitatu, uye imi mukazvitora nemwoyo murefu; mubairo wenyu uchapetwa kaviri kwamuri;
Uye uchapupu hutatu uhwu huchamira huchipokana nemuvengi wenyu kana asina kutendeuka, uye hauzodzimwa.

Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana muvengi uya akapunyuka kutsiva kwangu, kuti asatorwe mukutongwa pamberi pangu, zvino muchaona kuti mamuyambira muzita rangu, kuti asazouya pamuri zvakare, kana pamhuri yenyu, kunyangwe vana vevana venyu kusvikira kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechina.
Uye zvino, kana akauya pamuri kana kuvana venyu, kana kuvana vevana venyu kusvikira kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina, ndaisa muvengi wenyu mumaoko enyu;
Uye zvino kana mukamuregerera, muchapihwa mubairo wekururama kwenyu; uye nekuvana venyuwo uye nekuvana vevana vavo kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina.

Zvisinei, muvengi wenyu ari mumaoko enyu; uye kana mukamupa mubairo uri maererano nemabasa ake hamuna mhosva; kana achitsvaka kukuurayai, uye upenyu hwenyu huri mungozi pamusana pake, muvengi wenyu ari mumaoko enyu uye imi hamuna mhosva.
Tarisai, uyu ndiwomutemo wandakapa kumuranda wangu Nifai, uye nemadzibaba enyu, Josefa, uye Jakobo, Isaka, naAbrahama, uye nevose vaporofita vangu nevaapositori vekare.
Uye zvakare, uyo ndiwomutemo wandakapa kune vangu vekare, kuti vasabude kuenda kunorwa nerudzi rwupi zvarwo, kana dzinza, rurimi, kana vanhu, kunze kwekunge ini Ishe, ndavaraira.
Uye kana rudzi rwupi zvarwo, rurimi kana vanhu vakadaidzira hondo kwavari, vanofanira kutanga vasimudzira mureza werunyararo kuvanhu ivavo, kana rudzi irworwo, kana rurimi irworwo;
Uye kana vanhu ivavo vakasabvuma runyararo rwavari kupihwa, kana kechipiri kana kechitatu, vanofanira kuuya neuchapupu uhu pamberi paIshe;
Zvino ini Ishe, ndinozopa kwavari murairo, nekuvatsigira mukuenda kwavo kuhondo nenyika iyoyo, kana rurimi kana vanhu.
Uye ini Ishe, ndinozorwa hondo dzavo, uye nehondo dzevana vavo, uye nedzevana vevana vavo, kusvika vazvitsividza pavavengi vavo vose, kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina.
Tarisai, uyu muenzaniso kuvanhu vose, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, kuti pave nekuenzanisa pamberi pangu.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri kana muvengi wenyu achinge auya kwamuri kekutanga, akatendeuka akauya kwamuri achikumbira ruregerero rwenyu, imi munofanira kumuregerera, uye imi hamuzozvichengeta seuchapupu pamusoro pemuvengi wenyu—
Uye zvichidaro kechipiri nekechitatu; uye nenguva dzose dzinotendeuka muvengi wenyu mukutadza kwaakakutadzirai, imi muchamuregerera, kudakara kave makumi manomwe akapetwa kanomwe.
Uye akakutadzirai uye akasatendeuka kekutanga, zvisinei muchamuregerera.
Uye akakutadzirai kechipiri, uye akasatendeuka, zvisinei muchamuregerera.
Uye kana akutadzirai kechitatu, uye akasatendeuka muchamuregerera zvakare.

Asi akakutadzirai kwenguva yechina, hamuchamuregerera, asi muchaunza uchapupu uhu pamberi paIshe; uye hazvizodzimwa kudakara atendeuka uye nokukuripai kakapetwa kana muzvinhu zvose zvaakakutadzirai nazvo.
Uye kana akaita izvi, imi muchamuregerera nemwoyo wenyu wose; uye akasaita izvi, ini Ishe ndichakutsivirai muvengi wenyu zvakapetwa kazana;
Uye nekuvana vake, uye nekuvana vevana veavo vose vanondivenga, kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina.

Asi kana vana vakatendeuka, kana vana vevana, uye vakatendeukira kuna Ishe Mwari vavo, nemwoyo yavo yose uye nemasimba avo ose, nepfungwa, uye nesimba, uye vakadzorera zvakapetwa kana zvekutadza kwose ukwo kwavakatadza nako, kana ukwo kwakatadzwa nemadzibaba avo, kana madzibaba emadzibaba avo, ipapo ndipo pachabviswa kugumbuka kwenyu.
Uye kutsividza hakwuzouya zvakare pavari, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu, uye kutadza kwavo hakuzouyiswa zvakare seuchapupu kwavari pamberi paIshe. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/99.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 99
chapter_summary: 1–8, John Murdock anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri, uye avo vanomugashira vanogashira Ishe nekuwana tsitsi.

verses.text: Tarisai vanodaro Ishe kumuranda wangu John Murdock—iwe wadaidzwa kuti uende kunyika dzekumabvazuva, kubva kuimba neimba, kubva kumusha nemusha, uye kubva kuguta neguta, kuti uparidze vhangeri rangu risingaperi kuvagari vemo, mukati mekutambudzwa uye nohuipi.
Uye uyo anokugashira anogashira ini, uye uchawana simba rekutaura izwi rangu mukuratidza kweMweya Mutsvene wangu.
Uye uyo anogashira semwana mudiki, anogashira umambo hwangu; vakaropafadzwa ivavo nokuti vachawana tsitsi.
Uye ani zvake achakuramba acharambwa naBaba vangu nemba yake; uye uchageza tsoka dzako munzvimbo dzakahwanda dzamunofamba nadzo seuchapupu kwavari.
Uye tarisai, muone, ndinouya nokukurumidza kuzotonga, kupwisa vose zviito zvavo zvisiri zvehumwari nezvavakaita kwandiri ini, sekunyorwa kwazvakaitwa pamusoro pangu mukati mebhuku.
Uye zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, hazvina kufanira kuti muende kudakara vana venyu variritirwa, uye vatumirwa zvakanaka kuna bhishopi weZioni.
Mushure memakore akati, kana muchida kwandiri, munogonawo kuenda kunyika yakanaka, kuti munogara nhaka yenyu;
Kana zvisirizvo ucharamba uchiparidza vhangeri rangu kusvika watorwa. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/100.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 100
chapter_summary: 1–4, Joseph naSidney vachaparidza vhangeri rekuponeswa kwemweya; 5–8, Zvichapihwa kwavari panguva iyoyo zvavanofanira kutaura; 9–12, Sidney achave mutauri uye Joseph achave muzaruri ari mukuru muhupupuri; 13–17, Ishe vachamutsa vanhu vakachena, uye vanoteerera vachaponeswa.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe kwamuri, shamwari dzangu Sidney naJoseph, mhuri dzenyu dziri zvakanaka; dziri mumaoko angu, ndichaita navo izvo zvandinoona zvakandinakira; nokuti mandiri mune simba rose.
Naizvozvo, nditeverei, muteerere mirairo yandichapa kwamuri.
Tarisai muone, ndine vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo ino mumatunhu akatenderedza, kuchazarurwa musiwo chaiwo mumatunhu akatenderedza munyika ino iri nechekumabvazuva.
Naizvozvo, ini Ishe, ndakakubvumirai kuti muuye munzvimbo ino, nokuti zvakanga zvakafanira kwandiri kuitira kuponeswa kwemweya.
Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, simudzai mazwi enyu kuvanhu ava; taurai pfungwa dzandichaisa mumwoyo menyu, uye hamuzonyadziswa pamberi pevanhu.
Nokuti zvichapihwa kwamuri munguva iyoyo, hongu muchinguva ichocho, zvamuchataura.
Asi ndinokupai murairo, kuti muchataura chose chirichipi chinhu chamunotaura muzita rangu, mukuyera kwemwoyo, mumweya wekuzvininipisa, muzvinhu zvose.
Uye ndinopa kwamuri chivimbiso ichi, kuti kana muri munenge muchiita izvi Mweya Mutsvene uchadirwa mukupupura zvinhu zvose zvazvo zvamuchataura.
Uye zvakafanira mandiri kuti iwe, muranda wangu Sidney, unofanira kuve mutauri kuvanhu ava; hongu, zvirokwazvo, ndichakugadza kubasa iri, kunyangwe kuve mutauri wemuranda wangu Joseph.
Uye ndichamupa simba rekuve akasimba mukupupura.

Uye ndichapa kwauri simba rekuti uve wakasimba mukutsanangura ose magwaro matsvene, kuti uve mutauri kwaari, iye achave muzaruri kwauri, kuti uzive chokwadi chezvinhu zvose zviri maererano nezvinhu zveumambo hwangu pano pasi.
Naizvozvo, endai mberi nerwendo rwenyu uye murege mwoyo yenyu ifare, nokuti tarisai, uye muone, ndinemi kunyangwe kusvika kumagumo.
Uye zvino ndavekukupai shoko nezveZioni. Zioni ichanunurwa, kunyangwe dai icharangwa kwemwaka mupfupi.
Hama dzenyu, varanda vangu Orson Hyde naJohn Gould, vari mumaoko angu; uye sekugara kwavanoita vachichengeta mirairo yangu vachaponeswa.
Naizvozvo mwoyo yenyu ngainyaradzwe; nokuti zvose zvinhu zvichashanda pamwechete kunakira avo vanofamba zvakarurama, uye mukutsvindiswa kwechechi.
Nokuti ndichazvimutsira vanhu vakachena, avo vachandishandira mukururama;
Uye avo vose vanodaidza zita raIshe, vachichengeta mirairo yavo, vachaponeswa. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/101.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 101
chapter_summary: 1–8, Vatendi vanorangwa nokutambudzwa pamusoro pekutadza kwavo; 9–15, Kugumbuka kwaIshe kuchawira pamusoro pemarudzi, asi vanhu vavo vachaunganidzwa vagonyaradzwa; 16–21, Zioni nehoko dzayo zvichamiswa; 22–31, Mararamiro eupenyu munguva yeMereniamu anotsanangurwa; 32–42, Vatendi vacharopafadzwa nokupihwa mubairo ipapo; 43–62, Rungano rwemufananidzo wemurume anokudzwa uye nemiti yemiorivhi, zvinoratidza matambudziko nekuzonunurwa kweZioni; 63–75, Vatendi vanofanira kuramba vachiungana pamwechete; 76–80, Ishe vakamisa bumbiro remitemo yeUnited States; 81–101, Vatendi vanofanira kukumbira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadzirwe, maererano nerungano rwemufananidzo wemudzimai nemutongi akanga asingatonge zvakanaka.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, pamusoro pehama dzenyu dzakatambudzwa, uye dzikashungurudzwa, uye dzikabviswa munyika yenhaka yadzo—
Ini Ishe, ndakabvumira kutambudzwa uku kuti kuuye pavari, uko kwakava kutambudzwa nechikonzero chekutadza kwavo;
Asi ndichavatora, uye vachave vangu muzuva iro randichauya kuzounganidza zvinokosha zvishongo zvangu.
Naizvozvo, vanofanira kuti varangwe uye nokuyedzwa, kunyangwe saAbrahama, uyo akaudzwa kuti apire mwanakomana wake mumwechete.
Nokuti avo vose vasingagone kushingirira kurangwa, asi vachindiramba, havangatsveneswe.
Tarisai ndinoti kwamuri, kwaive nokupesana, uye negakava, uye nokuchiva, uye nekunetsana, uye nemwoyo yehutsvina neruchiva pakati pavo; nokudaro nezvinhu izvi vakasvibisa nhaka yavo.
Vainonoka kunzwa izwi raIshe Mwari vavo; nokudaro, Ishe Mwari vavo vanononoka kunzwa minamato yavo, kuvapindura muzuva redambudziko ravo.
Muzuva rerunyararo rwavo havana kukoshesa kuraira kwangu; asi muzuva redambudziko ravo, pamusana penhamo vanonditsvaga.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana nezvitadzo zvavo, ura hwangu hwakazadzwa netsitsi kwavari, handizovarasa chose; uye muzuva rehasha ndichavarangarira netsitsi.
Ndapika, uye chisungo chikaenda nemumwe murairo uyo wandakapa kwamuri, kuti ndiregerere munondo wekugumbuka kwangu ndakamirira vanhu vangu; uye kunyangwe sezvandakataura, zvichaitika.
Kugumbuka kwangu kuri pedyo nekuzodirwa zvisina mwero pamarudzi ose; izvi ndichazviita kana mukombe wekutadza kwavo wazara.
Uye muzuva iroro vose vanowanikwa vari panharire, kana kuti nemamwe mazwi, yose Israeri yangu ichaponeswa.
Uye vose vakanga vakapararira vachaunganidzwa.
Uye avo vose vakachema vachanyaradzwa.
Uye vose vakapa upenyu hwavo pamusana pezita rangu vachapfekedzwa korona.
Naizvozvo, regai mwoyo yenyu inyaradzwe pamusoro peZioni, nokuti yose nyama iri mumaoko angu; nyararai uye muzive kuti ndini Mwari.
Zioni haizobviswa panzvimbo payo, kana dai zvazvo vana vayo vakapararira.
Avo vanosara, uye vari vakachena mumwoyo, vachadzoka, uye vouya kunhaka yavo, ivo nevana vavo, nenziyo dzerufaro rwusingaperi, kuzovaka matongo eZioni—
Uye zvose zvinhu izvi kuti vaporofita vazadzikiswe.
Uye, tarisai hakuna imwe nzvimbo yakadomwa kunze kweiyo yandakadoma; kana kuti pachazove neimwe nzvimbo yakadomwa kunze kweiyo yandadoma, mubasa rekuunganidza vatendi vangu—
Kudakara zuva rauya apo pachashaikwa nzvimbo yavo; uye zvino ndine dzimwe nzvimbo dzandidoma kwavari, uye dzichanzi hoko, kuitira kudzivirira simba reZioni.
Tarisai, chido changu, kuti vose avo vanodaidza zita rangu, nokundinamata maererano nevhangeri rangu risingaperi, vanofanira kuungana pamwechete, nokumira munzvimbo tsvene;
Uye gadzirirai zvakazarurwa zviri kuuya, apo chidzitiro chinofukidza mutemberi mutabernakeri yangu, icho chinoviga nyika, chichabviswa, uye yose nyama ichandiona pamwechete.
Uye chose chinhu chinoora, chemunhu, kana chemhuka dzesango, kana cheshiri dzematenga, kana chehove dzegungwa, icho chinogara pamusoro penyika, chichaparadzwa.
Kana izvowo zvechiumbiso, zvichanyungudika nekupisa kukuru; uye zvose zvinhu zvichavezvitsva, kuti ruzivo nokubwinya kwangu kugare pamusoro penyika yose.
Uye muzuva iroro ruvengo rwemunhu, neruvengo rwemhuka, hongu ruvengo rwenyama yose, rwuchapera pamberi pechiso changu.
Uye muzuva iroro chose zvacho chinokumbirwa nemunhu, chichapihwa kwaari.
Uye muzuva iroro Satani haazove nesimba rekuedza kana munhu upi zvake.
Uye hakuchazove nekusuwa nokuti hakuna rufu.
Muzuva iroro kacheche hakazofa kusvika kachembera; uye upenyu hwake huchaita sezera remuti;
Uye kana ofa, haazorara, zvichireva kuti muvhu, asi achapindurwa mukubwaira kweziso, uye achatorwa, uye kuzorora kwake kugoropafadzwa.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, muzuva iroro richauya Ishe, vacharatidza zvose zvinhu—
Zvinhu zvakapfuura, nezvinhu zvakavigwa zvisina munhu aizviziva, zvinhu zvenyika, zvayakaumbwa nazvo, uye nezvakavandika uye nemagumo acho—
Zvinhu zvinokoshesesa, zvinhu zviri pamusoro, nezvinhu zviri pasi, zvinhu zviri muvhu, nezviri pamusoro pevhu, nezviri mudenga.
Uye nevose avo vanotambudzwa pamusoro pezita rangu, uye vachashingirira murutendo, kana dai vakadaidzwa kuti vaise upenyu hwavo pasi pamusana pangu, asi vachave mukubwinya kwose uku.
Nokudaro, musatye kunyangwe kusvika kurufu, nokuti munyika muno rufaro rwenyu haruna kuzara, asi mandiri rufaro rwenyu rwuzere.
Naizvozvo, musave nehanya nemuviri, kana upenyu hwemuviri; asi torerai hanya mweya, neupenyu hwemweya.
Uye mutsvake chiso chaIshe nguva dzose, kuti mumwoyo murefu munogona kuve nemweya yenyu, uye muchave neupenyu hwokusingaperi.
Kana vanhu vadaidzwa kuvhangeri rangu risingaperi, uye vakabvumirana nechibvumirano chisingaperi, vanotariswa semunyu wenyika nemurungi wevanhu;
Vanodaidzwa kuti vazove varungi vevanhu, naizvozvo, kana munyu wenyika ukarunduka, tarisai, kubvira ipapo hauchisina chawakanakira, kunze kwekuti uraswe kunze nokutsikwa-tsikwa pasi petsoka dzevanhu.
Tarisai houno ungwaru maererano nevana veZioni, kunyangwe vazhinji asi kwete vose; vakawanikwa vari vatadzi, naizvozvo vanofanira kurangwa—
Uyo anozvikwidziridza achadzikiswa, uye anozvidzikisa achakwidziridzwa.
Uye zvino, ndichakuratidzai rungano rwemufananidzo, kuti mugoziva chido changu maererano nerununuro rweZioni.

Mumwe murume aikudzwa aive nenzvimbo yake yakanaka chaizvo, uye akati kuvaranda vake: Endai kumunda wangu wemizambiringa, kunyangwe panzvimbo yakanaka chaizvo iyi, uye munodyara miti yemiorivhi gumi nemiviri;

Uye moisa varindi vakaikomberedza, uye movaka nharire, kuti munhu agotarisa dunhu rose rakatenderedza, kuti ave murindi panharire, kuti miti yangu yemiorivhi irege kutyorwa kana muvengi akauya kuzokanganisa nokuzvitorera michero yemunda wangu wemizambiringa.

Zvino varanda vemurume anokudzwa vakaenda vakanoita zvavakanga varairwa naishe wavo, uye vakadyara miti yemiorivhi, uye vakavaka ruzhowa rwakatenderedza, uye ndokuisa murindi, uye ndokutanga kuvaka nharire.
Uye vachiri kuisa hwaro hwacho, vakatanga kutaura pachavo: Iye ishe wedu anoidii nharire iyi?
Uye vakataura kwenguva huru, vachiti pakati pavo: Ko ishe wangu anodireiko iyi nharire, tichiona kuti inguva yerunyararo?
Mari iyi hayaifanira kunge yakapihwa kune vanoshanda nezvemari here? Nokuti zvinhu izvi hazvina basa.
Uye vari mukupesana kudaro vakavamba kuita nungo chaidzo, uye vakasateerera kumirairo yatenzi wavo.
Uye muvengi akauya husiku, uye akapaza ruzhowa; uye varanda vemurume aikudzwa vakamuka uye vakatya, uye vakatiza; uye muvengi akaparadza basa iroro, uye akatyora miti yemiorivhi.
Zvino tarisai, murume anokudzwa uyu, ishe wemunda wemizambiringa, akadaidza varanda vake, akati kwavari, Sei? Chii chakakonzera zvakaipa kudai?

Hamaifanira here kungemakaita zvandakakurairai, uye—mushure mekunge madyara mumunda wemudzambiringa, uye mukavaka ruzhowa makatenderedza, uye mukaisa varindi pachidziro chacho—mukavakawo nharire, uye mukaisa murindi panharire, uye akarinda munda wangu wemuzambiringa, uye asina kukotsira, potse muvengi angauye pamuri?

Uye tarisai, murindi panharire angadai akaona muvengi achiri kure; uye zvino mungadai makagadzirira uye makatadzisa muvengi kutyora ruzhowa, uye makadzivirira munda wangu wemizambiringa kubva mumaoko emuparadzi.

Uye ishe wemunda wemuzambiringa akati kune mumwe wevaranda vake: Enda unounganidza vasara vevaranda vangu, uye utore rose simba remba yangu, rinove iwo mawuto angu, majaya angu, uye neavo vasati vakwegura pakati pevaranda vangu vose, vari ivo simba remba yangu, kunze kweavo vandadoma kuti vagare;
Uye mobva maenda kunzvimbo yemunda wemuzambiringa wangu, uye munodzikinura munda wangu, nokuti ndewangu; ndakautenga nemari.
Naizvozvo, endai iye zvino kunyika yangu; pazai zvidziro zvevavengi vangu; koromorai nharire yavo, uye muparadze varindi vavo.
Uye kana vari vanounganidzana pamwechete kukurwisai, nditsividzirei vavengi vangu, kuti pamberi apo ndingazouya nevakasara vemba yangu uye ndobvandatora nyika.
Uye muranda akati kuna ishe wake: Zvinhu izvi zvichaitika rinhi?
Uye iye akati kumuranda wake: Kana ndavekuda; endai iye zvino uye munoita zvose zviri zvipi zvazvo zvandakurairai;
Uye izvi zvichave chisimbiso changu uye nemaropafadzo kwamuri mutariri anotendeka akangwara pakati pemba yangu, mutongi muumambo hwangu.
Uye muranda wake akabva aenda pakarepo, uye akanoita zvose zvinhu zvazvo zvaakanga arairwa naishe wake; uye mushure memazuva mazhinji zvose zvinhu zvakazadzikiswa.
Zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndicharatidza kwamuri ungwaru huri mandiri maererano nechechi dzose, kana ari anoda kutungamirirwa nenzira kwayo yakanaka kuruponeso rwavo—
Kuti basa rekuunganidzwa pamwechete kwevatendi vangu rirambe richiitwa, kuti ndivavake muzita rangu panzvimbo tsvene; nokuti nguva yekukohwa yauya, uye izwi rinofanira kuti richizadzikiswa.

Naizvozvo, ndinofanira kuunganidza pamwechete vanhu vangu, maererano nerungano rwemufananidzo wegorosi nemasawi, kuti gorosi richengetwe mutsapi kuti riwane upenyu hwokusingaperi, uye kugadzwa nekubwinya kweseresitiyaro, apo pandichauya muumambo hwaBaba vangu kuzopa mubairo kune munhu wose maererano nezvichange zvakaita basa rake;
Apo masawi achisungwa mumasvinga, uye tambo dzawo dzichiitwa kuti dzisimbe, kuti agopiswa nemoto usingadzime.
Naizvozvo, ndinopa murairo chechi dzose, kuti varambe vachiungana pamwechete munzvimbo dzandakadoma.
Zvisinei, sezvandakambotaura kwamuri mune mumwe murairo, kuungana kwenyu ngakurege kuitwa nokukurumidza, kana nokutizira, asi zvinhu zvose ngazvigadzirirwe pamberi penyu.
Uye kuti zvinhu zvose zvigadzirirwe pamberi pangu, cherechedzai murairo wandakapa pamusoro pezvinhu izvi—
Uyo unoti, kana unodzidzisa, kutenga dzose nzvimbo nemari, dzinogona kutengwa nemari, mudunhu iro rakapoteredza nyika yandakasarudza kuti ive nyika yeZioni, mukutanga kwekuungana kwevatendi vangu;
Yose nyika inogona kutengwa muruwa rweJackson, nematunhu akatenderedza, uye musiye zvinosara muruoko rwangu.

Zvino, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai chechi dzose dziunganidze pamwechete mari yadzo; regai zvinhu izvi zviitwe nenguva yazvo, asi kwete mukukurumidza; uye mucherechedze kuti zvinhu zvigadzirirwe pamberi penyu.
Uye regai kudomwe varume vaneruremekedzo, kunyangwe varume vaneungwaru, uye movatuma kuti vanotenga nzvimbo idzi.
Uye chechi dziri munyika dzekumabvazuva, kana achinge avakwa, kana akateerera kurairwa kuno anogona kutenga nzvimbo uye voungana pamwechete padziri; uye munzira iyi anokwanisa kumisa Zioni.

Kune kunyangwe iyezvino zvakachengetedzwa kare zvakakwana, hongu, kunyangwe zvakatowandisisa, zvekununura Zioni, nokumisa matongo ayo, kuti asazopunzwa zvakare, ndokunge chechi idzo dzinozvidaidza nezita rangu dzaida kuteerera kuzwi rangu.
Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, avo vakaparadzwa nevavengi vavo, chido changu kuti varambe vachitsvaga kuti zvigadziriswe, nerununuro, nemaoko eavo vakaiswa sevatongi uye vaine simba pamusoro penyu—
Maerererano nemutemo nebumbiro remutemo revanhu, iro randakabvumira kuti riitwe, uye kuti richengetwe kuitira kodzero nokudziirirwa kweyese nyama maererano nemitemo yakarurama uye iri mitsvene;

Kuti munhu wose ashande ari mudzidziso uye mumitemo iri maererano nenguva ichauya, maererano nekugona kuzvifungira kwandakamupa, kuti wose munhu azvipindurire pamusoro pezvivi zvake muzuva rekutongwa.
Naizvozvo, hazvina kunaka kuti kuve nemunhu akasungwa nemumwe.
Uye nechinangwa ichi ndakaita Bumbiro remirau yenyika ino, nemaoko evarume vakangwara vandakamutsira basa iri, uye nokununura nyika mukudeura ropa.
Zvino, ndingafananidze nei vana veZioni? Ndichavafananidza nerungano rwemufananidzo wemukadzi nemutongi akaipa, nokuti vanhu vanofanira kunamata nguva dzose vasinganete, uyo unoti—
Paive nemutongi muguta akange asingatye Mwari, kana kukudza munhu.
Uye makanga muine shirikadzi muguta iroro, uye yakauya kwaari ikati: ndidzorereiwo muvengi wangu.

Uye kwechinguva chakati akaramba asi mumashure akati nechemumwoyo kana zvazvo ndisingatye Mwari, kana kukudza munhu, pamusana pekuti shirikadzi iyi iri kundinetsa ndichaitsividzira, potse nokuramba ichiuya kwayo ingandiite kuti ndinete.
Ndikokufananidza kwandingaite vana veZioni.
Ngavacheme patsoka dzemutongi.
Uye kana akasavateerera, ngavaende vanonyengetedza pasi petsoka dzagavhuna;
Uye kana gavhuna akasavanzwa, ngavanyengetedze vari pasi petsoka dzemutungamiri;
Uye kana mutungamiri akasavanzwa, ipapo Ishe vachasimuka uye vachiuya kubva munzvimbo yavo yekuhwanda, uye muhasha dzavo vagonetsa rudzi;
Uye mukusafadzwa kwavo kukuru, nemukushatirwa kwavo kwakaipa, munguva yavo, achabvisa avo vakaipa, vasingatendeke, nevatariri vakaipa, uye ovapa mugove wavo muvanyengedzi, nevasingatende;
Kunyangwe murima rekunze, umo mune kuchema, nekuwuwura, nekugedageda kwemeno.
Namatai imi naizvozvo, kuti nzeve dzavo dzingazururwe mukuchema kwenyu, kuti ini ndigovaitira tsitsi, kuti zvinhu izvi zvisauye pavari.
Zvandataura kwamuri zvakafanira kuveizvo, kuti vose vanhu vasare vasina chekuhwanda nacho;
Kuti varume vakangwara nevatongi vagonzwa nokuziva icho chavasina kumbofunga;
Kuti ndiende mberi nekuunza chiito changu, chiito changu chinoshamisa, nokuita basa rangu, basa rangu rinoshamisa, kuti vanhu vagogona kuziva pakati pevakaipa nevakarurama, vanodaro Mwari venyu.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, hazvipindirane nemurairo wangu nechido changu kuti muranda wangu Sidney Gilbert atengese imba yangu yekuchengetera, iyo yandakadomera kuvanhu vangu; kuisa mumaoko evavengi vangu.
Musaite kuti icho chandinenge ndadoma chisvibiswe nevavengi vangu, nemvumo yeavo vanozvidaidza nezita rangu;
Nokuti ichi chitema chinorwadza uye chakaipa zvikuru kwandiri, nekuvanhu vangu, pamusoro pezvinhu izvo zvandakadzika uye zvave pedyo nokuwira marudzi.
Naizvozvo, chido changu kuti vanhu vangu vatore uye vabatirire pane icho chandakavadomera, kana dai vasingafanire kubvumirwa kugarapo.
Zvisinei, handizikuti havachazogara ipapa; nokuti kana vari varikuunza michero nemabasa akafanira umambo hwangu, vachagaramo.
Vachavaka, uye hakuna anozozvitora; vachadyara minda yemizambiringa, uye vachadya michero yacho. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/102.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 102
chapter_summary: 1–8, Dare repamusoro rinodomwa kuti rigogadzirisa zvakakosha zvinonetsa zvinomuka muChechi; 9–18, Zvinotevedzwa mukunzwa nyaya zvinopihwa; 19–23, Mukuru wedare ndiye anoita zvafungwa; 24–34, Mutemo wekuti nyaya inzwike zvakare inomiswa.

verses.text: Nhasi dare reruzhinji revapirisita vepamusoro makumi maviri nevana raungana pamba paJoseph Smith, Mwana, kuburikidza nezvakazarurwa, uye vakaronga dare guru rechechi raKristu, iro raizove nevapirisita vepamusoro gumi nevaviri, uye nemukuru mumwechete kana vatatu, sezvingangodikanwa.

Dare guru rakasarudzwa kuburikidza nezvakazarurwa kuti rigoita basa rekugadziridza zvakaoma zvinokosha zvingangomuka muchechi, izvo zvakanga zvisingagone kugadziriswa nechechi kana nedare remabhishopi, zvinogutsa vatadzirana.

Joseph Smith, Mwana, Sidney Rigdon naFrederick G. Williams vakatorwa sevakuru nezwi redare, uye Joseph Smith, Baba, John Smith, Joseph Coe, John Johnson, Martin Harris, John S. Carter, Jared Carter, Oliver Cowdery, Samuel H. Smith, Orson Hyde, Sylvester Smith, naLuke Johnson, vapirisita vepamusoro, vakasarudzwa kuti vave dare rakamiswa rechechi, nezwi revose vedare.

Makurukota edare ataurwa aya vakabvunzwa kuti vanobvuma here kusarudzwa kwavo, uye nokuti vachaita basa munzvimbo idzodzo maererano nemutemo wedenga, uye vose vakapindura kuti vanobvuma kusarudzwa kwavo, nokuti vachaita muzvinzvimbo izvozvo maererano nenyasha dzaMwari idzo dzakaiswa pavari.

Huwandu hwevaiumba dare, avo vakasarudza muzita vakamirira chechi, uye mukusarudza makurukota ataurwa aya vaive makumi mana nevatatu, sezvizvi: vapirisita vepamusoro vapfumbamwe, magosa gumi nemanomwe, vapirisita vana, nenhengo gumi nenhatu.
Zvakasarudzwa: kuti dare guru harina simba rekuita chimwe chinhu pasina vanomwe vemakurukota ataurwa, kana avo vanosarudzwa nguva nenguva kutora nzvimbo dzavo vasipo.
Ivava vanomwe vachave nesimba rekusarudza vamwe vapirisita vepamusoro avo vavanenge vachiona vakakodzera uye vachikwanisa kushanda munzvimbo yemakurukota anenge asipo.

Zvakasarudzwa: Pose panenge pave nechinzvimbo pamusana perufu, kana kubviswa mubasa pamusana pechitadzo, kana kubviswa mukutonga kwechechi ino, kwaani zvake wemakurokota ataurwa pamusoro, chinzvimbo ichocho chichatsiviwa nokusarudzwa kwemutungamiri kana vatungamiri, uye zvigotsigirwa nedare reruzhinji revapirisita vepamusoro, radaidzirwa basa iroro, kuti vashande vari muzita rechechi.
Mutungamiri wechechi anove ndiye zvakare mutungamiri wedare, anosarudzwa nezvakazarurwa, uye achitsigirwa mukushanda kwake nezwi rechechi.
Uye zviri maererano nekukudzwa kwechinzvimbo chake kuti atungamire dare rechechi; uye ikodzero yake kuti ayamurwe nevamwe vaviri vevatungamiri, vanosarudzwa netsika imwecheteyo seyaakasarudzwa nayo.

Uye kana zvaita kuti mumwechete wavo kana vose avo vakasarudzwa kuti vamuyamure vasipo, ane simba rekutungamira dare asina anoyamura; uye kana ari iye asipo, vamwe vatungamiri vane simba rekutungamira munzvimbo make, vose kana mumwe wavo.

Apo pose panenge dare repamusoro rechechi yaKristu, maererano nemutowo watsanangurwa shure, richave basa remakurukota gumi nevaviri kuti vakande mijenya umwe neumwe kuti naizvozvo vagoziva kuti ndiyani wavo wegumi nevaviri achataura pekutanga, zvichitanga newe kutanga zvichitevedzana kusvikira wegumi nevaviri.

Pose panosangana dare iri kutarisa nyaya, makurukota ane gumi nevaviri ndivovachaona kuti nyaya yakaoma here kana kuti kwete; kana isina, vaviri chete vemakurukota ndivovachataura pamusoro payo, maererano nechimiro chanyorwa pamusoro.
Asi kana ichinzi yakaoma, vana vachasarudzwa; uye kana yakaoma kupfuura ipapo, vatanhatu vachadomwa; asi hakuna pamwe pangadomwe vanopfuura vatanhatu kuti vataure.
Anenge achipihwa mhosva, mumhosva dzose zvadzo, ane kodzero kuchidimbu chepakati nepakati chedare, kudzivirira kukanganisirwa kana kutongwa kusakarurama.

Uye makurukota akadomwa kuti ataure pamberi pedare ndivovanotaura nyaya, mushure mekunge humbowo hwaongororwa, sezvahuri chaizvo pamberi pedare; uye munhu wose anofanira kutaura maererano nekuenzanisa nokunatsa.

Ayo makurukota anoburitsa kuverengwa kwakaenzana, zvichireva, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, na12, zvichidaro ndivovanhu vachamiririra avo varikupihwa mhosva, uye kuti zvidzivirire kukanganisirwa nekusatongwa kwakarurama.

Munyaya dzose, arikupa mhosva neari kupihwa mhosva vachawana mukana wekuzvitaurira pachavo pamberi pedare, mushure mekunge humbowo hwanzwikwa uye makurukota akadomwa kuti ataure panyaya iyi apedza kutaura.

Mushure mekunge humbowo hwanzwikwa, makurukota, arikupa mhosva neari kupihwa mhosva uye vataura, mutungamiri anofanira kupa kutonga maererano nemanzwiro aanenge ainawo panyaya yacho, uye odaidza makurukota gumi nevaviri kuti vazopa rutsigiro rwavo, nokusarudzwa kwavo.

Asi kana makurukota vanenge vasina kutaura, kana mumwe wavo, mushure mekunzwa humbowo nezvikumbiro vasina kwavakarerekera, vaona kukanganiswa muhutongo hwemutungamiri, vanogona kuzviratidza pachena, uyezve nyaya yacho ichazonzwika zvakare.
Uye kana mushure mekunyatsoteereresa pakutongwa zvakare, kana paine zvimwe zvabuda pachena pamusoro penyaya iyi, zvakatongwa zvinogona kupindurwa maererano nezvabuda.
Asi kana pasina zvimwe zvabuda pachena, zvakatongwa pakutanga ndizvozvichaitwa, uye divi rinevazhinji riine simba rekuzviita izvozvo.

Kana paine chakaoma maererano nedzidziso kana mutemo, kana pasina zvakakwana zvakanyorwa zvinoita kuti inyatsove pachena mupfungwa dzedare, mutungamiri anogona kubvunza uye agowana pfungwa dzaIshe nekuzarurirwa.

Vapirisita vepamusoro kana vari kune dzimwe nyika, vane simba rekudaidza nekuronga dare maererano nemutowo watsanangurwa uyu, kuti vagadzirise zvinonetsa kana vakanganisirana vose, kana mumwe wavo achinge azvikumbira.
Uye dare riri kutaurwa revapirisita vepamusoro richave nesimba rekudoma mumwe wavo kuti atungamire dare rakadaro kwenguva iyoyo.
Richave basa redare iroro kuti ritumire, pakarepo, gwaro rezvavaita, uye nemazwi azere euchapupu hunoenderana nekutonga kwavo, kudare repamusoro rechigaro cheHutungamiri Hwekutanga hweChechi.

Kana mapato kana mumwe wavo asina kugutswa nekutonga kwedare rarehwa, vanogona kukwira kudare repamusoro rechigaro cheHutungamiri Hwekutanga hweChechi, uye pobva panzi nyaya ngainzwikwe zvakare, iyi nyaya inobva yatongwa, maererano nemutowo wakare wakanyorwa, sekunge kusina kumbotongwa zvakadaro.
Dare iri remapirisita vepamusoro vari kune dzimwe nyika, rinodaidzwa chete kana paine mhosva dzechechi dzakanyanya kuoma; uye haisi nyaya yose yose inodaidzirwa dare rakadai.
Uye vanofamba kana vagere nzvimbo imwechete mapirisita vepamusoro vari kune dzimwe nyika vane simba rekutaura kana zvakafanira kana kuti kwete kuti kudaidzwe dare rakadaro.
Pane mutsauko uripo pakati pedare repamusoro kana vanofamba vari vapirisita vepamusoro kune dzimwe nyika, nedare repamusoro vanofamba riine vaapositori vanegumi nevaviri, mukutonga kwavo.
Pakutonga kweavo vekutanga kunogona kuendeswa kune rimwe dare asi kune zvinenge zvatongwa nedare rechipiri hakunazve rimwe dare.
Vekupedzisira vanogona kubvunzurudzwa chete nevakuru vakuru vechechi yose kana paita nyaya yechitadzo.

Zvakafungwa: kuti mutungamiri kana vatungamiri vechigaro cheHutungamiri Hwekutanga hweChechi vachave nesimba rekuita kuti yose zvayo nyaya yakwidzwa zvakare, inyaya yakakodzera kuti itongwe zvakare, mushure mekunge vaongorora nyaya nehumbowo nezvinotaurwa zvinoenderana nayo.

Makurukota gumi nevaviri vakabva vatanga kukanda mijenya kana kusarudza, kuti kuonekwe kuti ndianaani vanofanira kutanga kutaura, uye zvinotevera ndizvo zvakaonekwa; 1, Oliver Cowdery; 2, Joseph Coe; 3, Samuel H. Smith; 4, Luke Johnson; 5, John S. Carter; 6, Sylvester Smith; 7, John Johnson; 8, Orson Hyde; 9, Jared Carter; 10, Joseph Smith, Baba; 11, John Smith; 12, Martin Harris. Mushure meminamato muchechi wakapera.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/103.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 103
chapter_summary: 1–4, Sei Ishe vakabvumira Vatendi muRuwa rweJackson kuti vatambudzwe; 5–10, Vatendi vachakunda kana vakachengeta mirairo; 11–20, Rununuro rweZioni rwunounzwa nesimba; uye Ishe vachaenda mberi kwevanhu vavo; 21–28, Vatendi vanofanira kuungana muZioni, uye avo vacharasikirwa neupenyu hwavo vachahuwana zvakare; 29–40, Vazvarwa vakasiyana-siyana vanodaidzwa kuti vagadzire misasa yeZioni uye kuti vaende kuZioni; vanovimbiswa kukunda kana vachitendeka.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, tarisai ndichapa kwamuri chakazarurwa nemurairo, kuti mugoziva zvekuita mukuita basa renyu maererano neruponeso nerununuro rwehama dzenyu, avo vakapararira nenyika yeZioni;
Vari vakatinhwa nekurohwa nemaoko evavengi vangu, avo vandichadeurira hasha dzangu dzisisina mwero munguva yangu.
Nokuti ndakabvumira kusvika zvino kuti vazadze chiyero chekuipa kwavo, kuti mukombe wavo uve wakazara;
Kuti avo vanozvidaidza nezita rangu varangwe kwechinguva chidiki-diki nekurangwa kunorwadza kunosuwisa, nokuti havana kumboteerera zvavo kumitemo nemirairo yandakavapa.
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndatsidza nechitsidzo icho chichaonekwa nevanhu vangu, kana vari vanoteerera kubvira panguva ino mukuraira uko Ini, Ishe Mwari vavo, kwandichavapa.
Tarisai, nokuti ini ndazvitsidza, vachave vanotanga kukunda vavengi vangu kubvira panguva iyo ino.

Uye mukuteerera kuti vacherechedze ose mashoko Ini Ishe Mwari vavo, andichataura kwavari, havachazorega kukunda kudakara umambo hwenyika hwakurirwa pasi petsoka dzangu, uye pasi rapihwa kuvatendi, kuti rive ravo nariini nariini.
Asi kana vari vasiri kuchengeta mirairo yangu, uye vasingateerere kuti vacherechedze ose mazwi angu, umambo hwenyika huchavakurira.
Nokuti vakaiswa kuti vave chiedza chenyika, uye nokuti vave vaponesi vevanhu;
Uye kana vasiri vaponesi vevanhu, vanoita semunyu wadurungunda, uye nokudaro unenge usisina chawakanakira asi kuti urasirwe kunze uye uchitsikwa netsoka dzevanhu.
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndatsidza kuti hama dzenyu idzo dzakaparadzwa dzichidzoka kunyika dzenhaka yadzo, uye dzigovaka matongo enzvimbo dzeZioni.
Nokuti mushure mekunetswa kwakawanda, sekutaura kwandakaita kwamuri pane mumwe murairo, kunouya maropafadzo.

Tarisai, aya ndiwo maropafadzo andakavimbisa mushure mematambudziko enyu, uye nematambudziko ehama dzenyu, kununurwa kwenyu, uye nokununurwa kwehama dzenyu, kana nokudzorerwa kwavo kunyika yeZioni, kuti imiswe, kuti vasazodzikisirwa pasi zvakare.
Zvisinei, kana vakasvibisa nhaka dzavo vachakandwa pasi; nokuti handizovaregerera kana vakasvibisa nhaka dzavo.
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, rununuro rweZioni rwunofanira kuunzwa nesimba;
Nokudaro, ndichamutsira vanhu vangu munhu achavatungamira kufanana naMosesi akatungamira vana vaIsraeri.
Nokuti imi muri vana vaIsraeri, uye vembeu yaAbrahama, uye munofanira kutungamirwa kubuda muhusungwa nesimba, uye neruoko rwakatambanudzwa.
Uye sekutungamirwa kwakaitwa madzibaba enyu pakutanga, kunyangwe saizvozvo ndizvozvichaitawo rununuro rweZioni ruchadaro.
Naizvozvo, musarege mwoyo yenyu ichineta, nokuti handitaure kwamuri sezvandakataura kumadzibaba enyu. Ngirozi yangu ichaenda pamberi penyu asi kwete kuvepo kwangu.
Asi ndinoti kwamuri: Ngirozi dzangu dzichaenda mberi kwenyu, uye nekuvepo kwangu, uye nenguva muchawana nyika yakanaka.
Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kuti muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana ndiye munhu andakafananidza nemuranda uyo akataurwa naye naIshe wemunda wemizambiringa mumufananidzo wandakakupai.

Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana ati kune simba remba yangu, majaya angu uye neavo vabvezera—Unganai pamwechete kunyika yeZioni munyika yandakatenga nemari iyo yakatsaurirwa kwandiri.
Uye chechi ngadzitumire varume vakangwara nemari dzavo, uye vagotenga nzvimbo sekuraira kwandakaita kwavari.

Uye kana vavengi vangu vari vanouya kwamuri kuzokubvisai munzvimbo dzandakakupai dzakanaka, idzo dzandakatsaura kuti dzive nyika yeZioni, kunyangwe kubva munzvimbo dzenyu mushure meuchapupu uhu, uho hwamakaunza pamberi pangu, muchavatuka.
Uye ani zvake amuchatuka, ini ndichamutuka, uye muchanditsividzira vavengi vangu.
Uye ini ndichange ndiripo nemi pakutsividzira vavengi vangu, kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechina cheavo vanondivenga.
Ngakurege kuve nemunhu anotya kupira upenyu hwake pamusana pangu, nokuti ani zvake anopira upenyu hwake pamusana pangu achahuwana zvakare.
Uye ani zvake asingade kuisa upenyu hwake pasi pamusana pangu haasi mudzidzi wangu.

Chido changu kuti muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon asimudze izwi rake ari kumakungano enyika dziri kumabvazuva, mukugadzira chechi dzenyika dziri kumabvazuva, mukugadzira machechi kuti vachengete mirairo yandakavapa pamusoro pekudzorerwa pakare nekununurwa kweZioni.

Kuda kwangu kuti muranda wangu Parley P. Pratt uye nemuranda wangu Lyman Wight, vasadzokere kunyika yehama dzavo, kudakara vawana vekuenda navo kunyika yeZioni, vari mumakumi kana maviri, kana mashanu, kana mazana, kudakara vawana huwandu hunoita mazana mashanu esimba remba yangu.
Tarisai ichi ndichochido changu; kumbira uye uchagashira; asi vanhu havaite kuda kwangu nguva dzose.
Naizvozvo, kana musingagone kuwana mazana mashanu, shingirirai kutsvaka kuti pamwe mungawane mazana matatu.
Uye kana mukatadza kuwana mazana matatu, shingirirai kutsvaka kuti zvimwe muwane zana rimwechete.
Asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai murairo, kuti hamuzokwira kuenda kunyika yeZioni kudakara mawana zana revesimba remba yangu, kuti vaende nemi kunyika yeZioni.

Naizvozvo, sekutaura kwandaita kwamuri, kumbirai uye mugogashira; namatai zvikuru kuti zvimwe muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana aende nemi, agotungamira ari pakati pevanhu vangu, uye agoronga umambo hwangu panzvimbo pakatsaurwa, uye vana veZioni pamutemo nemirairo iyo yakanga iripo ichapihwa kwamuri.
Kwose kukunda uye nokubwinya kunonzi kuitike kwamuri kuburikidza nokushingaira kwenyu, kutendeka, uye neminamato yerutendo.
Regai muranda wangu Parley P. Pratt afambe nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana.
Regai muranda wangu Lyman Wight afambe nemuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon.
Regai muranda wangu Hyrum Smith afambe nemuranda wangu Frederick G. Williams.

Regai muranda wangu Orson Hyde afambe nemuranda wangu Orson Pratt, kwose zvako kwavanenge varairwa nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, mukutsvaka kuwana kuzadzikiswa kwemirairo iyi yandapa kwamuri, uye regai vanosara vari mumaoko angu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/104.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 104
chapter_summary: 1–10, Vatendi vanotadzira hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa vachatukwa; 11–16, Ishe vanogadzirira Vatendi vavo nenzira yavo; 17–18, Mutemo wevhangeri inotonga kuchengetwa kwevarombo; 19–46, Hutariri nemakomborero ehama dzakasiyana-siyana dzinodzikwa; 47–53, Hurongwa hwemubatananidzwa muKirtland, nehurongwa muZioni hwaizoshanda (pakepake) husina kubatana; 54–66, Dura reupfumi rinoyera raIshe rakamisirwa kunyorwa kwemagwaro matsvene; 67–77, Dura rezvakasiyana-siyana rehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa raizoshanda zvichibva mukubvumirana kwevose; 78–86, vose vari muhurongwa hwemubatanidzwa vanofanira kubhadhara zvikwerete zvavo zvose uyezve Ishe vaizovasunungura kubva (kuhuranda) husungwa hwezvemari.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu ndinokupai kuraira nemurairo zviri pamusoro pemidziyo yose yehurongwa uho hwandakaraira kuti hurongwe nekumiswa kuti huve hurongwa hwakabatana uyezve husingaperi kuti zvinakire chechi yangu, nekuponesa vanhu kusvikira ndauya—
Nechivimbiso chisingasanduki kana chisingasandurwe zvichienda nekuti avo vandakaraira vakaramba vakatendeka, vachakomborerwa nemakomborero akawandisa;
Asi pose pavainge vasina kutendeka vaive pedyo nekutukwa.
Naizvozvo, sezvo vamwe vevaranda vangu vasina kuchengeta murairo asi vakatyora chibvumirano pamusana peruchiva, uye nemazwi ekunyepa, ndavatuka nekutuka kunorwadza uye kunosuwisa.

Nokuti Ini Ishe, ndazvitsidza mumwoyo mangu, kuti kana munhu upi zvake wechisungo akawanikwa ari mutadzi, kana nemamwe mazwi, akatyora chibvumirano icho chakakusungai, achatukwa muupenyu hwake, uye achatsikwa-tsikwa neuyo wandinenge ndada;
Nokuti Ini Ishe, handisekwe muzvinhu izvi—

Uye zvose izvi kuti vasina chavanoziva pakati penyu varege kutongwa pamwechete nevasakaruruma; uye nokuti vane mhosva pakati penyu havapunyuke; nokuti Ini Ishe, ndakavimbisa kwamuri korona yekubwinya kuruoko rwangu rwerudyi.
Naizvozvo, sezvo mukawanikwa muri vatadzi, hamungapunyuke muhasha dzangu muupenyu hwenyu.
Kana muri makaraswa pamusana pekutadza, hamungapunyuke kunetswa naSatani kusvika muzuva rerununuro.

Uye zvino ndavekupa simba kubvira panguva ino, kuti ani zvake munhu pakati penyu, wemuchisungo, akawanikwa ari mutadzi uye akasatendeuka pachakaipa, kuti muchamuisa kunonetswa naSatani; uye haazove nesimba rekuunza zvakaipa kwamuri.
Ungwaru mandiri, nokudaro murairo wandinokupai, kuti muzvironge pachenyu uye nokudomera wose munhu hutariri hwake;
Kuti wose munhu ataure kwandiri pamusoro pehutariri hwake uhwo hwaakadomerwa;
Nokuti zvakafanira kuti Ini Ishe ndiite kuti wose munhu azvipindurire, semutariri wezvinhu zvepano pasi; izvo zvandakaita uye ndikagadzirira zvisikwa zvangu.
Ini Ishe, ndakatambanudza matenga, uye ndikavaka nyika, basa remaoko angu; uye zvose zvinhu zvirimo ndezvangu.
Uye chinangwa changu chekuti ndiriritire vatendi vangu, nokuti zvose zvinhu ndezvangu.
Asi zvinofanira kuitwa nemaitiro angu; uye tarisai iyi ndiyo nzira Ini Ishe, yandatsidza yekuriritira vatendi vangu, kuti varombo vagosimudzirwa, mukuti vapfumi vagoderedzwe.
Nokuti nyika izere, uye mune zvakakwana nezvinotosara; hongu, ndakagadzira zvose zvinhu, uye ndikapa kuvana vevanhu kuti vazvimirire pachavo.

Naizvozvo, kana mumwe munhu akatora kubva panezvakawanda izvi zvandakasika, uye akasagovera chidimu chake, maererano nemutemo wevhangeri rangu, kuvarombo nevanoshaya, achasimudza meso ake, pamwechete nevakaipa, ari mugehena, ari mukutambura.
Uye zvino zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, maererano nemidziyo yehurongwa—

Regai muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon adomerwe nzvimbo iyo yaari kugara iyezvino, uye nenzvimbo yekusuka matehwe kuhutariri hwake, kuitira kuti awane chekubata achishanda mumunda wangu wemizambiringa, kunyangwe sekuda kwangu, pandichataura kwaari.
Uye regai zvose zvinhu zviitwe maererano nekuraira kwehurongwa nemvumo yemubatanidzwa kana neizwi rehurongwa revagari vemunyika yeKirtland.
Uye hutariri uhu nemaropafadzo, ini Ishe, ndinoisa pamuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon kuitira maropafadzo paari uye nekumbeu mushure make.
Uye ndichawanza maropafadzo paari kana ari anenge akazvininipisa pamberi pangu.
Uye zvakare, regai muranda wangu Martin Harris, adomerwe, hutariri hwake, nzvimbo iyo yakawanikwa nemuranda wangu John Johnson yeyakange iri nhaka yake, yake iye nembeu yake mushure make;
Uye kana achinge akavimbika, ndichapamhidzira maropafadzo paari uye nekumbeu yake mushure make.
Uye regai muranda wangu Martin Harris aise mari yake mukutaura mazwi angu, maererano nezvichataurwa nemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana.
Uye zvakare, Frederick G. Williams ave nenzvimbo apo paagere iyezvino.
Uye muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery ngaawane nzvimbo iyo yakabatana nemba, iyo ichave hofisi yekudhinda, iri iyo nzvimbo yekutanga, uyewo nenzvimbo apo pagere baba vake.
Uye regai varanda vangu Frederick G. Williams naOliver Cowdery vave nenzvimbo yekudhindira uye nezvose zvinhu zvinoenderana nayo.
Uye uhu ndihwo huchave hutariri hwavo huchapihwa kwavari.
Uye kana vari vanotendeka, tarisai ndichavaropafadza, uye ndigopamhidzira maropafadzo pavari.
Uye uku ndikokutanga kwehutariri hwandavadomera, ivo nembeu yavo mushure mavo.
Uye kana vari vanotendeka, ndichapamhidzira maropafadzo pavari uye nekumbeu yavo mushure mavo, kana maropafadzo akawanda zvakapetwa.

Uye zvakare, regai muranda wangu John Johnson awane imba iyo yaagere, uye nenhaka, yose kunze kwenzvimbo yakasiirwa kuvaka dzimba dzangu, zviri maererano neiyo nhaka, uye neidzo nzvimbo dzadaidzirwa muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery.
Uye kana ari akatendeka, ndichapamhidzira maropafadzo paari.

Uye chido changu kuti anofanira kutengesa idzo nzvimbo dzakakamurwa kuitira kuvaka guta revatendi vangu, kana kuti zvichienderana nekuziviswa kwazvichaita kwavari nezwi reMweya, nemaererano nekuraira kwehurongwa, nezwi rehurongwa.
Uye uku ndikokutanga kwehutariri uhwo hwandakamudomera, semaropafadzo kwaari uye nekumbeu yake mushure make.
Uye kana ari anotendeka, ndichawanza zvakapetwa maropafadzo paari.

Uye zvakare, regai muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney adomerwe nzvimbo nedzimba iye zvino, apo pane zvitoro, uyewo nenzvimbo iri parutivi nechekuchamhembe kwechitoro uyewo nenzvimbo iyo inemba inogadzirirwa sipo nezvimwe zvakadaro.

Uye zvose izvi ndazvidomera kumuranda wangu Newel K. Whitney sehutariri hwake, semaropafadzo paari uye nekumbeu yake mushure make, kuyamura zvitoro zvechirongwa changu icho chandakamisira hoko yangu munyika yeKirtland.
Hongu, zvirokwazvo, uhu ndihwo hutariri hwandadomera kumuranda wangu Newel K. Whitney, kunyangwe zvose zvitoro zvino, iye nemumiririri wake, uye nekumbeu yake mushure make.
Uye kana ari anotendeka mukuchengeta mirairo yangu, iyo yandakamupa, ndichapamhidzira maropafadzo paari uye nekumbeu yake mushure make, kunyangwe maropafadzo akapetwa zvakawanda.

Uye zvakare regai muranda wangu Joesph Smith, Mwana adomerwe nzvimbo iyo yakasiirwa kuvakwa kwemba yangu, iyo yakareba zvinoita mazana maviri enhano kureba uye negumi nembiri kupamhama, uye nenhakawo apo pagere baba vake;
Uye uku ndiko kutanga kwehutariri uhwo hwandakamudomera, uye kuti ndimuropafadze, uye nababa vakewo.
Nokuti tarisai, ndachengetedza nhaka yababa vake, kuti zvivayamure; nokudaro vachaverengerwa mumba yemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana.
Uye ndichapamhidzira maropafadzo mumba yemuranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, kana ari akatendeka, kunyangwe maropafadzo akapetwa zvakawanda.
Uye zvino, murairo ndinopa kwamuri maererano neZioni, kuti hamuchasungirwa hurongwa kuramba muri semubatanidzwa kuhama dzenyu dzeZioni, asi mune izvi chete—

Mushure mekunge maronga, muchadaidzwa kuti Hurongwa hweMubatanidzwa hweHoko yeZioni, Guta reKirtland. Uye hama dzenyu, mushure mekunge varongwa, vachadaidzwa kuti Hurongwa hweMubatanidzwa hweGuta reZioni.
Uye vacharongwa mumazita avo, uye nemuzita ravo; uye vachaita basa ravo muzita ravo, uye nemumazita avo;
Uye imi muchaita basa renyu muzita renyu, uye nemumazita enyu.
Uye ndazviraira kuti zviitwe kuti muwane ruponeso, uyewo neruponeso rwavo, pamusana pekutandwa kwavo uye nepamusana peicho chichauya.
Zvibvumirano zviri kutyorwa kuburikidza nokutadza, neruchiva uye nemazwi ekunyepera—

Naizvozvo, maputswa sechirongwa chemubatanidzwa pamwe nehama dzenyu, kuti hamuna kusungirwa kwavari kubvira panguva ino chete, kunze kwemune izvi, sekutaura kwandakaita, muchikwereti sezvichabvumirwa nehurongwa huno mudare, sezvinobvumidzwa nemamiriro enyu nekutungamira kuchaita izwi redare.
Uye zvakare, murairo ndinopa kwamuri maererano nehutariri hwenyu uho hwandakadoma kwamuri.
Tarisai, yose midziyo iyi ndeyangu, kana zvisiriizvo rutendo rwenyu haruna basa, uye munowanikwa muri vanyengedzi, uye zvibvumirano zvamakaita kwandiri zvakatyorwa.
Uye kana midziyo iri yangu, zvino imi murivatariri; pasinaizvo hamungave vatariri.
Asi, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndakakudomai kuti muve vatariri vemba yangu, kunyangwe vatariri vechokwadi.

Uye nechinangwa ichi ndakakurairai kuti muzvironge pachenyu, kunyangwe kutsikisa mazwi angu, zvizere zvemagwaro angu matsvene, zvakazarurwa zvandakapa kwamuri, nezvandichakupai kubvira zvino, nguva nenguva
Nechinangwa chekuvaka chechi yangu neumambo hwangu pasi pano nokugadzirira vanhu nguva yandichagara navo, iyo yave pedyo.
Uye imi muchazvigadzirira nzvimbo yekuisa pfuma uye moitsaurira kuzita rangu.
Uye muchadoma mumwe pakati penyu anochengeta panoiswa pfuma, uye achagadzwa kumaropafadzo aya.

Uye pachave nechisimbiso papfuma, uye zvose zvinhu zvinoyera zvichaiswa munzvimbo yepfuma iyi, uye hapana munhu pakati penyu achaiti ndeyake, kana rumwe rutivi rwayo, nokuti ichange iri yenyu mose muri pamwechete.

Uye ndinoipa kwamuri kubvira panguva iyo ino; saka chionai kuti maenda kunoshandisa hutariri hwandakadoma kwamuri, husingabatanidzire zvinoera, nechinangwa chekuti zvinhu izvi zvinoyera zvinyorwe sekutaura kwandakaita.

Uye zvinenge zvawanikwa pamusana pezvinhu zvinoyera zvichaiswa munochengeterwa pfuma; uye pachave nesimbiso pairi uye hazvizoshandiswa kana kuburitsa munzvimbo yepfuma naani zvake, kana chinamo hachizobviswa chinenge chaiswa, asi chete nezwi rechisungo, kana nemurairo
Uye ndikokuchengetedza kwamuchaita zvinowanikwa muzvinhu zvinokosha zviri muzvimbo inochengeterwa pfuma, kuitira zvinangwa zvinoyera nezvitsvene.
Uye iyi ichinzi nzvimbo inoyera inochengeterwa pfuma yaIshe; uye chitsikiso chichaiswa pairi kuti ive tsvene uye yakatsaurirwa kuna Ishe.
Uye zvakare, kuchave neimwe nzvimbo yepfuma ichagadzirirwa, uye koiswa muchengeti anochengeta nzvimbo yepfuma uye ichiiswa chisimbiso pairi.

Uye dzose mari dzamunogashira muhutariri hwenyu, nokuvandudzira pazvinhu zvandakakupai, mudzimba, kana munzvimbo, kana kumombe, kana muzvinhu zvose, kunze chete kwezvinyorwa zvitsvene zvinoyera, izvo zvandakazvichengetera ini parutivi nezvinangwa zvitsvene nezvinoyera, zvichakandwa mumba yepfuma nokukurumidza mangoitambira mari yacho, kana ari mazana, kana makumi mashanu, kana makumi maviri, kana gumi, kana shanu.
Kana nemamwe mazwi, kana ani zvake munhu pakati penyu akawana madhora mashanu, ngaakande mumba yepfuma kana akawana gumi, kana makumi maviri, kana makumi mashanu, kana zana, ngaaite zvimwechetezvo;
Uye ngakurege kuva nemumwe pakati penyu anoti ndeyake ega; nokuti haizodaidzwa kuti ndeyake kana chidimu zvacho chayo.
Uye hakuna chidimu chayo chinoshandiswa, kana kubviswa mumba yepfuma, asi chete nezwi uye nokubvumirana kwechisungo.
Uye iri richave izwi nokubvumirana kwechisungo—kuti ani zvake munhu pakati penyu ati kumuchengeti wehomwe; ndirikuda izvi kuti zvindiyamure muhutariri hwangu—
Kana ari madhora mashanu, kana ari madhora gumi, kana makumi maviri, kana makumi mashanu, kana zana, muchengeti wehomwe achamupa mari yaari kuda kumuyamura muhutariri hwake—
Dakara awanikwa ari mutadzi, uye zvaratidzwa kudare rechisungo zviri pachena kuti haatendeseke uye mutariri asina kungwara.
Asi kana ari mukufambidzana zvizere, uye ari anotendeka uye akangwara muhutariri hwake, ichi ndichochichave chiratidzo chake kumba yepfuma kuti muchengeti wehomwe asazoramba.
Asi kana paripaitwa chitadzo muchengeti wehomwe achatarisa kudare uye nekuzwi rechisungo.
Uye kana muchengeti wehomwe akawanikwa asiri akatendeka uye ari mutariri asina kungwara, achatongwa nedare, uye nezwi rechisungo, uye achabviswa panzvimbo yake, uye mumwe obva adomwa munzvimbo make.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, pamusoro pezvikwereti zvenyu—tarisai chido changu chekuti mubhadhare zvikwereti zvenyu.
Uye kuda kwangu kuti muzvininipise pamberi pangu, kuti muwane maropafadzo aya nekushingaira kwenyu uye nokuzvininipisa nemunamato werutendo.
Uye kana muri munoshingaira uye makazvininipisa, uye muchiita munamato werutendo, tarisai, ndichapfavisa mwoyo yeavo vamuine zvikwereti navo, dakara ndatumira nzira kwamuri yekuti mubve mazviri.

Naizvozvo, nyorerai nokukurumidza kuNew York uye munyore zviri maererano nezvichataurwa neMweya wangu; uye ndichapfavisa mwoyo yeavo vamuine zvikwereti navo, kuti zvibviswe mupfungwa dzavo kuti vakupinzei mumatambudziko.
Uye kana muri makazvininipisa uye muchitendeka uye muchidaidza zita rangu, tarisai, ndinokupai kukunda.
Ndinopa kwamuri chivimbiso, kuti muchabviswa kamwechete kano kubva muhusungwa hwenyu.
Kana muri munowana mukana wekukwereta mari iri mumazana, kana muzviuru, kana kudakara makwereta inokwanisa kukubvisai muhusungwa, zviri kwamuri.
Uye ipai midziyo yandakaisa mumaoko enyu, kwazvino chete nekupa mazita enyu nokutenderana kana neimwewo nzira, izvo zvamuchaona zvichinge zvakanaka kwamuri.

Ndinopa kwamuri mukana uyu, zvino chete; uye tarisai, kana mukaita zvinhu zvandaisa pamberi penyu, maererano nemirairo yangu, zvose zvinhu izvi ndezvangu, uye imi muri vatariri vangu, uye tenzi haazobvumira kuti imba yake ipazwe. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/105.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 105
chapter_summary: 1–5, Zioni inovakwa nokuteedza mutemo weumambo weseresitiyaro; 6–13, Kununurwa kweZioni kunombomiswa kwechinguva; 14–19, Ishe vacharwa hondo dzeZioni; 20–26, Vatendi ngavave vakangwara uye vasingazvikudze mune zvemabasa makuru pavanoungana; 27–30, Nzvimbo dziri muJackson nemaruwa akabatana nayo dzinofanira kutengwa; 31–34, Magosa anofanira kugashira endawumenti mumba maIshe muKirtland; 35–37, Vatendi vakadaidzwa zvose nokusarudzwa vakacheneswa; 38–41, Vatendi vanofanira kusimudzira mureza werunyararo kunyika.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri mazviunganidza pamwechete kuti mudzidze chido changu maererano norununuro rwevangu vanotambudzika—
Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, dai pasina kutadza kwevanhu vangu, ndichataura maererano nechechi kwete zvemunhu mumwe nemumwe, vangadai zvimwe iye zvino vakatonunurwa.

Asi tarisai, havasati vadzidza kuteerera kuzvinhu zvandakati ndinozvida kubva kwavari, asi vazere nezvakaipa zvakasiyana-siyana, uye havape upfumi hwavo, sezvazvinofanira kuitwa neVatendi, kuvarombo nevanotambudzika vari pakati pavo;
Uye havana kubatana maererano nokubatana kunodiwa nemurau weumambo weseresitiyaro;
Uye Zioni haigone kuvakwa kunze kwekuburikidza nebumbiro remutemo weumambo hweseresitiyaro, pasina izvozvo handingaigashire kwandiri.
Uye vanhu vangu vanofanira kurangwa kudakara vadzidza kuteerera, kana zviri zvakafanira, kuburikidza nematambudziko.
Handizikutaura pamusoro peavo vakadomwa kuti vatungamire vanhu vangu, vari ivo magosa ekutanga echechi yangu, nokuti havasi vose vari pasi pekutongwa kuno.

Asi ndiri kutaura pamusoro pechechi dzangu dziri kure—kune vazhinji vachati: Ko Mwari wavo aripi? Tarisai achavanunura munguva dzematambudziko, nokuti hatingaende kuZioni, uye tichachengeta mari dzedu.
Naizvozvo, pamusana pekutadza kwevanhu vangu, zvakanaka kwandiri kuti magosa angu ambomirira kwechinguva rununuro rweZioni.
Kuti ivo pachavo vagadzirire, uye kuti vanhu vangu vadzidziswe zvakakwana, uye vagoona, nokuziva zvakakwana pamusoro pebasa ravo, uye nezvinhu zvandinoda kubva kwavari.
Uye izvi hazvizoitika kusvika magosa angu aropafadzwa nesimba rinobva kumusoro.
Nokuti tarisai, ndagadzira endawumenti huru nemaropafadzo achadirwa pavari, kana vari vakatendeka uye vachiramba vakazvininipisa pamberi pangu.
Naizvozvo zvakanaka kwandiri kuti magosa angu anofanira kumirira kwechinguva, rununuro rweZioni.
Nokuti tarisai, handidi kuti ivo varwe hondo yeZioni; nokuti sekutaura kwandakamboita mune mumwe murairo, kunyangwe saizvozvo ndichazvizadzikisa—ndicharwa hondo dzenyu.

Tarisai, muparadzi ndamutumira kuti anoparadza nokusakadza vavengi vangu uye pasina makore mazhinji kubva zvino havachazoregwa vachisvibisa nhaka yangu, nokutuka zita rangu munyika dzandakatsaurira kuitira kuungana pamwechete kwevatendi vangu.

Tarisai, ndaraira muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana kuti ati kusimba remba yangu, kunyangwe mawuto angu, majaya angu, neavo vabvezera, kuti vaungane pamwechete kuitira rununuro rwevanhu vangu, uye vagokoromora nharire dzevavengi vangu, nokuparadza nharire dzavo;
Asi vesimba remba yangu havana kuteerera kumazwi angu.
Asi kana pane avo vakateerera kumazwi angu, ndavagadzirira maropafadzo neendawumenti, kana vakaramba vari vakatendeka.
Ndanzwa minamato yavo, uye ndichatambira mipiro yavo; uye zvakanaka kwandiri kuti vanofanira kusvitswa kwose uko kuitira kuti vayedzwe murutendo rwavo.
Uye zvino zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai murairo kuti vose vakauya kuno,vanokwanisa kugara mudunhu rino, regai vagare;
Uye avo vasingakwanise kugara, vane mhuri dziri kumabvazuva, regai vambogara kwechinguva, kana muranda wangu Joseph ari avadomera kudaro;
Nokuti ndichamuraira pamusoro penyaya iyi, uye nezvose zvinhu zviri zvipi zvazvo zvaachavasarudzira zvichazadzikiswa.

Uye vanhu vangu vagere mumatunhu akatenderedza vanofanira kuve vakatendeka zvikuru, vazere nokunamata, uye vakazvityora pamberi pangu, uye vasingaratidze zvinhu zvandakaratidza kwavari, kusvika hwave ungwaru mandiri kuti zviratidzwe.
Musataure nezvekutongwa, kana kuzvikudza pamusana perutendo kana pemabasa makuru, asi nyatsounganai pamwechete, vose vanokwanisa kugara mudunhu rimwechete, maererano nezvido zvevanhu;

Uye tarisai, ndichakupai kutarirwa nenyasha mumaziso avo, kuti muzorore muri murunyararo uye pasina chinokuwanai, uye imi muchiti kuvanhu: Titongei uye nokururamisa maererano nemurau, uye mutigadzirise mukukanganisa kwedu.
Zvino tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, shamwari dzangu, nenzira iyi mungawane kudiwa mumaziso evanhu, kusvika mauto eIsraeri ave makuru kwazvo.
Uye ndichapfavisa mwoyo yevanhu sezvandakaita mwoyo waFarao nguva nenguva, kusvika muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana nemaGosa angu, avo vandakadoma, vave nenguva yekuunganidza vesimba remba yangu.
Uye nokunge ndatumira varume vane ungwaru, kuti vazadzikise icho chandakaraira maererano nekutengwa kwenzvimbo dziri muruwa rweJackson idzo dzinotengeka, uye nemumaruwa ari pedyo akatenderedza.
Nokuti chido changu chekuti nzvimbo idzodzi dzitengwe; uye mushure mekunge dzatengwa, kuti vatendi vangu dzive dzavo, uye zviri maererano nemirau yekutsaurwa yandakapa.

Uye mushure mekunge nzvimbo idzi dzatengwa, handizowana mauto eIsraeri aine mhosva mukutora kwavo nzvimbo dzavo, idzo dzavakanga vatenga nemari yavo, uye nokukoromora nharire dzevavengi vangu avo vanenge vari pavari uye vachiparadza varindi vavo, nokunditsivira vavengi vangu kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina cheavo vanondivenga.
Asi chekutanga regai hondo yangu itange yakura chaizvo, uye murege icheneswe pamberi pangu, kuti ive yakanaka sezuva, uye yakachena semwedzi, uye kuti mireza yavo ive inotyisa zvikuru kumarudzi ose;
Kuti umambo hwepasi pano hungamanikidzwe kuti huzive kuti umambo hweZioni ndihwo zvirokwazvo umambo hwaMwari wedu naKristu wavo; nokudaro ngativei pasi pemitemo yahwo.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvakanaka kwandiri kuti magosa ekutanga echechi yangu vanofanira kugashira endawumenti dzavo kubva kumusoro mumba mangu, iyo yandakati ivakwe muzita rangu munyika yeKirtland.
Uye itai kuti iyo mirairo yandakapa pamusoro peZioni uye nemutemo wayo zviitwe uye zvizadzikiswe, mushure merununuro rwayo.
Kwakaita zuva rekudzidza, asi nguva yasvika yezuva rekusarudza; uye regai vasarudzwe avo vakakodzera.
Uye zvicharatidzwa kumuranda wangu nezwi reMweya, avo vakasarudzwa; uye vachacheneswa;
Uye kana vari vanotevedza kurairwa kwavachagashira, vachawana simba mushure memazuva mazhinji rekuita zvose zvinhu zviri maererano neZioni.
Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, kumbirai runyararo, kwete chete kuvanhu vakurwisai, asiwo nekuvanhu vose;
Uye simudzai mureza werunyayaro, uye mudaidzire runyararo kusvika kumagumo enyika;
Uye itai zvirongwa zverunyararo kune avo vakurwisai, zviri maererano nezwi reMweya uyo uri mamuri, uye zvose zvinhu zvichashanda pamwechete kukupundutsai.
Nokudaro, ivai makatendeka; uye tarisai, uye onai, ndinemi kana kusvika kumagumo. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/106.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 106
chapter_summary: 1–3, Warren A. Cowdery Anodaidzwa semutungamiri wenzvimbo iyoyo yaanogara; 4–5, Kuuya Kwechipiri hakuzonyangira vana vechiedza sembavha; 6–8, Maropafadzo makuru anotevera basa rakatendeka muChechi.

verses.text: Chido changu kuti muranda wangu Warren A. Cowdery adomwe uye agogadzwa kuve mupirisita wepamusoro anotungamira chechi yangu munyika yeFreedom uye nemumatunhu akakomberedza;
Uye agoparidza vhangeri rangu risingaperi, uye achisimudza izwi rake uye achiyambira vanhu, kwete avo vari munzvimbo make chete, asi vari munzvimbo dzakabatana nekwake;

Uye aise nguva yake yose kubasa iri guru uye dzvene, iro randave kumupa iye zvino, achitsvaka nechido umambo hwekudenga uye nekururama kwahwo, uye zvose zvinhu zvinofanirwa zvichapamhidzirwa pane izvozvi; nokuti mushandi akakodzera mubairo wake.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri kuuya kwaIshe kuri kuswedera, uye kunonyangira nyika sembavha husiku—
Naizvozvo, sungira nguwo dzako muchiuno, kuti muve vana vechiedza, uye kuti zuva iroro rirege kukunyangirai sembavha.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kwakave nerufaro kudenga apo muranda wangu Warren akakotamira tsvimbo yangu, uye akazvibvisa mukunyengedza kwevanhu;
Naizvozvo, akaropafadzwa muranda wangu Warren, nokuti ndichamunzwira tsitsi; uye zvisinei nokuipa kwemwoyo wake, ndichamusimudzira kana ari anozvininipisa pamberi pangu.

Uye ndichamupa nyasha nerusimbiso zvichaita kuti akwanise kumira; uye akaramba ari mupupuri anotendeka uye ari chiedza kuchechi ndamugadzirira ngundu mudzimba dzaBaba vangu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/107.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 107
chapter_summary: 1–6, Kune hupirisita huviri: hwaMerkizedeki nehwaAroni; 7–12, Avo vane hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki vanesimba rekutungamira munezvigaro zvose zviri muChechi; 13–17, Vehubhishopi vanotungamira hupirisita hwaAroni, uhwo hunotonga zvemabasa ekunze; 18–20, hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki hune makiyi emaropafadzo ose eMweya; Hupirisita hwaAroni, hune makiyi ekushanda kwengirozi; 21–38, VeHutungamiri Hwekutanga, nevaneGumi neVaviri, nevemakumi manomwe ndivovanoumba zvikwata zvinotungamira, zvavanomisa zvichiitwa mukabatana nemukururama; 39–52, Hurongwa hwemadzibaba hwakamiswa kubvira kuna Adama kusvika kuna Noa; 53–57, Vatendi vakare vakaungana paAdama-ondi-Amani, uye Ishe vakazviratidza kwavari: 58–67, VaneGumi neVaviri vanoronga vashandi veChechi munzira kwayo; 68–76, Mabhishopi vanoshanda sevatongi muIsraeri; 77–84, Vehutungamiri Hwekutanga nevaneGumi neVaviri ndivo vanoita dare guru repamusoro-soro muChechi; 85–100, vanotungamira vehupirisita, vanotonga zvikwata zvavo.

verses.text: Muchechi mune hupirisita huviri, hwaMerkizedeki nehwaAroni, kusanganisira hupirisita hwaRevi.
Sei hwekutanga huchidaidzwa kunzi hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki pamusana pekuti Merkizedeki akanga ari mupirisita wepamusoro-soro.
Asati avepo hwaidaidzwa kunzi Hupirisita Hutsvene hweHurongwa hweMwanakomana waMwari.

Asi nokuda kwekukudza kana kuyeresa zita raMwari, kuti zita ravo risarambe richingodaidzwa, iyo chechi mumazuva ekare, yakadaidza hupirisita uhu nezita raMerkizedeki, kana kuti Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki.
Ose mamwe masimba kana zvigaro muchechi zvibatanidzwa muhupirisita uhu.
Asi kune mapoka maviri kana hutungamiri hukuru—humwe ndihwo Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, uye humwe ndehwaAroni kana Hupirisita hwaRevi.
Chigaro chehugosa chinouya pasi pehupirisita hwaMerkizedeki.
Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki ndihwo hune kodzero yehutungamiri, uye hune simba nemvumo pamusoro pezvimwe zvigaro zvose zviri muchechi kumazera ose epasi, kushandira muzvinhu zvose zvemweya.
Vatungamiri veHupirisita Hwepamusoro, muchikwata chaMerkizedeki, vanemvumo yekushandira muzvigaro zvose zviri muchechi.

Vapirisita vepamusoro vemuhurongwa hweHupirisita hwaMerkizedeki vanekodzero yekushandira vari pachavo, vari pasi pekurairwa nevehutungamiri, mukuita basa rezvinhu zvemweya, uyewo nemuchigaro chagosa, mupirisita (wehurongwa hwaRevi), mudzidzisi, dhikoni, nenhengo.
Gosa anogona kushanda munzvimbo yamupirisita wepamusoro kana asipo.

Mupirisita wepamusoro negosa vanofanirwa kushandira zvinhu zvemweya, zvinotenderana nezvibvumirano nemirairo yechechi; uye vane kodzero yekushanda muzvigaro zvose izvi zvechechi kana pasina vakuru vari pamusoro pavo.
Hupirisita hwechipiri hunonzi Hupirisita hwaAroni, nokuti hwakaiswa pana Aroni nembeu yake, kuzvizvarwa zvavo zvose.
Hunonzi hupirisita hudiki nenzira yekuti chibatanidzwa chehukuru, kana kuti pahupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, uye hune simba rekushandira zvisungo zvekunze.
Vari muhutungamiri hwehubhishopi ndivovatungamiri vehupirisita uhu, uye vane kiyi kana simba kamvumo.
Hakuna munhu anekodzero pamurau yekutora chinzvimbo ichi, kuti ave nekiyi dzehupirisita uhu, kunze kwekunge ari wechizvarwa chaicho chaAroni.

Asi semupirisita wepamusoro weHupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, ane mvumo yekushanda muzvigaro zvose zvidiki, anogona kushanda muchinzvimbo chabhishopi kana pasina wechizvarwa chaAroni, ndokunge achinge akadaidzwa akatsaurwa uye akagadzwa kusimba irori nemaoko eHutungamiri hweHupirisita hwaMerkizedeki.
Simba nemvumo yehuripamusoro, kana kuti Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, kubata kiyi dzose dzemumaropafadzo emweya echechi—

Kuve nemukana wekugashira zvakavanzika zveumambo hwekudenga, kuti vave vanozarurirwa matenga, kuve vanotaura negungano reruzhinji nechechi yeDangwe, uye nokuwana kutaurwa navo nokuvepo kwaMwari Baba, naJesu munyai vechibvumirano chitsva.

Simba nemvumo yehudiki, kana kuti hupirisita hwaAroni, kubata kiyi dzehushumiri hwengirozi, uye nokushanda muzvisungo zvekunze, matsamba evhangeri, kubhabhatidza kwekutendeuka kuitira kuregererwa kwezvivi, zvinowirirana nezvibvumirano nemirairo.
Zvinodikanwa kuve nevatungamiri, kana vari muzvigaro zvekutungamira vanobva, kana vanodomwa kubva mukati meavo vakagadzwa muzvinzvimbo zvakasiyana-siyana muhupirisita huviri uhu.

Kuhupirisita hwaMerkizedeki, vatatu vari Kutungamira vehupirisita hwepamusoro, vanosarudzwa nedare, vodomwa nokugadzwa muchinzvimbo ichocho, uye vachitsigirwa noruvimbo, norutendo, nomunamato wechechi, vanoita chikwata cheHutungamiri hweChechi.

Makurukota anegumi nevaviri avo vanofamba vanodaidzwa kuti vave Vaapositori vaneGumi neVaviri, kana kuti vapupuri vakakosha vezita raKristu pasi pose, mukudaro vakasiyana nevamwe vanoshanda muchechi mumabasa ekudaidzwa kwavo.
Uye ivo vanoita chikwata, chinesimba nemvumo zvakangofanana nezvevatungamiri vatatu vaye vambotaurwa.
Vemakumi Manomwe vanodaidzwa kuti vazoparidza vhangeri, nokuvewo vapupuri vakakosha kumaJentairi nekupasi rose—mukudaro vakasiyana nevamwe vanoshanda muchechi mumabasa ekudaidzwa kwavo.
Uye vanoita chikwata chakaenzana masimba nevaneGumi neVaviri vapupuri vakakosha kana Vaapositori varikubva mukutaurwa.

Uye chose chinofungwa nokuitwa nerimwe rezvikwata izvi zvinofanira kuitwa nokubvumirana kwezwi ravo; kureva kuti yose nhengo yechikwata chega-chega inofanira kutenderana nezvafungwa, kuitira kuti zvavanenge vafunga zvive nesimba kana huremu hwakaenzana pakati pavo—
Kana vakawanda vanogona kuita chikwata kana zvinhu zvisingatendere kuti zviitwe neimwe nzira—

Kunze kwekunge izvi zviri izvo zvazviri, zvavanofunga hazvina maropafadzo mamwechetewo seayo epfungwa dzechikwata chevatungamiri vatatu vekare, avo vakanga vakagadzwa maererano nekuita kwaMerkizedeki, uye vari vakanga vari varume vakarurama uye vari vatsvene.

Zvinofungwa nezvikwata izvi, kana rimwechete rawo, zvinofanira kuitwa mukururama kwose, muhutsvene, nekurereka kwemwoyo, muhunyoro nekushinga, nomurutendo, nehunhu, nemuruzivo, kuzvibata, mwoyo murefu, humwari, rudo rwevanhu vamwechete nerudo rwakadzama;
Nokuti chivimbiso ndechichi, kana zvinhu izvi zvakawanda mavari havazove vasina michero muruzivo rwaIshe.

Uye kana kuri kuti pane zvafungwa nezvikwata izvi mukusarurama, zvinogona kuunzwa pamberi pegungano reruzhinji rezvikwata zvakati wandei, iro rinove nevatungamiri vechechi munezvemweya; nokuti hakuna chinozokwidzwa kumwe zvakare mushure mezvavanenge vatonga.

VaneGumi neVaviri iDare reVatungamiri Vanofamba vari Dare rePamusoro rinotungamira, vanoshanda muzita raIshe vachitungamirirwa neHutungamiri hweChechi, zviri zvinowirirana nezvekudenga; kuvaka chechi nokufambisa nyaya dzacho dzose mumarudzi ose, kutanga kumaJentairi nokuzoenda kuvaJuda.

VeMakumi Manomwe vanoshanda muzita raIshe vari pasi pevaneGumi neVaviri kana kuti vedare repamusoro rinofamba, mukuvaka chechi nomukufambisa nyaya dzaro mumarudzi ose, kutanga nekumaJentairi vozoenda kumaJuda—
VaneGumi neVaviri vachitumwa kunze vakabata kiyi, kuti vazarure musiwo nokuparidza vhangeri raJesu Kristu, uye kutanga kumaJentairi uye vachizoenda kumaJuda.
Matare makuru aripo muhoko dzeZioni, anoumba chikwata chakaenzana mumasimba munyaya dzechechi, mukufunga kwavo kwose, nechikwata chevatungamiri kana dare guru revanofamba.
Dare repamusoro muZioni rinoita chikwata chakangoyenzana musimba, munyaya dzechechi, mune zvavanoita zvose, kumatare evaneGumi neVaviri ari pahoko dzeZioni.
Ibasa redare repamusoro rinofamba kukumbira Vane Makumi Manomwe, kana vachinge vachida ruyamuro, kuzadza zvigaro zvakatiwandei, zvekuparidza nokufambisa vhangeri, pane kukumbira vamwe vasiri ivava.
Ibasa revaneGumi neVaviri, mumapazi makuru ose echechi, kuti vagadze vapirisita vevhangeri, sekupihwa kwavanenge vachiitwa kwavari nezvakazarurwa—
Chirongwa chehupirisita uhu chakasimbiswa kuti chinobva pana baba chichienda pamwana, uye muchokwadi ndecheavo vechizvarwa chaicho chembeu yakasarudzwa, vanove ndivo vakaitirwa zvivimbiso.
Hurongwa uhwu hwakavambwa mumazuva aAdama, uye ndokubva hwadzika nemutsetse nenzira inotevera iyi:

Kubva kuna Adama kusvika kuna Seti, uyo akagadzwa naAdama ave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe ekuberekwa, uye akaropafadzwa naye makore matatu (Adama) asati afa, uye akagashira chivimbiso chaMwari kuburikidza nababa vake, kuti vana vake vaizove vakasarudzwa vaIshe, uye nokuti vachachengetedzwa kusvika kumagumo epasi;

Pamusana pekuti iye (Seti) akanga ari munhu akarurama, uye akanga akafanana nababa vake zvekunge baba vake chaivo, zvekuti aiita sababa vake muzvinhu zvose, uye aizongosiyana pazera rake nababa vake chete.
Enosi akagadzwa ave nemakore zana nemakumi matatu nemana nemwedzi mina, neruoko rwaAdama.
Mwari vakadaidza Kainami murenje mugore rake rechimakumi mana ekuzvarwa; uye akasangana naAdama achienda kuShedoramaka. Akanga ava nemakumi masere nemanomwe ekuberekwa paakagashira kugadzwa kwake.
Maharareri akanga ava nemakore mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe ane matanhatu ane mazuva mana ekuberekwa paakagadzwa neruoko rwaAdama uyo akamuropafadzawo.
Jareti akanga ave nemazana maviri emakore ekuberekwa paakagadzwa neruoko rwaAdama uyo akamuropofadzawo.
Enoki akanga aine makore makumi maviri nemashanu paakagadzwa pasi peruoko rwaAdama; uye akanga ava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu paakaropafadzwa naAdama.

Uye akaona Ishe, uye akafamba navo, uye akanga ari pamberi pechiso chavo nguva dzose; uye akafamaba naMwari kwemakore mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, zvinoreva kuti akanga ave nemakore mazana mana nemakumi matatu ekuzvarwa panguva yaakatorwa kudenga.
Metusara akanga ave nezana remakore ekuberekwa paakagadzwa pasi peruoko rwaAdama.
Rameki akanga ava nemakore makumi matatu nemaviri ekuberekwa paakagadzwa pasi peruoko rwaSeti.
Noa akanga ave nemakore gumi ekuberekwa paakagadzwa neruoko rwaMetusara

Makore matatu Adama asati afa, akadaidza Seti, Enosi, Kainami, Maharareri, Jareti, Enoki, naMetusara, vakanga vose vari vapirisita vepamusoro, neavo vevana vake vakanga vasara vakanga vari vakarurama kunhika yeAdama-ondi-Amani, uye ikoko akavapa maropafadzo ake ekupedzisira.
Ishe vakazviratidza kwavari, uye vakasimuka vakaropafadza Adama, uye vakamudaidza kuti Mikaeri, jinda nengirozi huru.
Uye Ishe vakanyaradza Adama, uye vakati kwaari: Ndakuisa kuti uve kumusoro; marudzi mazhinji achauya achibva pauri, uye iwe uchave mutongi wavo nariini.
Uye Adama akamira pakati pegungano; uye zvisinei nekuti akanga akwegura, azere neMweya mutsvene, akataura zvakanga zvichizoitika kumhuri yake kusvika kuchizvarwa chekupedzisira.
Zvinhu izvi zvakanyorwa zvose mubhuku raEnoki, uye zvichapupurwa nezvazvo nenguva yakafanira.
Ibasa revaneGumi neVaviri zvakare, kugadza nekuronga vose vamwe vashandi vechechi, zvinobvumirana nezvakazarurwa zvinoti;
Kuchechi yaKristu iri munyika yeZioni, pamusoro pemitemo yechechi maererano nebasa rechechi—
Zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, vanodaro Ishe vehondo, kunofanira kuve nemagosa anotungamira avo vari muzvigaro zvehugosa;
Uyewo nevapirisita vanotungamira avo vari muzvinzvimbo zvehupirisita;
Uyewo nevadzidzisi kuti vatungamire avo vari muzvigaro zvevadzidzisi, uye zvimwechetezvo, nekumadhikoniwo—

Nokudaro, kubva kumadhikoni kuenda kumudzidzisi, uye kubva kumudzidzisi kuenda kumupirisita, uye kubva kumupirisita kuenda kuna gosa, vakasiyana-siyana sekudomwa kwavo, maererano nezvibvumirano nemirairo yechechi.
Zvino kouya Hupirisita hwePamusoro, hunove ndihwo hukurusa kupfuura zvose.
Nokudaro, zvinofanira kuti pave nemumwe anodomwa kubva kuHupirisita hwePamusoro kuti atungamire hupirisita, uye achadaidzwa kuti Mutungamiri weHupirisita hwePamusoro hweChechi;
Kana kuti, nemamwe mazwi, Mupirisita wePamusoro Anotungamira Hupirisita hwePamusoro hweChechi.
Kubva kuna ivava kunouya kuitwa kwezvisungo nemaropafadzo kuchechi, kuburikidza nokuisa maoko pamusoro.
Nokudaro, chigaro chabhishopi hachina kuenzana nacho; nokuti chigaro chabhishopi ndechekutarisa zvose zvenyika;
Zvakadaro bhishopi anofanira kudomwa kubva muHupirisita hwePamusoro, kunze kwekunge ari wechizvarwa chaicho chaAroni.
Nokuti kunze kwekunge ari wechizvarwa chaicho chaAroni haakwanise kubata kiyi dzehupirisita uhu.
Zvakadaro, mupirisita wepamusoro zvinoreva kuti muhurongwa hwaMerkizedeki, anogona kunzi agadzwe kuti aite basa rezvinhu zvenyika, aine ruzivo nazvo kuburikidza neMweya wechokwadi.

Uye nokuvewo mutongi muIsraeri, kuita basa rechechi, kugara achitonga vanenge vatadza maererano neuchapupu hunenge hwaiswa pamberi pake maererano nemitemo, neruyamuro rwevanobatsirana naye, avo vaakasarudza kana vaachasarudza pakati pemagosa echechi.
Iri ndiro basa rabhishopi asiri wechizvarwa chaAroni chaicho, asi akagadzwa muHupirisita hwePamusoro hwechikwata chaMerkizedeki.

Saka achave mutongi, kunyangwe mutongi wezvose pakati pevagari veZioni, kana muhoko yeZioni, kana mune ripi zvaro bazi rechechi paanenge apihwa basa iri, kusvika miganhu yeZioni yakudzwa, uye zvazofanira kuti kuve nemamwe mabhishopi kana vatongi muZioni kana kumwewo.
Uye mamwe mabhishopi ose achadomwa naiwo achashanda ari muchigaro chimwechetecho.

Asi wechizvarwa chaAroni chaicho anobvumirwa nemurawu kuti ave mutungamiri hwehupirisita uhu, kukiyi dzebasa iri, kushanda muchigaro chehubhishopi akazvimirira, asina vanomuyamura, kunze kwekunge Mutungamiri weHupirisita hwePamusoro, Hupirisita hwaMerkizedeki achitongwa, agere semutongi muIsraeri.
Uye zvinoitwa nerimwe rematare aya, zviri maererano nemurairo unoti:

Zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, basa guru rakakoshesesa rechechi, nenyaya dzakanyanya kuoma dzechechi, kana pari pashaya kugutswa nekutonga kwabhishopi kana vatongi, ichatakurwa yoendeswa kudare rechechi, pamberi peHutungamiri hweHupirisita hwePamusoro.

Uye Hutungamiri hwedare reHupirisita hwePamusoro huchave nesimba rekudaidza vamwe vapirisita vepamusoro, kunyangwe gumi nevaviri, kuti vayamure semakurukota, nokudaro Hutungamiri hweHupirisita hwePamusoro nemakurokota ahwo huchave nesimba rekuita maererano neuchapupu sezvinopindirana nemirawu yechechi.
Mushure mekuita uku hazvizoyeukwa zvakare pamberi paIshe; nokuti iri ndirodare guru repamusoro-soro rechechi yaMwari, iri iyo yekupedzisira mukupesana kwose munyaya dzemweya.
Hakuna kana ani zvake munhu wechechi anonzi haamire pamberi pedare rechechi iyi.
Uye kana Mutungamiri hwehupirisita hwePamusoro akatadza, achamiswa pamberi pedare revazhinji rechechi, iyo ichayamurwa nemakurukota gumi nevaviri veHupirisita hwePamusoro;
Uye zvavanenge vatonga pamusoro pake ndizvo zvinopedza nharo dzose dziri maererano naye.
Saka hakuna achasiiwa mukuenzanisa uye nemumitemo yaMwari, kuti zvose zvinhu zviitwe nehurongwa nechiremerera chinoyera pamberi pavo, zviri maererano nechokwadi nekururama.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, basa remutungamiri pamusoro pachigaro chemudhikoni, kutungamira madhikoni anokwana gumi nevaviri, kugara navo achivaraira, nekuvadzidzisa basa ravo, vachisimbisana, sekupihwa kwazvakaitwa maererano nezvibvumirano.

Uyewo basa remutungamiri ari pamusoro pechinzvimbo chevadzidzisi, kuti anofanira kutungamira vadzidzisi makumi maviri nevana nokugara navo pasi, achivadzidzisa mabasa ezvigaro zvavo, sekupihwa kwaakaitwa muchibvumirano.

Uye basa remutungamiri wehupirisita hwaAroni kutungamira vapirisita vanosvika kumakumi mana nevasere, uye achagara achirairana navo, kuvadzidzisa mabasa ezvigaro zvavo, sekupihwa kwazvakaitwa muzvibvumirano—
Uyu mutungamiri anofanira kuve bhishopi; nokuti ndiro rimwe basa rehupirisita huno.
Zvakare, basa remutungamiri wepamusoro pemagosa, kutungamira makumi mapfumbamwe namatanhatu emagosa, nokugara pasi navo vachirairana, nokuvadzidzisa maererano nezvibvumirano.
Uhu hutungamiri hwakasiyana chaizvo neuhwo hwevane makumi manomwe, uye hwakarongerwa avo vasingafambe vachienda munyika yose.
Uye zvakare, basa reMutungamiri wechinzvimbo cheHupirisita hwePamusoro, kutungamira chechi yose nokuita saMosesi—
Tarisai, houno ungwaru; hungu, kuve muoni, muzaruri, mududziri, nomuporofita, aivenezvipo zvose zvinobva kunaMwari izvo zvavanopa kumutungamiri wechechi.
Uye zviri maererano nechiratidzo chakaonesa marongerwo evane Makumi Manomwe, kuti vave nevatungamiri vanomwe vanovatungamira, vanosarudzwa kubva mune vane makumi manomwe;
Uye mutungamiri wechinomwe wevatungamiri ava anofanira kutungamira ava vatanhatu.
Uye vatungamiri vanomwe ava vanofanira kusarudza vamwe vane makumi manonwe, pamusoro pavane makumi manomwe vekutanga kunove ndiko kwavari ivo, uye vanofanira kuvatungamira;
Uyewo nevamwe vane makumi manomwe, kusvika kumakumi manomwe akapetwa kanomwe, kana basa riri mumunda wemizambiringa richida kuti zvidaro.
Uye vane makumi manomwe ava ndivo vachave vapirisita vanofamba, kutanga kumaJentairi uyewo nekuvaJuda.

Zvakadaro vamwe vane zvigaro muchechi vasiri vevaneGumi neVaviri, kana kuvane Makumi manomwe, vasina basa rekufamba pakati pemarudzi ose, asi vachizofamba sezvinotendera zvinhu zvavo, zvisinei vanogona kubata zvigaro zvepamusoro zvakadaro nemabasa makuru muchechi.
