Nokudaro, zvino regai munhu wose adzidze basa rake uye nokushanda muchigaro chaakasarudzirwa, nokushingaira kwose.
Uyo anenungo haazoverengwa seakakodzera kumira, uye uyo asinga dzidzire basa rake achizviratidza kuti haana kugashirwa haazoverengwa seakakodzera kumira. Kana saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/108.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 108
chapter_summary: 1–3, Lyman Sherman anoregererwa zvitadzo zvake; 4–5, Anoverengerwa pamagosa anotungamira eChechi; 6–8, Anodaidzwa kuti aparidze vhangeri uye nokusimbisa vamwe vake.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwauri, muranda wangu Lyman: Zvitadzo zvako wazviregererwa, nokuti wateerera izwi rangu mukuuya kwako kuno mangwanani ano kuti uzogashira kurairwa neuyo wandakasarudza.
Nokudaro, mweya wako ngauzorore pamusoro pepauchamira munezvemweya, uye usarwise zvakare izwi rangu.
Uye simuka uchenjere kubvira zvino mukucherechedza zvitsidzo zvako, izvo zvawakaita nezvauri kuita, uye uchazoropafadzwa nemaropafadzo mazhinji makuru.
Mira nemwoyo murefu gungano rinoera radaidzirwa nevaranda vangu, zvino ucharangarirwa pamwechete neekutanga magosa angu, uye ugogashira mvumo nekugadzwa nevamwe vose vemagosa angu avo vandakasarudza.
Tarisai, ichi chivimbiso chaBaba kwauri kana ukaramba uchitendeka.
Uye chichazadzikiswa pauri muzuva iroro rauchave nemvumo yekuparidza vhangeri rangu uko kwose kwandichakutuma kubvira panguva iyoyo.
Naizvozvo, simbisa hama dzako mukukurukura kwako kwose, muminamato yako yose, mukukuridzira kwako kwose, nomukuita kwako kwose.
Uye tarisai uye uone, ndinewe kuti ndikuropafadze nokukununura zvachose. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/109.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 109
chapter_summary: 1–5, Temberi yeKirtland yakavakwa senzvimbo yaizoshanyirwa neMwanakomana weMunhu; 6–21, Ichave imba yemunamato, kutsanya, rutendo, kudzidza, kubwinya, uye yakarongwa, nemba yaMwari; 22–33, Avo vasingade kutendeuka uye vachishora vanhu vaIshe ngavadziviswe; 34–42, Vatendi ngavaende nesimba kunounganidza vakarurama kuZioni; 43–53, Vatendi ngavabviswe muzvinhu zvakaipa zvichidirwa kune vakaipa mumazuva ekupedzisira; 54–58, Marudzi nevanhu machechi vagadzirire vhangeri; 59–67, MaJuda, maRamani, uye neIsraeri yose, vanunurwe; 68–80, Vatendi ngavapfekedzwe ngundu yokubwinya nerukudzo uye vagowana ruponeso rwokusingaperi.

verses.text: Kutenda ngakuve kuzita renyu, Ishe Mwari waIsraeri, munochengeta chibvumirano uye muchiratidza tsitsi kuvaranda venyu avo vanofamba vakatwasanuka pamberi penyu, nemwoyo yavo yose—
Imi makaudza varanda venyu kuti vavake imba muzita renyu munzvimbo ino (Kirtland).
Uye zvino murikuona Ishe, kuti varanda venyu vaita maererano nekutaura kwenyu.

Uye zvino tinokukumbirai, Baba Vatsvene, muzita raJesu Kristu, Mwanakomana wepaChipfuva chenyu, muzita rake murovaimo chete munogona kupihwa ruponeso kuvana vevanhu, tinokukumbirai, Ishe kuti mutambire imba ino, basa remaoko edu, isu varanda venyu, iyo yamakatiraira kuti tivake.

Nokuti imi munoziva kuti takaita basa iri mukati mekutambudzika kukuru; uye muhurombo hwedu tapa zvatiinazvo kuti tikuvakirei imba muzita renyu, kuti Mwanakomana weMunhu angawane nzvimbo yekuzviratidza kuvanhu vake.
Uye sekutaura kwamakaita mune chakazarurwa chakapihwa kwatiri, muchitidaidza kuti shamwari dzenyu, muchiti—Daidzai gungano renyu dzvene sezvandakakurairai;

Uye sezvo vasiri vose vane rutendo, tsvagai nokushingaira uye mudzidzisane mazwi eungwaru; hongu, tsvagai mumabhuku akanaka mazwi eungwaru, tsvakai kudzidza kunyangwe nokudzidza zvakadzama uyewo nerutendo;
Zvirongei pachenyu; gadzirirai chose chinhu chinodiwa, uye momisa imba, kunyangwe imba yemunamato, imba yekutsanya, imba yerutendo, imba yekudzidza, imba yekubwinya, imba yakarongeka, imba yaMwari;
Kuti kupinda kwenyu kuve muzita raIshe, kuti kubuda kwenyu kuve muzita raIshe, kuti kukwazisana kwenyu kwose kuve muzita raIshe, nemaoko akasimudzirwa kune vari Kumusoro-soro—
Uye zvino, Baba Mutsvene, tinokumbira kuti mutiyamure, vanhu venyu, nenyasha dzenyu, mukudaidza gungano redu dzvene, kuti zviitwe mukukudzwa kwenyu nekugamuchirwa kwenyu kutsvene;
Uye mutowo inoita kuti tiwanikwe tiri vanokodzera mumaziso enyu, kuti tiwane kuzadzikiswa kwezvisimbiso zvamakaita kwatiri vanhu venyu, mune zvakozarurwa zvakapihwa kwatiri;
Kuti kubwinya kwenyu kudzike pavanhu venyu, uye nepano paimba yenyu, iyo yatave zvino kukumikidza kwamuri kuti icheneswe nekuti iitwe tsvene uye kuti hutsvene hwenyu hurambe huri mumba ino;
Uye kuti vanhu vose vachapinda nepasuwo remba yaIshe vagonzwa simba renyu, uye vagonzwa vachidikanwa kuti vabvume kuti makaichenesa, uye kuti imba yenyu, inzvimbo yehutsvene hwenyu.

Uye chibvumirai Baba Vatsvene, kuti vose avo vachanamata mumba muno vagodzidziswa mazwi eungwaru anobva mumabhuku akanaka, uye kuti vagotsvaka kudzidza kunyangwe nokuverenga, uyewo nerutendo, sekutaura kwamakaita;
Uye kuti vagokura varimamuri, uye vagogashira kuzara kweMweya Mutsvene, uye vagoronga maererano nemitemo yenyu, uye vagogadzirira kuwana chose chinhu chinodiwa;
Uye kuti imba ino ive imba yemunamato, imba yokutsanya, imba yerutendo, imba yokubwinya uye neyaMwari, kunyangwe imba yenyu;
Kuti kupinda kwose kwevanhu venyu mumba ino, kuve muzita raIshe;
Kuti kubuda kwavo kwose mumba muno kuve muzita raIshe;
Uye kuti kwose kukwazisana kwavo kuve muzita raIshe, nemaoko matsvene, akasimudzirwa kune vePamusoro-soro;
Uye hakuna chinhu chisina kuchena chichabvumirwa kuuya mumba menyu kuzoisvibisa;

Uye kana vanhu vatadza, ani zvake wavo, vanogona kutendeuka nokukurumbidza uye vachibva vadzokera kwamuri, uye vagowana kudiwa mumaziso enyu, uye vagodzorerwa kumaropafadzo ayo amakagadza kuti agodirwa pane avo vachakukudzai mumba menyu.
Uye tinokukumbirai Baba, Vatsvene, kuti varanda venyu vabve mumba muno vave nesimba renyu uye kuti zita renyu rive pavari, uye ngirozi dzenyu dzivatarise;

Uye kubva pane ino nzvimbo ngavatakure mazwi makuru kwazvo akanaka, muchokwadi, kusvika kumagumo kwenyika, kuti vagoziva kuti iri ibasa renyu, kuti imi makaisa ruoko rwenyu, kuzadzisa izvo zvamakataura nemiromo yevaporofita, pamusoro pamazuva ekupedzisira.
Tinokukumbirai Baba Vatsvene, kuti mumise vanhu avo vachanamata, nekubata neruremekedzo zita renyu uye vachimira muimba yenyu iyi, kuzvizvarwa zvose nokokusingapere;
Kuti hakuna chombo chinoitirwa kuvarwisa chichabudirira; kuti uyo achavacherera gomba, iye ndiye achawira mariri;
Kuti hakuna chirango chezvakaipa chichawana simba rekumukira chikakurira vanhu venyu avo vachaiswa zita renyu pavari mumba muno;
Uye kana vanhu vapi zvavo vakamukira vanhu ava, kuti hasha dzenyu dzitungidzwe kurwisana navo;
Uye kana vakarova vanhu ava imi muchavarova; imi mucharwira vanhu venyu sezvamakaita muzuva rehondo, kuti vabviswe mumaoko evavengi vose vavo.

Tinokukumbirai Baba Vatsvene, kanganisai, nokushamisa, uye muunze pakunyadzisa uye nokusaziva, vose avo vakaparadzira zvekunyepa kure, munyika, pamusoro pemuranda wenyu kana varanda venyu, kana vasingatendeuke apo vhangeri risingaperi richataurwa munzeve dzavo;

Uye kuti mabasa avo ose ashaye basa, uye ayeredzwe nechivhuramahwe, uye nezvirango zvamunenge matumira kwavari mukushatirwa kwenyu, kuti kuve nekuguma kwekunyepa nekutaura zvakaipa pamusoro pavanhu venyu.
Nokuti imi munoziva Ishe, kuti varanda venyu vanga vasina mhosva pamberi penyu mukupupura zvezita renyu, ririiro raita kuti vatambudzike muzvinhu izvi.
Nokudaro, tinokumbira pamberi penyu kuti mutibvise zvizere uye zvachose pasi pejoki iri;
Rityorei Ishe, rityorei ribve mumitsipa yevaranda venyu nesimba renyu, kuti tigosimuka pakati pechizvarwa chino uye tichiita basa renyu.
Jehova ivai netsitsi pamusoro pevanhu ava, uye sezvo vanhu vose vachitadza regererai kutadza kwevanhu venyu, uye muite kuti zvibvazvadzimwa zvachose.
Itai kuti kuzodzwa kwevafundisi venyu chive chisungo pavari nesimba rinobva kumusoro.
Ngazvizadziswe pavari, sezvakaitika pane avo musi wePentekosta; chipo chendimi ngachidirwe muvanhu venyu, kunyange rurimi rwune mhaswa kunge moto urikubvira, nokududzira kwacho.
Uye imba yenyu ngaizadzwe seyazadzwa nemhepo, kuri kubwinya kwenyu.

Isai pavaranda venyu uchapupu hwechibvumirano, kuti kana voenda kunze kunoshambadza izwi renyu vasimbise mutemo, uye mugadzirire mwoyo yevatendi venyu zvirango zvose izvo zvamavekuda kutumira mukushatirwa kwenyu, kuvagari vemunyika pamusana pekutadza kwavo, kuti vanhu venyu vasakundwe muzuva redambudziko.

Uye guta ripi zvaro richapindwa nevaranda venyu, uye vanhu veguta iroro vagogashira uchapupu hwavo, itai kuti runyararo rwenyu neruponeso rwenyu rwuve muguta iroro; kuti vagounganidza kubva muguta iroro vakarurama, kuti vagouya kuZioni kana kuhoko dzayo, nzvimbo dzamakadoma imi, nenziyo dzerufaro rwusingapere;
Uye kusvika izvi zvaitwa, musaite kuti kuranga kwenyu kuwire guta iroro.

Uye guta ripi zvaro richapindwa nevaranda venyu, uye vanhu veguta iroro vagosagashira uchapupu hwevaranda venyu, uye varanda venyu vavayambire kuti vazviponese kubva kuchizvarwa chino chakaipa, regai zviitike kuguta iroro maererano nezvakataurwa nemiromo yemaporofita enyu.
Asi nunurai imi Jehova, tinokukumbirai nemwoyo yose, varanda venyu kubva mumaoko avo, uye movachenesa kubva muropa ravo.
Ishe, hatifare nokuparadzwa kwevamwe vedu; mweya yavo inokosha pamberi penyu;
Asi izwi renyu rinofanira kuzadzikiswa. Yamurai varanda venyu kuti vataure, vachiyamurwa nenyasha dzenyu; Kuda kwenyu ngakuitike Ishe, kwete kwedu.
Tinoziva kuti makataura nemiromo yevaporofita enyu zvinhu zvinotyisa pamusoro pevakaipa mumazuva ekupedzisira—kuti muchadira zvirango zvenyu zvisina mwero;
Naizvozvo Ishe, bvisai vanhu venyu mudambudziko revakaipa; itai varanda venyu vagone kusimbisa mutemo, uye nokusunga uchapupu, kuti vagove vakagadzirira zuva rekutsva.
Tinokukumbirai Baba Vatsvene, kuti murangarire avo vakabviswa nevagari veruwa rweJackson, Missouri, munyika dzenhaka yavo, uye mutyore Ishe, joki iri rekutambudzwa rakaiswa pavari.
Imi munoziva Ishe, kuti vakadzvinyirirwa zvikuru uye nokutambudzwa nevanhu vakaipa; uye mwoyo yedu izere nokusuwa pamusana pekunetsa kwemitoro yavo.

Ishe, kusvika riini muchibvumira vanhu kuti vatakure kutambudzika uku, uye nokuchema kwevasina mhosva avo kuti kusvike munzveve dzenyu, uye ropa ravo richiuya sekupupura pamberi penyu, imi mukasaita chiratidzo cheuchapupu hwenyu pamusoro pavo?
Ivai netsitsi Ishe, kune chikwata chakaipa, ichochakabvisa vanhu venyu, kuti chirege kuparadza, kuti chigotendeuka muzvivi zvacho, kana kutendeuka kuchikwanisa kuwanikwa;
Asi kana vasingade, isai ruoko rwenyu pachena Ishe, uye mununure icho chamakadoma kuti chive Zioni kuvanhu venyu.

Uye kana zvisingagone kuitika nepamwe, kuti basa revanhu venyu risakundikane pamberi penyu hasha dzenyu ngadzitungidzwe, uye kushatirwa kwenyu ngakuvawire, kuti vayeredzwe, zvose mudzi nebazi zvibve pasi pedenga;
Asi kana vari vanotendeuka, imi mune nyasha netsitsi, uye munobvisa hasha dzenyu kana matarisa chiso cheMuzodzwa wenyu.

Ivai netsitsi Ishe, kumarudzi ose epasi, ivai netsitsi kuvatongi venyika yedu; mitemo iyo yakadzivirirwa zvakarurama, uye zvakatwasuka kudaro inova, Bumbiro reMitemo renyika yedu, nemadzibaba edu, ivepo nariini.
Rangarirai madzimambo, machinda, vanoremekedzwa, uye navakuru vepasi, uye nevanhu vose nechechi dzose, vose varombo, vanoshaya, nevanotambudzika vepasi;

Kuti mwoyo yavo ipfave kana varanda venyu voenda kubva mumba menyu Jehova, kunopupura zita renyu; kuti kutonga kusina mwero kwavo kusiire mukana kuchokwadi, uye kuti vanhu venyu vave vanowana kufarirwa mumaziso evose;
Kuti kumiganhu yose yepasi igoziva kuti isu, varanda venyu, takanzwa izwi renyu, uye takatumwa nemi;
Kuti kubva pakati pevose ava varanda venyu, vanakomana vaJakobo, vangaunganidze vakarurama kuti vavake guta dzvene kuzita renyu, sekuvataurira kwamakaita.
Tinokukumbirai kuti mudomere Zioni dzimwe hoko pamusoro peiyi yamakadoma, kuti kuungana kwevanhu venyu kufambe nesimba guru nokukudzwa, kuti basa renyu riitwe nokukurumbidza nemukururama.
Zvino mazwi aya Ishe, atataura pamberi penyu, pamusoro pezvakazarurwa uye nemirairo izvo zvamakatipa, isu tinobatanidzirwa kumaJentairi.
Asi imi munoziva kuti mune rudo rukuru kuvana vaJakobo, avo vakapararira mumakomo kwenguva refu, nezuva remakore nererima.
Nokudaro, tinokukumbirai kuti muve netsitsi pavana vaJakobo, kuti Jerusarema, kubvira panguva ino itange kununurwa;
Uye joki rehusungwa ritange kutyoka kubva mumba maDavidi;
Uye vana vaJuda vatange kudzokera kunyika dzamakapa kuna Abrahama, baba wavo.
Uye muite kuti vakasara vaJakobo, avo vakashurikidzwa uye vakarohwa pamusana pekutadza kwavo, vadzorwe kubva mukugara kwavo kwehubhinya nekupenga, vapinde mukuzara kwevhangeri risingaperi;
Kuti vagoisa pasi zvombo zvavo zvekudeura ropa, uye varege kupanduka kwavo.
Uye vose vakasara vakapararira veIsraeri, avo vakatinhirwa kumagumo epasi, vauye paruzivo rwechokwadi, vatende muna Mesia, uye vagonunurwa mukudzvinyirirwa, uye vagofara pamberi penyu.

Ishe, rangarirai muranda wenyu Joseph Smith, Mwana, nekwose kutambudzwa kwake nekunetswa—kubvumirana kwaakaita naJehova, uye akatsidza kwamuri, Samasimba Mwari vaJakobo—nemirairo yamakapa kwaari, uye nokuti ayedza nemwoyo wake wose kuita kuda kwenyu.
Ivai netsisi Ishe kumukadzi wake nevana kuti vagosimudzwa pamberi penyu uye vagochengetedzwa neruoko rwenyu rwekurera.
Ivai netsitsi kune avo vose vepedyo navo, kuti kufungira kwavo kutyorwe kutsvairwe kunge kwatorwa nemvura; kuti vadzorwe uye vagonunurwa pamwechete neIsraeri, uye vagoziva kuti muri Mwari.

Rangarirai Ishe, vatungamiri, kunyangwe vose vatungamiri vechechi yenyu, kuti ruoko rwenyu rwerudyi rwuvasimudze, nemhuri dzavo dzose, uye neavo vepedyo navo, kuti mazita avo arambe aripo uye ari mukuyeukwa kusingaperi chizvarwa nechizvarwa.

Rangarirai chechi yenyu yose Ishe, nemhuri dzavo dzose, uye neavo varipedyo navo, nevarwere vavo vose uye nevanotambudzika, pamwechete nevarombo vose nevakazvirereka vemunyika; kuti umambo, uhu hwamakavaka musina kubata neruoko, huve gomo guru uye rinozadza pasi rose;
Kuti chechi yenyu ingauye ichibuda murenje rerima, uye rigopenya nekuchena semwedzi rigojekesa sezuva, uye richityisa semauto ane mireza.

Uye izoshongedzwa semwenga kuitira zuva ramuchazarura chidzitiro matenga, uye muchiita kuti makomo ayerere pamberi penyu, uye nhika dzichisimudzwa, nzvimbo dzine man’a dzichikwenenzverwa; kuti kubwinya kwenyu kuzadze pasi;
Kuti kana hwamanda yoridzirwa vakafa, tichabatwa mugore kuti tisangane nemi, kuti tizogara nariini tiina Ishe;

Kuti nhumbi dzedu dzive dzakachena, kuti tigopfekedzwa nguwo dzehururami nemichindwi mumaoko edu, uye nekorona dzekubwinya pamisoro yedu, uye tigokohwa rufaro rwokusingaperi mukutambudzika kwedu kwose.

Ishe Mwari Samasimba, tinzwei mukuchema kwedu, uye mutipindure kubva kudenga, nzvimbo yenyu yamunogara tsvene, kwamunogara pachigaro cheumambo, muinokubwinya, kukudzwa, simba, kuremekedzwa, kushinga, kutonga, chokwadi, kuenzanisa, zvirango, tsitsi, uye nokuzara kusingapere, kubva kusingaperi kusvika kusingapere.
Inzwai, inzwai, inzwai Ishe! Uye mupindure zvichemo izvi, uye mutambire kukumikidzwa kwemba iyi kwamuri, basa remaoko edu, iyo yatavakira zita renyu.

Uyewo nechechi ino, kuti tiise pairi zita renyu. Uye mutiyamure nesimba reMweya wenyu, kuti tiimbe mazwi edu achisangana neemaserafu ayo anopenya akachena akatenderedza chigaro cheumambo hwenyu, tichisheedzera kurumbidza tichiti Hosana kuna Mwari neGwayana!
Uye regai vakazodzwa venyu, vapfekedzwe neruponeso uye vatendi venyu vadaidzire zvikuru nerufaro. Ameni neAmeni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/110.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 110
chapter_summary: 1–10, Ishe Jehova vanoonekwa vari mukubwinya uye vanogashira temberi yeKirtland semba yavo; 11–12, Mosesi naEria vose vanoonekwa uye ndokugamuchidza makiyi enguva dzavo; 13–16, Erija anodzoka obva apa kiyi dzemukuwo wake sekuvimbiswa kwazvakaitwa naMaraki.

verses.text: Chidzitiro chakatorwa kubva mupfungwa dzedu, uye maziso ekunzwisisa kwedu akabva azuruka.
Takaona Ishe vamire pamberi paaritari, pamberi pedu, uye pasi petsoka dzake pakarovererwa chiumbwa chegoridhe chairo riine ruvara rwutsvuku.

Maziso avo aiita serimi remoto, vhudzi remusoro mavo rakachena sechando chaicho; chiso chavo chaipenya kupfuura kupenya kwezuva; uye izwi ravo rainge richiita semvura zhinji iri kuyerera, kana izwi raJehova, richiti:
Ndini wekutanga newekupedzisira; Ndini iye mupenyu, Ndini iye akauraiwa; Ndini murevereri wenyu kuna Baba.
Tarisai zvitadzo zvenyu mazviregererwa; makachena pamberi pangu; nokudaro, simudzai misoro yenyu mufare.
Mwoyo yehama dzenyu ngaifare, uye mwoyo yevanhu vangu vose ngaifare, avo vavaka nesimba ravo, imba ino kuzita rangu.
Nokuti tarisai, ndatambira imba ino uye zita rangu richave muno; uye ini ndichazviratidza kuvanhu vangu mutsitsi mumba ino.
Hongu, ndichazviratidza kuvaranda vangu, uye ndichataura kwavari nezwi rangu, kana vanhu vangu vakachengeta mirairo yangu, uye vakasasvibisa imba ino tsvene.
Hongu, mwoyo yezviuru uye nemakumi ezviuru ichafara zvikuru pamusana pemaropafadzo achadirwa, neendawumenti dzapihwa varanda vangu mumba ino.
Uye nembiri yemba ino ichasvika kunyika dzevatorwa; uye uku ndikokutanga kwemaropafadzo achadirwa pamisoro yevanhu vangu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Mushure mekuzarirwa kwechiratidzo ichi, matenga akazarurirwa isu zvakare; uye Mosesi akauya pamberi pedu, uye akatipa kiyi dzekuunganidza Israeri kubva kumativi mana epasi, uye nedzekutungamira marudzi gumi kubva kunyika yekuchamhembe.
Mushure meizvi, Eria akaoneka, uye akapa mukuwo wevhangeri raAbrahama, achiti matiri nemumbeu yedu zvose zvizvarwa mushure medu zvinofanira kuropafadzwa.

Mushure mekunge chiratidzo ichi chavharwa, chimwe chiratidzo chikuru uye chinoshamisa chakasvika patiri; nokuti Erija muporofita, uyo akatorwa kuenda kudenga asina kumboraira rufu, akamira pamberi pedu akati;
Tarisai, nguva yasvika izere, iyo yakataurwa nemuromo waMaraki—achipupura kuti iye Erija achatumwa zuva guru rinotyisa raIshe risati rauya—
Kutendeutsira mwoyo yaanababa kuvana, uye yevana kunanababa, nokuti pasi rose ringarohwe neshura—
Nokudaro, kiyi dzenguva ino dzapihwa mumaoko enyu; uye naizvozvi mungazive kuti zuva guru rinotyisa raIshe rave pedyo, kunyangwe pamisiwo chaipo.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/111.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 111
chapter_summary: 1–5, Ishe vanotarisa kuzvinhu zvemunyika zvinodiwa nevaranda vavo; 6–11, Vachashanda neZioni netsitsi uye vagoronga zvose zvinhu kuitira kupunduka kwevaranda vavo.

verses.text: Ini, Ishe Mwari venyu, handina kusafara nekuuya kwenyu parwendo rwuno, zvisinei nekukanganisa kwenyu.
Ndine upfumi hwakawanda hwenyu muguta rino hunoyamura Zioni, uye vanhu vazhinji muguta rino, avo vandichaunganidza nenguva yakafanira kupundutsa Zioni, kuburikidza nokushanda kwenyu.
Naizvozvo, zvakafanira kuti mujairane nevanhu vari muguta rino, sekutungamirwa kwamuchaitwa, uye sekuzvipihwa kwamunoitwa.

Uye zvichaitika nenguva yakafanira kuti ndichapa guta rino mumaoko enyu, kuti muzove nesimba pamusoro paro, zvekuti havazombowana zvakavanzika zvenyu; uye upfumi hwaro huri maererano negoridhe nesirivha huchave hwenyu.
Musazvinetse pamusana pezvikwereti zvenyu, nokuti ndichakupai zvenyu, nokuti ndichakupai simba rekuzviripa.
Musazvinetse pamusana peZioni, nokuti ndichashanda nayo netsitsi.
Garai munzvimbo ino, uye nemumatunhu akatenderedza;
Uye nemunzvimbo iyo inova chido changu kuti mugare, zvikuru-kuru, zvicharatidzwa kwamuri nerunyararo nesimba reMweya wangu, izvo zvichayererera kwamuri.
Ino nzvimbo munogona kuiwana kana mabvisa mari. Uye bvunzai zvakasimba pamusoro pevagari vakatanga guta iri.
Nokuti mune upfumi hunopfuura humwechete muguta rino.
Naizvozvo, chenjerai senyoka asi musina chitadzo; uye ndichaita kuti zvose zvinhu zvinakire imi, nokukurumidza kana muchigona kuzvigashira. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/112.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 112
chapter_summary: 1–10, VaneGumi neVaviri vanofanira kutumira vhangeri uye nokusimudzira izwi rekuyambira kumarudzi ose nevanhu; 11–15, Vanofanira kutora muchinjikwa wavo, votevera Jesu, nekufudza hwai dzake; 16–20, Avo vanogamuchira Hutungamiri Hwekutanga vanogashira Ishe; 21–29, Rima rakafukidza pasi, uye avo chete vanotenda uye vakabhabhatidzwa ndivo vanoponeswa; 30–34, Hutungamiri Hwekutanga nevaneGumi neVaviri vane kiyi dzenguva yekuzara kwenguva.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwauri iwe muranda wangu Thomas: Ndanzwa minamato yako; uye yauya sendangariro kwandiri, kuitira idzo hama dzako vakasarudzwa kuti vape uchapupu hwezita rangu nokuritumira kure kumarudzi, madzinza, ndimi, nevanhu vose, uye kaburikidza nekushanda kwevaranda vangu.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, kune zvinhu zvange zviri mumwoyo mako uye zvauinazvo izvo zvisina kundifadza ini, Ishe.
Zvisinei, kana uri wazvidzikisa uchasimudzwa; nokudaro, zvitadzo zvako zvose wazviregererwa.
Mwoyo wako ngaufare zvakanaka pamberi pechiso changu; uye uchapupura pamusoro pezita rangu, kwete kumaJentairi chete, asiwo nekuvaJuda; uye uchatumira izwi rangu kumiganhu yepasi.
Rwisa iwe, nokudaro mangwanani nemangwanani ezuva, zuva nezuva ita kuti kuyambira kwako kuende munyika; uye kana husiku hwauya usaregere vagari vemunyika vachikotsira, pamusana pekutaura kwako.
Ita kuti paunogara pazivikanwe muZioni, uye usabvise imba yako; nokuti Ini Ishe ndine basa guru rako rekuti uite, mukushambadza zita rangu pakati pevana vevanhu.
Naizvozvo, sungira nguwo dzako muchiuno chako kuitira basa. Tsoka dzako ngadzipfekedzwe shangu naidzowo, nokuti wasarudzwa, uye nzira yako iri mumakomo, nemukati memarudzi mazhinji.
Uye nezwi rako vazhinji vari pamusoro vachadzikiswa pasi, uye nezwi rako vazhinji vakadzikira vachasimudzwa.
Izwi rako richava chitsiuro kumutadzi; uye mukutsiura kwako ita kuti rurimi rwemunyepi ruregere hutsauki hwarwo.
Iva wakazvininipisa, uye Ishe Mwari vako vachakutungamirira neruoko, uye nokukupa mhinduro kuminamato yako.

Ndinoziva mwoyo wako, uye ndakanzwa minamato yako pamusoro pehama dzako. Usavade kupfuura vamwe vazhinji, asi rega rudo rwako kwavari ruve serwako; uye rudo rwako ngaruwande kuvanhu vose, uye nekune avo vose vanoda zita rangu.
Uye namatira hama dzako dzineGumi neVaviri. Vatsiure zvakasimba kuiitira zita rangu, uye urege varangwe pamusana pezvitadzo zvavo zvose, uye iwe uve wakatendeka pamberi pangu muzita rangu.

Uye mushure mekuedzwa kwavo, uye nokutambudzika kwakawanda, tarisai, Ini Ishe, ndichavanzwirwa nyasha, uye vakasaomesa mwoyo yavo, vakasaomesa mitsipa yavo kwandiri, vachatendeutswa, uye ini ndichavarapa.
Zvino, ndinoti kwauri, uye zvandinotaura kwauri ndinozvitaura kune vaneGumi neVaviri vose: Simuka usungira nguwo dzako muchiuno chako, tora muchinjikwa wako, unditevere, uye ufudze hwai dzangu.

Usazviise pamusoro; usapandukira muranda wangu Joseph; nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, ndinaye ini, uye ruoko rwangu rwuchave paari; uye kiyi dzandamupa, uyewo nekunewewo, hadzizobvutwa kwaari kusvika ndauya.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, muranda wangu Thomas, ndiwe munhu andasarudza kuti ubate kiyi dzeumambo hwangu, maererano nevaneGumi neVaviri, munyika pakati pamarudzi ose—
Kuti ugove muranda wangu kuti ugozarura musiwo weumambo munzvimbo dzose idzo muranda wangu Joseph, uye nemuranda wangu Sidney, nemuranda wangu Hyrum, dzavasingagone kuuya;
Nokuti pavari ndipopandaisa mutoro chechi dzose kwechinguva chakati kuti.
Nokudaro, kwose kwavachakutuma; enda, uye ini ndichave newe; uye nemunzvimbo yose yauchataura izwi rangu, pachazarurwa musiwo wekushanda nawo kwauri, kuti vagashire izwi rangu.
Uyo achagashira izwi rangu anogashira ini, uye uyo anogashira ini, anogashira ivavo, veHutungamiri Hwekutanga, avo vandakatumira, avo vandakaita makurukota pamusoro pangu kwamuri.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwauri, uyo wauchatuma muzita rangu, nezwi rehama dzako, vaneGumi neVaviri, uye vakataurwa vakabvumirwa newe, vachave nesimba rekuzarura musiwo weumambo hwangu kurudzi rwupi zvarwo kwose kwauchavatumira—
Kana vari vanozvininipisa pamberi pangu, uye vachigara muzwi rangu, uye vachiteerera kuzwi reMweya wangu.
Zvirokwazvo zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwauri, rima rakaputira nyika, uye rima rakanyanya kupfungwa dzevanhu, yose nyama yakaora pamberi pechiso changu.

Tarisai, kudzorera kunouya nokukurumidza pavagari vepasi, zuva rehasha, zuva rekupisa, zuva rekuparara, rekuchema, nekugungudzika, uye nokukungura; uye sechamupupuri richauya panyika yose, vanodaro Ishe.
Uye pamba pangu ndopazvichatangira, uye kubva pamba pangu zvichaenda mberi; vanodaro Ishe;
Kutanga pakati peavo vari pakati penyu, vanodaro Ishe, vakapupura kuti vanoziva zita rangu asi vasina kundiziva, uye vakandituka pakati pemba yangu, vanodaro Ishe.
Nokudaro, onai kuti hamuzvinetse pamusoro penyaya dzechechi yangu munzvimbo ino, vanodaro Ishe.
Asi chenesai mwoyo yenyu pamberi pangu; uye imi endai munyika yose, uye muparidzire vhangeri rangu kuchisikwa chose chisati charitambira;
Uye uyo anotenda akabhabhatidzwa achaponeswa uye uyo asingatende, uye akasabhabhatidzwa acharaswa.

Nokuti kwamuri vaneGumi neVaviri, uye neavo, veHutungamiri Hwekutanga, uye vakadomwa pamwechete nemi kuti vave makurukota enyu nekuve vatungamiri venyu, ndikwo kwakapihwa simba rehufundisi uhwu kwemazuva ekupedzisira uye kwenguva yekupedzisira, muri imo mune mukuwo wekuzara kwenguva.
Riri iro simba ramuinaro, maererano neavo vose vakagashira zvenguva, panguva ipi zvayo kubvira pakutangwa kwekusikwa;
Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kiyi dzezvenguva iyoyi, iyo yamagashira, dzakadzika kubva kumadzibaba, uye pekupedzisira, ndokutumirwa kubva kudenga kuuya kwamuri.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, tarisai kukura kwakaita kudaidzwa kwenyu. Sukai mwoyo yenyu uye nenhumbi dzenyu, potse ropa rechizvarwa chino ringazodiwa mumaoko enyu.
Tendekai kudakara ndauya, nokuti ndinouya nokukurumidza; uye mubairo wangu ndinawo kuti ndiripire wose munhu maererano nezvinenge zvakaita basa rake. Ndini Arfa naOmega. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/113.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 113
chapter_summary: 1–6, Muti waJesi, bazi rinobva pauri, uye nedzinza raJesi zvinodudzirwa; 7–10, Vakasara vevakapararira veZioni vane mvumo yehupirisita uye vanodaidzwa kuti vadzokere kuna Ishe.

verses.text: Ndiani weMuti waJesi ari kutaurwa nezvake mundima yekutanga, yechipiri, yechitatu, yechina neyechishanu muchitsauko chegumi neimwechete muna Isaya?
Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe: Ndiye Kristu.
Chii chitanda chirikutaurwa nezvacho mundima yekutanga yechitsauko chegumi neimwechete chaIsaya, chinofanira kuuya chichibva pamuti waJesi chii?
Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe: Muranda ari mumaoko aKristu, ari rumwe rutivi wechizvarwa chaJesi nechaEfraimi, kana wemba yaJosefa, uyo akapihwa simba rakawanda.
Chii chirikunzi mudzi waJesi chirikutaurwa mundima yegumi muchitsauko chegumi neimwechete?
Tarisai, vanodaro Ishe, ndiye wechizvarwa chaJesi, nechaJosefa, zvakare uko kunofanirwa kuve nehupirisita, nemakiyi eumambo, kuve semureza, mukuunganidza vanhu vangu mumazuva ekupedzisira.
Mibvunzo yaElias Higbee: Zvinorevei zviri kutaurwa muna Isaya chitsauko makumi mashanu nembiri, chikamu chekutanga chinoti: Pfeka simba rako, Zioni—uye ndivanani vanhu vaitaurwa kuna Isaya?

Aitaura avo vaizodaidzwa naMwari mumazuva ekupedzisira, avo vachange vaine simba rehupirisita rekuunza zvakare Zioni, nokununurwa kweIsraeri, uye kupfeka simba ravo kupfeka mvumo yehupirisita, uho iyo Zioni ine kodzero kwahuri kuburikidza nedzinza rayo; nokudzokerawo kusimba riya rayakanga yarasa.
Chii chatinonzwisisa kana zvichinzi Zioni izvisunungure majoto ari mumutsipa mayo; ndima yechipiri?

Tinofanira kunzwisisa kuti vakasara vevakapararira vanonyengetedzwa kuti vadzokere kuna Ishe uko kwavakakoromoka vachibva; zvekuti kana vakazviita, chivimbiso chaIshe ndechekuti vachataura kwavari, kana kuvapa zvakazarurwa. Onai ndima yechitanhatu, yechinomwe, neyerusere. Majoto emutsipa wayo kutukwa naMwari kuri paari, kana vakasara veIsraeri mukupararira kwavo pakati pemaJentairi.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/114.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 114
chapter_summary: 1–2, Zvinzvimbo muChechi zvine avo vasingatendeke zvinopihwa kune vamwe.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe: Ungwaru mumuranda wangu David W. Patten, kuti agadzirise basa rake rose nokukurumidza chaizvo, uye agotengesa zvinhu zvake zvose, kuti agondiitira rimwe basa rangu pamatsutso anouya, pamwechete nevamwe, kunyangwe gumi nevaviri pamwechete naiye, kuti vapupure pamusoro pezita rangu uye nekutakura nyaya dzinofadza kupasi rose.
Nokuti zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, kuti sezvo kuine vamwe pakati penyu vanoramba zita rangu, kuchaiswa vamwe munzvimbo dzavo uye vagogashira hubhishopi hwavo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/115.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 115
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ishe vanotumidza chechi yavo kuti Chechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi yaMazuva Ekupedzisira; 5–6, Zioni nehoko dzayo inzvimbo dzekudzivirira uye nedzekuhwanda kweVatendi; 7–16, Vatendi vanorairwa kuti vavake imba yaIshe paFar West; 17–19, Joseph Smith ane kiyi dzeumambo hwaMwari pasi pano.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwauri, muranda wangu Joseph Smith, Mwana, uyewo nekumuranda wangu Sidney Rigdon, uye nemuranda wangu Hyrum Smith, uye nemakurokota enyu varipo uye navadomwa pano mushure;
Uye nekwauriwo, muranda wangu Edward Partridge, uye nemakurukota ake;

Uye nekuvaranda vangu vakatendeka avo vari mudare repamusoro rechechi yangu muZioni, nokuti ndikokudaidzwa kwarichaitwa, uye nekumagosa ose nevanhu veChechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira, vakapararira nenyika;
Nokuti ndikokudaidzwa kuchaitwa chechi yangu mumazuva ekupedzisira, kunyangwe Chechi yaJesu Kristu yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira;
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri mose; Simukai mupenye kuti chiedza chenyu chive mureza wemarudzi;
Uye nekuti kuungana pamwechete munyika yeZioni; nepahoko dzayo zvigova chidziviriro, uye neruchengeto kubva kudutu nekubva kuhasha padzichadirwa dzisina kusanganiswa pamusoro penyika yose.
Regai guta rinonzi Far West, rive dzvene, nyika yakatsaurirwa kwandiri; uye richanzi dzvene kupfuura mamwe, nokuti paumire patsvene.
Naizvozvo, ndinokuraira kuti undivakire imba yekuunganidzira vatendi vangu pamwchete kuti vagondinamata.
Uye ngakuve nokutanga kwebasa iri, uye nehwaro, uye nebasa rekugadzirira, muzhizha rino ririkutevera;
Uye regai kutanga kuitwe muzuva rechina raChikunguru anouya; uye kubvira panguva iyoyo zvichienda mberi vanhu vangu ngavashande neshungu kuti vavake imba muzita rangu;
Uye mushure megore rimwechete kubvira nhasi ngavatange zvakare kuisa hwaro hwemba yangu.
Saka regai kubvira panguva iyoyo vashande neshungu kudakara yapera, kubvira padombo rechitsigiro kusvika kumusoro, kudakara pasisina kana chii zvacho chisina kupera.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, musarege muranda wangu Joseph, kana muranda wangu Sidney, kana muranda wangu Hyrum, vachipinda muzvikwereti zvakare pamusana pekuvakwa kwemba muzita rangu;
Asi regai kuvakwe imba iri muzita rangu maererano nemutowo wandichavaratidza.
Uye kana vanhu vangu vakaivaka zvisiri maererano nemutowo wandicharatidza vatungamiri vavo, handizoibvuma kubva kwavari.
Asi kana vanhu vangu vakaivaka maererano nemutowo wandicharatidza vatungamiri vavo, vanove muranda wangu Joseph nemakurukota ake, ipapo ndinozoibvuma kubva mumaoko evanhu vangu.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, chido changu kuti guta reFar West rinofanira kuvakwa nokukurumidza mukuunganidza vatendi vangu;
Uye nokutiwo dzimwe nzvimbo ngadzidomwe kuitira hoko mumatunhu akatenderedza, sekuratidzwa kwazvichaitwa kumuranda wangu Joseph, nguva nenguva.
Nokuti tarisai, ndichave naye, uye ndichamuchenesa pamberi pevanhu; nokuti kwaari ndapa kiyi dzeumambo huno nebasa. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Spring Hill yakatumidzwa naIshe kunzi Adama-ondi-Amani, nokuti vakati ivo, ndiyoinzvimbo iyo Adama yaachauya kuzoshanyira vanhu vake, kana Vakweguru vaMazuva pavachagara, sekutaurwa kwazvakaitwa nemuporofita Danieri.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/117.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 117
chapter_summary: 1–9, Varanda vaIshe havana kufanira kuchiva zvinhu zvenyika, nokuti “Chii chinonzi midziyo kuna Ishe?”; 10–16, Vanofanira kusiya zvisina maturo, uye mipiro yavo ichave inoera kuna Ishe.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kumuranda wangu William Marks, uye zvakare nekumuranda wangu Newel K. Whitney, ngavagadzirise zvebasa ravo nokukurumidza uye vaende parwendo kubva kunyika yeKirtland, ini Ishe ndisati ndatumira zvakare chando pamusoro penyika.
Ngavamuke, uye vasimuke vauye, uye vasagare nokuti Ini Ishe, ndaraira.
Naizvozvo, vakagara, hazvivanakire.
Regai vatendeuke pazvitadzo zvavo zvose, uye nekuchiva kwavo kwose, pamberi pangu, vanodaro Ishe; nokuti chii chinonzi midziyo kwandiri? vanodaro Ishe.
Zvinhu zviri muKirtland ngazvitengeswe zviripe zvikwereti, vanodaro Ishe. Ngazviende, vanodaro Ishe, uye izvo zvinenge zvasara, ngazvisare zviri mumaoko enyu, vanodaro Ishe.
Ko handina here shiri dzedenga nehove dzegungwa, uye nenhika dzemakomo? Handina kuita nyika here? Handizini here ndakabata upenyu hwemawuto ose emarudzi epasi pano?
Naizvozvo, handingaite here kuti nzvimbo dzakaoma dzibereke dzive nemaruva, uye nokuti dziunze zvakawanda? vanodaro Ishe.
Hamuna nzvimbo yakakwana here mumakomo aAdama-ondi-Amani, uye nemumarenje eOlaha Shineha, kana munyika maigara Adama, kuti muchive izvi zvinove kadonwe, uye muchiregera nyaya dzine chiremerera?
Naizvozvo, uyayi kuno kunyika yevanhu vangu, kunyangwe Zioni.

Regai muranda wangu William Marks ave akatendeka muzvinhu zvishoma, uye anozove mutongi wezvizhinji. Ngaatungamire ari pakati pevanhu vangu muguta reFar West, uye murege aropafadzwe nemaropafadzo evanhu vangu.

Regai muranda wangu Newel K. Whitney anyare nezveboka reNikorayatini zvose zvavanoita muchivande zvinonyangadza nezvisina maturo pamberi pangu, vanodaro Ishe, uye auye kunyika yeAdama-ondi-Amani, uye ave bhishopi wevanhu vangu, vanodaro Ishe, kwete muzita asi muzviito, vanodaro Ishe.

Uye zvakare ndinoti kwamuri, ndinorangarira muranda wangu Oliver Granger; tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwaari zita rake richarangarirwa serinoyera muzvizvarwa nezvizvarwa, nariini nariini, vanodaro Ishe.

Naizvozvo ngaarwise zvakasimba nezve rununuro rweHutungamiri hweKutanga hweChechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe. Uye kana akapunzika achasimuka zvakare, nokuti mupiro wake uchave unoyera zvikuru kwandiri, kupinda rugare rwake, vanodaro Ishe.
Naizvozvo, regai auye nokukurumidza, kunyika yeZioni; uye nenguva yakafanira achaitwa mutengesi muzita rangu, vanodaro Ishe, kuyamura vanhu vangu.
Naizvozvo hakuna munhu anofanira kushora muranda wangu Oliver Granger, asi regai maropafadzo evanhu vangu ave paari nariini nariini.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai varanda vangu vose vari munyika yeKirtland varangarire Ishe Mwari vavo, uye nemba yanguwo, kuti tarire uye nekuichengetedza iri tsvene, uye nokutandanisa vanochinja mari munguva yangu, vanodaro Ishe. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/118.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 118
chapter_summary: 1–3, Ishe vachariritira mhuri dzevaneGumi neVaviri; 4–6, Nzvimbo dzisina vanhu mune vaneGumi neVaviri dzinozadziswa.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe: Ngakuitwe muchechi izvozvi, vaneGumi neVaviri ngavarongwe; uye ngakudomwe vanhu vanotora nzvimbo dzeavo vakapunzika.
Regai muranda wangu Thomas ambogara kwechinguva munyika yeZioni, kuti ashambadze izwi rangu.

Regai avo vakasara varambe vachiparidza kubvira panguva iyoyo, uye kana vakaita izvi mukurereka chaiko kwemwoyo, muhunyoro uye nomukuzvininipisa, uye nemwoyo murefu, Ini Ishe, ndinopa kwavari chivimbiso chekuti ndichariritira mhuri dzavo; uye musiwo unoshanda vachauzarurirwa kubvira zvino.
Uye mwaka unouya ngavabve vaende mhiri kwemvura huru, uye ikoko vasvikotaura vhangeri rangu, kuzara kwaro, uye nokupupura pamusoro pezita rangu.
Regai vaende kunowoneka vatendi vangu vari muguta reFar West, muzuva rechimakumi maviri nenhanhatu remwedzi waKubvumbi panzvimbo apo pachavakwa imba yangu, vanodaro Ishe.

Regai muranda wangu John Taylor, uyewo nemuranda wangu John E. Page, uyewo nemuranda wangu Wilford Woodruff, uyewo nemuranda wangu Willard Richards, vadomwe kuti vatore nzvimbo dzeavo vakapunzika, uye vagoziviswa zviri pamutemo kuti vadomwa.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/119.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 119
chapter_summary: 1–5, Vatendi vanofanira kubhadhara zvinhu zvavo zvavanosiya uye vagozopa, sechegumi, chikamu chimwechete mugumi mune zvavanowana pagore; 6–7, Kuita ikoko kuno chenesa nyika yeZioni.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe, ndinoda zvinhu zvavo zvavanosiya zvose zviiswe mumaoko abhishopi wechechi yangu muZioni,
Kuti kuvakwe imba yangu, uye nekuisa hwaro hweZioni uye nehufundisi, uye nezvikwereti zveHutungamiri hweChechi yangu.
Uye uku ndikokuchave kutanga kwekubvisiswa chegumi kwevanhu vangu.

Uye mushure mezvo, avo vanenge vanzi vabvise chegumi vachabvisa chikamu chimwechete mugumi chezvavanowana pagore; uye uyu uchave mutemo wakamiswa kwavari nariini, kuitira hupirisita hwangu hutsvene, vanodaro Ishe.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvichaitika kuti vose avo vanoungana munyika yeZioni vachabvisiswa chegumi pane zvinosara zvemidziyo yavo, uye vachacherechedza mutemo uyu, kana kuti havazowanikwa vakakodzera kugara pakati penyu.

Uye ndinoti kwamuri, kana vanhu vangu vasingacherechedze mutemo uyu, kuuchengeta uri mutsvene, uye kuti nemutemo uyu vachenese nyika yeZioni kwandiri, kuti mirau yangu uye nekutonga kwangu kuchengetedzwe, kuti ive tsvene chaizvo, tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, haingave nyika yeZioni kwamuri.
Uye izvi zvichave mufananidzo kuhoko dzose dzeZioni. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Zvirokwazvo, vanodaro Ishe, nguva yasvika zvino, kuti zvichatengeswa nedare, rine Hutungamiri Hwekutanga hweChechi yangu, uye nerabhishopi nedare rake, uye nedare rangu repamusoro; uye nezwi rangu kwavari, vanodaro Ishe. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/121.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 121
chapter_summary: 1–6, Muporofita anochema kuna Ishe pamusoro pekutambudzika kweVatendi; 7–10, Ishe vanotaura runyararo kwaari; 11–17, Vakatukwa avo vose vanodaidzira nhema nokutadza pamusoro pevanhu vaIshe; 18–25, Havawane kodzero kuhupirisita uye vachatongwa; 26–32, Zvakazarurwa zvinoshamisa zvakavimbiswa avo vachashingirira vasina kutya; 33–40, Sei vazhinji vachidaidzwa uye vashoma vachisarudzwa; 41–46, Hupirisita hunofanira kushandiswa chete mukururama.

verses.text: Mwari, muri kupi? Iripi tende yekufukidza panzvimbo penyu pekuhwanda?

Ruoko rwenyu rwuchamira kusvika riini, neziso renyu, hongu ziso renyu rakachena, muchaona kubva kumatenga okusingaperi kutadzirwa kwevanhu venyu nokwevaranda venyu, uye nzeve yenyu igopindwa nekuchema kwavo?
Hongu, Ishe vachabvumira kusvika riini kutadza uku nokudzvinyirira kusiri pamutemo, mwoyo wenyu usati wapfava kwavari, uye ura hwenyu hugo fambiswa netsitsi kwavari?

Ishe Mwari Samasimba, musiki vedenga, nyika nemakungwa, nezvozvose zviri mazviri, munodzora nokuisa dhiabhorosi pasi penyu, nenzvimbo yerima inonzi Sheol—tambanudzai ruoko rwenyu; regai ziso renyu ribaye; itai kuti chituko chenyu chisumudzwe; itai kuti nzvimbo yenyu yekuhwanda isafukidzwe; itai kuti nzeve yenyu irerekere; itai kuti mwoyo wenyu upfaviswe uye hura hwenyu hufambiswe pamusana pedu.
Regai hasha dzenyu dzitungidzirwe vavengi vedu; uye mukushatirwa kwemwoyo wenyu, nemunondo wenyu mutitsividzire zvatakatadzirwa.
Rangarirai vatendi venyu vari kutambudzwa, Mwari vedu; uye varanda venyu vachafara muzita renyu nariini.
Mwanakomana wangu, runyararo ngaruve kumweya wako; matambudziko ako nemarwadzo ako zvichave kwechinguva chidiki;
Uye zvino, kana ukashingaira mazviri zvakanaka, Mwari vachakusimudzira pamusoro; iwe uchakunda vose vavengi vako.
Shamwari dzako dzinomira newe, uye vachakukwazisa zvakare nemwoyo yerudo nemaoko ehushamwari.
Iwe hausati waita saJobo; shamwari dzako hadzinetsane newe, kana kukupomera mhosva yekutadza, sezvavakaita Jobo.
Uye avo vanokupomera kutadza, zvavanofungira zvichaparadzwa, nezvavanotarisira zvichanyangadika sezvinoita chando chiri kupiswa nezuva ririkubuda;

Uye nokutiwo Mwari vaisa ruoko rwavo nechisimbiso kuti vashandure nguva nemwaka, nokupofomadza pfungwa dzavo, kuti vasanzwisise kushanda kwavo kunoshamisa kuti vagovayedzavo nokuvabata muhunyengedzi hwavo;
Nokutiwo mwoyo yavo yakaora, uye zvinhu zvavanoda kuti vazviunze kune vamwe, uye vachida kuti vamwe vatambudzike, zvingangouya kwavari zvakazarisisa chaizvo;
Kuti vagogumburwawo, uye nezvavanenge vakatarisira zvigoparadzwa;
Uye hakuna makore mazhinji kubva zvino, kuti ivo nezvizvarwa zvavo vatsvairwe kubva pasi pedenga, vanodaro Mwari, kuti hakuna kana mumwechete wavo anosara akamira nemadziro.

Kutukwa kune avo vose vanopikisana nevakazodzwa vangu, vanodaro Ishe, uye vachidaidzira kuti vatadza ivo vasina kutadza pamberi pangu, vanodaro Ishe, asi vakaita icho chakanaka kumaziso angu, uye chiri chandakaraira kwavari.
Asi avo vanodaidzira kutadza vanozviita nokuti ndivovaranda vechitadzo, uye vana vekusateerera ivo pachavo.
Uye avo vanopika vachinyepa pamusoro pevaranda vangu, kuti vavaunze muhusungwa nemurufu—
Nhamo kwavari; nokuti vatadzira vadiki vangu vachabviswa muzvisungo zvemba yangu.
Tswanda yavo haizozara, dzimba dzavo nematura avo zvichaparara, uye ivo pachavo vachashorwa neavo vaivarumbidza zvekuvafadza.
Havachazova nekodzero kuhupirisita, kana vana vavo mushure mavo, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kuchizvarwa.
Zvaive nani kwavari kuti dai guyo rakakochekerwa mumitsipa yavo, uye vakanyura muhudzamu hwegungwa.
Nhamo kune avo vose vanotadzisa kugadzikana kwevanhu vangu, vanovatamisa, vanovaponda uye nokupupura pamusoro pavo, vanodaro Ishe veHondo; chizvarwa chenyoka hachizopunyuka kutongwa kwegehena.
Tarisai, maziso angu anoona nokuziva mabasa avo ose, uye ndakachengeta kutongwa kunokurumbidza panguva yacho, kwavari vose;
Nokuti kune nguva yakadomerwa wose munhu, maererano nezvichange zvakaita mabasa ake.
Mwari vachapa kwamuri ruzivo kuburikidza neMweya Mutsvene wavo, hongu, kuburikidza nechipo chisingataurike cheMweya Mutsvene, chisina kumbenge chakaratidzwa kubvira nyika payakavepo kusvika zvino;

Icho chakamirirwa nemadzitateguru edu, vachitarisira nokushushikana kuti chiratidzwe munguva dzekupedzisira, idzo dzakanongedzerwa pfungwa dzavo nengirozi, zvichinzi zvakachengeterwa kubwinya kwavo kuzere;
Nguva ichauya iyo isina chinovanzwa, kana dai paina Mwari mumwechete kana vamwari vakawanda, zvichabuda pachena.
Zvose zvigaro nehutongi, nyika dzinotongwa nevana vamambo, uye nemasimba, zvicharatidzwa uye zvigotsanangurwa kune avo vose vakashingirira pasina kutya pavhangeri raJesu Kristu.
Uyewo, kana paine miganhu yakamiswa kumatenga kana kumakungwa, kana kunyika hukutu, kana kuzuva, mwedzi, kana nyenyedzi—

Nguva dzose dzekutenderera kwazvo, mumazuva ose akadomwa, nemwedzi, nemakore, uye ose mazuva emazuva azvo, mwedzi, makore, uye nokubwinya kwazvo kwose, nemitemo, uye nenguva dzakatarwa, zvicharatidzwa mumazuva emukuwo wekuzara kwenguva—

Maererano neicho chakamiswa pakati peDare raMwari Vokusingaperi wevamwari vamwe vose nyika ino isati yavepo, chakafanira kuchengeterwa kunatsira uye nekupera kwacho, apo wose munhu achapinda pamberi pake pokusingaperi uye muzororo rake rekusafa.

Mvura inoerera icharamba isina kuchena kusvika riini? Isimba ripi ringadzivirire matenga? Zvingaite semunhu anoisa kaoko kake kasina simba kudzivirira rwizi rweMissouri kuti rwusaerere nenzira yarwo yakatemwa, kana kurwuita kuti rwudzokere shure, kuda kurambidza Samasimba kuti adire ruzivo kubva kudenga, pamisoro yaVatendi vaMazuva Ekupedzisira.
Tarisai, kune vazhinji vanodaidzwa, asi vashoma vanosarudzwa. Uye sei vasingasarudzwe?
Nokuti mwoyo yavo yakatarisa zvakanyanya pazvinhu zvenyika ino, uye vachivavarira kukudzwa navanhu zvekuti havadzidze chidzidzo chimwechete ichi—
Kuti kodzero dzehupirisita dzakabatana zvisingapatsanurwe nemasimba edenga, uye kuti masimba edenga haangagone kushandiswa kana kubatwa kunze chete kwezviri maererano nemitemo yeururami.

Kuti dzinogona kupihwa patiri, ichokwadi; asi kana tave kuita zvekuvanza zvitadzo zvedu, kana kugutsa kuzvida kwedu, zvatinoda zvisina maturo, kana kuda kubata kana kutonga kana kumanikidza pamweya yevana vevanhu, mukusarurama kupi zvako, tarisai, matenga anosuduruka; Mweya waIshe unosuwiswa; uye kana wabviswa, Ameni kuhupirisita kana kumvumo yemunhu iyeyo.
Tairasi, asati aziva, anosiiwa ari ega pachake, kuti arwisane neminzwa, nokunetsa vatendi, uye nokurwisana naMwari.
Tadzidza nezvatawona zvinosuwisa kuti magariro nokuita tingangoti kwevanhu vose, vakangowana kasimba kadiki-diki chete, sekufunga kwavo, vanobva vatanga ipapo kuita nokutonga zvisina kururama.
Saka kunodaidzwa vazhinji, asi vashoma ndivo vanosarudzwa.
Hakuna simba kana hurudziro ingaitwe kana kuchengetedzwa nekuda kwehupirisita kunze kwekunyengerera, mwoyo murefu, nehunyoro nekuzvininipisa nerudo rusina kunyengedza;
Nemwoyochena, neruzivo rwakachena,urwo rwuchakudza mweya zvikuru pasina kunyepera, uye pasina kunyengedza—
Muchitsiura pakarepo zvakasimba, kana mafemerwa neMweya Mutsvene; uye muchizoratidza mushure mezvo rudo rwakawedzerwa kune uyo wamatsiura, potse angazokutorai semuvengi wake;
Kuti agoziva kuti kutendeka kwenyu kwakasimba kupfuura tambo dzerufu.

Regai hura hwenyu huzare nerudo rwakadzama kuvanhu vose, nekuimba yerutendo, uye murege hunhu hushongedze pfungwa dzenyu zvisingapere; zvino ruvimbo rwenyu rwuchasimba pamberi paMwari; uye dzidziso yehupirisita ichawira pamweya yenyu sedova rinobva kudenga.

Mweya Mutsvene uchave mumwe wako nguva dzose, uye tsvimbo yako yekutonga ichave tsvimbo yekutonga isingapinduke yekururama nechokwadi; uye umambo hwako huchave umambo husingaperi, uye pasina zvekumanikidzwa, huchauya kwauri kusvika nariini nariini.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/122.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 122
chapter_summary: 1–4, Mativi ose enyika achabvunza nezvezita raJoseph Smith; 5–7, Njodzi dzose dzake nekutambudzika kwose kuchamupa ruzivo uye kuchave chinhu chakanaka kwaari; 8–9, Mwanakomana wemunhu akadzika pasi pazvo zvose.

verses.text: Mativi epasi achabvunza nezvezita rako, uye mafuza achakuseka, uye gehena richakurwisa;
Apo vakachena mumwoyo, uye nevakangwara, nevanoremekedzwa, nevakanaka, vachatsvaka kurairwa, nemvumo, nemaropafadzo nguva dzose kubva pasi peruoko rwako.
Uye vanhu vako havafe vakakupandukira pamusana peuchapupu hwevatengesi.

Uye kana zvazvo mabasa avo achakupinza mumatambudziko mumajeri uchakudzwa; inguva pfupi asi kechinguva chakati izwi rako richatyisa pakati pevavengi vako kupfuura shumba inotyisa, pamusana pekururama kwako; uye Mwari vako achamira newe nariini nariini.
Kana zvichidiwa kuti upfuure nemumatambudziko, kana uri munjodzi pakati pavanonyepera kuve hama; kana uri munjodzi pakati pemakororo; kana uri munjodzi munyika kana mugungwa;

Kana uchipihwa mhosva yose yekukupomera nhema; kana vavengi vako vakakurwisa; kana vakakutora kubva mumhuri yababa naamai vako nekuvakoma nehanzvadzi dzako; uye kana nemunondo vavengi vako vakakutovisa pachipfuva chemudzimai wako, uye nechevana vako, uye mwanakomana wako mukuru, kana dai ari ane makore matanhatu ekuberekwa achabatirira panhumbi dzako, uye achati, Baba vangu, Baba vangu, sei musingagone kugara nesu? Baba vangu, varume ava vachaitei nemi? Uye kana akabviswa pauri nemunondo uye iwe wozvuzvurudzwa kuenda kutirongo, uye vavengi vako vachatenderera pauri semhumhi dzakamirira ropa regwayana;

Uye kana ukakandwa mugomba kana mumaoko emhondi, kana ukatongerwa rufu; kana ukakandwa makadzika kana masaisai anoshinyira akakurongera kurwisana newe; kana mhepo dzinotyisa dzikave mhandu dzako; kana matenga akaunganidza kusviba, uye zviumbiswa zvikabatana kusosa; pamusoro pazvo zvose, kana dai shaya chaidzo dzegehena dzikashama muromo kutsvaka iwe, ziva mwanangu, kuti zvose zvinhu izvi zvichakupa zivo, uye zvakanaka kwauri.
Mwanakomana weMunhu vakadzika pasi pazvo zvose. Uri mukuru kupfuura iye here?

Nokudaro, ramba wakabatirira munzira yako, uye hupirisita hucharamba huinewe; nokuti miganhu yavo yakaiswa, havakwanise kupfuura. Mazuva ako anozivikanwa, uye makore ako, haazoitwe mashoma; nokudaro, usatye zvingaitwe nemunhu, nokuti Mwari vachazove newe nariini nariini.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/123.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 123
chapter_summary: 1–6, Vatendi vanofanira kuunganidza uye vagoshambadza nhoroondo yekutambudzika kwavo nekushungurudzwa kwavo; 7–10, Iwoyo mweya mumwechetewo wakamisa zvitendero zvekunyepa unokonzera zvakare kushungurudzwa kwevatendi; 11–17, Vazhinji mukati mezvikwata zvose vachagashira chokwadi.

verses.text: Uye zvakare, tinokurudzira kuti mumbofunga kuti vatendi vose vaunganidze ruzivo rwezvechokwadi nokutambudzika nokutukwa kwakaiswa pavari nevanhu veDunhu rino;
Uye zvakare nemidziyo zvose nekukura kwekukuvadzwa kwavakaitwa, zvose zvekukuvadzwa hunhu nezvekukuvadzwa chaiko, nezvinhu chaizvo;
Uye zvakare nemazita evanhu vose avo vakabatsira mukudzvinyirirwa kwavo, avo vose vavanokwanisa kuwana nokuvanongedzera.
Uye zvimwe kungasarudzwe dare rekutsvaga zvinhu izvi, uye nokutora mazwi nemagwaro eruvimbiso; nokuunganidza magwaro ane nhema akashambadzwa ayo ari muvanhu;

Uye neose ari mumapepanhau, nemumabhuku eruzivo, uye nenhoroondo dzose dzine nhema dzakashambadzwa, neavo vakadzinyora, uye muise zvose zveunhubu hwadhiabhorosi nokuipa nehumhondi uhwo hwakaitwa pavanhu ava—

Kuti tisangozvishambadza kupasi rose chete, asi kuti tizivise kuvakuru vehurumende mukusviba kwazvo kwose nemavara azvo egehena, sechinhu chekupedzisira chatakanzi naBaba vedu Vekudenga tiedze, tisati takwanisa kugashira zvakakwana uye zvizere icho chivimbiso chichavadaidza kuti vachibuda kubva panzvimbo yavo yekuhwanda, uye nokuti rudzi rwose rwuwanikwe rwusina chekutaura vasati vatumira simba guru reruoko rwavo.

Ibasa ratinosungirwa kuitira kuna Mwari, kungirozi, idzo dzatichaita kunzi timire nadzo pamwechete, nekwatiri pachedu, kuvakadzi nevana vedu, avo vakaitwa kuti vakotame pamusana pekuchema, kusuwa, nehanya, pasi peruoko rwakawomesesa rwekuponda, hudzvinyiriri, nokubatwa zvakaipa, vachitsigirwa nokukuridzirwa nokusimudzirwa nokuita kwemweya uya uyo wakasimbisa zvikuru zvitendero zvemadzibaba, avo vakagara nhaka yekureva nhema, vachiisa mumwoyo yevana, uye zvange zvichizadza nyika nekukangaidzika, uye zvange zvichiramba zvichisimba, uye zvino zvave ndiwo musimboti weuori hwose, uye pasi rose ririkugomera nokuremerwa nezvitema zvawo.
Ijoko resimbi, ibhande rakasimba; ndidzo chaidzo simbi dzemumaoko, nesimbi dzemumakumbo, misungo yegehena.
Ibasa ratinosungirwa kuita, kwete chete kuvakadzi vedu nevana vedu pachedu, asi kune chirikadzi nevasina ana baba, avo vane varume naanababa vakapondwa pasi peruoko rwayo rwesimbi;
Kuita uku kwerima kunosvibisa zvekuti kana gehena pacharo rinotya nako, uye rinomira nokutya nokushamiswa, uye maoko adhiabhorosi chaiye agodedera nokubvunda.
Uye zvakare ibasa ratinosungirwa kuitira zvose zvizvarwa zviri kukura nekune vose vakachena mumwoyo—

Nokuti kuchine vazhinji vari munyika mukati memapoka ose, zvikwata, nedzisvondo, vakapofomadzwa nekunyengedza kwakavanda kwevanhu, kwavanohwanda nako vakamirira kunyengedza, uye vanoshaiswa chokwadi chete nekuti havazive kwekuchiwana—
Kuti tiparadze nokupedza upenyu hwedu mukuunza muchiedza zvose zvinhu zvakavandika zverima, semaziviro atinozviita; uye zvakaratidzwa chokwadi kubva kudenga—
Izvi zvinofanira kuitwa nokuzvipira kukuru.
Hapana munhu akafanira kuzvitora sezvinhu zvidiki nokuti kune zvizhinji zviri munguva ichauya zviri maererano nevatendi, zvinotarisirwa kuzvinhu izvi.
Munoziva hama kuti ngarava huru kwazvo inoyamurwa nechityairiso chengarara chidiki-diki munguva dzedutu, nokunangiswa kumhepo nemasaisai.

Naizvozvo, hama dzinodiwa zvikuru, ngatiite zvose zvinhu takafara izvo zviri musimba redu; uye kana tadaro tozomira, tiine chokwadi chizere, chokuona ruponeso rwaMwari, uye kuti ruoko rwavo rwugoratidzwa.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/124.title: Dzidziso neZvibvumirano 124
chapter_summary: 1–14, Joseph Smith anorairwa kuti aite chirevo chakakosha chevhangeri kumutungamiri wenyika yeUnited States of America, kumagavhuna, nevatongi vemarudzi ose; 15–21, Hyrum Smith, David W. Patten, Joseph Smith, Baba, nevamwe pakati pevapenyu nevakafa vanoropafadzwa pamusana pekuzvibata kwavo nokunaka kwavo; 22–28, Vatendi vanorairwa kuti vavake imba yevayeni netemberi muNauvoo; 29–36, Kubhabhatidzwa kwevakafa kunoitirwa mumatemberi; 37–44, Vanhu vaIshe nguva dzose vanovaka matemberi kuti muitirwe zvisungo zvitsvene; 45–55, Vatendi vanonzi havana mhosva kana vakasavaka temberi muRuwa rweJackson pamusana pekudzvinyirirwa nevavengi vavo; 56–83, Vanopihwa zvekuita kuti vavake Imba yeNauvoo; 84–96, Hyrum Smith anodaidzwa kuti ave patiriyaki, kuti atambire makiyi acho, uye kuti amire munzvimbo yaOliver Cowdery; 97–122, William Law nevamwe vanoraiwa mumabasa avo; 123–145, Vakuru vechechi yose nevakuru vemakungano vanotaurwa, pamwechete nemabasa avo nezvikwata zvavari.

verses.text: Zvirokwazvo vanodaro Ishe kwauri, muranda wangu Joseph Smith, ndinofadzwa chaizvo nemipiro nekutenda kwako, iko kwawaita; nokuti nechinangwa ichocho ndakakumutsa, kuti ndiratidze ungwaru hwangu kuburikidza nemuzvihu zvepasi zvisina simba.

Minamato yako inobvumwa pamberi pangu, uye mukuipindura ndinoti kwauri, uri kudaidzwa izvozvi uite chirevo chakakosha pamusoro pevhangeri rangu, nehoko ino yandadzika kuti rive dombo remhandiko neZioni, uye richakwenenzverwa nokutsveneswa uko kwakafanana nemuzinda wamambo.

Chirevo ichi, chichaitwa kumadzimambo ose epasi, kumativi mana enyika, kune anokudzwa mutungamiri ari kuzogadzwa, nemagavhuna anoremekedzwa erudzi rwamugere marwuri, nekumarudzi ose epasi akapararira kwose kwose.
Ngachinyorwe mumweya une hunyoro nesimba reMweya Mutsvene, iro richave mauri panguva yekunyorwa kwacho;
Nokuti zvichapihwa kwauri nemweya Mutsvene kuti uzive chido changu pamusoro pemadzimambo acho nevamwe vatongi, kunyangwe izvo zvichavawira munguva ichauya.
Nokuti, tarisai ndave pedyo nokuti ndivadaidze kuti vateerere kuchiedza nokubwinya kweZioni, nokuti nguva yakatarwa yasvika yokuiitira zvakanaka.

Daidzirai imi, nokudaro, kwavari nezwi guru, neuchapupu hwenyu, musingavatye, nokuti vakaita sehuswa, uye nokubwinya kwavo kose sekweruva racho iro risingatane kudonha, kuti naivowo vasare vasina chikonzero—

Uye kuti ndigovashanyira muzuva rekutongwa, apo pandichafugura kumeso kwangu, kuti ndigopa mudzvinyiriri nzvimbo pakati pevanyengedzi, apo pane kugeda-geda kwemeno, kana vakaramba varanda vangu neuchapupu hwangu uhwo hwandakaratidza kwavari.

Uye zvakare, ndichavashanyira ndigopfavisa mwoyo yavo, vazhinji vavo kuitira iwe, kuti ugowana nyasha mumaziso avo, kuti vagouya kuchiedza chechokwadi, uye maJentairi vagosimudzira kana kukwidziridza Zioni.
Nokuti zuva rekutonga kwangu rinouya nokukurumidza, munguva yamusingafungire; kudzivirirwa kwevanhu vangu kuchavepi, uye nepekuhwanda kweavo vachasara vavo?
Mukai, madzimambo epasi! Uyai imi, uyayi imi, negoridhe nesirivha yenyu, kuruyamuro rwevanhu vangu, kumba yevanasikana veZioni.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, rega muranda wangu Robert B. Thompson akuyamure kunyora chirevo ichi, nokuti ini ndinofadzwa naye, uye nokuti ave newe;
Nokudaro, ngaateerere kuraira kwako, uye ini ndichamuropafadza nemaropafadzo akawanda; ngaave akatendeka nokuve nechokwadi muzvinhu zvose kubvira zvino, uye achave mukuru mumaziso angu;
Asi ngaarangarire kuti hutariri hwake ndinohuda kubva kwaari.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, akaropafadzwa muranda wangu Hyrum Smith; nokuti ini Ishe ndinomuda pamusana pekuvimbika kwemwoyo wake, uye nokuti anoda icho chakanaka pamberi pangu, vanodaro Ishe.

Zvakare, regai muranda wangu John C. Bennett akuyamure mukushanda kwako mukutumira izwi rangu kumadzimambo nevanhu vepasi, uye agomira newe, kunyangwe iwe muranda wangu Joseph Smith, munguva yekutambudzwa; uye mubairo wake hauzotadza kana akagashira kurairwa.

Uye pamusana perudo rwake achave mukuru, nokuti achave wangu kana akaita izvi vanodaro Ishe. Ndakaona basa raakaita, iro randinogashira kana akaramba achiriita, uye ndichamupfekedza korona yemaropafadzo nokubwinya kukuru.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwauri chido changu kuti muranda wangu Lyman Wight arambe achiparidza kuZioni, mumweya wekuzvirereka, achindipupura pamberi penyika; uye ini ndichamutakura sepamapapiro egondo; uye achabereka kubwinya norukudzo kwaari iye uye nokuzita rangu.

Kuti kana paachapedza basa rake, ndingazomutambira kwandiri, kunyangwe zvandakaita muranda wangu David Patten, uyo aneni panguva ino, uyewo nemuranda wangu Edward Partridge, uye nemuranda wangu akwegura Joseph Smith, Baba, uyo agere naAbrahama kuruoko rwake rwerudyi, uye akaropafadzwa uye ari mutsvene, nokuti ndewangu.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwauri, muranda wangu George Miller haana hunyengedzi; anovimbika naye pamusana pekuvimbika kwemwoyo wake, uye pamusana perudo rwaainarwo kuuchapupu hwangu, ini Ishe ndinomuda.

Naizvozvo ndinoti kwauri, ndinogadza paari chinzvimbo chehubhishopi, sezvakaita muranda wangu Edward Partridge, kuti agogashira zvakatsaurwa zvemba yangu, kuti agopa maropafadzo pamusoro peavo varombo vevanhu vangu, vanodaro Ishe. Hapana munhu anofanira kushora muranda wangu George, nokuti achandikudza.

Regai muranda wangu George, nemuranda wangu Lyman nemuranda wangu John Snider, nevamwe, vandivakire imba iri muzita rangu, yakaita seiyo muranda wangu Joseph achavaratidza, nepanzvimbo yekuvakira paachavaratidza zvakare.

Uye ichave imba yekugara, imba yekuti vayeni vanobva kure vanozogara imomo; nokudaro ngaive imba yakanaka, yakakodzera zvose zvairi, kuti uyo mufambi aneta agowana hutano nekusatya paanenge achifunga nezvezwi raIshe; nedombo remhandiko randakasarudzira Zioni.

Imba iyi ichave nzvimbo yekugara inehutano kana ikave inovakirwa kuzita rangu, uye kana gavhuna achadomwa akasabvumira kusvibiswa kuti kuuye pairi. Ichave tsvene, nokuti Ishe Mwari vako havangazogara mairi.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai vatendi vangu vose vabve kure.

Uye tumirai vatumwa vanokurumidza, hongu, vatumwa vakasarudzwa, uye moti kwavari: huyai imi, negoridhe renyu rose, nesirivha yenyu, nematombo anokosha enyu, nezvose zvenyu zvekare zvinokosha; neavo vose vane ruzivo nezvekare, avo vanoda kuuya, vangauye, uye vauye nemiti yemisaipurasi, nemifiri, nemupaini, pamwechete nemiti yose inokosha yepasi;
Uye nesimbi, nemhangura, nemusanganiswa wemhangura pamwe nezenge uye nezenge pachayo, nezvose zvinhu zvenyu zvinokosha zvepasi; uye movaka imba muzita rangu, kuti Iyeyo wepamusoro soro agogaramo.
Nokuti hapana imwe nzvimbo panyika kwaangauye kuti adzorere zvakare icho chamakarasikirwa nacho, kana icho chaakakutorerai, kunyangwe kuzara kwehupirisita.
Nokuti hapana chidziva chekubhabhatidzira, kuti ivo, vatendi vangu vagobhabhatidzirwa avo vakafa—
Nokuti chisungo ndechemumba mangu, uye hachingagashirwe neni, kunze chete kwemumazuva ehurombo hwenyu, umo mamunenge musingagone kundivakira imba.
Asi ndinokurairai, mose vatendi vangu, kuti muvake imba kwandiri; uye ndinokupai nguva yakakwana kuti muvake imba kwandiri; uye munguva iyi rubhabhatidzo rwenyu rwuchagashirwa kwandiri.

Asi tarisai, mushure menguva iyi kubhabhatidzirwa kwenyu kwevakafa hakuzogashirwa neni; uye kana mukasaita zvinhu izvi pakupera kwenguva iyi mucharambwa sechechi, nevakafa venyu, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.

Nokuti zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, mushure mekunge mawana nguva yakakwana yekuvaka imba kwandiri, umo munove ndimo mekubhabhatidzira vakafa, uye iyo yakagara yakagadzirirwa zvimwechetezvo kubvira pahwaro hwenyika husati hwavepo, rubhabhatidzo rwenyu rwevakafa venyu harungabvumwe neni;
Nokuti mairi ndimomakaiswa kiyi dzehupirisita hutsvene, kuti mugogashira rukudzo nokubwinya.
Uye mushure menguva iyi, rubhabhatidzo rwenyu rwevakafa, neavo vakapararira kure, harubvumwe neni, vanodaro Ishe.
Nokuti zvakaitwa kuti muZioni, nemuhoko dzayo, nemuJerusarema, idzo nzvimbo dzandakadoma sedzekupotera, ndidzo dzichave nzvimbo dzenyu dzekubhabhatidzirwa vakafa venyu.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kugezwa kwenyu kuchagashirwa neni sei, kunze kwekunge makuitira mumba yamunenge mavakira kwandiri?

Nokuti, pamusana pechikonzero ichi ndakaraira Mosesi kuti avake tabernakeri, kuti vagoitakura murenje uye nokuvaka imba munyika yechipikirwa, kuti izvo zvisungo zvigoratidzwa izvo zvange zvakavigwa kubvira nyika isati yavepo.

Naizvozvo, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kuti kuzodzwa kwenyu, nokugezwa kwenyu, nokubhabhatidzwa kwenyu kwevakafa, nemagungano enyu anoyera nokurangarira kwenyu mipiro yenyu nevanakomana vaRevi, nezvakazarurwa zvenyu munzvimbo dzenyu dzakanyanya kuvatsvene umo mamunogashira zvamunotaurirwa, nemitemo yenyu nokutongwa, kuri kutanga kwezvakazarurwa nehwaro hweZioni, nokubwinya, nekukudzwa neendawumenti kwenhengo dzayo dzose, dzinogadzwa nezvisungo zvemumba yangu tsvene, iyo inogara vanhu vangu vanogara vachirairwa kuti vavake kuzita rangu dzvene.
Uye zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai imba iyi ivakwe muzita rangu, kuti ndigoratidza zvisungo zvangu imomo kuvanhu vangu;
Nokuti ndinoona zvakafanira kuti ndiratidze kuchechi yangu zvinhu zvagara zvakavigwa kubvira hwaro hwenyika husati hwavepo, zvinhu zviri maererano nemazuva ekuzara kwenguva.
Uye ndicharatidza kumuranda wangu Joseph zvose zviri maererano nemba iyi, uye nehupirisita hwacho, uye nepanzvimbo paichavakirwa.
Uye imi muchaivaka panzvimbo yamuri kufunga kuivakira, nokuti ndiyoyandasarudza kuti imi muivakire.
Kana mukashanda nesimba renyu rose, ndichatsaura nzvimbo iyoyo kuti iitwe tsvene.
Uye kana vanhu vangu vakateerera kuzwi rangu, nekuzwi revaranda vangu avo vandakadoma kuti vatungamire vanhu vangu, tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, havazobviswa munzvimbo yavo.

Asi kana vakasateerera kuizwi rangu, kana kuizwi revarume ava vandakadoma, havachazoropafadzwa, nokuti vanosvibisa nzvimbo dzangu tsvene, nezvisungo zvangu zvitsvene, nemabumbiro, uye mazwi angu matsvene ayo andinovapa.

Uye zvichaitika kuti kana mukavaka imba kuzita rangu, uye mogorega kuita zvinhu zvandinotaura, handizoita chitsidzo chandiri kuita kwamuri, kana kuzadzisa zvivimbiso zvamakatarisira paruoko rwangu, vanodaro Ishe.

Nokuti kunze kwemaropafadzo, imi nemabasa enyu, munounza kutukwa, hasha, kugumbuka, nokutongwa pamisoro yenyu, pamusana pehurema hwenyu, nezvose zvinosemesa, izvo zvamunoita pamberi pangu vanodaro Ishe.

Zvirokwazvo, zvirokwazvo, ndinoti kwamuri, kana ndapa murairo kune vapi zvavo vanakomana vevanhu kuti vaite basa muzita rangu, uye ivavo vana vevanhu vakaenda nesimba ravo rose nezvavainazvo zvose kunoita basa iroro, uye vasarege kushingaira kwavo, uye vavengi vakauya vakavarwisa vachivakanganisa mukuita basa ravo, tarisai, zvakafanira kuti ndisarambe ndichida basa iri kubva mumaoko evanakomana vevanhu, asi kuti ndibvume mipiro yavo.

Uye kuipa nokutyorwa kwemitemo yangu mitsvene nemirairo ndichazviisa pamusoro peavo vakatadzisa basa rangu, kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina, kana vasingatendeuke, uye vachindivenga, vanodaro Ishe Mwari.
Nokudaro, pamusana pezvizvi ndakabvuma mipiro yeavo vandakaraira kuti vavake guta nemba muzita rangu, muruwa rweJackson, Missouri, uye vakatadziswa nevavengi vavo, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.

Uye ndichaunza kutongwa, hasha, kugumbuka, kuwuwura, nekurwadziwa, nekugeda-geda kwemeno pamisoro yavo, kusvika kuchizvarwa chechitatu nechechina, kana vasingatendeuke, uye vachindivenga, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.
Uye izvi ndinozviita mufananidzo kwamuri, kukunyaradzai pamusana peavo vose vakarairwa kuti vaite basa uye vakatadziswa nemaoko evavengi vavo, uye nokudzvinyirirwa, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.
Nokuti ndini Ishe Mwari venyu, uye ndichaponesa vose avo vehama dzenyu vakachena mumwoyo, uye vari vakapondwa munyika yeMissouri, vanodaro Ishe.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokurairai zvakare kuti muvake imba muzita rangu, kunyangwe nzvimbo ino, kuti mugozviratidza kwandiri kuti makatendeka muzvinhu zvose zviri zvipi zvazvo zvandinokurairai, kuti ndikuropafadzei, uye nokukugadzai norukudzo, kusafa, neupenyu hwokusingaperi.

Uye zvino ndinoti kwamuri, zviri maererano neimba yangu yevayeni iyo yandakakurairai kuti muvakire vayeni kuti vagare, ngaivakwe muzita mangu, uye zita rangu ngaritumidzwe pairi, uye regai muranda wangu Joseph nemba yake vawane nzvimbo imomo, kubva kuzvizvarwa nezvizvarwa.
Nokuti kuzodzwa uku ndakuisa pamusoro pake, kuti maropafadzo ake achiiswawo pamusoro pevana vake mushure make.
Uye sekutaura kwandakaita kuna Abrahama pamusoro pemadzinza epasi, kunyangwe saizvozvo ndinoti kumuranda wangu Joseph: Mauri nemumbeu yako madzinza epasi acharopafadzwa.
Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu Joseph nembeu yake vave nenzvimbo mumba iyoyo, zvizvarwa nezvizvarwa, narinhi narinhi, vanodaro, Ishe.
Uye regai zita remba iyoyo rinzi Imba yeNauvoo; uye ngaive imba inofadza kumunhu, uye iri inozorodza mufambi aneta, kuti agofunga nezvekubwinya kweZioni, kubwinya kweiri, dombo rechitsigiro racho;
Kuti agogashira kurairwa kubva kune avo vandakamisa kuti vaite sezvirimwa zvine mbiri, uye sevarindi vari pazvidziro zvake.

Tarisai, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu George Miller, nemuranda wangu Lyman Wight, nemuranda wangu John Snider, nemuranda wangu Peter Haws, vazvironge pachavo, uye vagodoma mumwe wavo kuti ave mutungamiri wechikwata chavo kuti vavake imba iya.
Uye vachaumba bumbiro remitemo, iro rinoita kuti vagokwanisa kugashira pfuma yekuvakisa imba iyoyo.

Uye havazogashira mari iri pasi pemakumi mashanu emadhora semugove wepfuma iri mumba imomo, uye vachabvumirwa kugashira zviuru gumi nezvishanu zvemadhora kubva kunaani zvake munhu mumwechete zvepfuma iri mumba iyoyo.
Asi havazobvumirwa kugashira pfuma inopfuura madhora zviuru gumi nezvishanu kubva kunaani zvake munhu mumwechete.
Uye havazobvumirwa kuti vagashire mari iri pasi pemakumi mashanu emadhora semugove wepfuma kubva kunaani zvake ari mumba imomo.
Uye havazobvumirwa kugashira ani zvake munhu, semuridzi wezvinhu mumba ino, kunze kwekunge iyeyo abhadhara pfuma yake achivapa mumaoko avo paanenge atambira mugove;
Uye zvichienzaniswa nekuwanda kwezvinhu zvaanobhadhahara mumaoko avo achagashira pfuma mumba imomo; asi kana akashaya chaanobhadhara mumaoko avo haazowana pfuma yaanogashira mumba imomo.

Kana ani zvake akabhadhara pfuma mumaoko avo ichave pfuma iri mumba iyoyo, zvake iye pachake nezve zvizvarwa zvake mushure make, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kuchizvarwa nechizvarwa, kana iye nevadyi venhaka yake vakabata pfuma iyoyo, uye vasingatengese kana kuisa zvinhu izvi musiri mumaoko avo nokuda kwavo, kana mukaita kuda kwangu vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana muranda wangu George Miller, nemuranda wangu Lyman Wight, nemuranda wangu John Snider, nemuranda wangu Peter Haws, vakagashira pfuma ipi zvayo mumaoko avo, iri mari, kana midziyo umo mavanotambira kukosha chaiko kwemari, havafanire kushandisa imwe yemari iyoyo pane rimwe basa asi chete mumba imomo.

Uye kana vakashandisa imwe yemari iyoyo mune chimwe chepfuma, kunze kwemumba imomo, vasina mvumo yemubati wepfuma, uye vakasabhadhara zvakapetwa kana pfuma yavanenge vashandisa kumwe, kunze kwemumba imomo, vachatukwa, uye vachabviswa munzvimbo mavo vanodaro Ishe Mwari; nokuti Ini Ishe ndini Mwari uye handigone kusekwa mune chimwe chezvinhu izvi.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Joseph abhadhare pfuma mumaoko avo yekuvaka imba iya, sekuona kwaanoita; asi muranda wangu Joseph haagone kubhadhara mari inopfuura zviuru gumi nezvishanu yepfuma, kana iri pasi pemakumi mashanu emadhora; hapana mumwe munhu anozvibvumirwa, vanodaro Ishe.
Uye kune vamwewo vanoda kuziva chido changu pamusoro pavo, nokuti vakazvikumbira kwandiri.

Nokudaro, ndinoti kwamuri nezvemuranda wangu Vinson Knight, kana achiita kuda kwangu regai aise pfuma mumba iyoyo kuitira iye pachake, uye achiitira chizvara chake mushure make, kubva kuzvizvarwa nezvizvarwa.

Uye regai asimudze izwi rake kwenguva refu uye achidaidzira pakati pevanhu, achichemera dambudziko revarombo nevanoshaya; uye ngaarege kukundikana, kana mwoyo wake ngaurege kuneta; uye ndichabvuma mipiro yake, nokuti haizove kwandiri semipiro yaKaini, nokuti achave wangu, vanodaro Ishe.

Regai mhuri yake ifare uye ibvise mwoyo yayo kune zvinotambudza; nokuti ndamusarudza uye ndikamuzodza, uye acharemekedzwa pakati pemba yake, nokuti ndicharegerera zvivi zvake zvose, vanodaro Ishe. Ameni.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Hyrum aise pfuma mumba iyoyo sezvaanoona zvakanaka kwaari, azviise iye pachake nechizvarwa chake shure kwake, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kune chimwe chizvarwa.

Regai muranda wangu Isaac Galland aise pfuma mumba iyoyo; nokuti ini Ishe, ndinomuda pamusana pebasa raakaita, uye ndicharegerera zvitema zvake zvose; nokudaro, ngaarangarirwe nokuvandudzirwa mumba iyoyo chizvarwa nechizvarwa.

Regai muranda wangu Isaac Galland asarudzwe pakati penyu, uye agadzwe nemuranda wangu William Marks, uye agoropafadzwa naye, kuti aende nemuranda wangu Hyrum kuti vanoita basa iro muranda wangu Joseph achavaratidza, uye ivo vacharopafadzwa zvikuru.
Regai muranda wangu William Marks abhadhare pfuma kumba iyoyo, zviri zvaanoona zvakanaka kwaari, kuzviitira iye pachake uye nechizvarwa chake, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kuchizvarwa.
Regai muranda wangu Henry G. Sherwood abhadhare pfuma mumba iyoyo, zviri zvaanoona zvakanaka kwaari, kuzviitira iye pachake nembeu yake mushure make, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kune chimwe chizvarwa.
Regai muranda wangu William Law abhadhare pfuma mumba iyoyo, kuzviitira iye pachake nembeu yake mushure make, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kune chimwe chizvarwa.
Kana achiita kuda kwangu ngaarege kutora mhuri yake kuenda kunyika dzekumabvazuva, kunyangwe kuKirtland; zvisinei, ini Ishe ndichavaka Kirtland, asi ini Ishe, ndineshamhu yakagadzirirwa vagari vemo.

Uye pamuranda wangu Almon Babbitt, pane zvinhu zvizhinji zvisingandifadze; tarisai, anoda kwazvo kuita zvaanofunga iye kunze kwezveuyo andakagadza, kunyangwe izvo zveHutungamiri hweChechi yangu, uye anomisa mhuru yegoridhe kuti vanhu vangu vainamate.
Musarege munhu achibva panzvimbo ino ariauya pano achiyedza kuchengeta mirairo yangu.
Kana vachigara pano ngavagarire ini, uye kana vachifa ngavafire ini; nokuti vachazorora kubva mukushanda kwavo kwose pano, uye vagoramba vachiita mabasa avo.

Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu William aise ruvimbo rwake mandiri, uye arege kutya pamusoro pemhuri yake, pamusana pekurwara kwenyika. Kana muchindida, chengetai mirairo yangu; uye kurwara kwenyika kuchave kubwinya kwenyu.

Regai muranda wangu William aende anotaura vhangeri rangu risingaperi nezwi guru, uye nokufara kukuru, sekufemerwa kwaanenge achiitwa neMweya wangu, kuvagari vekuWarsaw, nekuvagariwo vekuCarthage, nekuvagariwo vekuBurlington, nekuvagariwo vekuMadison, vamirire nomwoyo murefu akaperera kwazvo kuimwe mirairo pamusangano mukuru vevanhu vose, vanodaro Ishe.

Kana ari achaita kuda kwangu regai kubvira zvino ateerere kumazwi emuranda wangu Joseph, nezvinhu zvake atsigire basa revarombo, uye agoshambadza kududzirwa kutsva kweizwi rangu dzvene kuvagari vepasi.
Uye kana akaita izvi ndinomuropafadza nemaropafadzo akapetwa kazhinji, zvekuti haazosiiwa, kana mbeu yake haizowanikwa ichikumbira chingwa.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu William adomwe, agadzwe, uye azodzwe, segurukota remuranda wangu Joseph, munzvimbo yemuranda wangu Hyrum, kuti muranda wangu Hyrum atore chinzvimbo cheHupirisita nechaPatiriyaki, icho chakapihwa kwaari nababa vake mukuropafadzwa uyewo nekodzero;
Kuti kubvira zvino achabata makiyi emaropafadzo apatiriyaki pamisoro yevanhu vangu.
Kuti ani zvake waacharopafadza acharopafadzwa, uye ani zvake waachatuka achatukwa, kuti chose chaachasunga panyika chichasungwa kudenga; uye chose chaachasunungura panyika chichasunungurwa kudenga.
Uye kubvira nguva ino zvichienda mberi ndichamudoma kuti ave muporofita, uye muoni, uye nemuzaruri kuchechi yangu, pamwechete nemuranda wangu Joseph;

Kuti agoitawo mukubvumiranawo nemuranda wangu Joseph; uye nokuti achagashira kurairwa nemuranda wangu Joseph, uyo achamuratidza kiyi dzekukumbira nawo uye nokugashira, uye achibva apihwa maropafadzo mamwechetewo nokubwinya, nerukudzo, nehupirisita, nezvipo zvehupirisita, izvo zvakamboiswa pane uyo aive muranda wangu Oliver Cowdery;
Kuti muranda wangu Hyrum apupure pamusoro pezvinhu zvandichamuratidza, kuti zita rake rirangarirwe nerukudzo kubva kuchizvarwa nechizvarwa, narinhi narinhi.

Regai muranda wangu William Law naiyewo agashire kiyi idzo dzaanogona kukumbira uye nokugashira maropafadzo; ngaave akazvininipisa pamberi pangu, uye asina hunyengedzi, uye achagashira Mweya wangu, kunyangwe Mweya Munyaradzi, uyo uchaisa pachena kwaari chokwadi chezvinhu zvose, uye uchamupa, munguva yacho chaiyo, zvaachataura.
Uye zviratidzo izvi zvichamutevera—achaporesa vanorwara, achiburitsa mweya yakaipa, uye achanunurwa kubva kune avo vanoda kumupa chepfu inouraya;
Uye achaendeswa nemudzinzira umo mekuti nyoka ine huturu hwakaipa haikwanise kuruma chitsitsinho chake, uye achasimudzwa mukufungidzira kwepfungwa dzake sekunge ari pamapapiro egondo.
Uye kana ndikaita kuti amutse vakafa, ngaarege kudzora izwi rake.
Nokudaro, regai muranda wangu William acheme zvinonzwikwa uye asarege, uye nekufara nokupembera, nemahosana kwaari uyo agere pachigaro chekutonga narinhi narinhi, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.

Tarisai, ndinoti kwamuri, ndine basa randakachengetera muranda wangu William, nemuranda wangu Hyrum, uye nderavo chete; regai muranda wangu Joseph amboramba ari kumba, nokuti ari kudiwa ikoko. Zvasara ndichakuratidzai pashure. Kunyangwe saizvozvo Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana muranda wangu Sidney akashandira ini uye akave gurukota remuranda wangu Joseph, ngaasimuke uye auye azomira munzvimbo yaakadaidzwa, uye azvininipise pamberi pangu.

Uye kana akapira kwandiri mupiro wandinobvuma, uye wandinotambira, uye agoramba aine vanhu vangu, tarisai; ini Ishe Mwari venyu, ndichamuita kuti arapwe; uye achasimudza izwi rake zvakare mumakomo, uye agove mumiriri pamberi peusu hwangu.
Ngaauye azoisa mhuri yake munharaunda inogara muranda wangu Joseph.
Uye munzendo dzake dzose ngaasimudze izwi rake kuti riite sehwamanda, uye achiyambira vagari vemunyika kuti vatize hasha huru dzirikuuya.
Regai ayamure muranda wangu Joseph, uye muregewo muranda wangu William Law ayamure muranda wangu Joseph, mukuita chirevo chinoera kumadzimambo epasi, kunyangwe sezvandakambotaura kwamuri.
Kana muranda wangu Sidney achida kuita kuda kwangu, ngaarege kuendesa mhuri yake kunyika dzekumabvazuva, asi ngaavatamise pavagere, kunyangwe sekutaura kwandaita.
Tarisai, hachisi chido changu kuti atsvage kuwana pasina ngozi nepekupotera, kunze kweguta iro randakakusarudzirai, kunyangwe guta reNauvoo.
Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kunyangwe zvino, kana akateerera kuzwi rangu, zvichave zvakanaka kwaari. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.
Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, regai muranda wangu Amos Davies abhadhare pfuma mumaoko evavo vandakasarudza kuti vavake imba yekugara, kunyangwe Imba yeNauvoo.
Izvi regai aite kana achizove nemugove; uye ngaateerere kuraira kwemuranda wangu Joseph, uye agoshanda nemaoko ake kuti agovimbisika kuvanhu.
Uye kana akagona kuzviratidza kuti anotendeka muzvinhu zvose zvichaiswa mumaoko ake, hongu, kunyangwe zvinhu zvishoma, achaitwa mutongi wezvizhinji.
Regai zvakadaro azvininipise kuti agosimudzirwa kunyangwe saizvozo. Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, kana muranda wangu Robert D. Foster akateerera izwi rangu, regai avake imba yemuranda wangu Joseph maererano nechirangano chaakaita naye, musiwo uchave unozarurwa kwaari nguva nenguva.
Uye ngaatendeuke muhupenzi hwake hwose, uye azvipfekedze rudo rwakadzama; uye arege kuita zvakaipa, uye asiye kutaura kwake kwose kukukutu;
Uye abhadharewo pfuma mumaoko echikwata cheImba yeNauvoo, kuzviitira iye nechizvarwa chake mushure make, kubva kuchizvarwa kusvika kune chimwe chizvarwa;
Uye ateerere kuraira kwevaranda vangu Joseph, naHyrum, naWilliam Law, nekune avo vane masimba vandakadaidza kuti vaise hwaro hweZioni; uye zvichamunakira nariini nariini. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, musarege munhu achibhadhara pfuma kuchikwata cheImba yeNauvoo kunze kwekunge ari anotenda muBhuku raMormoni, nezvakazarurwa zvandakakupai, vanodaro Ishe Mwari.
Nokuti zvinopfuura kana kuita zvishoma pane izvi zvinobva kune wakaipa, uye zvichave zviine kutukwa zvisina maropafadzo, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu. Kunyangwe saizvozvo Ameni.

Uye zvakare, zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, chikwata cheImba yeNauvoo ngachiwane mubairo wakafanira webasa racho rose rachinoita mukuvaka Imba yeNauvoo; uye regai mibairo yavo iite sezvavanenge vabvumirana pakati pavo, maererano nokuti ichava marii.

Uye regai munhu anobhadhara pfuma kana mari ave anobvisawo chikamu chake chemari inotambirwa nevashandi, kana zvichifanira kuvariritira, vanodaro Ishe; nokuti basa ravo richatarwa richatariswa semugove kupfuma yemumba iyoyo. Kunyangwe saizvozvo. Ameni.

Zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, zvino ndave kukupai vabati vezvigaro zveHupirisita hwangu, kuti muve nekiyi; kunyangwe Hupirisita hweboka raMerkizedeki, uhwo huri hweboka reMwanakomana wangu Mumwechete Akaberekwa.

Kutanga, ndinokupai Hyrum Smith kuti ave patiriyaki kwamuri, kuti abate maropafadzo ekusunganidza emuchechi yangu, kunyangwe Mweya Mutsvene weruvimbiso apo pamunosunganidzwa kuzuva rerununuro, kuti musazopunzika kana dai iri nguva yekuyedzwa ingangouya pamuri.
Ndinokupai muranda wangu Joseph kuti ave gosa rinotungamira muchechi rangu rose, kuti ave mududziri, muzaruri, muoni, nemuporofita.
Ndinopa kwavari kuti vave makurukota ake muranda wangu Sidney Rigdon nemuranda wangu William Law, kuti ivava vaumbe chikwata neHutungamiri Hwekutanga, kuti vagotambira zvakazarurwa zvechechi yose.
Ndinokupai muranda wangu Brigham Young kuti ave mutungamiri wevaneGumi neVaviri vedare revanofamba;
Vari ivo vaneGumi neVaviri vakabata makiyi ekuvhura mvumo yeumambo hwangu kumativi mana enyika, uye mushure maizvozvo, kutumira izwi rangu kuchisikwa chose.
NdiHeber C. Kimball, Parley P. Pratt, Orson Pratt, Orson Hyde, William Smith, John Taylor, John E. Page, Wilford Woodruff, Willard Richards, George A. Smith;
David Patten ndamutora ini pachangu; tarisai, hupirisita hwake hapana munhu angahutore kwaari, asi zvirokwazvo ndinoti kwamuri, mumwe angangodomwa kubasa rimwechetero.
Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai dare repamusoro, sedombo rinotsigira eZioni—

Mazita avo ndiSamuel Bent, Henry G. Sherwood, George W. Harris, Charles C. Rich, Thomas Grover, Newel Knight, David Dort, Dunbar Wilson—Seymour Brunson, ndamutora ini pachangu; hapana munhu anotora hupirisita hwake, asi mumwe angangodomwa muhupirisita humwechetehwo munzvimbo yake; uye ndinoti kwamuri regai muranda wangu Aaron Johnson agadzwe mubasa iri munzvimbo yake—David Fullmer, Alpheus Cutler, William Huntington.
Uye zvakare, ndinopa kwamuri Don C. Smith kuti ave mutungamiri wechikwata chemapirisita vepamusoro;
Chiri chisungo chadzikwa nechinangwa chekuti vakodzere avo vachazosarudzwa kuti vave vatungamiri vakamirira kana varanda vanotarisa hoko dzakapararira kwose kwose;
Uye vanogona kufambawo, kana vakasarudza, asi chaizvo vanogadzwa sevatungamiri vakamirira, ndicho chinzvimbo chekudaidzwa kwavo, vanodaro Ishe Mwari venyu.
Ndinokupai Amasa Lyman naNoah Packard semakurukota, kuti vagotungamira chikwata chevapirisita vepamusoro vechechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe.

Uye zvakare, ndinoti kwamuri, ndinokupai John A. Hicks, Samuel Williams, naJesse Baker, vapirisita ava vari ivo vachatungamira chikwata chemagosa, chiri chikwata chakaitirwa vapirisita vanomirira; zvisinei vanogona kufamba, asi vakagadzwa kuti vave mapirisita vakamirira muchechi yangu, vanodaro Ishe.
